 120+ 7BB2 22 86 7A                             ld      (AttractTimer),hl
 121+ 7BB5 3E 80                                ld      a, AttractCounterStart
 122+ 7BB7 32 88 7A                             ld      (AttractCounter),a
 123+ 7BBA C9                                   ret
 124+ 7BBB
 125+ 7BBB
 126+ 7BBB
# file closed: ./Menus/AttractMode.asm
 566  7BBB
 567  7BBB                  include "./Maths/Utilities/XX12EquNodeDotOrientation.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XX12EquNodeDotOrientation.asm
   1+ 7BBB              ; We enter here with hl pointing at XX16 and bc = XX15 value
   2+ 7BBB              ; so xx12 = XX15 * XX16 row
   3+ 7BBB              XX12ProcessOneRow:
   4+ 7BBB              XX12CalcXCell:
   5+ 7BBB ED 4B A6 C0          ld		bc,(UBnkXScaled)
   6+ 7BBF 5E           		ld		e,(hl)								    ; get orientation ZX
   7+ 7BC0 23           		inc		hl
   8+ 7BC1 56           		ld		d,(hl)                                  ; so now e = xx16 value d = xx16 sign
   9+ 7BC2 7A           		ld		a,d
  10+ 7BC3 A8                   xor     b
  11+ 7BC4 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit                            ; a = XX 16 sign
  12+ 7BC6 DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; orientation sign to ixh
  13+ 7BC8 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  14+ 7BC9 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  15+ 7BCB 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  16+ 7BCC E5           		push	hl
  17+ 7BCD 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  18+ 7BCF 60           		ld		h,b
  19+ 7BD0 69           		ld		l,c
  20+ 7BD1 CD 79 97     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  21+ 7BD4 22 45 80     		ld		(XX12PVarResult1),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result, we only want to use high byte later
  22+ 7BD7 DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  23+ 7BD9 32 4C 80     		ld		(XX12PVarSign1),a					    ; S = sign  not sign 1 and 2 are reversed in memory so that fetchign back will put 1 in high byte 2 in low byte
  24+ 7BDC E1           		pop		hl
  25+ 7BDD              XX12CalcYCell:
  26+ 7BDD ED 4B A8 C0          ld		bc,(UBnkYScaled)
  27+ 7BE1 23           		inc		hl
  28+ 7BE2 5E           		ld		e,(hl)							    	; get orientation ZX
  29+ 7BE3 23           		inc		hl
  30+ 7BE4 56           		ld		d,(hl)
  31+ 7BE5 7A           		ld		a,d
  32+ 7BE6 A8                   xor     b
  33+ 7BE7 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit
  34+ 7BE9 DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; XX16 orientation sign to ixh
  35+ 7BEB 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  36+ 7BEC E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  37+ 7BEE 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  38+ 7BEF E5           		push	hl
  39+ 7BF0 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  40+ 7BF2 60           		ld		h,b
  41+ 7BF3 69           		ld		l,c
  42+ 7BF4 CD 79 97     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  43+ 7BF7 22 47 80     		ld		(XX12PVarResult2),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result
  44+ 7BFA DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  45+ 7BFC 32 4B 80     		ld		(XX12PVarSign2),a					    ; S = sign
  46+ 7BFF E1           		pop		hl
  47+ 7C00              XX12CalcZCell:
  48+ 7C00 ED 4B AA C0          ld		bc,(UBnkZScaled)
  49+ 7C04 23           		inc		hl
  50+ 7C05 5E           		ld		e,(hl)								    ; get orientation ZX
  51+ 7C06 23           		inc		hl
  52+ 7C07 56           		ld		d,(hl)
  53+ 7C08 7A           		ld		a,d
  54+ 7C09 A8                   xor     b
  55+ 7C0A E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit
  56+ 7C0C DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; orientation sign to ixh
  57+ 7C0E 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  58+ 7C0F E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  59+ 7C11 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  60+ 7C12 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  61+ 7C14 60           		ld		h,b
  62+ 7C15 69           		ld		l,c
  63+ 7C16 CD 79 97     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  64+ 7C19 22 49 80     		ld		(XX12PVarResult3),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result
  65+ 7C1C DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  66+ 7C1E 32 4D 80     		ld		(XX12PVarSign3),a					    ; S = sign
  67+ 7C21              XX12CalcCellResult:
  68+ 7C21 2A 45 80     		ld		hl,(XX12PVarResult1)				    ; X Cell Result
  69+ 7C24 ED 5B 47 80  		ld		de,(XX12PVarResult2)				    ; Y Cell Result
  70+ 7C28 ED 4B 4B 80  		ld		bc,(XX12PVarSign2)					    ; b = var 1 result sign c = var 2 result signs
  71+ 7C2C              XX12MSBOnly:
  72+ 7C2C 6C           		ld		l,h									    ; now move results into lower byte so / 256
  73+ 7C2D 5A           		ld		e,d									    ; for both results
  74+ 7C2E AF           		xor		a									    ;
  75+ 7C2F 67           		ld		h,a									    ;
  76+ 7C30 57           		ld		d,a									    ; so set high byte to 0
  77+ 7C31 CD B6 94     		call	ADDHLDESignBC                           ;  XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; returns with HL = result1 + result 2 signed in a
  78+ 7C34 47           		ld		b,a									    ; move sign into b ready for next calc
  79+ 7C35 3A 4D 80     		ld		a,(XX12PVarSign3)					    ; result of the calcZ cell
  80+ 7C38 4F           		ld		c,a									    ; goes into c to align with DE
  81+ 7C39 ED 5B 49 80  		ld		de,(XX12PVarResult3)				    ; now add result to Result 3
  82+ 7C3D 5A           		ld		e,d                                     ; d = result /256
  83+ 7C3E 16 00        		ld		d,0									    ; and only us high byte
  84+ 7C40 CD B6 94     		call	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; returns with HL = result and a = sign
  85+ 7C43 C9           		ret											    ; hl = result, a = sign
  86+ 7C44              								    ; hl = result, a = sign
  87+ 7C44
  88+ 7C44              XX12EquNodeDotTransMat:							    ; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high
  89+ 7C44              ;...X cell
  90+ 7C44 21 79 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow0x0     			; process orientation matrix row 0
  91+ 7C47 CD BB 7B             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
  92+ 7C4A 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
  93+ 7C4B 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
  94+ 7C4C B0           		or		b
  95+ 7C4D 32 AD C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
  96+ 7C50 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
  97+ 7C51 32 AC C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
  98+ 7C54              ;...Y cell
  99+ 7C54 21 81 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow1y0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 100+ 7C57 CD BB 7B             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 101+ 7C5A 47           		ld		b,a
 102+ 7C5B 7C           		ld		a,h
 103+ 7C5C              ;		ld		a,l
 104+ 7C5C B0           		or		b
 105+ 7C5D 32 AF C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12ySign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 106+ 7C60 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 107+ 7C61 32 AE C0             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a						; that is result done for
 108+ 7C64              ;...Z cell
 109+ 7C64 21 89 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow2z0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 110+ 7C67 CD BB 7B             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 111+ 7C6A 47           		ld		b,a
 112+ 7C6B 7C                   ld		a,h
 113+ 7C6C              ;		ld		a,l
 114+ 7C6C B0           		or		b
 115+ 7C6D 32 B1 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12zSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 116+ 7C70 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 117+ 7C71 32 B0 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a						; that is result done for
 118+ 7C74 C9                   ret
 119+ 7C75
 120+ 7C75              XX12EquNodeDotOrientation:							; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high
 121+ 7C75              ;...X cell
 122+ 7C75 21 79 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow0x0     			; process orientation matrix row 0
 123+ 7C78 CD BB 7B             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
 124+ 7C7B 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
 125+ 7C7C 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
 126+ 7C7D B0           		or		b
 127+ 7C7E 32 AD C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 128+ 7C81 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 129+ 7C82 32 AC C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
 130+ 7C85              ;...Y cell

 140+ 7C95              ;...Z cell

 147+ 7C9E 32 B1 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12zSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 148+ 7CA1 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now

 152+ 7CA6              XX12EquNodeDotXX16:					         		; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high
 153+ 7CA6              ;...X cell

 155+ 7CA9 CD BB 7B             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
 156+ 7CAC 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
 157+ 7CAD 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
 158+ 7CAE B0           		or		b
 159+ 7CAF 32 AD C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 160+ 7CB2 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 161+ 7CB3 32 AC C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
 162+ 7CB6              ;...Y cell
 163+ 7CB6 21 67 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkTransmatRoofvX     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 164+ 7CB9 CD BB 7B             call    XX12ProcessOneRow

 166+ 7CBD 7C           		ld		a,h
 167+ 7CBE              ;		ld		a,l
 168+ 7CBE B0           		or		b
 169+ 7CBF 32 AF C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12ySign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7

 570  7D4F                  include "./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
   1+ 7D4F              ScaleXX16Matrix197:
   2+ 7D4F                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
   3+ 7D4F ~                                    ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
   4+ 7D4F ~                                    ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
   5+ 7D4F ~                                    MMUSelectMathsTables
   6+ 7D4F ~            .ScaleXX16Loop:         ld		e,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value              ;
   7+ 7D4F ~                                    inc		hl                  ;
   8+ 7D4F ~                                    ld		a,(hl)              ;
   9+ 7D4F ~                                    ld		d,a                 ;
  10+ 7D4F ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  11+ 7D4F ~                                    ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  12+ 7D4F ~                                    ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  13+ 7D4F ~                                    ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  14+ 7D4F ~                                    push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  15+ 7D4F ~                                    push	hl                  ; save HL
  16+ 7D4F ~                                    call    AEquAmul256Div197Log;
  17+ 7D4F ~                                    pop		hl
  18+ 7D4F ~                                    dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  19+ 7D4F ~                                    ld      (hl),a              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  20+ 7D4F ~                                    inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  21+ 7D4F ~                                    ld      a,ixl
  22+ 7D4F ~                                    ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  23+ 7D4F ~                                    pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  24+ 7D4F ~                                    inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  25+ 7D4F ~                                    djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  26+ 7D4F ~                                    MMUSelectROM0
  27+ 7D4F ~                                    ret
  28+ 7D4F                      ELSE
  29+ 7D4F 06 09                                ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
  30+ 7D51 0E C5                                ld		c,ConstNorm         ; c = 197
  31+ 7D53 21 61 C0                             ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
  32+ 7D56 7E           .ScaleXX16Loop:         ld		a,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value
  33+ 7D57 5F                                   ld		e,a                 ;
  34+ 7D58 23                                   inc		hl                  ;
  35+ 7D59 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)              ;
  36+ 7D5A 57                                   ld		d,a                 ;
  37+ 7D5B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  38+ 7D5D DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  39+ 7D5F                                      ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  39+ 7D5F CB 23       >			   sla e
  39+ 7D61 CB 12       >			   rl  d
  40+ 7D63 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  41+ 7D64 C5                                   push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  42+ 7D65 E5                                   push	hl                  ; save HL
  43+ 7D66 CD FB 99                             call	DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC; AEquAmul256DivD; DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	; result in BC = A*256 / 197 or D *512 / 197 = 2.6 * vector element, effectivley the result will always be in c
  44+ 7D69 E1                                   pop		hl
  45+ 7D6A 2B                                   dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  46+ 7D6B 71                                   ld      (hl),c              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  47+ 7D6C 23                                   inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  48+ 7D6D                                  ;    ld      a,(hl)
  49+ 7D6D                                  ;    and     $80
  50+ 7D6D DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
  51+ 7D6F 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  52+ 7D70 C1                                   pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  53+ 7D71 23                                   inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  54+ 7D72 10 E2                                djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  55+ 7D74 C9                                   ret
  56+ 7D75                      ENDIF
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
 571  7D75
 572  7D75                  include "./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm
   1+ 7D75              ;note: DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC as per
   2+ 7D75              ;                                   BC = A0
   3+ 7D75              ;                                   DE = 0C
   4+ 7D75              ;                                   so BC = a * 256 / C
   5+ 7D75
   6+ 7D75              ; We can cheat here, Speed is always 0 or positive
   7+ 7D75              ; z postion will always be positive if we can see it
   8+ 7D75
   9+ 7D75 EB           InitStarAtHL:           ex      de,hl               ; preserving hl
  10+ 7D76 CD 18 8A                             call    doRND               ; a = random OR bit 5
  11+ 7D79 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  12+ 7D7A F6 08                                or      8                   ; .
  13+ 7D7C 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; save to x pos
  14+ 7D7D E6 7F                                and     $7F                 ; a = abs a
  15+ 7D7F 23                                   inc     hl                  ;
  16+ 7D80 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ;
  17+ 7D81 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; preserving hl
  18+ 7D82 CD 18 8A                             call    doRND               ; a = -ve (random / 2)
  19+ 7D85 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  20+ 7D86 0F                                   rrca                        ; .
  21+ 7D87 E6 80                                and     $80                 ; .
  22+ 7D89 B6                                   or      (hl)                ; or with
  23+ 7D8A 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  24+ 7D8B 23                                   inc     hl
  25+ 7D8C EB                                   ex      de,hl
  26+ 7D8D CD 18 8A                             call    doRND
  27+ 7D90 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  28+ 7D91 F6 04                                or      4
  29+ 7D93 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  30+ 7D94 23                                   inc     hl
  31+ 7D95 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  32+ 7D97 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  33+ 7D98 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  34+ 7D99 CD 18 8A                             call    doRND
  35+ 7D9C EB                                   ex      de,hl
  36+ 7D9D 0F                                   rrca
  37+ 7D9E E6 80                                and     $80
  38+ 7DA0 B6                                   or      (hl)
  39+ 7DA1 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  40+ 7DA2 23                                   inc     hl
  41+ 7DA3 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  42+ 7DA4 CD 18 8A                             call    doRND
  43+ 7DA7 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  44+ 7DA8 F6 90                                or      144
  45+ 7DAA 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  46+ 7DAB 23                                   inc     hl
  47+ 7DAC F6 70                                or      %01110000
  48+ 7DAE E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  49+ 7DB0 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  50+ 7DB1 23                                   inc     hl
  51+ 7DB2 C9                                   ret
  52+ 7DB3
  53+ 7DB3 EB           InitHyperStarAtHL:      ex      de,hl
  54+ 7DB4 CD 18 8A                             call    doRND
  55+ 7DB7 CB 27                                sla     a
  56+ 7DB9 CB 27                                sla     a                ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  57+ 7DBB EB                                   ex      de,hl
  58+ 7DBC E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  59+ 7DBE 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  60+ 7DBF E6 7F                                and     $7F
  61+ 7DC1 23                                   inc     hl
  62+ 7DC2 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  63+ 7DC3 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  64+ 7DC4 CD 18 8A                             call    doRND
  65+ 7DC7 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  66+ 7DC8 0F                                   rrca
  67+ 7DC9 E6 80                                and     $80
  68+ 7DCB B6                                   or      (hl)
  69+ 7DCC 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  70+ 7DCD 23                                   inc     hl
  71+ 7DCE EB                                   ex      de,hl
  72+ 7DCF CD 18 8A                             call    doRND
  73+ 7DD2 CB 27                                sla     a
  74+ 7DD4 CB 27                                sla     a               ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  75+ 7DD6 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  76+ 7DD7 E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  77+ 7DD9 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  78+ 7DDA 23                                   inc     hl
  79+ 7DDB E6 7F                                and     $7F
  80+ 7DDD 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  81+ 7DDE EB                                   ex      de,hl
  82+ 7DDF CD 18 8A                             call    doRND
  83+ 7DE2 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  84+ 7DE3 0F                                   rrca
  85+ 7DE4 E6 80                                and     $80
  86+ 7DE6 B6                                   or      (hl)
  87+ 7DE7 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  88+ 7DE8 23                                   inc     hl
  89+ 7DE9 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  90+ 7DEA CD 18 8A                             call    doRND
  91+ 7DED EB                                   ex      de,hl
  92+ 7DEE F6 5F                                or      95
  93+ 7DF0 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  94+ 7DF1 23                                   inc     hl
  95+ 7DF2 F6 70                                or      %01110000
  96+ 7DF4 E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  97+ 7DF6 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  98+ 7DF7 23                                   inc     hl
  99+ 7DF8 C9                                   ret
 100+ 7DF9
 101+ 7DF9              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 102+ 7DF9 06 0B        InitialiseStars:        ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 103+ 7DFB 21 D0 86                             ld      hl,varDust
 104+ 7DFE CD 75 7D     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitStarAtHL
 105+ 7E01 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 106+ 7E03 C9                                   ret
 107+ 7E04              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 108+ 7E04 06 0B        InitialiseHyperStars:   ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 109+ 7E06 21 D0 86                             ld      hl,varDust
 110+ 7E09 CD B3 7D     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitHyperStarAtHL
 111+ 7E0C 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 112+ 7E0E C9                                   ret
 113+ 7E0F              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 114+ 7E0F 06 0B        DustForward:            ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars                  ; get the number of stars to process
 115+ 7E11 FD 21 D0 86                          ld      iy,varDust                          ; hl is now a pointer to the dust array
 116+ 7E15 C5           StarProcessLoop:        push    bc                                  ; save counter +1
 117+ 7E16 FD 7E 05     .Qequ64XSpeedDivZHi:    ld      a,(iy+5)                            ; e  = z high
 118+ 7E19 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; d = 0
 119+ 7E1A 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; de = zhi/256
 120+ 7E1C 3A 6E 84                             ld      a,(DELTA)                           ; a = speed
 121+ 7E1F                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .NormalSpeed               ; if we are stationary set speed
 121+ 7E1F A7          >                        and     a
 121+ 7E20 C2 24 7E    >                        jp	    nz,.NormalSpeed
 122+ 7E23 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; so it is at least some dust movement
 123+ 7E24 47           .NormalSpeed:           ld      b,a                                 ;
 124+ 7E25 0E 00                                ld      c,0                                 ; bc = delta * 256
 125+ 7E27 CD 87 9A                             call    BC_Div_DE                           ; BC = Speed/Z , HL = remainder
 126+ 7E2A                                      ShiftHLRight1
 126+ 7E2A CB 3C       >			   srl h
 126+ 7E2C CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 127+ 7E2E                                      ShiftHLRight1                               ; hl = remainder/2 so now 64 * speed / zhi
 127+ 7E2E CB 3C       >			   srl h
 127+ 7E30 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 128+ 7E32 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ;
 129+ 7E33 F6 01                                or      1                                   ; so ensure A is at least 1 for ambient movement
 130+ 7E35 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                               ; preserve A which is also VarQ = 64 * speed / zhi
 131+ 7E37 FD 6E 04 FD  .ZequZMinusSpeedX64:    ld      hl,(iy+4)                           ; hl = z
 131+ 7E3B 66 05
 132+ 7E3D ED 5B 6F 84                          ld      de, (DELTA4)                         ; de = delta4 i.e. speed * 64 pre computed
 133+ 7E41 CD A8 95                             call    subHLDES15
 134+ 7E44                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,ResetStar                  ; if z ended up negative then reset the star
 134+ 7E44 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 134+ 7E46 C2 9B 7F    >                        jp      nz,ResetStar
 135+ 7E49 FD 75 04 FD                          ld      (iy+4),hl                           ; save new z pos
 135+ 7E4D 74 05
 136+ 7E4F FD 6E 00 FD  .XEquXPlusXhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; hl  = x
 136+ 7E53 66 01
 137+ 7E55 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 138+ 7E56 E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 139+ 7E58 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(x hi)
 140+ 7E59 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 141+ 7E5B ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(x hi) * Q
 142+ 7E5D 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 143+ 7E5E E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 144+ 7E60 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 145+ 7E61 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 146+ 7E62 CD D9 94                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; x = x + (x hi/256 * Q)
 147+ 7E65 7C                                   ld      a,h
 148+ 7E66 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 149+ 7E68                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $70, ResetStar
 149+ 7E68 FE 70       >                        cp     $70
 149+ 7E6A D2 9B 7F    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 150+ 7E6D FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl                           ;
 150+ 7E71 74 01
 151+ 7E73 FD 6E 02 FD  .YEquYPlusYhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; hl  = y
 151+ 7E77 66 03
 152+ 7E79 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 153+ 7E7A E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 154+ 7E7C 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(y hi)
 155+ 7E7D DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 156+ 7E7F ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(y hi) * Q
 157+ 7E81 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 158+ 7E82 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 159+ 7E84 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 160+ 7E85 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 161+ 7E86 CD D9 94                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; y = y + (x hi/256 * Q)
 162+ 7E89 7C                                   ld      a,h
 163+ 7E8A E6 7F                                and     $7F
 164+ 7E8C                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60, ResetStar
 164+ 7E8C FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 164+ 7E8E D2 9B 7F    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 165+ 7E91 7C                                   ld      a,h
 166+ 7E92 E6 80                                and     $80
 167+ 7E94 20 06                                jr      nz,.NoSecondCheck
 168+ 7E96 7C                                   ld      a,h
 169+ 7E97                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $20, ResetStar
 169+ 7E97 FE 20       >                        cp     $20
 169+ 7E99 D2 9B 7F    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 170+ 7E9C FD 75 02 FD  .NoSecondCheck:         ld      (iy+2),hl                           ;
 170+ 7EA0 74 03
 171+ 7EA2              ; Now roll
 172+ 7EA2              ;  6. x = x - alpha * y / 256
 173+ 7EA2 3A 89 83     .XRoll:                 ld      a,(ALP1)                           ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 174+ 7EA5 FE 00                                cp      0
 175+ 7EA7 28 4D                                jr      z,.NoRoll                           ; don;t roll if magnitude is 0
 176+ 7EA9                                   ;   break
 177+ 7EA9 6F                                   ld      l,a                                 ; roll magnitude
 178+ 7EAA 3A 8B 83                             ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)                        ; inverted roll sign
 179+ 7EAD E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                        ; sanitise sign bit
 180+ 7EAF 67                                   ld      h,a                                 ; h = roll sign
 181+ 7EB0 E5                                   push    hl                                  ; save on the stack
 182+ 7EB1 4F           .rxSaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 183+ 7EB2 55           .rxDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 184+ 7EB3 FD 7E 03                             ld      a,(iy+3)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 185+ 7EB6 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save signed byte
 186+ 7EB7 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                        ; a = sign only
 187+ 7EB9 47           .rxBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 188+ 7EBA 7B           .rxEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e                                 ; e = abs byte
 189+ 7EBB E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 190+ 7EBD 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 191+ 7EBE ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 192+ 7EC0 79                                   ld      a,c                                 ; get back sign from roll
 193+ 7EC1 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 194+ 7EC2 B2                                   or      d
 195+ 7EC3 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 196+ 7EC4 FD 6E 00 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 196+ 7EC8 66 01
 197+ 7ECA CD A8 95                             call    subHLDES15                       ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 198+ 7ECD FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl
 198+ 7ED1 74 01
 199+ 7ED3              ;  5. y = y + alpha * x / 256
 200+ 7ED3              .YRoll:                 ;break
 201+ 7ED3 E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 202+ 7ED4 4C           .rySaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,h                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 203+ 7ED5 55           .ryDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 204+ 7ED6 FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 205+ 7ED9 5F                                   ld      e,a
 206+ 7EDA E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 207+ 7EDC 47           .ryBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 208+ 7EDD 7B           .ryEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 209+ 7EDE E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 210+ 7EE0 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 211+ 7EE1 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 212+ 7EE3 79                                   ld      a,c
 213+ 7EE4 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 214+ 7EE5 B2                                   or      d
 215+ 7EE6 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 216+ 7EE7 FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 216+ 7EEB 66 03
 217+ 7EED CD D9 94                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 218+ 7EF0 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 218+ 7EF4 74 03
 219+ 7EF6 3A 7D 83     .NoRoll:                ld      a,(BET1)
 220+ 7EF9 FE 00                                cp      0
 221+ 7EFB 28 22                                jr      z,.NoPitch
 222+ 7EFD              ;  8. y = y - beta * 256
 223+ 7EFD 57           .YPitch:                ld      d,a                                 ; d = BET1
 224+ 7EFE FD 7E 02                             ld      a,(iy+2)
 225+ 7F01 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; e = Y HI
 226+ 7F02 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de = BET1 * YHi so now D = BETA & YHI / 256
 227+ 7F04 5F                                   ld      e,a
 228+ 7F05 ED 30                                mul                                         ; so now de = (BETA & Yhi) ^ 2
 229+ 7F07                                      ShiftDELeft1                                ; de = 2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2)
 229+ 7F07 CB 23       >			   sla e
 229+ 7F09 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 230+ 7F0B 3A 7E 83                             ld      a,(BET2)                            ; get inverted Sign
 231+ 7F0E B2                                   or      d
 232+ 7F0F 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = - (2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2))
 233+ 7F10 FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)
 233+ 7F14 66 03
 234+ 7F16 CD D9 94                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4
 235+ 7F19 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 235+ 7F1D 74 03
 236+ 7F1F              ; now work out screen pos
 237+ 7F1F              ; Note two optimistations, write to layer 2 - we get a free removal via double buffer cls
 238+ 7F1F              ; read z dept than determine hw many pixesl to plot, e.g. 1,2,3,4
 239+ 7F1F              ;        pop     de
 240+ 7F1F               ;       call    ProjectStarXToScreen
 241+ 7F1F                                      ;pop     de
 242+ 7F1F              .NoPitch:
 243+ 7F1F FD 7E 01     .ProjectStar:           ld      a,(iy+1)
 244+ 7F22 6F                                   ld      l,a
 245+ 7F23 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 246+ 7F25                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegXPt
 246+ 7F25 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 246+ 7F27 C2 30 7F    >                        jp      nz,StarNegXPt
 247+ 7F2A C6 80                                add     a,$80
 248+ 7F2C 4F                                   ld      c,a
 249+ 7F2D C3 35 7F                             jp      StarDoneX
 250+ 7F30 47           StarNegXPt:             ld      b,a
 251+ 7F31 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 252+ 7F33 90                                   sub     b
 253+ 7F34 4F                                   ld      c,a
 254+ 7F35 FD 7E 03     StarDoneX:              ld      a,(iy+3)
 255+ 7F38 6F                                   ld      l,a
 256+ 7F39 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 257+ 7F3B                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegYPt
 257+ 7F3B CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 257+ 7F3D C2 46 7F    >                        jp      nz,StarNegYPt
 258+ 7F40 C6 60                                add     a,$60
 259+ 7F42 47                                   ld      b,a
 260+ 7F43 C3 4B 7F                             jp      StarDoneY
 261+ 7F46 47           StarNegYPt:             ld      b,a
 262+ 7F47 3E 60                                ld      a,$60
 263+ 7F49 90                                   sub     b
 264+ 7F4A 47                                   ld      b,a
 265+ 7F4B 3E 92        StarDoneY:              ld      a,L2DustColour
 266+ 7F4D C5                                   push    bc
 267+ 7F4E              .DrawStar:              MMUSelectLayer2
 267+ 7F4E ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 267+ 7F52 CD 83 E1       call    l2_plot_pixel
 268+ 7F55 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 269+ 7F58 C1                                   pop    bc
 270+ 7F59                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60,EndofStarsLoop
 270+ 7F59 FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 270+ 7F5B D2 8B 7F    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 271+ 7F5E 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 272+ 7F60 0C                                   inc     c
 273+ 7F61 C5                                   push    bc
 274+ 7F62                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 274+ 7F62 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 275+ 7F66 CD 83 E1                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 276+ 7F69 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 277+ 7F6C C1                                   pop    bc
 278+ 7F6D                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $37,EndofStarsLoop
 278+ 7F6D FE 37       >                        cp     $37
 278+ 7F6F D2 8B 7F    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 279+ 7F72 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 280+ 7F74 04                                   inc     b
 281+ 7F75 C5                                   push    bc
 282+ 7F76                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 282+ 7F76 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 282+ 7F7A CD 83 E1         call    l2_plot_pixel
 283+ 7F7D FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 284+ 7F80 C1                                   pop    bc
 285+ 7F81 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 286+ 7F83 0D                                   dec     c
 287+ 7F84                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 287+ 7F84 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 287+ 7F88 CD 83 E1         call    l2_plot_pixel
 288+ 7F8B C1           EndofStarsLoop:         pop     bc                                      ;  0
 289+ 7F8C FD E5        NextStarLoop3:          push    iy                                      ; +1
 290+ 7F8E E1                                   pop     hl                                      ;  0
 291+ 7F8F ED 34 06 00                          add     hl,6
 292+ 7F93 E5           NextStarLoop2:          push    hl                                      ; +1
 293+ 7F94 FD E1                                pop     iy                                      ;  0
 294+ 7F96 05                                   dec     b
 295+ 7F97 C2 15 7E                             jp      nz,StarProcessLoop
 296+ 7F9A C9                                   ret
 297+ 7F9B C1           ResetStar:              pop     bc                                      ; 0
 298+ 7F9C FD E5                                push    iy                                      ; +1 (current star)
 299+ 7F9E E1                                   pop     hl                                      ; 0
 300+ 7F9F CD 75 7D                             call    InitStarAtHL
 301+ 7FA2 C3 8C 7F                             jp      NextStarLoop3
 302+ 7FA5              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 303+ 7FA5 FD 4E 00     ProjectStarXToScreen:   ld      c,(iy+0)
 304+ 7FA8 FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)
 305+ 7FAB 6F                                   ld      l,a
 306+ 7FAC E6 7F                                and     $7F
 307+ 7FAE 47                                   ld      b,a
 308+ 7FAF CD 12 9A                             call    DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 309+ 7FB2 7D                                   ld      a,l
 310+ 7FB3                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarXNegativePoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 310+ 7FB3 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 310+ 7FB5 C2 C0 7F    >                        jp      nz,StarXNegativePoint
 311+ 7FB8              ;StarXPositivePoint:									; x was positive result
 312+ 7FB8 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
 313+ 7FBA 26 00                                ld          h,0
 314+ 7FBC 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
 315+ 7FBD C3 C7 7F                             jp          StarStoreXPoint
 316+ 7FC0              StarXNegativePoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
 317+ 7FC0 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX
 318+ 7FC2 26 00                                ld          h,0
 319+ 7FC4                                      ClearCarryFlag
 319+ 7FC4 B7          >                        or a
 320+ 7FC5 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
 321+ 7FC7              StarStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 322+ 7FC7 7D                                   ld          a,l
 323+ 7FC8 32 28 87                             ld          (varStarX),a
 324+ 7FCB C9                                   ret
 325+ 7FCC
 326+ 7FCC FD 46 02     ProjectStarYToScreen:   ld          b,(iy+2)
 327+ 7FCF FD 7E 03                             ld          a,(iy+3)
 328+ 7FD2 6F                                   ld          l,a
 329+ 7FD3 E6 7F                                and         $7F
 330+ 7FD5 47                                   ld          b,a
 331+ 7FD6 CD 12 9A                             call        DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 332+ 7FD9 7D                                   ld          a,l                                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 333+ 7FDA                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
 333+ 7FDA CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 333+ 7FDC C2 E7 7F    >                        jp      nz,StarNegativeYPoint
 334+ 7FDF                                  ;StarPositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
 335+ 7FDF 2E 60                               ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 336+ 7FE1                                      ClearCarryFlag
 336+ 7FE1 B7          >                        or a
 337+ 7FE2 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
 338+ 7FE4 C3 EC 7F                             jp          StarStoreYPoint
 339+ 7FE7              StarNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
 340+ 7FE7 2E 60                                ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 341+ 7FE9 26 00                                ld          h,0
 342+ 7FEB 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
 343+ 7FEC              StarStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 344+ 7FEC 7D                                   ld          a,l
 345+ 7FED 32 29 87                             ld          (varStarY),a
 346+ 7FF0 C9                                   ret
 347+ 7FF1
 348+ 7FF1
# file closed: ./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm

 574  7FF1              ;    include "./ModelRender/draw_object.asm"
 575  7FF1              ;    include "./ModelRender/draw_ship_point.asm"
 576  7FF1              ;    include "./ModelRender/drawforwards-LL17.asm"
 577  7FF1              ;    include "./ModelRender/drawforwards-LL17.asm"

 579  7FF1                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
   1+ 7FF1
   2+ 7FF1 00           memfillvalue		DB 0
   3+ 7FF2 83 C3 C7 CB  memfill        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   3+ 7FF6 7D
   4+ 7FF7 F1 7F        memfill_astrt  		DW memfillvalue
   5+ 7FF9 00 40        memfill_length 		DB $00,$40
   6+ 7FFB 24 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1FIXED_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   7+ 7FFE 00 00        memfill_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   8+ 8000 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   9+ 8004              memfill_cmd_len	  	EQU $ - memfill
  10+ 8004
  11+ 8004              memfill_dma:
  12+ 8004              ; "memfill_dma, hl = address to fill, a = value, de = length"
  13+ 8004              .set_fill_value:
  14+ 8004 32 F1 7F     	ld 		(memfillvalue),a
  15+ 8007              .set_target:
  16+ 8007 22 FE 7F     	ld		(memfill_bstrt),hl
  17+ 800A              .set_length:
  18+ 800A ED 53 F9 7F  	ld		(memfill_length),de
  19+ 800E              .write_dma:
  20+ 800E 21 F2 7F     	ld 		hl, memfill
  21+ 8011 06 12        	ld 		b, memfill_cmd_len
  22+ 8013 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  23+ 8015 ED B3        	otir
  24+ 8017 C9           	ret
  25+ 8018
# file closed: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
 580  8018                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm
   1+ 8018
   2+ 8018 83 C3 C7 CB  memcopy        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   2+ 801C 7D
   3+ 801D 00 00        memcopy_astrt  		DB $00,$00
   4+ 801F 00 40        memcopy_length 		DB $00,$40
   5+ 8021 14 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   6+ 8024 00 00        memcopy_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   7+ 8026 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   8+ 802A              memcopy_cmd_len	  	equ $ - memcopy
   9+ 802A
  10+ 802A              memcopy_dma:
  11+ 802A              ; "memcopy_dma, hl = target address de = source address to copy, bc = length"
  12+ 802A              .set_target:
  13+ 802A 22 24 80     	ld		(memcopy_bstrt),hl
  14+ 802D              .set_source:
  15+ 802D ED 53 1D 80  	ld		(memcopy_astrt),de
  16+ 8031              .set_length:
  17+ 8031 ED 43 1F 80  	ld		(memcopy_length),bc
  18+ 8035              .write_dma:
  19+ 8035 21 18 80     	ld 		hl, memcopy
  20+ 8038 06 12        	ld 		b, memcopy_cmd_len
  21+ 803A 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  22+ 803C ED B3        	otir
  23+ 803E C9           	ret
  24+ 803F
# file closed: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm

 182+ 804E 00 00 00...  Keys					DS	40          ; This is the list of key states for all the VK keys presssed i.e. VK_CAPS through to VK_B
 183+ 8076              c_KeyBoardLen 			equ $ - Keys
 184+ 8076 00 00 00...  RawKeys					DS	8
 185+ 807E FE FD FB F7  KeyAddrTab				DB	$FE, $FD, $FB, $F7, $EF, $DF, $BF, $7F
 185+ 8082 EF DF BF 7F
 186+ 8086              ; Now keyboard map lists each game key and the corresponding address in the Keys table to get the value. This way redefining keys is just a case
 187+ 8086              ; of updating this table with the respective location to look up
 188+ 8086              ; key list sequence is in table above
 189+ 8086 5D 80 5E 80  KeyboardMap             DW  Keys+KeyCode_Front        ,Keys+KeyCode_Aft          ,Keys+KeyCode_Left         ,Keys+KeyCode_Right        ,Keys+KeyCode_RollLeft
 189+ 808A 5F 80 60 80
 189+ 808E 68 80
 190+ 8090 67 80 58 80                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_RollRight    ,Keys+KeyCode_Dive         ,Keys+KeyCode_Climb        ,Keys+KeyCode_Accellerate  ,Keys+KeyCode_Decellerate
 190+ 8094 53 80 59 80
 190+ 8098 54 80
 191+ 809A 71 80 5C 80                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_FireLaser    ,Keys+KeyCode_TargetMissle ,Keys+KeyCode_FireMissile  ,Keys+KeyCode_UnarmMissile ,Keys+KeyCode_ECM
 191+ 809E 56 80 5B 80
 191+ 80A2 5A 80
 192+ 80A4 6A 80 4E 80                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_EnergyBomb   ,Keys+KeyCode_EscapePod    ,Keys+KeyCode_DockingComp  ,Keys+KeyCode_Hyperspace   ,Keys+KeyCode_Distance
 192+ 80A8 74 80 70 80

 207+ 8102
 208+ 8102              ; mapping of a code to the lookup table Keyboard map. So if you are using an addr_Pressed you can then fetch from KeyboardMap the address in Keys
 209+ 8102              ; for the raw key press status
 210+ 8102              addr_Pressed_Front         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Front
 211+ 8102              addr_Pressed_Aft           equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Aft
 212+ 8102              addr_Pressed_Left          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Left
 213+ 8102              addr_Pressed_Right         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Right
 214+ 8102              addr_Pressed_RollLeft      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_RollLeft
 215+ 8102              addr_Pressed_RollRight     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_RollRight
 216+ 8102              addr_Pressed_Dive          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Dive
 217+ 8102              addr_Pressed_Climb         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Climb
 218+ 8102              addr_Pressed_Accellerate   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Accellerate
 219+ 8102              addr_Pressed_Decellerate   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Decellerate
 220+ 8102              addr_Pressed_FireLaser     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_FireLaser
 221+ 8102              addr_Pressed_TargetMissle  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_TargetMissle
 222+ 8102              addr_Pressed_FireMissile   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_FireMissile
 223+ 8102              addr_Pressed_UnarmMissile  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_UnarmMissile
 224+ 8102              addr_Pressed_ECM           equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_ECM
 225+ 8102              addr_Pressed_EnergyBomb    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_EnergyBomb
 226+ 8102              addr_Pressed_EscapePod     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_EscapePod

 230+ 8102              addr_Pressed_HomeCursor    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_HomeCursor
 231+ 8102              addr_Pressed_Launch        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Launch
 232+ 8102              addr_Pressed_BuyCargo      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_BuyCargo
 233+ 8102              addr_Pressed_SellCargo     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_SellCargo
 234+ 8102              addr_Pressed_Equip         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Equip
 235+ 8102              addr_Pressed_GalacticChrt  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GalacticChrt
 236+ 8102              addr_Pressed_LocalChart    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_LocalChart
 237+ 8102              addr_Pressed_MarketPrices  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_MarketPrices
 238+ 8102              addr_Pressed_Status        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Status
 239+ 8102              addr_Pressed_Inventory     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Inventory
 240+ 8102              addr_Pressed_GameSkip      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GameSkip
 241+ 8102              addr_Pressed_Save          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Save

 243+ 8102              addr_Pressed_Resume        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Resume

 245+ 8102              addr_Pressed_Quit          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Quit

 249+ 8102              addr_Pressed_Find          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Find
 250+ 8102
 251+ 8102
 252+ 8102              MIsKeyPressed:          MACRO   keyaddress, misstarget
 253+ 8102 ~                                    ld      hl,(keyaddress)
 254+ 8102 ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
 255+ 8102 ~                                    JumpIfAIsZero   misstarget
 256+ 8102                                      ENDM
 257+ 8102
 258+ 8102 21 4E 80     init_keyboard:          ld		hl,Keys                         ; no key s are pressed by default
 259+ 8105 11 28 00                             ld		de, c_KeyBoardLen               ;
 260+ 8108 3E 00                                ld		a,0                             ;
 261+ 810A CD 04 80                             call	memfill_dma                     ;
 262+ 810D C9                                   ret                                     ;
 263+ 810E
 264+ 810E
 265+ 810E
 266+ 810E DD 21 76 80  scan_keyboard:          ld		ix,RawKeys                      ; hl = table of raw IO port readings
 267+ 8112 21 7E 80                             ld		hl,KeyAddrTab                   ; de = table of IO ports to read
 268+ 8115 0E 08                                ld		c,8                             ; 8 ports to ready
 269+ 8117 11 4E 80                             ld      de,Keys                         ; ix = table of key states from raw read
 270+ 811A 7E           .PortReadLoop:          ld		a,(hl)							; Set up port to read as (hl)$FE
 271+ 811B DB FE                                in		a,($FE)							; read port to a
 272+ 811D DD 77 00                             ld      (ix+0),a                        ; save raw scan
 273+ 8120 DD 23                                inc     ix
 274+ 8122 23                                   inc		hl                              ; and ready for next read
 275+ 8123 06 05        .ProcessInputBits:      ld		b,5								; loop all bits (there are only 5 keys to a group)
 276+ 8125 1F           .ProcessBitsLoop:       rra                                     ; shit bit 0 into carry
 277+ 8126 CB 47                                bit		0,a								; is bit set
 278+ 8128 30 08                                jr      nc,.SetKeyPressed               ; low bit means it was pressed
 279+ 812A FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 280+ 812C                                      ZeroA
 280+ 812C AF          >                        xor a
 281+ 812D C3 3A 81                             jp      .SetKey
 282+ 8130 20 0B                                jr		nz,.SkipKeySet
 283+ 8132 FD 6F        .SetKeyPressed:	        ld      iyl,a                           ; save current input byte
 284+ 8134 1A                                   ld      a,(de)                          ; get current keystate
 285+ 8135 FE 02                                cp      2
 286+ 8137 28 02                                jr      z,.AlreadyHeld
 287+ 8139 3C                                   inc     a                               ; and increment by 1 as its moved from previous state
 288+ 813A 12           .SetKey:                ld		(de),a				  	        ; save key Pressed state
 289+ 813B FD 7D        .AlreadyHeld:           ld      a,iyl                           ; and retrieve the current input byte
 290+ 813D 13           .SkipKeySet:	        inc		de								; move to next key
 291+ 813E 10 E5                                djnz	.ProcessBitsLoop				; Process all key group bits
 292+ 8140 0D                                   dec     c                               ; thats one row of bits all processed
 293+ 8141 20 D7                                jr      nz,.PortReadLoop				; Read next input port
 294+ 8143 C9                                   ret
 295+ 8144
 296+ 8144
 297+ 8144
 298+ 8144              GetKeyStateAddressDE:   MACRO
 299+ 8144 ~                                    ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 300+ 8144 ~                                    add     hl,a
 301+ 8144 ~                                    ld      e,(hl)
 302+ 8144 ~                                    inc     hl
 303+ 8144 ~                                    ld      d,(hl)                          ; now de = address in keypress list
 304+ 8144                                      ENDM
 305+ 8144
 306+ 8144              GetKeyStateAddressHL:   MACRO
 307+ 8144 ~                                    ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 308+ 8144 ~                                    add     hl,a
 309+ 8144 ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
 310+ 8144 ~                                    inc     hl
 311+ 8144 ~                                    ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 312+ 8144 ~                                    ld      l,a
 313+ 8144                                      ENDM

 348+ 8144              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,'O'
 349+ 8144              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 350+ 8144              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 351+ 8144              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 352+ 8144              ;;old debug code                        add         a,8
 353+ 8144              ;;old debug code                        ld          (CurrentX),a
 354+ 8144              ;;old debug code                        pop         af
 355+ 8144              ;;old debug code                        pop         bc,,hl
 356+ 8144              ;;old debug code                        djnz        .displayLoop
 357+ 8144              ;;old debug code                        ret
 358+ 8144              ;;old debug code

 365+ 8144              ;;old debug code                        ld      a,"*"
 366+ 8144              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1

 376+ 8144              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1

 381+ 8144
 382+ 8144              ; call with a = c_Pressed key, will then read mapping does this with keyboard scan, waits until key gets to state 1, if it was already held then#
 383+ 8144              ; it will have to be let go to reset of 0 and scan again
 384+ 8144              ; Deprecated as not used as yet
 385+ 8144              ;;;;;;wait_for_key_a_press:   GetKeyStateAddressHL
 386+ 8144              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 387+ 8144              ;;;;;;.wait_loop:             call    scan_keyboard
 388+ 8144              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl                              ; get key address into hl
 389+ 8144              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 390+ 8144              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,(hl)
 391+ 8144              ;;;;;;                        JumpIfANENusng  1,.wait_loop             ; will also loop if held down when entering this routine
 392+ 8144              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl                              ; tidy up rogue push, less t states than detecting if we want to push or not
 393+ 8144              ;;;;;;                        ret
 394+ 8144              ;;;;;;; call with a = c_Pressed key, will then read mapping does this with keyboard scan waits until key gets to state 2
 395+ 8144              ;;;;;;wait_for_key_a_held:    GetKeyStateAddressDE
 396+ 8144              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 397+ 8144              ;;;;;;.wait_loop:             call    scan_keyboard
 398+ 8144              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl
 399+ 8144              ;;;;;;                        push    hl

 401+ 8144              ;;;;;;                        JumpIfALTNusng  2, .wait_loop

 403+ 8144              ;;;;;;                        ret
 404+ 8144
 405+ 8144              ; Gets the current keystate of the c_Pressed Key in a register
 406+ 8144              get_key_a_state:        GetKeyStateAddressHL                    ; reads a mapped key and sets a to key staus, e.g. 0 1 or >=2 DOES NOT SCAN KEYBOARD
 406+ 8144 21 86 80    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 406+ 8147 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 406+ 8149 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 406+ 814A 23          >                        inc     hl
 406+ 814B 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 406+ 814C 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 407+ 814D 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 408+ 814E C9                                   ret
 409+ 814F
 410+ 814F              ; sets they keystate of c pressed key in a register to 1 (pressed)
 411+ 814F              force_key_press:        GetKeyStateAddressHL                    ; read key locations
 411+ 814F 21 86 80    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 411+ 8152 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 411+ 8154 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 411+ 8155 23          >                        inc     hl
 411+ 8156 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 411+ 8157 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 412+ 8158 3E 01                                ld      a,1
 413+ 815A 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 414+ 815B C9                                   ret
 415+ 815C
 416+ 815C              is_key_up_state:        GetKeyStateAddressHL
 416+ 815C 21 86 80    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 416+ 815F ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 416+ 8161 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 416+ 8162 23          >                        inc     hl
 416+ 8163 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 416+ 8164 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 417+ 8165 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 418+ 8166 FE 00                                cp      0
 419+ 8168 C9                                   ret
 420+ 8169
 421+ 8169              ; returns z is set if c_ key is pressed
 422+ 8169              is_key_pressed:         GetKeyStateAddressHL
 422+ 8169 21 86 80    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 422+ 816C ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 422+ 816E 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 422+ 816F 23          >                        inc     hl
 422+ 8170 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 422+ 8171 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 423+ 8172 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 424+ 8173 FE 01                                cp      1                               ; we cant just test bit 0 as this may have been held long
 425+ 8175 C9                                   ret
 426+ 8176
 427+ 8176              ; returns nz is set if c_ key is held, if key was held then keystate would be 2 or 3, i.e. bit 1 set
 428+ 8176              is_key_held:            GetKeyStateAddressHL
 428+ 8176 21 86 80    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 428+ 8179 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 428+ 817B 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 428+ 817C 23          >                        inc     hl
 428+ 817D 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 428+ 817E 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 429+ 817F 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 430+ 8180 E6 02                                and     Bit1Only                        ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 431+ 8182 C9                                   ret
 432+ 8183
 433+ 8183              ; checks to see if any key is pressed in the key table
 434+ 8183 21 4E 80     is_any_key_pressed:     ld      hl,Keys
 435+ 8186 01 28 00                             ld      bc,40
 436+ 8189 3E 01                                ld      a,1
 437+ 818B ED B1                                cpir                                    ; search for the value 1
 438+ 818D 28 03                                jr      z,.KeyPressed                   ; if a key was pressed then handle press
 439+ 818F                                      SetAFalse
 439+ 818F 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 440+ 8191 C9                                   ret
 441+ 8192 3E 27        .KeyPressed:            ld      a,39                            ; so c will be how many keys still to scan
 442+ 8194 91                                   sub     c                               ; so a = 40 - c to get to result
 443+ 8195 C9                                   ret
 444+ 8196
 445+ 8196 21 4E 80     is_any_key_held:        ld      hl,Keys
 446+ 8199 06 28                                ld      b,40
 447+ 819B 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 448+ 819D 7E           .KeyReadLoop:           ld      a,(hl)
 449+ 819E E6 02                                and     Bit1Only                        ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 450+ 81A0 C2 AA 81                             jp      nz,.KeyPressed
 451+ 81A3 23                                   inc     hl
 452+ 81A4 0C                                   inc     c
 453+ 81A5 10 F6                                djnz    .KeyReadLoop
 454+ 81A7                                      SetAFalse
 454+ 81A7 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 455+ 81A9 C9                                   ret
 456+ 81AA 79           .KeyPressed:            ld      a,c
 457+ 81AB C9                                   ret
 458+ 81AC
 459+ 81AC
 460+ 81AC 21 7E 80     WaitForNoKey:           ld      hl,KeyAddrTab                   ; de = table of IO ports to read
 461+ 81AF 06 08                                ld		b,8                             ; 8 ports to ready
 462+ 81B1 7E           .PortReadLoop:          ld		a,(hl)							; Set up port to read as (hl)$FE
 463+ 81B2 DB FE                                in		a,($FE)							; read port to a
 464+ 81B4 E6 1F                                and     %00011111
 465+ 81B6 FE 1F                                cp      %00011111
 466+ 81B8 20 F2                                jr      nz ,WaitForNoKey
 467+ 81BA 23                                   inc		hl                              ; and ready for next read
 468+ 81BB 10 F4                                djnz    .PortReadLoop
 469+ 81BD C9                                   ret
 470+ 81BE
 471+ 81BE F5 D5 C5 E5  WaitForAnyKey:          push    af,,de,,bc,,hl
 472+ 81C2 CD AC 81                             call    WaitForNoKey
 473+ 81C5 21 7E 80     .waitKeyLoop:           ld		hl,KeyAddrTab                   ; de = table of IO ports to read
 474+ 81C8 06 08                                ld		b,8                             ; 8 ports to ready
 475+ 81CA 7E           .PortReadLoop:          ld		a,(hl)							; Set up port to read as (hl)$FE
 476+ 81CB DB FE                                in		a,($FE)							; read port to a
 477+ 81CD E6 1F                                and     %00011111
 478+ 81CF FE 1F                                cp      %00011111
 479+ 81D1 C2 DB 81                             jp      nz,.WaitComplete
 480+ 81D4 C0                                   ret     nz
 481+ 81D5 23                                   inc		hl                              ; and ready for next read
 482+ 81D6 10 F2                                djnz    .PortReadLoop
 483+ 81D8 C3 C5 81                             jp      .waitKeyLoop
 484+ 81DB E1 C1 D1 F1  .WaitComplete:          pop     af,,de,,bc,,hl
 485+ 81DF C9                                   ret
 486+ 81E0
 487+ 81E0
 488+ 81E0 00 00 00...  InputString             DS  30              ; used for a 30 character input buffer
 489+ 81FE 00                                   DB  0               ; end of string marker as a safety
 490+ 81FF 00           InputCursor             DB  0
 491+ 8200 00           EnterPressed            DB  0               ; zero notpressed FF pressed
 492+ 8201 00           InputChanged            DB  0
 493+ 8202              InputLimit              EQU 20
 494+ 8202
 495+ 8202 21 E0 81     keyboard_copy_input_to_de:  ld      hl,InputString
 496+ 8205 3A FF 81                                 ld      a,(InputCursor)
 497+ 8208 FE 00                                    cp      0
 498+ 820A 28 05                                    jr      z,.NoString
 499+ 820C 4F                                       ld      c,a
 500+ 820D 06 00                                    ld      b,0
 501+ 820F ED B0                                    ldir
 502+ 8211 3E 00        .NoString                   ld      a,0
 503+ 8213 12                                       ld      (de),a
 504+ 8214 C9                                       ret

 506+ 8215 AF           initInputText:          xor     a
 507+ 8216 32 FF 81                             ld      (InputCursor),a
 508+ 8219                                      SetMemFalse EnterPressed
 508+ 8219 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 508+ 821B 32 00 82    >                        ld      (EnterPressed),a
 509+ 821E                                      SetMemFalse InputChanged
 509+ 821E 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 509+ 8220 32 01 82    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 510+ 8223 21 E0 81                             ld      hl,InputString
 511+ 8226 06 1E                                ld      b,30
 512+ 8228 77           .wipeloop:              ld      (hl),a
 513+ 8229 23                                   inc     hl
 514+ 822A 10 FC                                djnz    .wipeloop
 515+ 822C C9                                   ret
 516+ 822D
 517+ 822D              InputName:              SetMemFalse InputChanged
 517+ 822D 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 517+ 822F 32 01 82    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 518+ 8232 CD 83 81                             call    is_any_key_pressed
 519+ 8235 FE FF                                cp      $FF
 520+ 8237 C8                                   ret     z
 521+ 8238 4F           .KeyPressed:            ld      c,a
 522+ 8239 3A FF 81                             ld      a,(InputCursor)                 ; No key so we can now look at if we are at the end of the buffer
 523+ 823C FE 14                                cp      InputLimit                      ; move to variable later and then cp (hl)
 524+ 823E 28 0B                                jr      z,.DeleteOrEnterOnly            ;
 525+ 8240 21 DA 80                             ld      hl,ASCII_Map
 526+ 8243 79                                   ld      a,c
 527+ 8244 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 528+ 8246 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 529+ 8247 FE 41                                cp      "A"
 530+ 8249 30 0B                                jr      nc,.AlphaPressed
 531+ 824B              ; CAPS and Symbol act as delete for now
 532+ 824B FE 20        .DeleteOrEnterOnly      cp      " "                             ; if space was  pressed (mapped to Hash in ASCII table))
 533+ 824D 28 33                                jr      z,.SpacePressed               ; for now we will ignore the shift and just assume delete
 534+ 824F FE 3E                                cp      ">"         ; ENTER
 535+ 8251 28 19                                jr      z,.EnterPressed
 536+ 8253 FE 23                                cp      "#"         ; CAPS
 537+ 8255 C9                                   ret
 538+ 8256 47           .AlphaPressed:          ld      b,a
 539+ 8257 3A FF 81                             ld      a,(InputCursor)
 540+ 825A 4F                                   ld      c,a
 541+ 825B 21 E0 81                             ld      hl,InputString
 542+ 825E ED 31                                add     hl,a
 543+ 8260 78                                   ld      a,b
 544+ 8261 70                                   ld      (hl),b
 545+ 8262 79                                   ld      a,c
 546+ 8263 21 FF 81                             ld      hl,InputCursor
 547+ 8266 34                                   inc     (hl)
 548+ 8267                                      SetMemTrue InputChanged
 548+ 8267 AF          >                        xor     a
 548+ 8268 32 01 82    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 549+ 826B C9                                   ret
 550+ 826C 3A FF 81     .EnterPressed:          ld      a,(InputCursor)
 551+ 826F 21 E0 81                             ld      hl,InputString
 552+ 8272 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 553+ 8274                                      ZeroA
 553+ 8274 AF          >                        xor a
 554+ 8275 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 555+ 8276                                      SetMemTrue EnterPressed
 555+ 8276 AF          >                        xor     a
 555+ 8277 32 00 82    >                        ld      (EnterPressed),a
 556+ 827A                                      SetMemTrue InputChanged
 556+ 827A AF          >                        xor     a
 556+ 827B 32 01 82    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 557+ 827E CD 02 81                             call    init_keyboard           ; Flush keyboard status so futher inputs don't auto read the enter key as a second press
 558+ 8281 C9                                   ret
 559+ 8282 3A FF 81     .SpacePressed:          ld      a,(InputCursor)         ; Space = delete
 560+ 8285 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; if input is zero length then can not delete
 561+ 8287 C8                                   ret     z
 562+ 8288 3D                                   dec     a                       ; move back one and update cursor pos
 563+ 8289 32 FF 81                             ld      (InputCursor),a         ;
 564+ 828C 21 E0 81                             ld      hl,InputString          ; now update end of line to null
 565+ 828F ED 31                                add     hl,a                    ; .
 566+ 8291                                      ZeroA                           ; .
 566+ 8291 AF          >                        xor a
 567+ 8292 77                                   ld      (hl),a                  ; .
 568+ 8293                                      SetMemTrue InputChanged
 568+ 8293 AF          >                        xor     a
 568+ 8294 32 01 82    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 569+ 8297 C9                                   ret
 570+ 8298
 571+ 8298              TargetMissileTest:      AnyMissilesLeft
 571+ 8298 3A E1 84    >                        ld      a,(NbrMissiles)
 571+ 829B A7          >                        and     a
 572+ 829C                                      JumpIfZero      .ClearTargetting
 572+ 829C CA B3 82    >                        jp	z,.ClearTargetting
 573+ 829F                                      IsMissileLaunchFlagged                      ; if we are comitted to launch
 573+ 829F 3A 76 87    >                        ld      a,(MissileTargettingFlag)
 573+ 82A2 E6 80       >                        and     $80
 574+ 82A4 C8                                   ret             z                           ; then don't scan as it will be cleared on launch
 575+ 82A5 3E 16        .ScanForKey:            ld              a,c_Pressed_TargetMissle    ; if not pressed we are done
 576+ 82A7 CD 69 81                             call            is_key_pressed              ; .
 577+ 82AA C0                                   ret             nz                          ; .
 578+ 82AB 3A 76 87     .TargetPressed:         ld              a,(MissileTargettingFlag)   ; get flag back
 579+ 82AE                                      JumpIfAEqNusng  StageMissileNotTargeting, .SetTargetting

 579+ 82B0 CA B9 82    >                        jp      z,.SetTargetting

 582+ 82B9 3E FE       >                        ld      a,StageMissileTargeting
 582+ 82BB 32 76 87    >                        ld      (MissileTargettingFlag),a
 583+ 82BE C9                                   ret

   1+ 8355              ;Contants
   2+ 8355
   3+ 8355              SignMask8Bit		equ %01111111
   4+ 8355              SignMask16Bit		equ %0111111111111111
   5+ 8355              SignOnly8Bit		equ $80

  30+ 8873 06 0E                                ld      b,MineralsIndex+1           ; Only count to Gold as that is in KG
  31+ 8875 7E           .AddLoop:               ld      a,(hl)
  32+ 8876 81                                   add     c
  33+ 8877 4F                                   ld      c,a                     ; add to counter
  34+ 8878 05                                   dec     b
  35+ 8879 23                                   inc     hl
  36+ 887A 10 F9                                djnz    .AddLoop

  42+ 8885 B9          >                        cp     c
  42+ 8886 CA 8B 88    >                        jp      z,.CargoFull

  43+ 8889 B7          >                        or a
  44+ 888A C9                                   ret
  45+ 888B              .CargoFull:             SetCarryFlag
  45+ 888B 37          >                        scf
  46+ 888C C9                                   ret

  47+ 888D FE 11       >                        cp     AlienItemsIndex

  88+ 88F5 67                                   ld      h,a                                             ;
