  93+ 88FB 21 73 87     RechargeShip:           ld      hl,PlayerEnergy                                 ; if enery >= 128
  94+ 88FE 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
  95+ 88FF CB 7F                                bit     7,a                                             ; then we can recharge shields
  96+ 8901 28 0D                                jr      z,.UpdatePlayerEnergy
  97+ 8903 21 71 87     .ShieldCharge:          ld      hl,ForeShield                                   ; charge front shield
  98+ 8906 34                                   inc     (hl)
  99+ 8907 20 01                                jr      nz,.DoneForeShield
 100+ 8909 35           .ForeOverCharge:        dec     (hl)
 101+ 890A 23           .DoneForeShield:        inc     hl                                              ; point to aft shield
 102+ 890B 34                                   inc     (hl)
 103+ 890C 20 01                                jr      nz,.DoneAftShield
 104+ 890E 35                                   dec     (hl)                                            ; back to 255
 105+ 890F 23           .DoneAftShield:         inc     hl                                              ; point to energy
 106+ 8910 34           .UpdatePlayerEnergy:    inc     (hl)
 107+ 8911 28 0A                                jr      z,.OverflowedEnergy
 108+ 8913 3A 03 8A                             ld      a,(ExtraEnergyUnit)
 109+ 8916                                      ReturnIfANENusng EquipmentItemFitted                    ; if energy unit fitted an extra step
 109+ 8916 FE FF       >                        cp      EquipmentItemFitted
 109+ 8918 C0          >                        ret     nz
 110+ 8919 34           .EnergyUnitFitted:      inc     (hl)
 111+ 891A 28 01                                jr      z,.OverflowedEnergy
 112+ 891C C9                                   ret
 113+ 891D 35           .OverflowedEnergy:      dec     (hl)                                            ;  restore to 255
 114+ 891E C9                                   ret
 115+ 891F 21 73 87     .SkipShieldCharge:      ld      hl,PlayerEnergy
 116+ 8922 18 EC                                jr      .UpdatePlayerEnergy
 117+ 8924
 118+ 8924              ; sets carry to true if target
 119+ 8924 3A 76 87     IsMissileLockedOn:      ld      a,(MissileTargettingFlag)
 120+ 8927 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 121+ 8929 28 07                                jr      z, .TargetSelected
 122+ 892B E6 70                                and     $70                         ; are all upper bits set (we can ignore bit 7)
 123+ 892D CA 32 89                             jp      z, .TargetSelected           ; if its only bit 7 then we have a lock
 124+ 8930                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; if bitsd 6 to 4 were set then it must be unlocked status
 124+ 8930 B7          >                        or a
 125+ 8931 C9                                   ret
 126+ 8932              .TargetSelected:        JumpIfSlotAEmpty .TargetInvalid     ; does slot A have an target
 126+ 8932 21 47 85    >                        ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
 126+ 8935 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 126+ 8937 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 126+ 8938 3C          >                        inc     a
 126+ 8939 CA 3F 89    >                        jp      z,.TargetInvalid    ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
 126+ 893C 3D          >                        dec     a           ; get original value back for later
 127+ 893D                                      SetCarryFlag
 127+ 893D 37          >                        scf
 128+ 893E C9                                   ret
 129+ 893F 3E FF        .TargetInvalid:         ld      a, StageMissileNotTargeting     ; housekeep missile status if target gone

 131+ 8944 C9                                   ret

 600  8A17                  INCLUDE "./Variables/random_number.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/random_number.asm
   1+ 8A17              doRandom2:									; .DORND2	\ -> &3F85 \ Restricted for explosion dust.
   2+ 8A17              doRND2:
   3+ 8A17 A7           	and		a								; fast clear carry  leave bit0 of RAND+2 at 0.
   4+ 8A18              doRandom:									;.DORND	\ -> &3F86 \ do random, new A, X.
   5+ 8A18              ; "doRandom, Random Seed update, new value in A & C)"
   6+ 8A18              ; uses a c h l registers
   7+ 8A18              doRND:                  ;exx                                     ; protect bc,de,hl
   8+ 8A18 3A 65 83                             ld		a,(RandomSeed)					; Get Seed 0
   9+ 8A1B CB 17                                rl		a								; Rotate L including carry
  10+ 8A1D 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c =  double lo
  11+ 8A1E 21 67 83     .AddSeed2:              ld		hl,RandomSeed2
  12+ 8A21 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)							; RAND+2
  13+ 8A22 32 65 83     .SaveAtoSeed:           ld		(RandomSeed),a					; and save RAND
  14+ 8A25 08           .SaveBtoSeed2:          ex		af,af'
  15+ 8A26 79                                   ld		a,c
  16+ 8A27 32 67 83                             ld		(RandomSeed2),a
  17+ 8A2A 08                                   ex		af,af'
  18+ 8A2B 3A 66 83                             ld		a,(RandomSeed1)
  19+ 8A2E 4F                                   ld		c,a								; C = Seed1
  20+ 8A2F 21 68 83     .AddSeed3:              ld		hl,RandomSeed3
  21+ 8A32 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)
  22+ 8A33 32 66 83                             ld		(RandomSeed1),a
  23+ 8A36 08                                   ex		af,af'
  24+ 8A37 79                                   ld		a,c
  25+ 8A38 32 68 83                             ld		(RandomSeed3),a
  26+ 8A3B 08                                   ex		af,af'
  27+ 8A3C                                      ;exx                                     ; get bc,de,hl back
  28+ 8A3C C9                                   ret
  29+ 8A3D
  30+ 8A3D 21 65 83     saveRandomSeeds:        ld      hl,RandomSeed
  31+ 8A40 11 69 83                             ld      de,RandomSeedSave
  32+ 8A43 01 04 00                             ld      bc,4
  33+ 8A46 ED A0                                ldi
  34+ 8A48 ED A0                                ldi
  35+ 8A4A ED A0                                ldi
  36+ 8A4C ED A0                                ldi
  37+ 8A4E C9                                   ret
  38+ 8A4F
  39+ 8A4F 21 69 83     restoreRandomSeeds:     ld      hl,RandomSeedSave
  40+ 8A52 11 65 83                             ld      de,RandomSeed
  41+ 8A55 01 04 00                             ld      bc,4
  42+ 8A58 ED A0                                ldi
  43+ 8A5A ED A0                                ldi
  44+ 8A5C ED A0                                ldi
  45+ 8A5E ED A0                                ldi
  46+ 8A60 C9                                   ret

  17+ 8A89 11 6C 85                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds

  21+ 8A91 11 78 85                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  22+ 8A94 18 DB                                jr		copy_seed

  24+ 8A96 21 6C 85     copy_working_to_system: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  25+ 8A99 11 5E 84                             ld		de,SystemSeed
  26+ 8A9C 18 D3                                jr		copy_seed
  27+ 8A9E
  28+ 8A9E 21 5E 84     copy_system_to_working: ld		hl,SystemSeed
  29+ 8AA1 11 6C 85                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  30+ 8AA4 18 CB                                jr		copy_seed
  31+ 8AA6
  32+ 8AA6              next_system_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  33+ 8AA6 CD A9 8A     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  34+ 8AA9              .NextStep:
  35+ 8AA9 CD AC 8A     		call	process_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  36+ 8AAC              process_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  37+ 8AAC 3A 5E 84     		ld		a,(SystemSeed)				; QQ15
  38+ 8AAF B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  39+ 8AB0 21 60 84     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  40+ 8AB3 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 + QQ152
  41+ 8AB4 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo
  42+ 8AB5 3A 5F 84     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  43+ 8AB8 21 61 84     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  44+ 8ABB 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  45+ 8ABC 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  46+ 8ABD 3A 60 84     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+2)
  47+ 8AC0 32 5E 84     		ld		(SystemSeed+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150
  48+ 8AC3 3A 61 84     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)
  49+ 8AC6 32 5F 84     		ld		(SystemSeed+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151
  50+ 8AC9 3A 63 84     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+5)
  51+ 8ACC 32 61 84     		ld		(SystemSeed+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153
  52+ 8ACF 3A 62 84     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  53+ 8AD2 32 60 84     		ld		(SystemSeed+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152
  54+ 8AD5 B7           		or		a
  55+ 8AD6 78           		ld		a,b
  56+ 8AD7 21 60 84     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  57+ 8ADA 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  58+ 8ADB 32 62 84     		ld		(SystemSeed+4),a
  59+ 8ADE 79           		ld		a,c
  60+ 8ADF 21 61 84     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  61+ 8AE2 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  62+ 8AE3 32 63 84     		ld		(SystemSeed+5),a
  63+ 8AE6 C9           		ret
  64+ 8AE7
  65+ 8AE7              next_working_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  66+ 8AE7 CD EA 8A     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  67+ 8AEA              .NextStep:
  68+ 8AEA CD ED 8A     		call	working_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  69+ 8AED              working_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  70+ 8AED              ; x = a + c
  71+ 8AED 3A 6C 85     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)			; QQ15
  72+ 8AF0 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  73+ 8AF1 21 6E 85     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2			; hl -> qq+2 [c]
  74+ 8AF4 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 [a]+ QQ15 [c]
  75+ 8AF5 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo [x]
  76+ 8AF6              ; y = b + d	+ carry
  77+ 8AF6 3A 6D 85     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+1)          ; [b]
  78+ 8AF9 21 6F 85     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 [d] we don't inc as it affects carry)
  79+ 8AFC 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  80+ 8AFD 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  81+ 8AFE 3A 6E 85     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
  82+ 8B01 32 6C 85     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150 [a] = [c]
  83+ 8B04 3A 6F 85     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
  84+ 8B07 32 6D 85     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151 [b] = [d]
  85+ 8B0A 3A 71 85     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
  86+ 8B0D 32 6F 85     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153 [d] = [f]
  87+ 8B10 3A 70 85     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+4)
  88+ 8B13 32 6E 85     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152 [c] = [e]
  89+ 8B16 B7           		or		a
  90+ 8B17 78           		ld		a,b
  91+ 8B18 21 6E 85     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2		    ; hl -> qq+2
  92+ 8B1B 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  93+ 8B1C 32 70 85     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+4),a			; e = x + [c]
  94+ 8B1F 79           		ld		a,c
  95+ 8B20 21 6F 85     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  96+ 8B23 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  97+ 8B24 32 71 85     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+5),a			; f = y + [d] + carry
  98+ 8B27 C9           		ret
  99+ 8B28
 100+ 8B28 32           working_distX	DB 50
 101+ 8B29 32           working_distY	DB 50
 102+ 8B2A 00           current_distY	DB 0
 103+ 8B2B
 104+ 8B2B AF           find_present_system:    xor		a
 105+ 8B2C 32 78 84                             ld		(XSAV),a
 106+ 8B2F 3A 5F 84     .CounterLoop:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 107+ 8B32 4F                                   ld		c,a
 108+ 8B33 3A 7F 85     .calcLocaldy:           ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 109+ 8B36 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 110+ 8B37 79                                   ld		a,c
 111+ 8B38 90                                   sub		b
 112+ 8B39 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 113+ 8B3B 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedy
 114+ 8B3D ED 44        .negativedy:            neg
 115+ 8B3F 32 2A 8B     .positivedy:            ld		(current_distY),a				; save cuirrent_dist Y as we need it maybe
 116+ 8B42 ED 5B 28 8B                          ld		de,(working_distX)
 117+ 8B46 BA                                   cp		d
 118+ 8B47 30 24                                jr		nc,.toofar
 119+ 8B49 3A 61 84     .calcLocaldx:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 120+ 8B4C 4F                                   ld		c,a
 121+ 8B4D 3A 7E 85                             ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 122+ 8B50 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 123+ 8B51 79                                   ld		a,c
 124+ 8B52 90                                   sub		b
 125+ 8B53 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 126+ 8B55 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedx
 127+ 8B57 ED 44        .negativedx:            neg
 128+ 8B59 4F           .positivedx:            ld		c,a
 129+ 8B5A BB                                   cp		e
 130+ 8B5B 30 10                                jr		nc,.toofar
 131+ 8B5D 3A 2A 8B     .Nearer:			    ld		a,(current_distY) 				; we have a closer system
 132+ 8B60 47                                   ld		b,a								; we have c to recall Y into b
 133+ 8B61 ED 43 28 8B                          ld		(working_distX),bc
 134+ 8B65 C5                                   push	bc
 135+ 8B66 CD 9E 8A                             call 	copy_system_to_working
 136+ 8B69 C1                                   pop		bc
 137+ 8B6A 78                                   ld		a,b								;
 138+ 8B6B B1                                   or		c								;
 139+ 8B6C C8                                   ret		z								; if we have distance 0 then bang on
 140+ 8B6D CD A6 8A     .toofar:                call	next_system_seed
 141+ 8B70 3A 78 84                             ld		a,(XSAV)
 142+ 8B73 3D                                   dec		a
 143+ 8B74 FE 00                                cp		0
 144+ 8B76 C8                                   ret		z
 145+ 8B77 32 78 84                             ld		(XSAV),a
 146+ 8B7A 18 B3                                jr		.CounterLoop
 147+ 8B7C
 148+ 8B7C              get_planet_data_working_seed:
 149+ 8B7C 3A 6D 85     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+1)
 150+ 8B7F E6 07        		and		7
 151+ 8B81 32 00 85     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 152+ 8B84 3A 6E 85     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+2)
 153+ 8B87 CB 3F        		srl	a
 154+ 8B89 CB 3F        		srl	a
 155+ 8B8B CB 3F        		srl	a
 156+ 8B8D CB 3F        		srl	a								; c/8
 157+ 8B8F E6 07        		and		7
 158+ 8B91 32 01 85     		ld		(DisplayGovernment),a
 159+ 8B94 CB 3F        		srl	a
 160+ 8B96 FE 00        		cp		0
 161+ 8B98 20 08        		jr		nz,.CanBeRich
 162+ 8B9A              .Fedual:
 163+ 8B9A 3A 00 85     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 164+ 8B9D F6 02        		or		2							; Adjust Eco for Anarchy and Feudal, set bit 1.
 165+ 8B9F 32 00 85     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 166+ 8BA2              .CanBeRich:
 167+ 8BA2 3A 00 85     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 168+ 8BA5 EE 07        		xor		7							; flip economy so Rich is now 7
 169+ 8BA7 32 02 85     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Flipped Eco, EcoEOR7, Rich Ind = 7
 170+ 8BAA 47           		ld		b,a
 171+ 8BAB 3A 6F 85     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 172+ 8BAE E6 03        		and		3
 173+ 8BB0 80           		add		a,b
 174+ 8BB1 32 02 85     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek Level += seed d & 3
 175+ 8BB4 3A 01 85     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 176+ 8BB7 CB 3F        		srl		a 							; gov/2
 177+ 8BB9 47           		ld		b,a
 178+ 8BBA 3A 02 85     		ld		a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 179+ 8BBD 80           		add		a,b
 180+ 8BBE 32 02 85     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek += gov /2
 181+ 8BC1 CB 27        		sla		a
 182+ 8BC3 CB 27        		sla		a							; Onto Population (TL-1)*= 4
 183+ 8BC5 47           		ld		b,a
 184+ 8BC6 3A 00 85     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 185+ 8BC9 80           		add		a,b                  		; TechLevel*4 + Eco   7-56
 186+ 8BCA 47           		ld		b,a
 187+ 8BCB 3A 01 85     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)
 188+ 8BCE 3C           		inc		a  							; +Government, 0 is Anarchy + 1
 189+ 8BCF 32 03 85     		ld		(DisplayPopulation),a
 190+ 8BD2 3A 00 85     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 191+ 8BD5 EE 07        		xor		7							; Onto productivity
 192+ 8BD7 C6 03        		add		3							;  (Flipped eco +3)
 193+ 8BD9 57           		ld		d,a
 194+ 8BDA 3A 01 85     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 195+ 8BDD C6 04        		add		4
 196+ 8BDF 5F           		ld		e,a
 197+ 8BE0 ED 30        		mul									; ; DE = d*e, Productivity part 1. has hsb in A, lsb in P.
 198+ 8BE2 3A 03 85     		ld		a,(DisplayPopulation)		; then we use d for radius
 199+ 8BE5 57           		ld		d,a
 200+ 8BE6 ED 30        		mul
 201+ 8BE8 CB 23        		sla		e
 202+ 8BEA CB 1A        		rr		d
 203+ 8BEC CB 23        		sla		e
 204+ 8BEE CB 1A        		rr		d
 205+ 8BF0 CB 23        		sla		e
 206+ 8BF2 CB 1A        		rr		d							; de * 8
 207+ 8BF4 ED 53 05 85  		ld		(DisplayProductivity),de
 208+ 8BF8              .DoRadius:
 209+ 8BF8 3A 6F 85     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 210+ 8BFB 4F           		ld		c,a
 211+ 8BFC 3A 71 85     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 212+ 8BFF E6 0F        		and		$0F							;  lower 4 bits of w2_h determine planet radius
 213+ 8C01 C6 0B        		add		11							;  radius min = 256*11 = 2816 km
 214+ 8C03 47           		ld		b,a							;
 215+ 8C04 ED 43 09 85  		ld		(DisplayRadius),bc
 216+ 8C08 C9           		ret
 217+ 8C09
# file closed: ./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm

  37+ 8D4F
  38+ 8D4F              getTableText:
  39+ 8D4F              ; ">getTableText, hl = indexlist, a = textnbr, returns with hl = porinter to head of text"
  40+ 8D4F              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  41+ 8D4F D5           	push	de								; save DE as we will likley need it in caller
  42+ 8D50 ED 31        	add		hl,a							; 0 based ref, and its 2 bytes
  43+ 8D52 ED 31        	add		hl,a
  44+ 8D54 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
  45+ 8D55 23           	inc		hl
  46+ 8D56 56           	ld		d,(hl)							; de = indexed address
  47+ 8D57 EB           	ex		de,hl							; flip it to hl
  48+ 8D58 D1           	pop		de								; retrieve de
  49+ 8D59 C9           	ret										; return with hl as start entry
  50+ 8D5A
  51+ 8D5A
  52+ 8D5A              ;               CF      ZF      Result
  53+ 8D5A              ;               -----------------------------------
  54+ 8D5A              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  55+ 8D5A              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  56+ 8D5A              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  57+ 8D5A              ;               1       1       Impossible
  58+ 8D5A              getRankIndex:
  59+ 8D5A              ; ">getRank, de = kill count, returns a = index,hl destroyed"
  60+ 8D5A              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  61+ 8D5A 7A           	ld		a,d
  62+ 8D5B B3           	or		e
  63+ 8D5C FE 00        	cp		0
  64+ 8D5E C8           	ret		z								; quicks skip for 0 kills
  65+ 8D5F AF           	xor 	a
  66+ 8D60 21 AE 8C     	ld		hl,RankingTable
  67+ 8D63              .testLoop:
  68+ 8D63 4E           	ld		c,(hl)
  69+ 8D64 23           	inc		hl
  70+ 8D65 46           	ld		b,(hl)							; bc = ranking
  71+ 8D66 E5           	push	hl
  72+ 8D67 60           	ld		h,b
  73+ 8D68 69           	ld		l,c
  74+ 8D69 CD 7D 9B     	call	compare16HLDE
  75+ 8D6C 38 06        	jr		c,.HLLTDE
  76+ 8D6E              .HLGTEDE									; Found the correct rank
  77+ 8D6E E1           	pop		hl
  78+ 8D6F 23           	inc		hl								; move to next value
  79+ 8D70 23           	inc		hl
  80+ 8D71 3C           	inc		a								; we canloop forever as if kills was $FFFF then hits nutter rank but also +1 = 0000 as its 16 bit
  81+ 8D72 18 EF        	jr		.testLoop
  82+ 8D74              .HLLTDE:									; HL < Kills so found correct rank
  83+ 8D74 E1           	pop		hl
  84+ 8D75 C9           	ret
  85+ 8D76
# file closed: ./Tables/text_tables.asm

 236+ 93C9              CapitaliseString:
 237+ 93C9              ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 238+ 93C9              .CapLoop:
 239+ 93C9 23           	inc		hl
 240+ 93CA 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 241+ 93CB FE 00        	cp		0
 242+ 93CD C8           	ret		z
 243+ 93CE FE 5B        	cp		'Z'+1
 244+ 93D0 30 F7        	jr		nc,.CapLoop
 245+ 93D2 FE 41        	cp		'A'
 246+ 93D4 38 F3        	jr		c,.CapLoop
 247+ 93D6              .LowerCase:
 248+ 93D6 C6 20        	add		a,'a'-'A'
 249+ 93D8 77           	ld		(hl),a
 250+ 93D9 18 EE        	jr		.CapLoop

 252+ 93DB 21 C2 92     ShipIndexToAddress      ld      hl,WordIdxShipNames
 253+ 93DE C3 E4 93                             jp      WordLookup
 254+ 93E1
 255+ 93E1 21 F4 91     WordIndexToAddress:     ld		hl,WordIdx
 256+ 93E4 ED 31        WordLookup:             add		hl,a
 257+ 93E6 ED 31                                add		hl,a
 258+ 93E8 D5                                   push	de
 259+ 93E9 5E                                   ld		e,(hl)
 260+ 93EA 23                                   inc		hl
 261+ 93EB 56                                   ld		d,(hl)
 262+ 93EC EB                                   ex		de,hl
 263+ 93ED D1                                   pop		de
 264+ 93EE C9                                   ret

 267+ 93EF              expandTokenToString:
 268+ 93EF              ; ">expandTokenToString a = texttoken"

 271+ 93F5 11 A8 93     	ld		de,TextBuffer
 272+ 93F8              .ReadLoop:
 273+ 93F8 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 274+ 93F9 FE 00        	cp		0
 275+ 93FB 28 1B        	jr		z,.ReadDone
 276+ 93FD E5           	push	hl
 277+ 93FE D5           	push	de
 278+ 93FF 21 F4 91     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 279+ 9402 CD 4F 8D     	call	getTableText
 280+ 9405 D1           	pop		de
 281+ 9406              .WordExpandLoop:
 282+ 9406 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 283+ 9407 FE 00        	cp		0
 284+ 9409 28 05        	jr		z,.AddSpace
 285+ 940B              ;.GetChar:
 286+ 940B 12           	ld		(de),a
 287+ 940C 13           	inc		de
 288+ 940D 23           	inc		hl
 289+ 940E 18 F6        	jr		.WordExpandLoop
 290+ 9410              .AddSpace:
 291+ 9410 3E 20        	ld		a,' '
 292+ 9412 12           	ld		(de),a
 293+ 9413 13           	inc		de
 294+ 9414 E1           	pop		hl
 295+ 9415 23           	inc		hl
 296+ 9416 18 E0        	jr		.ReadLoop
 297+ 9418              .ReadDone:
 298+ 9418 1B           	dec		de
 299+ 9419 AF           	xor		a
 300+ 941A 12           	ld		(de),a
 301+ 941B C9           	ret

 201+ 94B6              ;D0 03                   BNE P%+5	\ hop over to continue Acc 9to127
 202+ 94B6              ;86 72                   STX &72	 \ QQ17	\ else Acc ==8, QQ17 set to X = 0
 203+ 94B6              ;60                      RTS

 206+ 94B6              ;C9 60                   CMP #&60	\ discard X, look at Acc = token >= 96

 208+ 94B6              ;C9 0E                   CMP #14		\ < 14 ?

 210+ 94B6              ;C9 20                   CMP #32		\ < 32 ?

 213+ 94B6              ;A6 72                   LDX &72	 	\ QQ17
 214+ 94B6              ;F0 3D                   BEQ TT74 	\ if QQ17 = 0 Upper case, jmp TT26, print character.
 215+ 94B6              ;30 11                   BMI TT41 	\ if bit7 set

 217+ 94B6              ;70 30                   BVS TT46 	\ If only bit6 set, clear bit6 and print as Upper
 218+ 94B6              ;	.TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase
 219+ 94B6              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 220+ 94B6              ;90 06                   BCC TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 221+ 94B6              ;C9 5B                   CMP #&5B	\ >= ascii 'Z'+1
 222+ 94B6              ;B0 02                   BCS TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 223+ 94B6              ;69 20                   ADC #&20	\ else Upper to lowercase
 224+ 94B6              ;	.TT44	\ print character as is with TT26
 225+ 94B6              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC \ TT26 \ print character
 226+ 94B6              ;
 227+ 94B6              ;	.TT41	\ QQ17 bit7 set
 228+ 94B6              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17
 229+ 94B6              ;70 17                   BVS TT45	\ bit6 set too, Nothing or lower.
 230+ 94B6              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 231+ 94B6              ;90 22                   BCC TT74 	\ print as is using TT26
 232+ 94B6              ;48                      PHA 		\ else store token Acc
 233+ 94B6              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 234+ 94B6              ;09 40                   ORA #&40	\ set bit6 in QQ17 so subsequent ones lower
 235+ 94B6              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 236+ 94B6              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore token
 237+ 94B6              ;D0 EC                   BNE TT44	\ guaranteed up, print as Uppercase with TT26.
 238+ 94B6              ;
 239+ 94B6              ;	.qw	\ Acc = 14to31 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 240+ 94B6              ;69 72                   ADC #&72	\ A+=114 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 241+ 94B6              ;D0 32                   BNE ex		\ guaranteed down, extra.
 242+ 94B6              ;
 243+ 94B6              ;	.crlf	\ Acc == 9,  colon on right
 244+ 94B6              ;A9 15                   LDA #21		\ on right
 245+ 94B6              ;85 2C                   STA &2C		\ XC
 246+ 94B6              ;D0 97                   BNE TT73	\ guaranteed up, print colon.
 247+ 94B6              ;
 248+ 94B6              ;	.TT45	\ QQ17 bits 7,6 set. Nothing or lower.
 249+ 94B6              ;E0 FF                   CPX #&FF	\ if QQ17 = #&FF
 250+ 94B6              ;F0 63                   BEQ TT48	\ rts
 251+ 94B6              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ >= ascii 'A' ?
 252+ 94B6              ;B0 D0                   BCS TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase, up.
 253+ 94B6              ;	.TT46	\ clear bit6 QQ17 and print as is using TT26
 254+ 94B6              ;48                      PHA 		\ push token
 255+ 94B6              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 256+ 94B6              ;29 BF                   AND #&BF	\ clear bit6
 257+ 94B6              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 258+ 94B6              ;68                      PLA 		\ pull token
 259+ 94B6              ;	.TT74	\ TT26, print character.
 260+ 94B6              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC	\ TT26
 261+ 94B6              ;
 262+ 94B6              ;	.TT43	\ Token > 127 page4 token or planet digram.
 263+ 94B6              ;C9 A0                   CMP #&A0	      \ >= #160 ?
 264+ 94B6              ;B0 14                   BCS TT47	      \ more page4, subtract #160
 265+ 94B6              ;29 7F                   AND #&7F	      \ else token 128to159  -> 0 to 31
 266+ 94B6              ;0A                      ASL A		      \ *= 2
 267+ 94B6              ;A8                      TAY 		      \ digram index = 0to62
 268+ 94B6              ;B9 80 08                LDA &0880,Y \ QQ16,Y  \ ALLEXEGEZACEBISOUSESARMAINDIREA?ER  etc.
 269+ 94B6              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token

 272+ 94B6              ;F0 40                   BEQ TT48    	      \ rts, name has odd-number of letters.
 273+ 94B6              ;4C 9A 33                JMP &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 274+ 94B6              ;
 275+ 94B6              ;	.TT47	\ more page4, subtract #160
 276+ 94B6              ;E9 A0                   SBC #&A0	\ -= 160
 277+ 94B6              ;	.ex	\ -> &342D \ extra, token >= 96 or Acc = 128to145 or -=160
 278+ 94B6              ;AA                      TAX 		\ copy of word index
 279+ 94B6              ;A9 00                   LDA #0		\ page 4 words lo  #QQ18 MOD 256
 280+ 94B6              ;85 22                   STA &22		\ V

 282+ 94B6              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 283+ 94B6              ;A0 00                   LDY #0

 285+ 94B6              ;F0 13                   BEQ TT50	\ if X=0 then Y offset to word correct
 286+ 94B6              ;	.TT51	\ counters Y letter, X token
 287+ 94B6              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 288+ 94B6              ;F0 07                   BEQ TT49	\ exit as word ended

 290+ 94B6              ;D0 F9                   BNE TT51	\ loop Y
 291+ 94B6              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1 \ next page as Y reached 256
 292+ 94B6              ;D0 F5                   BNE TT51    	\ guaranteed, loop Y letter
 293+ 94B6              ;	.TT49	\ word ended
 294+ 94B6              ;C8                      INY
 295+ 94B6              ;D0 02                   BNE TT59    	\ next word
 296+ 94B6              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1	\ next page as Y reached 256
 297+ 94B6              ;	.TT59	\ next word
 298+ 94B6              ;CA                      DEX 		\ token count
 299+ 94B6              ;D0 ED                   BNE TT51	\ loop X token
 300+ 94B6              ;	.TT50	\ token X = 0, counter Y offset to word correct

   1+ 94B6              ;; calcs BHB + CDE where B and C are signs and may be 24 bit
   2+ 94B6              ;; result HL with A as sign
   3+ 94B6              ;; special handling if result is zero forcign sign bit to be zero
   4+ 94B6

  42+ 94B6              ; bhl - 00 00 06 CDE - 80 00 0B so equates to 000006 + (-00000B) or -000005 or 800005

  44+ 94B6 78           ADDHLDESignBC:          ld      a,b
  45+ 94B7 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  46+ 94B9 A9                                   xor     c                           ;if b sign and c sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  47+ 94BA                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN     ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  47+ 94BA FA C8 94    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN
  48+ 94BD 78           ADDHLDEsBCSameSigns:    ld      a,b
  49+ 94BE B1                                   or      c
  50+ 94BF                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg    ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  50+ 94BF FA C4 94    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg
  51+ 94C2 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; both positive so a will already be zero
  52+ 94C3 C9                                   ret
  53+ 94C4 19           ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg:      add     hl,de
  54+ 94C5 78                                   ld      a,b
  55+ 94C6 B1                                   or      c                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  56+ 94C7 C9                                   ret
  57+ 94C8              ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN:       ClearCarryFlag
  57+ 94C8 B7          >                        or a
  58+ 94C9 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  59+ 94CB 38 02                                jr      c,ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert
  60+ 94CD 78           ADDHLDEsBCOppSGNNoCarry:ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  61+ 94CE C9                                   ret
  62+ 94CF              ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert:    NegHL                               ; if result was zero then set sign to zero (which doing h or l will give us for free)
  62+ 94CF AF          >                    xor a
  62+ 94D0 95          >                    sub l
  62+ 94D1 6F          >                    ld l,a
  62+ 94D2 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  62+ 94D3 94          >                    sub h
  62+ 94D4 67          >                    ld h,a
  63+ 94D5 78                                   ld      a,b
  64+ 94D6 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  65+ 94D8 C9                                   ret

  67+ 94D9 7C           ADDHLDESignedV4:        ld      a,h
  68+ 94DA E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  69+ 94DC 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  70+ 94DD AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  71+ 94DE                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN       ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  71+ 94DE FA F6 94    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  72+ 94E1 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
  73+ 94E2 B2                                   or      d
  74+ 94E3                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg      ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  74+ 94E3 FA E8 94    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  75+ 94E6 19                                   add     hl,de
  76+ 94E7 C9                                   ret
  77+ 94E8 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  78+ 94E9 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  79+ 94EB 67                                   ld      h,a
  80+ 94EC 7A                                   ld      a,d
  81+ 94ED E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  82+ 94EF 57                                   ld      d,a
  83+ 94F0 19                                   add     hl,de
  84+ 94F1 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  85+ 94F3 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  86+ 94F4 67                                   ld      h,a
  87+ 94F5 C9                                   ret
  88+ 94F6 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  89+ 94F7 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  90+ 94F9 67                                   ld      h,a
  91+ 94FA 7A                                   ld      a,d
  92+ 94FB E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  93+ 94FD 57                                   ld      d,a
  94+ 94FE                                      ClearCarryFlag
  94+ 94FE B7          >                        or a
  95+ 94FF ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  96+ 9501 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
  97+ 9503 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:  ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  98+ 9504 B4                                   or      h
  99+ 9505 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 100+ 9506 C9                                   ret
 101+ 9507              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:      NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
 101+ 9507 AF          >                    xor a
 101+ 9508 95          >                    sub l
 101+ 9509 6F          >                    ld l,a
 101+ 950A 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 101+ 950B 94          >                    sub h
 101+ 950C 67          >                    ld h,a
 102+ 950D 78                                   ld      a,b
 103+ 950E EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 104+ 9510 B4                                   or      h
 105+ 9511 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 106+ 9512 C9                                   ret

 155+ 9513              ; 06 06 2022 not used
 156+ 9513              ; HL = HL (signed) + A (unsigned), uses HL, DE, A
 157+ 9513 57           AddAusngToHLsng:        ld      d,a
 158+ 9514 5C                                   ld      e,h
 159+ 9515 7C                                   ld      a,h
 160+ 9516 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 161+ 9518 67                                   ld      h,a
 162+ 9519 7A                                   ld      a,d
 163+ 951A ED 31                                add     hl,a
 164+ 951C 7B                                   ld      a,e
 165+ 951D E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit

 167+ 9520 C9                                   ret
 168+ 9521              ; 06 06 2022 not used
 169+ 9521              ; HL = A (unsigned) - HL (signed), uses HL, DE, BC, A
 170+ 9521 44           HLEequAusngMinusHLsng:  ld      b,h
 171+ 9522 4F                                   ld      c,a
 172+ 9523 78                                   ld      a,b
 173+ 9524 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 174+ 9526 20 08                                jr      nz,.DoAdd
 175+ 9528 EB           .DoSubtract:            ex      de,hl               ; move hl into de
 176+ 9529 26 00                                ld      h,0                 ; hl = a
 177+ 952B 69                                   ld      l,c
 178+ 952C                                      ClearCarryFlag
 178+ 952C B7          >                        or a
 179+ 952D ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ; hl = a - hl
 180+ 952F C9                                   ret
 181+ 9530 79           .DoAdd:                 ld      a,c
 182+ 9531 ED 31                                add hl,a
 183+ 9533 C9                                   ret
 184+ 9534              ;tested mathstestsun2
 185+ 9534              ; DEL = DEL + BCH signed, uses BC, DE, HL, IY, A
 186+ 9534 78           AddBCHtoDELsigned:      ld      a,b                 ; Are the values both the same sign?
 187+ 9535 AA                                   xor     d                   ; .
 188+ 9536 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 189+ 9538 20 19                                jr      nz,.SignDifferent   ; .
 190+ 953A 78           .SignSame:              ld      a,b                 ; if they are then we only need 1 signe
 191+ 953B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; so store it in iyh
 192+ 953D FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ;
 193+ 953F 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
 194+ 9540 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 195+ 9542 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
 196+ 9543 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
 197+ 9544 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 198+ 9546 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 199+ 9547 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; l = h + l
 200+ 9548 85                                   add     l                   ; .
 201+ 9549 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
 202+ 954A 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; e = e + c + carry
 203+ 954B 8B                                   adc     e                   ; .
 204+ 954C 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
 205+ 954D 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; d = b + d + carry (signed)
 206+ 954E 8A                                   adc     d                   ;
 207+ 954F FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; d = or back in sign bit
 208+ 9551 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 209+ 9552 C9                                   ret                         ; done
 210+ 9553 78           .SignDifferent:         ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
 211+ 9554 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = b sign
 212+ 9556 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 213+ 9558 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
 214+ 9559 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
 215+ 955A FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a               ; iyl = d sign
 216+ 955C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 217+ 955E 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 218+ 955F E5                                   push    hl                  ; save hl
 219+ 9560 60 69                                ld      hl,bc               ; hl = bc - de, if bc < de then there is a carry
 220+ 9562 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ;
 221+ 9564 E1                                   pop     hl                  ;
 222+ 9565 38 0E                                jr      c,.BCHltDEL
 223+ 9567 20 1C                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH        ; if the result was not zero then DEL > BCH
 224+ 9569 7C           .BCeqDE:                ld      a,h                 ; if the result was zero then check lowest bits
 225+ 956A                                      JumpIfALTNusng l,.BCHltDEL
 225+ 956A BD          >                        cp      l
 225+ 956B DA 75 95    >                        jp		c, .BCHltDEL
 226+ 956E 20 15                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH
 227+ 9570              ; The same so its just zero
 228+ 9570 AF           .BCHeqDEL:              xor     a                  ; its just zero
 229+ 9571 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .
 230+ 9572 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .
 231+ 9573 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .
 232+ 9574 C9                                   ret                        ; .
 233+ 9575              ;BCH is less than DEL so its DEL - BCH the sort out sign
 234+ 9575 7D           .BCHltDEL:              ld      a,l                ; l = l - h                      ; ex
 235+ 9576 94                                   sub     h                  ; .                              ;   01D70F DEL
 236+ 9577 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .                              ;  -000028 BCH
 237+ 9578 7B                                   ld      a,e                ; e = e - c - carry              ;1.
 238+ 9579 99                                   sbc     c                  ; .                              ;
 239+ 957A 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .                              ;
 240+ 957B 7A                                   ld      a,d                ; d = d - b - carry              ;
 241+ 957C 98                                   sbc     b                  ; .                              ;
 242+ 957D 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .                              ;
 243+ 957E FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl              ; as d was larger, take d sign
 244+ 9580 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
 245+ 9582 B2                                   or      d                  ;
 246+ 9583 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 247+ 9584 C9                                   ret
 248+ 9585 7C           .DELltBCH:              ld      a,h                ; l = h - l
 249+ 9586 95                                   sub     l                  ;
 250+ 9587 6F                                   ld      l,a                ;
 251+ 9588 79                                   ld      a,c                ; e = c - e - carry
 252+ 9589 9B                                   sbc     e                  ;
 253+ 958A 5F                                   ld      e,a                ;
 254+ 958B 78                                   ld      a,b                ; d = b - d - carry
 255+ 958C 9A                                   sbc     d                  ;
 256+ 958D 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 257+ 958E FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh              ; as b was larger, take b sign into d
 258+ 9590 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
 259+ 9592 B2                                   or      d                  ;
 260+ 9593 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 261+ 9594 C9                                   ret
 262+ 9595
 263+ 9595              ; 06 06 2022 not used
 264+ 9595              ;BHL = AHL + DE where AHL = 16 bit + A sign and DE = 15 bit signed
 265+ 9595 47           AddAHLtoDEsigned:       ld      b,a                     ; B = A , C = D (save sign bytes)
 266+ 9596 4A                                   ld      c,d                     ; .
 267+ 9597 A9                                   xor     c                       ; A = A xor C
 268+ 9598 CB BA                                res     7,d                     ; clear sign bit of D
 269+ 959A 20 02                                jr nz,  .OppositeSigns          ; if A xor C is opposite signs job to A0A1
 270+ 959C 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; HL = HL + DE
 271+ 959D C9                                   ret                             ; return
 272+ 959E ED 52        .OppositeSigns:         sbc     hl,de                   ; HL = HL -DE
 273+ 95A0 D0                                   ret     nc                      ; if no carry return
 274+ 95A1 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; else HL = HL + DE
 275+ 95A2 EB                                   ex      de,hl                   ;      swap HL and DE
 276+ 95A3 A7                                   and     a                       ;      reset carry
 277+ 95A4 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                   ;      HL = DE - HL (as they were swapped)
 278+ 95A6 41                                   ld      b,c                     ;      B = sign of C
 279+ 95A7 C9                                   ret                             ;      ret
 280+ 95A8
 281+ 95A8
 282+ 95A8              ; 06 06 2022 not used
 283+ 95A8              ; a = value to add
 284+ 95A8              ; b = offset (equivalent to regX)
 285+ 95A8              ; returns INWK [x] set to new value
 286+ 95A8              ; NOT USED addINWKbasigned:
 287+ 95A8              ; NOT USED 		ld 		hl,UBnKxlo                  ; hl = INWK 0
 288+ 95A8              ; NOT USED 		ld      c,a                         ; preserve a
 289+ 95A8              ; NOT USED 		ld		a,b
 290+ 95A8              ; NOT USED 		add		hl,a                        ; hl = INWK[x]
 291+ 95A8              ; NOT USED         ld      a,c                         ; get back a value
 292+ 95A8              ; NOT USED         and     $80                         ; get sign bit from a
 293+ 95A8              ; NOT USED         ld      b,a                         ; now b = sign bit of a
 294+ 95A8              ; NOT USED         ld      a,c                         ; a = original value
 295+ 95A8              ; NOT USED         and     SignMask8Bit                ; a = unsigned version of original value
 296+ 95A8              ; 06 06 2022 not used
 297+ 95A8              ; hl = unsigned version of INWK0[b]
 298+ 95A8              ; a = value to add, also in c which will optimise later code
 299+ 95A8              ; b = sign bit of a ( in old code was varT)
 300+ 95A8              ; NOTUSEDaddhlcsigned:
 301+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = INKK value
