 303+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ld      d,(hl)
 304+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        inc     hl                          ; now pointing a sign
 305+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ld      a,(hl)                      ; a = sign bit
 306+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value now and de = pointer to sign
 307+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        xor     b                           ; a = resultant sign
 308+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        bit     7,a                         ; is it negative?
 309+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        jr      z,.postivecalc
 310+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED.negativecalc:
 311+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ld      a,h
 312+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        and     SignMask8Bit
 313+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ld      h,a                         ; strip high bit
 314+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ld      ixl,b                       ; save sign bit from b into d
 315+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ld      b,0                         ; c = value to subtract so now bc = value to subtract
 316+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        sbc     hl,bc
 317+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ld      b,ixl                       ; get sign back
 318+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to sign
 319+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ld      a,(hl)                      ;
 320+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        and     SignMask8Bit
 321+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        sbc     a,0                         ; subtract carry which could flip sign bit
 322+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        or      $80                         ; set bit 0
 323+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        xor     b                           ; flip bit on sign (var T)
 324+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),a
 325+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        dec     hl
 326+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),d
 327+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        dec     hl
 328+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),e                      ; write out DE to INKW[x]0,1
 329+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 330+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ret     c                           ; if carry was set then we can exit now
 331+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED.nocarry:
 332+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        NegHL                               ; get hl back to positive, a is still inkw+2
 333+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        or      b                           ; b is still varT
 334+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 335+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),e
 336+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        inc     hl
 337+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),d
 338+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        inc     hl
 339+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),a                      ; set sign bit in INKK[x]+2
 340+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to sign
 341+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ret
 342+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED.postivecalc:
 343+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ld      ixl,b
 344+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ld      b,0
 345+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        add     hl,de
 346+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl
 347+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        or      ixl                         ; we don;t need to recover b here
 348+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),a                      ; push sign into INWK[x]
 349+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        dec     hl
 350+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),d
 351+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        dec     hl
 352+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),e
 353+ 95A8              ; NOTUSED        ret
 354+ 95A8
 355+ 95A8              ;a = a AND 80 (i.e. bit 7) =>carry       so value is -
 356+ 95A8              ;MVT1
 357+ 95A8              ;    S = bits 6 to 0 of A
 358+ 95A8              ;    A = sign bit => T
 359+ 95A8              ;    xor sign bit with ink[x] Sign
 360+ 95A8              ;    if negative thn its not an add
 361+ 95A8              ;
 362+ 95A8              ;        and h, 7F
 363+ 95A8              ;        b = 0
 364+ 95A8              ;        c = varS
 365+ 95A8              ;        subtract INW[X]hilo, bc
 366+ 95A8              ;        retain carry
 367+ 95A8              ;        get INKW[x]Sign
 368+ 95A8              ;        and 7F
 369+ 95A8              ;        subtract carry (so will go negtive if negative)
 370+ 95A8              ;        xor bit 7 of h with T to flip bit
 371+ 95A8              ;        write to INKW[x]Sign
 372+ 95A8              ;
 373+ 95A8              ;    else
 374+ 95A8              ;MV10.
 375+ 95A8              ;        add INWK[x]hi,lo, varS
 376+ 95A8              ;        or      sign bit
 377+ 95A8
 378+ 95A8
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_add.asm
 611  95A8                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_subtract.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_subtract.asm
   1+ 95A8              ;...subtract routines
   2+ 95A8              ; we could cheat, flip the sign of DE and just add but its not very optimised
   3+ 95A8 7C           subHLDES15:             ld      a,h
   4+ 95A9 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   5+ 95AB 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
   6+ 95AC AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
   7+ 95AD                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite therefore we can add
   7+ 95AD FA DB 95    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDEOppSGN
   8+ 95B0 78           .SUBHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
   9+ 95B1 B2                                   or      d
  10+ 95B2                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  10+ 95B2 FA BC 95    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameNeg
  11+ 95B5                                      ClearCarryFlag
  11+ 95B5 B7          >                        or a
  12+ 95B6 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  13+ 95B8                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  13+ 95B8 FA CF 95    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  14+ 95BB C9                                   ret
  15+ 95BC 7C           .SUBHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  16+ 95BD E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  17+ 95BF 67                                   ld      h,a
  18+ 95C0 7A                                   ld      a,d
  19+ 95C1 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  20+ 95C3 57                                   ld      d,a
  21+ 95C4                                      ClearCarryFlag
  21+ 95C4 B7          >                        or a
  22+ 95C5 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  23+ 95C7                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  23+ 95C7 FA CF 95    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  24+ 95CA 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  25+ 95CB F6 80                                or      SignOnly8Bit
  26+ 95CD 67                                   ld      h,a
  27+ 95CE C9                                   ret
  28+ 95CF              .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw:     NegHL
  28+ 95CF AF          >                    xor a
  28+ 95D0 95          >                    sub l
  28+ 95D1 6F          >                    ld l,a
  28+ 95D2 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  28+ 95D3 94          >                    sub h
  28+ 95D4 67          >                    ld h,a
  29+ 95D5 78                                   ld      a,b
  30+ 95D6 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  31+ 95D8 B4                                   or      h
  32+ 95D9 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  33+ 95DA C9                                   ret
  34+ 95DB B7           .SUBHLDEOppSGN:         or      a
  35+ 95DC 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  36+ 95DD E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  37+ 95DF 67                                   ld      h,a
  38+ 95E0 7A                                   ld      a,d
  39+ 95E1 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  40+ 95E3 57                                   ld      d,a
  41+ 95E4 19                                   add     hl,de
  42+ 95E5 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  43+ 95E6 B4                                   or      h
  44+ 95E7 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  45+ 95E8 C9                                   ret
  46+ 95E9
  47+ 95E9
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_subtract.asm
 612  95E9                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AddDEToCash.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AddDEToCash.asm
   1+ 95E9              ; Note its big endian
   2+ 95E9 2A DD 89     addDEtoCash:            ld      hl,(Cash)
   3+ 95EC 19                                   add     hl,de
   4+ 95ED 22 DD 89                             ld      (Cash),hl
   5+ 95F0 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
   6+ 95F3 2A DF 89                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
   7+ 95F6 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
   8+ 95F8 22 DF 89                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
   9+ 95FB C9                                   ret
  10+ 95FC
  11+ 95FC 2A DD 89     subDEfromCash:          ld      hl,(Cash)
  12+ 95FF 7C                                   ld      a,h
  13+ 9600 B5                                   or      l
  14+ 9601 2A DF 89                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  15+ 9604 B4                                   or      h
  16+ 9605 B5                                   or      l
  17+ 9606 C8                                   ret     z               ; No cash return
  18+ 9607 B7                                   or      a
  19+ 9608 2A DD 89                             ld      hl,(Cash)
  20+ 960B ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  21+ 960D 22 DD 89                             ld      (Cash),hl
  22+ 9610 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
  23+ 9613 2A DF 89                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  24+ 9616 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  25+ 9618 22 DF 89                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  26+ 961B                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,.ZeroCash
  26+ 961B CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
  26+ 961D C2 21 96    >                        jp      nz,.ZeroCash
  27+ 9620 C9                                   ret
  28+ 9621 21 00 00     .ZeroCash:              ld      hl,0
  29+ 9624 22 DD 89                             ld      (Cash),hl
  30+ 9627 22 DF 89                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  31+ 962A C9                                   ret
  32+ 962B
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AddDEToCash.asm
 613  962B                  INCLUDE "./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm
   1+ 962B              ;INPUTS: ahl = dividend cde = divisor
   2+ 962B              ;OUTPUTS: cde = quotient ahl = remainder
   3+ 962B 47           Div24by24:              ld b,a
   4+ 962C E5                                   push hl
   5+ 962D DD E1                                pop ix
   6+ 962F 2E 18                                ld l,24
   7+ 9631 E5                                   push hl
   8+ 9632 AF                                   xor a
   9+ 9633 67                                   ld h,a
  10+ 9634 6F                                   ld l,a
  11+ 9635 DD 29        .Div24by24loop:         add ix,ix
  12+ 9637 CB 10                                rl b
  13+ 9639 ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
  14+ 963B 17                                   rla
  15+ 963C B9                                   cp c
  16+ 963D 38 0C                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  17+ 963F 20 05                                jr nz,.Div24by24setbit
  18+ 9641 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
  19+ 9643 19                                   add hl,de
  20+ 9644 38 05                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  21+ 9646 ED 52        .Div24by24setbit:       sbc hl,de
  22+ 9648 99                                   sbc a,c
  23+ 9649 DD 23                                inc ix
  24+ 964B E3           .Div24by24skip:         ex (sp),hl
  25+ 964C 2D                                   dec l
  26+ 964D E3                                   ex (sp),hl
  27+ 964E 20 E5                                jr nz,.Div24by24loop
  28+ 9650 D1                                   pop de
  29+ 9651 48                                   ld c,b
  30+ 9652 DD E5                                push ix
  31+ 9654 D1                                   pop de
  32+ 9655 C9                                   ret
  33+ 9656
  34+ 9656 FD 67        Div24by24ASigned:       ld      iyh,a
  35+ 9658 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  36+ 965A CD 2B 96                             call    Div24by24
  37+ 965D F5                                   push    af
  38+ 965E FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
  39+ 9660 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  40+ 9662 B1                                   or      c
  41+ 9663 4F                                   ld      c,a
  42+ 9664 F1                                   pop     af
  43+ 9665 C9                                   ret
  44+ 9666
  45+ 9666                                      ; CDE = AHL/CDE, AHL = remainder
  46+ 9666 FD 67        Div24by24LeadSign:      ld      iyh,a           ; Preserve signed in IYL
  47+ 9668 A9                                   xor     c               ; flip sign if negative
  48+ 9669 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit    ; .
  49+ 966B FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a           ; .
  50+ 966D 79                                   ld      a,c             ; make both values ABS
  51+ 966E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  52+ 9670 4F                                   ld      c,a             ; .
  53+ 9671 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; .
  54+ 9673 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  55+ 9675 CD 2B 96                             call    Div24by24       ; do abs divide
  56+ 9678 FD B5                                or      iyl             ; bring in sign bit
  57+ 967A FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save a
  58+ 967C 79                                   ld      a,c             ; sort sign for c
  59+ 967D FD B5                                or      iyl             ;
  60+ 967F 4F                                   ld      c,a             ;
  61+ 9680 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; sort sign of a
  62+ 9682 C9                                   ret
  63+ 9683
  64+ 9683              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  65+ 9683              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  66+ 9683              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  67+ 9683              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  68+ 9683 47           PROJ256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
  69+ 9684 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  70+ 9686 16 00                                ld      d,0
  71+ 9688 3A 73 84                             ld      a,(varQ)
  72+ 968B 5F                                   ld      e,a
  73+ 968C 21 00 00     PROJDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  74+ 968F 78                                   ld      a,b
  75+ 9690 06 10                                ld      b,16
  76+ 9692 CB 31        PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll     c       ; unroll 16 times
  77+ 9694 17                                   rla             ; ...
  78+ 9695 ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl       ; ...
  79+ 9697 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de       ; ...
  80+ 9699 30 02                                jr      nc,PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP       ; ...
  81+ 969B 19                                   add     hl,de       ; ...
  82+ 969C 0D                                   dec     c       ; ...
  83+ 969D 10 F3        PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  84+ 969F 79                                   ld      a,c
  85+ 96A0 32 74 84                             ld      (varR),a
  86+ 96A3 C9                                   ret
  87+ 96A4
  88+ 96A4
  89+ 96A4
  90+ 96A4
# file closed: ./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm
 614  96A4                  INCLUDE "./Maths/multiply.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/multiply.asm
   1+ 96A4              HLequSRmulQdiv256:      ;X.Y=x1lo.S*M/256  	\ where M/256 is gradient
   2+ 96A4 2A 74 84                             ld  hl,(varRS)
   3+ 96A7 3A 73 84                             ld  a,(varQ)
   4+ 96AA C5 D5        HLeqyHLmulAdiv256:      push    bc,,de
   5+ 96AC 11 00 00                             ld  de,0        ; de = XY
   6+ 96AF 47                                   ld  b,a         ; b = Q
   7+ 96B0                                      ShiftHLRight1
   7+ 96B0 CB 3C       >			   srl h
   7+ 96B2 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
   8+ 96B4 CB 20                                sla b
   9+ 96B6 30 03                                jr  nc,.LL126
  10+ 96B8 EB           .LL125:                 ex de,hl
  11+ 96B9 19                                   add hl,de
  12+ 96BA EB                                   ex  de,hl       ; de = de + rs
  13+ 96BB              .LL126:                 ShiftHLRight1
  13+ 96BB CB 3C       >			   srl h
  13+ 96BD CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  14+ 96BF CB 20                                sla b
  15+ 96C1 38 F5                                jr      c,.LL125
  16+ 96C3 20 F6                                jr      nz,.LL126
  17+ 96C5 EB                                   ex      de,hl   ; hl = result
  18+ 96C6 D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  19+ 96C8 C9                                   ret
  20+ 96C9
  21+ 96C9
  22+ 96C9              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  23+ 96C9 ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  24+ 96C9 ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  25+ 96C9 ~                                    ld      e,a
  26+ 96C9 ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  27+ 96C9 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  28+ 96C9 ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  29+ 96C9 ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  30+ 96C9 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  31+ 96C9 ~                                    ld      d,a
  32+ 96C9 ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  33+ 96C9 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  34+ 96C9 ~                                    ld      e,a
  35+ 96C9 ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  36+ 96C9 ~                                    ld      a,d
  37+ 96C9 ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  38+ 96C9 ~                                    ld      d,a
  39+ 96C9                                      ENDM
  40+ 96C9
  41+ 96C9
  42+ 96C9
  43+ 96C9                                 ; .MAD	\ -> &22AD  \ Multiply and Add  (DE also) X.A(Lo.Hi) = Q*A + R.S (Lo.Hi)
  44+ 96C9              madXAequQmulAaddRS:     MacroDEEquQmulASigned
  44+ 96C9 57          >                        ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  44+ 96CA 3A 73 84    >                        ld      a,(varQ)
  44+ 96CD 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ 96CE AA          >                        xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  44+ 96CF E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  44+ 96D1 47          >                        ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  44+ 96D2 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  44+ 96D3 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ 96D5 57          >                        ld      d,a
  44+ 96D6 7B          >                        ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  44+ 96D7 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ 96D9 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ 96DA ED 30       >                        mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  44+ 96DC 7A          >                        ld      a,d
  44+ 96DD B0          >                        or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  44+ 96DE 57          >                        ld      d,a
  45+ 96DF 2A 74 84                             ld		hl,(varR)
  46+ 96E2 CD 0A 97                             call	madXAAddHLDESigned
  47+ 96E5 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = R.S + DE
  48+ 96E6                                      ClearCarryFlag
  48+ 96E6 B7          >                        or a
  49+ 96E7 DD 6B                                ld      ixl,e
  50+ 96E9 7A                                   ld      a,d
  51+ 96EA C9                                   ret
  52+ 96EB
  53+ 96EB              madDEequQmulAaddRS:     MacroDEEquQmulASigned
  53+ 96EB 57          >                        ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  53+ 96EC 3A 73 84    >                        ld      a,(varQ)
  53+ 96EF 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  53+ 96F0 AA          >                        xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  53+ 96F1 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  53+ 96F3 47          >                        ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  53+ 96F4 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  53+ 96F5 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  53+ 96F7 57          >                        ld      d,a
  53+ 96F8 7B          >                        ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  53+ 96F9 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  53+ 96FB 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  53+ 96FC ED 30       >                        mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  53+ 96FE 7A          >                        ld      a,d
  53+ 96FF B0          >                        or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  53+ 9700 57          >                        ld      d,a
  54+ 9701 2A 74 84                             ld		hl,(varR)
  55+ 9704 CD 0A 97                             call	madXAAddHLDESigned
  56+ 9707 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = R.S + DE
  57+ 9708                                      ClearCarryFlag
  57+ 9708 B7          >                        or a
  58+ 9709 C9                                   ret
  59+ 970A
  60+ 970A 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  61+ 970B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  62+ 970D 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  63+ 970E AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  64+ 970F                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  64+ 970F FA 27 97    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  65+ 9712 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
  66+ 9713 B2                                   or      d
  67+ 9714                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  67+ 9714 FA 19 97    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  68+ 9717 19                                   add     hl,de
  69+ 9718 C9                                   ret
  70+ 9719 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  71+ 971A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  72+ 971C 67                                   ld      h,a
  73+ 971D 7A                                   ld      a,d
  74+ 971E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  75+ 9720 57                                   ld      d,a
  76+ 9721 19                                   add     hl,de
  77+ 9722 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  78+ 9724 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  79+ 9725 67                                   ld      h,a
  80+ 9726 C9                                   ret
  81+ 9727 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  82+ 9728 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  83+ 972A 67                                   ld      h,a
  84+ 972B 7A                                   ld      a,d
  85+ 972C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  86+ 972E 57                                   ld      d,a
  87+ 972F B7                                   or      a
  88+ 9730 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  89+ 9732 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
  90+ 9734 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  91+ 9735 B4                                   or      h
  92+ 9736 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  93+ 9737 C9                                   ret
  94+ 9738              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
  94+ 9738 AF          >                    xor a
  94+ 9739 95          >                    sub l
  94+ 973A 6F          >                    ld l,a
  94+ 973B 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  94+ 973C 94          >                    sub h
  94+ 973D 67          >                    ld h,a
  95+ 973E 78                                   ld      a,b
  96+ 973F EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  97+ 9741 B4                                   or      h
  98+ 9742 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  99+ 9743 C9                                   ret
 100+ 9744
 101+ 9744
 102+ 9744                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
 103+ 9744                  ;
 104+ 9744                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
 105+ 9744                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 106+ 9744                  ;
 107+ 9744                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 108+ 9744                  ;         carry reset
 109+ 9744                  ;
 110+ 9744                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 111+ 9744 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 112+ 9745 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 113+ 9746 ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 114+ 9748 EB                                   ex de,hl
 115+ 9749 ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 116+ 974B
 117+ 974B 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 118+ 974C 85                                   add a,l
 119+ 974D 57                                   ld  d,a
 120+ 974E EB                                   ex de,hl
 121+ 974F
 122+ 974F 7A                                   ld  a,d
 123+ 9750 CE 00                                adc a,0
 124+ 9752 C9                                   ret
 125+ 9753
 126+ 9753 54           HLE0quH0mulE:           ld      d,h                 ; .
 127+ 9754 63                                   ld      h,e                 ; .
 128+ 9755 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; de = xh * yl
 129+ 9757 EB                                   ex      de,hl
 130+ 9758 C9                                   ret
 131+ 9759
 132+ 9759                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 133+ 9759                 ;
 134+ 9759                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 135+ 9759                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 136+ 9759                 ;
 137+ 9759                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 138+ 9759                 ;         carry reset
 139+ 9759                 ;
 140+ 9759                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 141+ 9759
 142+ 9759
 143+ 9759
 144+ 9759 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 145+ 975A 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 146+ 975B 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 147+ 975C 6A                                   ld l,d
 148+ 975D E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 149+ 975E 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 150+ 975F              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 151+ 975F ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 152+ 9761 EB                                   ex de,hl
 153+ 9762 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 154+ 9764
 155+ 9764 AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 156+ 9765 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 157+ 9766 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 158+ 9767
 159+ 9767 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 160+ 9768 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 161+ 9769 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 162+ 976B
 163+ 976B 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 164+ 976C 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 165+ 976D
 166+ 976D 7A                                   ld a,d
 167+ 976E 85                                   add a,l
 168+ 976F 67                                   ld h,a
 169+ 9770 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 170+ 9771
 171+ 9771 D1                                   pop de
 172+ 9772 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 173+ 9774
 174+ 9774 EB                                   ex de,hl
 175+ 9775 ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 176+ 9777 EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 177+ 9778
 178+ 9778 C9                                   ret
 179+ 9779
 180+ 9779              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 181+ 9779              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 182+ 9779              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 183+ 9779              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 184+ 9779              ;         carry reset
 185+ 9779              ; maths is
 186+ 9779              ;        hl = y , de= x
 187+ 9779              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 188+ 9779              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 189+ 9779              ;
 190+ 9779              ;
 191+ 9779              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 192+ 9779 C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 193+ 977A 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 194+ 977B 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 195+ 977C 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 196+ 977D 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 197+ 977E 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 198+ 977F ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 199+ 9781 EB                                   ex de,hl
 200+ 9782 ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 201+ 9784 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 202+ 9785 59                                   ld e,c
 203+ 9786 50                                   ld d,b
 204+ 9787 ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 205+ 9789 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 206+ 978A 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 207+ 978B 67                                   ld h,a
 208+ 978C 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 209+ 978D                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 210+ 978D AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 211+ 978E C1                                   pop     bc
 212+ 978F C9                                   ret
 213+ 9790
 214+ 9790
 215+ 9790              ; CHL = multiplicand D = multiplier
 216+ 9790              ; DCHL = CHL * D
 217+ 9790 7A           mulCHLbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 218+ 9791 AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 219+ 9792 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 220+ 9794 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 221+ 9796 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; now CHL = ABS (CHL)
 222+ 9797 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 223+ 9799 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; .
 224+ 979A 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 225+ 979B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 226+ 979D              ; At this point CHL = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 227+ 979D 57           .mul1:                  ld      d,a                 ; first do D * L
 228+ 979E 5D                                   ld      e,l                 ; .
 229+ 979F ED 30                                mul     de                  ; DE = L * D
 230+ 97A1 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save multiplier
 231+ 97A2 6B                                   ld      l,e                 ; L = p0
 232+ 97A3 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; carry byte
 233+ 97A4 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; retrieve muliplier and save carry byte along with flags
 234+ 97A5 5C           .mul2:                  ld      e,h                 ; byte 2 of multiplicand
 235+ 97A6 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; and multiplier
 236+ 97A7 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; now its D & L
 237+ 97A9 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte with flags
 238+ 97AA 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; add low byte carry to result and retain carry too through next instructions
 239+ 97AB 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; h = P1
 240+ 97AC 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = carry byte
 241+ 97AD 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save carry byte and get back multiplier with flags
 242+ 97AE 59           .mul3:                  ld      e,c                 ; byte 3 of multiplicand
 243+ 97AF 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 244+ 97B0 ED 30                                mul     de                  ;
 245+ 97B2 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte and carry prior to first add
 246+ 97B3 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ;
 247+ 97B4 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; recover saved resultant sign
 248+ 97B6 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; c byte 3. Note the value range allowed can never cause a byte 3 carry
 249+ 97B7 C9                                   ret
 250+ 97B8
 251+ 97B8              ;  CHL = 53456 D = 1E
 252+ 97B8              ;  56 * 1E = A14 L = 14 carry = 0A
 253+ 97B8              ;  34 * 1E = 618 H = 18 +A = 22 carry = 6
 254+ 97B8              ;  5  * 1E = 096 C = 96 + 6 = 9C
 255+ 97B8              ;  CHL = 9C2214
 256+ 97B8              ;mult3
 257+ 97B8              ; DELC = HLE * D, uses HL, DE, C , A , IYH
 258+ 97B8              ; HLE = multiplicand D = multiplier
 259+ 97B8              ; tested by mathstestsun.asm all passed
 260+ 97B8              ; Algorithm
 261+ 97B8              ; AC =  E * D   (save carry)         H    L    E
 262+ 97B8              ; DE =  L * D                                  D
 263+ 97B8              ;  L =  A + E + carry                         E*D (lo)
 264+ 97B8              ; DE =  H * D                             L*D+ ^ (hi)
 265+ 97B8              ;  E =  A + E + carry                H*D (lo) + carry
 266+ 97B8              ;
 267+ 97B8              ;
 268+ 97B8 7A           mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 269+ 97B9 AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 270+ 97BA E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 271+ 97BC FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 272+ 97BE 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 273+ 97BF E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 274+ 97C1 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; .
 275+ 97C2 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 276+ 97C3 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 277+ 97C5 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 278+ 97C6 B7           .testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 279+ 97C7 28 24                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 280+ 97C9 7C                                   ld      a,h
 281+ 97CA B5                                   or      l
 282+ 97CB B3                                   or      e
 283+ 97CC 28 1F                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 284+ 97CE              ; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 285+ 97CE 42                                   ld      b,d                 ; save Quotient
 286+ 97CF ED 30        .mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 287+ 97D1 4B                                   ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 288+ 97D2 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save carry (p1)
 289+ 97D4 5D           .mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 290+ 97D5 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 291+ 97D6 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 292+ 97D8 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl               ; get back p1
 293+ 97DA 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 294+ 97DB 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
 295+ 97DC FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save new carry byte
 296+ 97DE 5C           .mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 297+ 97DF 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 298+ 97E0 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 299+ 97E2 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 300+ 97E4 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ; .
 301+ 97E5 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
 302+ 97E6 7A           .ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 303+ 97E7 CE 00                                adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 304+ 97E9 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 305+ 97EB 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 306+ 97EC C9                                   ret
 307+ 97ED 11 00 00     .ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 308+ 97F0                                      ZeroA
 308+ 97F0 AF          >                        xor a
 309+ 97F1 4F                                   ld      c,a
 310+ 97F2 6F                                   ld      l,a
 311+ 97F3 C9                                   ret
 312+ 97F4
 313+ 97F4              ;;;
 314+ 97F4              ;;;
 315+ 97F4              ;;;mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 316+ 97F4              ;;;                        xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 317+ 97F4              ;;;                        and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 318+ 97F4              ;;;                        ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 319+ 97F4              ;;;                        ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 320+ 97F4              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 321+ 97F4              ;;;                        ld      h,a                 ; .
 322+ 97F4              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 323+ 97F4              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 324+ 97F4              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 325+ 97F4              ;;;.testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 326+ 97F4              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 327+ 97F4              ;;;                        ld      a,h
 328+ 97F4              ;;;                        or      l
 329+ 97F4              ;;;                        or      e
 330+ 97F4              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 331+ 97F4              ;;;; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 332+ 97F4              ;;;.mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 333+ 97F4              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save mulitplier
 334+ 97F4              ;;;                        ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 335+ 97F4              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; save carry (p1)
 336+ 97F4              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 337+ 97F4              ;;;.mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 338+ 97F4              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 339+ 97F4              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 340+ 97F4              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 341+ 97F4              ;;;.carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 342+ 97F4              ;;;                        ld      l,a                 ; .
 343+ 97F4              ;;;                        ld      a,d
 344+ 97F4              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save new carry byte
 345+ 97F4              ;;;.mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 346+ 97F4              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 347+ 97F4              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 348+ 97F4              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 349+ 97F4              ;;;                        adc     a,e                 ; .
 350+ 97F4              ;;;                        ld      e,a                 ; .
 351+ 97F4              ;;;.ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 352+ 97F4              ;;;                        adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 353+ 97F4              ;;;                        or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 354+ 97F4              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 355+ 97F4              ;;;                        ret
 356+ 97F4              ;;;.ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 357+ 97F4              ;;;                        ZeroA
 358+ 97F4              ;;;                        ld      c,a
 359+ 97F4              ;;;                        ld      l,a
 360+ 97F4              ;;;                        ret
 361+ 97F4
 362+ 97F4              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 363+ 97F4              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 364+ 97F4              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 365+ 97F4              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 366+ 97F4              ;         carry reset
 367+ 97F4              ;
 368+ 97F4              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 369+ 97F4 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 370+ 97F5 AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 371+ 97F6 32 F4 97                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 372+ 97F9 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 373+ 97FA ED 27 80                             test    $80
 374+ 97FD 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 375+ 97FF E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 376+ 9801 57                                   ld      d,a
 377+ 9802 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 378+ 9804 32 F4 97                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 379+ 9807 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 380+ 9808 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 381+ 980B 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 382+ 980D E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 383+ 980F 67                                   ld      h,a
 384+ 9810 3A F4 97                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 385+ 9813 EE 80                                xor     $80
 386+ 9815 32 F4 97                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 387+ 9818 CD 79 97     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 388+ 981B 3A F4 97     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 389+ 981E ED 27 80                             test    $80
 390+ 9821 C8                                   ret     z
 391+ 9822 AF           .Negateghl: 			xor 	a
 392+ 9823 95                                   sub 	l
 393+ 9824 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 394+ 9825 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 395+ 9826 94                                   sub 	h
 396+ 9827 67                                   ld 		h,a
 397+ 9828 C9                                   ret
 398+ 9829
 399+ 9829 AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 400+ 982A 32 F4 97                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 401+ 982D 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 402+ 982E ED 27 80                             test    $80
 403+ 9831 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 404+ 9833 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 405+ 9835 57                                   ld      d,a
 406+ 9836 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 407+ 9838 32 F4 97                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 408+ 983B CD 79 97     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 409+ 983E 3A F4 97     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 410+ 9841 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 411+ 9844 C8                                   ret     z
 412+ 9845 AF           .Negateghl:             xor 	a
 413+ 9846 95                                   sub 	l
 414+ 9847 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 415+ 9848 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 416+ 9849 94                                   sub 	h
 417+ 984A 67                                   ld 		h,a
 418+ 984B C9                                   ret

 615  984C                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_square.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
   1+ 984C              ; "ASM_SQUA : TESTGOOD"
   2+ 984C              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi"
   3+ 984C
   4+ 984C              inline_squde: MACRO
   5+ 984C ~            			ld	e,a
   6+ 984C ~            			ld  d,a
   7+ 984C ~            			mul
   8+ 984C              			ENDM
   9+ 984C
  10+ 984C              inline_squa: MACRO
  11+ 984C ~            			ld	e,a
  12+ 984C ~            			ld  d,a
  13+ 984C ~            			mul
  14+ 984C ~            			ld	a,e
  15+ 984C              			ENDM
  16+ 984C
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
 616  984C                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
   1+ 984C              ; "ASM SQRT : TESTGOOD"
   2+ 984C              ; "16-bit integer square root"
   3+ 984C              ; "call with de = number to square root"
   4+ 984C              ; "returns   hl = square root"
   5+ 984C              ; "corrupts  bc, de"
   6+ 984C              asm_sqrt:
   7+ 984C 01 00 80     	ld bc,$8000
   8+ 984F 61           	ld h,c
   9+ 9850 69           	ld l,c
  10+ 9851              .sqrloop:
  11+ 9851 CB 38        	srl b
  12+ 9853 CB 19        	rr c
  13+ 9855 09           	add hl,bc
  14+ 9856 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ 9857 ED 52        	sbc hl,de
  16+ 9859 38 04        	jr c,.sqrbit
  17+ 985B EB           	ex de,hl
  18+ 985C 09           	add hl,bc
  19+ 985D 18 05        	jr .sqrfi
  20+ 985F              .sqrbit:
  21+ 985F 19           	add hl,de
  22+ 9860 EB           	ex de,hl
  23+ 9861 B7           	or a
  24+ 9862 ED 42        	sbc hl,bc
  25+ 9864              .sqrfi:
  26+ 9864 CB 3C        	srl h
  27+ 9866 CB 1D        	rr l
  28+ 9868 CB 38        	srl b
  29+ 986A CB 19        	rr c
  30+ 986C 30 E3        	jr nc,.sqrloop
  31+ 986E C9           	ret
  32+ 986F
  33+ 986F
  34+ 986F              sqrtQR:					; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
  35+ 986F 3A 73 84     	ld		a,(varQ)
  36+ 9872 5F           	ld		e,a
  37+ 9873 3A 74 84     	ld		a,(varR)
  38+ 9876 57           	ld		d,a
  39+ 9877 CD 4C 98     	call	asm_sqrt
  40+ 987A 7D               ld      a,l
  41+ 987B 32 73 84     	ld		(varQ),a
  42+ 987E C9           	ret
  43+ 987F
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
 617  987F                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ 987F
   2+ 987F
   3+ 987F
   4+ 987F              ;
   5+ 987F              ;   Set flags E to 11111110
   6+ 987F              ;   Loop:   A << 2
   7+ 987F              ;           if carry was 0
   8+ 987F              ;               if a >= D
   9+ 987F              ;                   A = A - D
  10+ 987F              ;                   clear carry (probably irrelevant really)
  11+ 987F              ;           else
  12+ 987F
  13+ 987F              ;               sla flags << bringing in carry of 1
  14+ 987F              ;               if bit 7 of flag was set then loop
  15+ 987F              ;                                        elase a = e and exit
  16+ 987F              ;
  17+ 987F              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
  18+ 987F              ;
  19+ 987F              ;INPUTS: hl = dividend dbc = divisor
  20+ 987F              ;OUTPUTS: hl/de -> AHL = quotient CDE = remainder, Carryflag set if divide by 0
  21+ 987F
  22+ 987F 57           DVIDT:                  ld      d,a                     ; D = var P+1
  23+ 9880 3A 73 84                             ld      a,(varQ)
  24+ 9883 4F                                   ld      c,a                     ; C = var Q
  25+ 9884 3A 70 83                             ld      a,(varP)
  26+ 9887 5F                                   ld      e,a                     ; E = var P
  27+ 9888                                      ; Need fast exists on ABS values
  28+ 9888 7A           BAequDEdivC:            ld      a,d                     ; Fast exit is value is 0
  29+ 9889 B3                                   or      e                       ; .
  30+ 988A 28 2A                                jr      z,.ResultIsZero         ; .
  31+ 988C 79                                   ld      a,c                     ; Fast exit is divide by 0
  32+ 988D A7                                   and     a                       ;
  33+ 988E 28 29                                jr      z,.ResultIsFFFF         ;
  34+ 9890 7A           .SavSign:               ld      a,d                     ; preserve sign of result in var T
  35+ 9891 A9                                   xor     c                       ;
  36+ 9892 E6 80                                and     $80
  37+ 9894 6F                                   ld      l,a                     ; l = var T
  38+ 9895 3E 00                                ld      a,0
  39+ 9897 06 10                                ld      b,16
  40+ 9899                                      ShiftDELeft1
  40+ 9899 CB 23       >			   sla e
  40+ 989B CB 12       >			   rl  d
  41+ 989D CB 21                                sla     c                       ; c = abs c
  42+ 989F CB 39                                srl     c
  43+ 98A1 CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl      a
  44+ 98A3                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .SkipSubtract
  44+ 98A3 B9          >                        cp      c
  44+ 98A4 DA AA 98    >                        jp		c, .SkipSubtract
  45+ 98A7                                      ClearCarryFlag
  45+ 98A7 B7          >                        or a
  46+ 98A8 99                                   sbc     c
  47+ 98A9                                      ClearCarryFlag
  47+ 98A9 B7          >                        or a
  48+ 98AA 3F           .SkipSubtract:          ccf
  49+ 98AB CB 13                                rl      e
  50+ 98AD CB 12                                rl      d
  51+ 98AF 05                                   dec     b
  52+ 98B0 20 EF                                jr      nz,.DivideLoop
  53+ 98B2 7B                                   ld      a,e
  54+ 98B3 B5                                   or      l
  55+ 98B4 42                                   ld      b,d
  56+ 98B5 C9                                   ret
  57+ 98B6              .ResultIsZero:          ZeroA
  57+ 98B6 AF          >                        xor a
  58+ 98B7 47                                   ld      b,a
  59+ 98B8 C9                                   ret
  60+ 98B9 3E FF        .ResultIsFFFF:          ld      a,$FF
  61+ 98BB 47                                   ld      b,a
  62+ 98BC C9                                   ret
  63+ 98BD
  64+ 98BD 57           DIV96:                  ld      d,a                     ; D = var P+1
  65+ 98BE 3A 73 84                             ld      a,(varQ)
  66+ 98C1 0E 60                                ld      c,96                    ; C = var Q
  67+ 98C3 3A 70 83                             ld      a,(varP)
  68+ 98C6 5F                                   ld      e,a                     ; E = var P
  69+ 98C7                                      ; Need fast exists on ABS values
  70+ 98C7 7A           BAequDEdiv96            ld      a,d                     ; Fast exit is value is 0
  71+ 98C8 B3                                   or      e                       ; .
  72+ 98C9 28 26                                jr      z,.ResultIsZero         ; .
  73+ 98CB 7A           .SavSign:               ld      a,d                     ; preserve sign of result in var T
  74+ 98CC A9                                   xor     c                       ;
  75+ 98CD E6 80                                and     $80
  76+ 98CF 6F                                   ld      l,a                     ; l = var T
  77+ 98D0 3E 00                                ld      a,0
  78+ 98D2 06 10                                ld      b,16
  79+ 98D4                                      ShiftDELeft1
  79+ 98D4 CB 23       >			   sla e
  79+ 98D6 CB 12       >			   rl  d
  80+ 98D8 CB 21                                sla     c                       ; c = abs c
  81+ 98DA CB 39                                srl     c
  82+ 98DC CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl      a
  83+ 98DE                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .SkipSubtract
  83+ 98DE B9          >                        cp      c
  83+ 98DF DA E5 98    >                        jp		c, .SkipSubtract
  84+ 98E2                                      ClearCarryFlag
  84+ 98E2 B7          >                        or a
  85+ 98E3 99                                   sbc     c
  86+ 98E4                                      ClearCarryFlag
  86+ 98E4 B7          >                        or a
  87+ 98E5 3F           .SkipSubtract:          ccf
  88+ 98E6 CB 13                                rl      e
  89+ 98E8 CB 12                                rl      d
  90+ 98EA 05                                   dec     b
  91+ 98EB 20 EF                                jr      nz,.DivideLoop
  92+ 98ED 7B                                   ld      a,e
  93+ 98EE B5                                   or      l
  94+ 98EF 42                                   ld      b,d
  95+ 98F0 C9                                   ret
  96+ 98F1              .ResultIsZero:          ZeroA
  96+ 98F1 AF          >                        xor a
  97+ 98F2 47                                   ld      b,a
  98+ 98F3 C9                                   ret
  99+ 98F4
 100+ 98F4 14           Div16by24usgn:          inc     d                           ; can we fast retu
 101+ 98F5 15                                   dec     d
 102+ 98F6 20 13                                jr      nz,.ResultZero
 103+ 98F8 50 59                                ld      de,bc                       ; so prep for bc/de
 104+ 98FA 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
 105+ 98FC 7A           .div16by16usng:         ld      a,d
 106+ 98FD B3                                   or      e
 107+ 98FE 28 10                                jr      z,.DivideByZero
 108+ 9900 14                                   inc     d
 109+ 9901 15                                   dec     d
 110+ 9902 CD 87 9A                             call    BC_Div_DE
 111+ 9905                                      ZeroA
 111+ 9905 AF          >                        xor a
 112+ 9906 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = remainder (need to fix c after hl = nothing of worth)
 113+ 9907 60 69                                ld      hl,bc                       ; hl = result (a is zero from above)
 114+ 9909 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; now fix c
 115+ 990A C9                                   ret
 116+ 990B AF           .ResultZero:            xor     a                           ; set AHL to 0 as d was 0 so h is zero
 117+ 990C 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; c = 0
 118+ 990D 67                                   ld      h,a
 119+ 990E 6F                                   ld      l,a
 120+ 990F C9                                   ret
 121+ 9910 3E FF        .DivideByZero:          ld      a,$FF
 122+ 9912 67                                   ld      h,a
 123+ 9913 6F                                   ld      l,a
 124+ 9914                                      SetCarryFlag
 124+ 9914 37          >                        scf
 125+ 9915 C9                                   ret
 126+ 9916
 127+ 9916              ;DIVD4 P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
 128+ 9916 06 08        HLEquAmul256DivD:       ld		b,8							; counter
 129+ 9918 CB 27                                sla		a							;
 130+ 991A 67                                   ld		h,a							; r a * 2 we will build result in hl
 131+ 991B CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl		a							; a = a * 2
 132+ 991D 38 03                                jr      c,.StraightToSubtraction    ; jump on carry to subtraction
 133+ 991F BA                                   cp      d                           ; what was var Q
 134+ 9920 38 03                                jr		c,.SkipSubtraction	        ; if a < d skip subtraction, note this will come to skip subtraction with carry the wrong way round
 135+ 9922              .StraightToSubtraction: ClearCarryFlag                      ; in 6502 the borrow flag is inverted carry, z80 just uses carry so we need to clear it
 135+ 9922 B7          >                        or a
 136+ 9923 9A                                   sbc     a,d                         ; a = a - q
 137+ 9924                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; set carry so it gets shifted into bit 0 of b. we do this as we have to flip carry due to jr c from earlier cp d
 137+ 9924 B7          >                        or a
 138+ 9925 3F           .SkipSubtraction:       ccf                                 ; we need to do this as 6502 does opposite on carry, i.e. if we jumped direct here then carry would be set in z80
 139+ 9926 CB 14                                rl      h                           ; roll d left bringing in carry if there was an sbc performed
 140+ 9928 10 F1                                djnz    .DivideLoop                 ; 8 cycles
 141+ 992A BA           .CalculateRemainder:    cp      d                           ; calulate 256 * a / d if q >= q then answer will not fit in one byte d is still set, a holds remainder to be subtracted
 142+ 992B 30 19                                jr      nc, .RemainderTooBig
 143+ 992D                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; remove carry as the previous cp will have set it and mess up the sla in the remainder loop
 143+ 992D B7          >                        or a
 144+ 992E 06 FE        .InitRemainderLoop:     ld      b,%11111110                 ; loop for bits 1 to 7
 145+ 9930 68                                   ld      l,b                         ; and set l to capture result bits (R)
 146+ 9931 CB 27        .RemainderLoop:         sla     a                           ; shift a left
 147+ 9933 38 0A                                jr      c, .RemainderSubtraction    ; if there was a carry go to subtraction
 148+ 9935 BA                                   cp      d                           ; if a < d then skip subtraction
 149+ 9936 38 01                                jr      c,.RemainderSkipSubtract    ; .
 150+ 9938 9A                                   sbc     d                           ; a > q so a = a - q, carry will be clear here
 151+ 9939 3F           .RemainderSkipSubtract: ccf                                 ; as the jr used z80 we need to flip the carry to behave like 6502
 152+ 993A CB 15                                rl      l                           ; rotate counter to the left
 153+ 993C 38 F3                                jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; if there was a bit pushed to carry then loop
 154+ 993E C9                                   ret
 155+ 993F 9A           .RemainderSubtraction:  sbc     d                           ; as the carry came from an sla we want to retain it
 156+ 9940                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; roll in a carry bit to result
 156+ 9940 37          >                        scf
 157+ 9941 CB 15                                rl      l                           ;
 158+ 9943 38 EC                                jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; and loop if there was a carry bit that came out
 159+ 9945 C9                                   ret
 160+ 9946 2E FF        .RemainderTooBig:       ld      l,$FF                       ; now hl = result
 161+ 9948 C9                                   ret
 162+ 9949
 163+ 9949 BA           AEquAmul256DivD:        cp      d
 164+ 994A 28 1D                                jr      z,.BothSame
 165+ 994C 30 1E                                jr      nc,.DgtA
 166+ 994E 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
 167+ 9950 CB 27        .DivideLoop:            sla     a
 168+ 9952 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
 169+ 9954                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
 169+ 9954 BA          >                        cp      d
 169+ 9955 DA 5A 99    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
 170+ 9958 92                                   sub     d
 171+ 9959                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
 171+ 9959 B7          >                        or a
 172+ 995A              .SkipSub:               FlipCarryFlag                       ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
 172+ 995A 3F          >                        ccf
 173+ 995B CB 13                                rl      e
 174+ 995D 38 F1                                jr      c,.DivideLoop
 175+ 995F 7B                                   ld      a,e
 176+ 9960 C9                                   ret
 177+ 9961 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
 178+ 9962                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
 178+ 9962 37          >                        scf
 179+ 9963 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
 180+ 9965 38 E9                                jr      c,.DivideLoop               ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
 181+ 9967 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
 182+ 9968 C9                                   ret
 183+ 9969 3E 01        .BothSame:              ld  a,1
 184+ 996B C9                                   ret
 185+ 996C 3E FF        .DgtA:                  ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
 186+ 996E C9                                   ret
 187+ 996F
 188+ 996F
 189+ 996F              ; Divide 8-bit values
 190+ 996F              ; In: Divide E by divider C
 191+ 996F              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
 192+ 996F              ;
 193+ 996F              ;;;Div8:
 194+ 996F              ;;;    xor a
 195+ 996F              ;;;    ld b,8
 196+ 996F              ;;;Div8_Loop:
 197+ 996F              ;;;    rl e
 198+ 996F              ;;;    rla
 199+ 996F              ;;;    sub c
 200+ 996F              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
 201+ 996F              ;;;    add a,c
 202+ 996F              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
 203+ 996F              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
 204+ 996F              ;;;    ld b,a0
 205+ 996F              ;;;    ld a,e
 206+ 996F              ;;;    rla
 207+ 996F              ;;;    cpl
 208+ 996F              ;;;    ret
 209+ 996F
 210+ 996F              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
 211+ 996F              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
 212+ 996F              ;;         A is a copy of E
 213+ 996F              ;;         HL is the remainder
 214+ 996F              ;;         BC is not changed
 215+ 996F              ;; so DE = DE /BC
 216+ 996F              ;140 bytes
 217+ 996F              ;145cc
 218+ 996F
 219+ 996F              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
 220+ 996F ~                                rla
 221+ 996F ~                                adc     hl,hl
 222+ 996F ~                                sbc     hl,bc
 223+ 996F ~                                jr      nc,$+3
 224+ 996F ~                                add     hl,bc
 225+ 996F                                  ENDM
 226+ 996F

 229+ 9970 ED 62            sbc hl,hl
 230+ 9972 7A               ld a,d

 258+ 99FB
 259+ 99FB              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
 260+ 99FB              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 261+ 99FB              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 262+ 99FB              ; Our use
 263+ 99FB              ; BC = A0
 264+ 99FB              ; DE = 0C
 265+ 99FB              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
 266+ 99FB              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
 266+ 99FB B9          >                        cp     c
 266+ 99FC D2 27 9A    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
 267+ 99FF 47                                   ld      b,a
 268+ 9A00 59                                   ld      e,c
 269+ 9A01 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 270+ 9A03 16 00                                ld      d,0
 271+ 9A05 C3 12 9A                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
 272+ 9A08 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
 273+ 9A09 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 274+ 9A0B 21 73 84                             ld      hl,varQ
 275+ 9A0E 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 276+ 9A0F 16 00                                ld      d,0
 277+ 9A11 5F                                   ld      e,a
 278+ 9A12              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
 279+ 9A12 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
 280+ 9A15 78                                   ld      a,b
 281+ 9A16 06 10                                ld      b,16
 282+ 9A18 CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
 283+ 9A1A 17                                   rla			; ...
 284+ 9A1B ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
 285+ 9A1D ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
 286+ 9A1F 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
 287+ 9A21 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 288+ 9A22 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 289+ 9A23 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 290+ 9A25 47                                   ld   b,a
 291+ 9A26 C9                                   ret
 292+ 9A27 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 293+ 9A2A C9                                   ret
 294+ 9A2B              ; switch to logarithm version
 295+ 9A2B              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 296+ 9A2B 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 297+ 9A2D AF                                   xor a
 298+ 9A2E CB 21        .div8_loop:	            sla c
 299+ 9A30 17                                   rla
 300+ 9A31 BA                                   cp d
 301+ 9A32 38 02                                jr c,.div8_skip
 301+ 9A34
 302+ 9A34 0C                                   inc c
 303+ 9A35 92                                   sub d
 304+ 9A36 10 F6        .div8_skip:	            djnz .div8_loop
 305+ 9A38 C9                                   ret
 306+ 9A39              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 307+ 9A39 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 308+ 9A3B AF                                   xor a
 309+ 9A3C CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 310+ 9A3E CB 14                                rl	h
 311+ 9A40              ;    add hl,hl
 312+ 9A40 17                                   rla
 313+ 9A41 B9                                   cp c
 314+ 9A42 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 315+ 9A44 2C                                   inc l
 316+ 9A45 91                                   sub c
 317+ 9A46 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 318+ 9A48 C9                                   ret
 319+ 9A49              ;
 320+ 9A49              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 321+ 9A49              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 322+ 9A49              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 323+ 9A49              ;
 324+ 9A49              HLDivC_Iteration: 	    MACRO
 325+ 9A49 ~                                    add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 326+ 9A49 ~                                    rla				; ...
 327+ 9A49 ~                                    cp	c			; ...
 328+ 9A49 ~                                    jr	1F
 329+ 9A49 ~                                    sub	c			; ...
 330+ 9A49 ~            1:
 331+ 9A49 ~                                    inc	l			; ...
 332+ 9A49                                      ENDM
 333+ 9A49
 334+ 9A49              EDivC_Iteration:        MACRO
 335+ 9A49 ~                                    rl  e
 336+ 9A49 ~                                    rla
 337+ 9A49 ~                                    sub c
 338+ 9A49 ~                                    jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 339+ 9A49 ~                                    add a,c
 340+ 9A49 ~            .Div8_NoAdd:
 341+ 9A49                                      ENDM

 360+ 9A87
 361+ 9A87              BCDIVDE_Iteration:      MACRO
 362+ 9A87 ~                                    rla
 363+ 9A87 ~                                    adc	    hl,hl
 364+ 9A87 ~                                    add	    hl,de
 365+ 9A87 ~                                    jr	    c,1F
 366+ 9A87 ~                                    sbc	    hl,de
 367+ 9A87 ~            1:
 368+ 9A87                                      ENDM
 369+ 9A87
 370+ 9A87
 371+ 9A87              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 372+ 9A87              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 373+ 9A87              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 374+ 9A87              ;min: 738cc
 375+ 9A87              ;max: 898cc
 376+ 9A87              ;avg: 818cc
 377+ 9A87              ;144 bytes
 378+ 9A87 AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
 379+ 9A88 67                                   ld h,a
 380+ 9A89 6F                                   ld l,a
 381+ 9A8A 93                                   sub e
 382+ 9A8B 5F                                   ld e,a
 383+ 9A8C 9F                                   sbc a,a
 384+ 9A8D 92                                   sub d
 385+ 9A8E 57                                   ld d,a
 386+ 9A8F 78                                   ld a,b
 387+ 9A90                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 387+ 9A90 17          >                        rla
 387+ 9A91 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 387+ 9A93 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 387+ 9A94 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 387+ 9A96 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 387+ 9A98             >1:
 388+ 9A98                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 388+ 9A98 17          >                        rla
 388+ 9A99 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 388+ 9A9B 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 388+ 9A9C 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 388+ 9A9E ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 388+ 9AA0             >1:
 389+ 9AA0                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 389+ 9AA0 17          >                        rla
 389+ 9AA1 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 389+ 9AA3 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 389+ 9AA4 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 389+ 9AA6 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 389+ 9AA8             >1:
 390+ 9AA8                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration

 390+ 9AAB 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 390+ 9AAC 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 390+ 9AAE ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
