 618  9B16                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
   1+ 9B16              asm_tis2:
   2+ 9B16              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ 9B16              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ 9B16 F5           	push af
   5+ 9B17 E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ 9B19 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ 9B1A 3A 73 84     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ 9B1D 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ 9B1E 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ 9B1F BB           	cp e
  11+ 9B20 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ 9B22 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ 9B24 ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ 9B26 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ 9B27 3A 73 84     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ 9B2A 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ 9B2B CD 39 9A     	call asm_div16
  18+ 9B2E F1           	pop af
  19+ 9B2F E6 80        	and $80
  20+ 9B31 B5           	or l
  21+ 9B32 C9           	ret
  22+ 9B33              .tis2_set96:
  23+ 9B33 F1           	pop af
  24+ 9B34 E6 80        	and $80
  25+ 9B36 F6 96        	or $96
  26+ 9B38 C9           	ret
  27+ 9B39
  28+ 9B39
  29+ 9B39              asm_unit_vector:
  30+ 9B39              squareregfx:
  31+ 9B39 3A A6 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  32+ 9B3C 57           	ld d,a
  33+ 9B3D 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ 9B3E ED 30        	mul
  35+ 9B40 EB           	ex de,hl
  36+ 9B41              squareregfy:
  37+ 9B41 3A A8 C0     	ld a, (UBnkYScaled)
  38+ 9B44 57           	ld d,a
  39+ 9B45 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ 9B46 ED 30        	mul
  41+ 9B48 19           	add hl,de
  42+ 9B49              squareregfz:
  43+ 9B49 3A AA C0     	ld a, (UBnkZScaled)
  44+ 9B4C 57           	ld d,a
  45+ 9B4D 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ 9B4E ED 30        	mul
  47+ 9B50 19           	add hl,de
  48+ 9B51 EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ 9B52              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ 9B52 CD 4C 98     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ 9B55 E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ 9B56 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ 9B57 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ 9B58              normfx:
  55+ 9B58 3A A6 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ 9B5B E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ 9B5C 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ 9B5D 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ 9B5E CD 16 9B     	call asm_tis2
  60+ 9B61 32 A6 C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ 9B64              normfy:
  62+ 9B64 3A A8 C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ 9B67 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ 9B68 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ 9B69 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ 9B6A CD 16 9B     	call asm_tis2
  67+ 9B6D 32 A8 C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ 9B70              normfz:
  69+ 9B70 3A AA C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ 9B73 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ 9B74 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ 9B75 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ 9B76 CD 16 9B     	call asm_tis2
  74+ 9B79 32 AA C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ 9B7C              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ 9B7C C9           	ret
  77+ 9B7D
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
 619  9B7D                  INCLUDE "./Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ 9B7D              ; Input:
   2+ 9B7D              ;       HL = 1st value
   3+ 9B7D              ;       DE = 2nd value
   4+ 9B7D              ; Output:
   5+ 9B7D              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   6+ 9B7D              ;
   7+ 9B7D              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   8+ 9B7D              ;               -----------------------------------
   9+ 9B7D              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  10+ 9B7D              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  11+ 9B7D              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  12+ 9B7D              ;               1       1       Impossible
  13+ 9B7D              ;
  14+ 9B7D
  15+ 9B7D E5           compare16HLDE:      push    hl
  16+ 9B7E A7                               and     a
  17+ 9B7F ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  18+ 9B81 E1                               pop     hl
  19+ 9B82 C9                               ret
  20+ 9B83
  21+ 9B83              ; With compare signed we do ABS comparison
  22+ 9B83              ; this is used for view ports as we just want to know if its +/- out side of 90 degrees
  23+ 9B83
  24+ 9B83 E5 D5        compare16HLDEABS:   push    hl,,de
  25+ 9B85 7C                               ld      a,h                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  26+ 9B86 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  27+ 9B88 67                               ld      h,a
  28+ 9B89 7A                               ld      a,d                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  29+ 9B8A E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  30+ 9B8C 57                               ld      d,a
  31+ 9B8D A7                               and     a
  32+ 9B8E ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  33+ 9B90 D1 E1                            pop     hl,,de
  34+ 9B92 C9                               ret
  35+ 9B93
  36+ 9B93
# file closed: ./Maths/compare16.asm
 620  9B93                  INCLUDE "./Maths/negate16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/negate16.asm
   1+ 9B93              ;;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2+ 9B93              ;; 16-bit negate
   3+ 9B93              negate16:
   4+ 9B93              negate16hl:
   5+ 9B93                      ; Input:
   6+ 9B93                      ;       HL = value
   7+ 9B93                      ; Output:
   8+ 9B93                      ;       HL = -value
   9+ 9B93                      ; Destroys:
  10+ 9B93                      ;       AF
  11+ 9B93                      ;
  12+ 9B93 AF           	xor 	a
  13+ 9B94 95           	sub 	l
  14+ 9B95 6F           	ld 		l,a
  15+ 9B96 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  16+ 9B97 94           	sub 	h
  17+ 9B98 67           	ld 		h,a
  18+ 9B99 C9           	ret
  19+ 9B9A
  20+ 9B9A              negate16de:
  21+ 9B9A AF           	xor 	a
  22+ 9B9B 93           	sub 	e
  23+ 9B9C 5F           	ld 		e,a
  24+ 9B9D 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  25+ 9B9E 92           	sub 	d
  26+ 9B9F 57           	ld 		d,a
  27+ 9BA0 C9           	ret
  28+ 9BA1
  29+ 9BA1              negate16bc:
  30+ 9BA1 AF           	xor 	a
  31+ 9BA2 91           	sub 	c
  32+ 9BA3 4F           	ld 		c,a
  33+ 9BA4 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  34+ 9BA5 90           	sub 	b
  35+ 9BA6 47           	ld 		b,a
  36+ 9BA7 C9           	ret
  37+ 9BA8
  38+ 9BA8
  39+ 9BA8              macronegate16hl:	MACRO
  40+ 9BA8 ~            					xor 	a
  41+ 9BA8 ~            					sub 	l
  42+ 9BA8 ~            					ld 		l,a
  43+ 9BA8 ~            					sbc 	a,a
  44+ 9BA8 ~            					sub 	h
  45+ 9BA8 ~            					ld 		h,a
  46+ 9BA8              					ENDM
  47+ 9BA8
  48+ 9BA8              macronegate16de:	MACRO
  49+ 9BA8 ~            					xor 	a
  50+ 9BA8 ~                                sub 	e
  51+ 9BA8 ~                                ld 		e,a
  52+ 9BA8 ~                                sbc 	a,a
  53+ 9BA8 ~                                sub 	d
  54+ 9BA8 ~                                ld 		d,a
  55+ 9BA8              					ENDM
  56+ 9BA8              macronegate16bc:	MACRO
  57+ 9BA8 ~            					xor 	a
  58+ 9BA8 ~                                sub 	c
  59+ 9BA8 ~                                ld 		c,a
  60+ 9BA8 ~                                sbc 	a,a
  61+ 9BA8 ~                                sub 	b
  62+ 9BA8 ~                                ld 		b,a
  63+ 9BA8              					ENDM
  64+ 9BA8
  65+ 9BA8              macronegate16ix:	MACRO
  66+ 9BA8 ~            					xor 	a
  67+ 9BA8 ~                                sub 	ixl
  68+ 9BA8 ~                                ld 		ixl,a
  69+ 9BA8 ~                                sbc 	a,a
  70+ 9BA8 ~                                sub 	ixh
  71+ 9BA8 ~                                ld 		ixh,a
  72+ 9BA8              					ENDM
# file closed: ./Maths/negate16.asm
 621  9BA8                  INCLUDE "./Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ 9BA8              ; a equal a / d * 96
   2+ 9BA8
   3+ 9BA8
   4+ 9BA8
   5+ 9BA8              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
   6+ 9BA8 3A A6 C0     normaliseXX1596S7:      ld		a,(XX15VecX)	    ; XX15+0
   7+ 9BAB DD 67                                ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
   8+ 9BAD E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; a = unsigned version
   9+ 9BAF              .n96SQX:	            inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
   9+ 9BAF 5F          >			ld	e,a
   9+ 9BB0 57          >			ld  d,a
   9+ 9BB1 ED 30       >			mul
  10+ 9BB3 62                                   ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  11+ 9BB4 6B                                   ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  12+ 9BB5 3A A7 C0     .n96SQY:                ld		a,(XX15VecY)
  13+ 9BB8 DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  14+ 9BBA E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit                 ; = abs
  15+ 9BBC                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  15+ 9BBC 5F          >			ld	e,a
  15+ 9BBD 57          >			ld  d,a
  15+ 9BBE ED 30       >			mul
  16+ 9BC0 19                                   add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  17+ 9BC1 3A A8 C0     .n96SQZ:                ld		a,(XX15VecZ)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  18+ 9BC4 FD 67                                ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
  19+ 9BC6 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit                 ; unsigned
  20+ 9BC8                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  20+ 9BC8 5F          >			ld	e,a
  20+ 9BC9 57          >			ld  d,a
  20+ 9BCA ED 30       >			mul
  21+ 9BCC 19           .n96SQADD:              add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  22+ 9BCD EB                                   ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  23+ 9BCE CD 4C 98     .n96SQRT:               call	asm_sqrt			; hl = de = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  24+ 9BD1 3A A6 C0     .n96NORMX:              ld		a,(XX15VecX)
  25+ 9BD4 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  26+ 9BD6 4F                                   ld		c,a
  27+ 9BD7 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  28+ 9BD8 CD 6B 9D                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  29+ 9BDB 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  30+ 9BDC DD 7C                                ld		a,ixh			    ;++SGN
  31+ 9BDE E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  32+ 9BE0 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  33+ 9BE1 32 A6 C0                             ld		(XX15VecX),a
  34+ 9BE4 3A A7 C0     .n96NORMY:              ld		a,(XX15VecY)
  35+ 9BE7 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  36+ 9BE9 4F                                   ld		c,a
  37+ 9BEA 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  38+ 9BEB CD 6B 9D                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  39+ 9BEE 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  40+ 9BEF DD 7D                                ld		a,ixl			    ;++SGN
  41+ 9BF1 E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  42+ 9BF3 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  43+ 9BF4 32 A7 C0                             ld		(XX15VecY),a
  44+ 9BF7 3A A8 C0     .n96NORMZ:              ld		a,(XX15VecZ)
  45+ 9BFA E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  46+ 9BFC 4F                                   ld		c,a
  47+ 9BFD 55                                   ld		d,l				; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  48+ 9BFE CD 6B 9D                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  49+ 9C01 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  50+ 9C02 FD 7C                                ld		a,iyh			    ;++SGN
  51+ 9C04 E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  52+ 9C06 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  53+ 9C07 32 A8 C0                             ld		(XX15VecZ),a
  54+ 9C0A C9                                   ret
  55+ 9C0B
  56+ 9C0B              ; Normalise vector
  57+ 9C0B              ; scale Q = Sqrt (X^2 + Y^2 + Z^2)
  58+ 9C0B              ; X = X / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e X = X / Q * 3/8
  59+ 9C0B              ; Y = Y / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Y = Y / Q * 3/8
  60+ 9C0B              ; Z = Z / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Z = Z / Q * 3/8
  61+ 9C0B
# file closed: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
 622  9C0B                  INCLUDE "./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ 9C0B              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ 9C0B              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ 9C0B              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ 9C0B              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ 9C0B              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ 9C0B              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ 9C0B              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ 9C0B 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ 9C0E CD 24 9C     	call	Num1
  10+ 9C11 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ 9C14 CD 24 9C     	call	Num1
  12+ 9C17 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ 9C1A CD 24 9C     	call	Num1
  14+ 9C1D 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ 9C1F CD 24 9C     	call	Num1
  16+ 9C22 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ 9C24              Num1:
  18+ 9C24 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ 9C26              .Num2:
  20+ 9C26 3C           	inc	a
  21+ 9C27 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ 9C28 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ 9C2A ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ 9C2C 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ 9C2D 13           	inc	de
  26+ 9C2E C9           	ret
  27+ 9C2F
  28+ 9C2F              DispAtoDE:
  29+ 9C2F 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ 9C31 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ 9C32 C3 0B 9C     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ 9C35
  33+ 9C35              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ 9C35 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ 9C37 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ 9C38 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ 9C3B CD 4B 9C     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ 9C3E 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ 9C40 CD 24 9C     	call	Num1
  40+ 9C43 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ 9C45 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  42+ 9C46 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  43+ 9C47 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  44+ 9C49 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  45+ 9C4B              .NumLeadBlank1:
  46+ 9C4B 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  47+ 9C4D              .NumLeadBlank2:
  48+ 9C4D 3C           	inc	a
  49+ 9C4E 09           	add	hl,bc
  50+ 9C4F 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  51+ 9C51 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  52+ 9C53 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  53+ 9C55              .Blank:
  54+ 9C55 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  55+ 9C57              .DontBlank:
  56+ 9C57 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  57+ 9C59 12           	ld	(de),a
  58+ 9C5A 13           	inc	de
  59+ 9C5B C9           	ret
  60+ 9C5C
  61+ 9C5C              DispQtyAtoDE:
  62+ 9C5C FE 00        	cp	0
  63+ 9C5E 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  64+ 9C60 26 00        	ld h,0
  65+ 9C62 6F           	ld l,a
  66+ 9C63 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  67+ 9C66 CD 72 9C     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  68+ 9C69 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  69+ 9C6B CD 72 9C     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  70+ 9C6E 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  71+ 9C70 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  72+ 9C72              .NumLeadBlank1:
  73+ 9C72 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  74+ 9C74              .NumLeadBlank2:
  75+ 9C74 3C           	inc	a
  76+ 9C75 09           	add	hl,bc
  77+ 9C76 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  78+ 9C78 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  79+ 9C7A 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  80+ 9C7C              .Blank:
  81+ 9C7C 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  82+ 9C7E              .DontBlank:
  83+ 9C7E ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  84+ 9C80 12           	ld	(de),a
  85+ 9C81 13           	inc	de
  86+ 9C82 C9           	ret
  87+ 9C83              .NoStock:
  88+ 9C83 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  89+ 9C85 12           	ld	(de),a
  90+ 9C86 13           	inc	de
  91+ 9C87 12           	ld	(de),a
  92+ 9C88 13           	inc	de
  93+ 9C89 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  94+ 9C8B 12           	ld	(de),a
  95+ 9C8C 13           	inc de
  96+ 9C8D C9           	ret
  97+ 9C8E
  98+ 9C8E
  99+ 9C8E              ;### CLCN32 -> Converts 32Bit-Value in ASCII-String (terminated by 0)
 100+ 9C8E              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address
 101+ 9C8E              ;### Output     IY=last char in destination string
 102+ 9C8E              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX

 626  9D36                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
   1+ 9D36              AequAdivQmul96ABS:      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   1+ 9D36 BA          >                        cp     d
   1+ 9D37 D2 52 9D    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
   2+ 9D3A 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
   3+ 9D3C CB 27        .TIS2RollTLoop:			sla			a
   4+ 9D3E                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
   4+ 9D3E BA          >                        cp      d
   4+ 9D3F DA 55 9D    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
   5+ 9D42 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
   6+ 9D43 37                                   scf
   7+ 9D44 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
   8+ 9D46 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
   9+ 9D48 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; T
  10+ 9D49 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 2
  11+ 9D4B CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
  12+ 9D4D 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  13+ 9D4E CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
  14+ 9D50 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  15+ 9D51 C9                                   ret
  16+ 9D52 3E 60        .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,$60							; unity
  17+ 9D54 C9                                   ret
  18+ 9D55 B7           .TIS2SkipSub:           or			a
  19+ 9D56 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  20+ 9D58 38 E2                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  21+ 9D5A C3 48 9D                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  22+ 9D5D
  23+ 9D5D
  24+ 9D5D              ; USES 			A DE BC
  25+ 9D5D              ; DOES NOT USE 	HL
  26+ 9D5D              TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
  27+ 9D5D CB 7F        	bit			7,a
  28+ 9D5F 28 04        	jr			z,AequAdivQmul96
  29+ 9D61 ED 44        	neg										; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
  30+ 9D63 CB FF        	set			7,a
  31+ 9D65              ; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  32+ 9D65              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  33+ 9D65              TIS2:
  34+ 9D65 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  35+ 9D66 3A 73 84     	ld			a,(varQ)
  36+ 9D69 57           	ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  37+ 9D6A 79           	ld			a,c							; recover a
  38+ 9D6B              AequAdivDmul967Bit:
  39+ 9D6B 4F               ld          c,a
  40+ 9D6C 7A               ld          a,d
  41+ 9D6D CB 27            sla         a
  42+ 9D6F 30 10            jr          nc, .OKToDivide
  43+ 9D71              .ScaleDown:
  44+ 9D71 B7               or          a
  45+ 9D72 CB 3A            srl         d
  46+ 9D74
  47+ 9D74 79               ld          a,c
  48+ 9D75 E6 7F            and         SignMask8Bit
  49+ 9D77 CB 3F            srl         a
  50+ 9D79 47               ld          b,a
  51+ 9D7A 79               ld          a,c
  52+ 9D7B E6 80            and         $80
  53+ 9D7D B0               or          b
  54+ 9D7E C3 82 9D         jp          AequAdivDmul96
  55+ 9D81              .OKToDivide:
  56+ 9D81 79               ld          a,c
  57+ 9D82              AequAdivDmul96:
  58+ 9D82 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  59+ 9D83 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  60+ 9D85              	JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  60+ 9D85 BA          >                        cp     d
  60+ 9D86 D2 A6 9D    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
  61+ 9D89 06 FE        	ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  62+ 9D8B              .TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  63+ 9D8B CB 27        	sla			a
  64+ 9D8D              	JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
  64+ 9D8D BA          >                        cp      d
  64+ 9D8E DA AC 9D    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
  65+ 9D91 9A           	sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  66+ 9D92 37           	scf                                     ; set carrry to roll into b
  67+ 9D93 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  68+ 9D95 38 F4        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  69+ 9D97              .TIS2SKIPCont:
  70+ 9D97 78           	ld			a,b							; A = T = 4 / 4
  71+ 9D98 CB 3F        	srl			a							; .
  72+ 9D9A CB 3F        	srl			a							; .
  73+ 9D9C 47           	ld			b,a							; .
  74+ 9D9D CB 3F        	srl			a							; A = A / 2 (i.e. T /8)
  75+ 9D9F 80           	add			a,b							; A = T/8 + T/4 (3T/8)
  76+ 9DA0 47           	ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  77+ 9DA1 79           	ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  78+ 9DA2 E6 80        	and			$80							; recover sign only
  79+ 9DA4 B0           	or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  80+ 9DA5 C9           	ret
  81+ 9DA6              .TIS2AccGTEQ:
  82+ 9DA6              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  83+ 9DA6 79           	ld			a,c
  84+ 9DA7 E6 80        	and			$80							; copy of Acc
  85+ 9DA9 F6 60        	or			$60							; unity
  86+ 9DAB C9           	ret
  87+ 9DAC              .TIS2SkipSub:
  88+ 9DAC              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; Clear carry as it needs to be empty to roll in 0
  88+ 9DAC B7          >                        or a
  89+ 9DAD CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  90+ 9DAF 38 DA        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  91+ 9DB1 C3 97 9D     	jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  92+ 9DB4
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm

   1+ 9DB4              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   2+ 9DB4              fmltu:
   3+ 9DB4 57           AequAmulQdiv256:        ld	d,a
   4+ 9DB5 3A 73 84                             ld	a,(varQ)
   5+ 9DB8 5F                                   ld	e,a
   6+ 9DB9 ED 30                                mul
   7+ 9DBB 7A                                   ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   8+ 9DBC C9                                   ret
   9+ 9DBD

  12+ 9DC0 7A                                   ld  a,d
  13+ 9DC1 C9                                   ret

 628  9DC2                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
   1+ 9DC2              ; "DV42,DV42IYH DE = P.R, c = R"
   2+ 9DC2              DV42IYH:									; as per DV42 but using iyl for Y reg
   3+ 9DC2 21 56 87     		ld		hl,varDustZ
   4+ 9DC5 FD 7D        		ld		a,iyl
   5+ 9DC7 ED 31        		add		hl,a
   6+ 9DC9 7E           		ld		a,(hl)
   7+ 9DCA C3 D6 9D     		jp		DV41
   8+ 9DCD              DV42:										; travel step of dust particle front/rear
   9+ 9DCD 21 56 87     		ld		hl,varDustZ
  10+ 9DD0 3A 5A 83     		ld		a,(regY)
  11+ 9DD3 ED 31        		add		hl,a
  12+ 9DD5 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; a = SZ[y]
  13+ 9DD6              DV41:										; P.R = speed/ (ZZ/8) dust left/right
  14+ 9DD6 5F           		ld		e,a							; using E as Q var replacement
  15+ 9DD7 3A 6E 84     		ld		a,(DELTA)					; DELTA \ speed, how far has dust moved based on its z-coord.
  16+ 9DDA              DVID4:										; P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
  17+ 9DDA 06 08        		ld		b,8							; counter
  18+ 9DDC CB 27        		sla		a							;
  19+ 9DDE 57           		ld		d,a							; use d for - p = delta * 2
  20+ 9DDF AF           		xor		a
  21+ 9DE0              DVL4:										; counter x loop (b reg)
  22+ 9DE0 CB 17        		rl		a							; a = a * 2
  23+ 9DE2 38 03        		jr		c,DV8						; jump on carry
  24+ 9DE4 BB           		cp		e							; var Q
  25+ 9DE5 38 02        		jr		c,DV5						; skip subtraction
  26+ 9DE7              DV8:
  27+ 9DE7 9B           		sbc		a,e							; a = a - q (with carry)
  28+ 9DE8 37           		scf									;  carry gets set
  29+ 9DE9              DV5:										; skipped subtraction
  30+ 9DE9 CB 12        		rl		d							; d (P hi)
  31+ 9DEB 10 F3        		djnz	DVL4						; dec b and loop loop X, hi left in P.
  32+ 9DED              .CalcRemainder:								; BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
  33+ 9DED              ; Note we are not going to call LL28+4 but inline code here:
  34+ 9DED 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; remainder R for AofQ *256/Q
  35+ 9DEF 4F           		ld		c,a							; use c as R var
  36+ 9DF0              .RollRemainder:
  37+ 9DF0 CB 27        		sla		a
  38+ 9DF2 38 11        		jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  39+ 9DF4 B8           		cp		b							; a < q?
  40+ 9DF5 30 01        		jr		nc,.DontSBC
  41+ 9DF7              .DoSBC:										; a is < q
  42+ 9DF7 98           		sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  43+ 9DF8              .DontSBC:
  44+ 9DF8 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1
  45+ 9DFA 38 F4        		jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  46+ 9DFC 79           		ld		a,c
  47+ 9DFD 32 74 84     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  48+ 9E00 7A           		ld		a,d
  49+ 9E01 32 70 83     		ld		(varP),a
  50+ 9E04 C9           		ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  51+ 9E05              .Reduce:									; a geneated a carry
  52+ 9E05 98           		sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  53+ 9E06 37           		scf									; set carry flag for rl
  54+ 9E07 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  55+ 9E09 38 E5        		jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  56+ 9E0B 79           		ld		a,c
  57+ 9E0C 32 74 84     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  58+ 9E0F 7A           		ld		a,d
  59+ 9E10 32 70 83     		ld		(varP),a
  60+ 9E13 C9           		ret
  61+ 9E14              .AnswerTooBig:
  62+ 9E14 0E FF        		ld		c,$FF						; arse its too big
  63+ 9E16 79           		ld		a,c
  64+ 9E17 32 74 84     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  65+ 9E1A 7A           		ld		a,d
  66+ 9E1B 32 70 83     		ld		(varP),a
  67+ 9E1E C9           		ret
  68+ 9E1F
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm

 630  9E23              ;INCLUDE "AP2equAPmulQunsgEorP-MLTU2.asm"
 631  9E23              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulQUnsg-MULTU.asm"
 632  9E23              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulX-MU11.asm"
 633  9E23                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ 9E23              APequQmulA:
   2+ 9E23              asm_mult1:
   3+ 9E23              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ 9E23 FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ 9E25 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ 9E27 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ 9E28 3A 73 84     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ 9E2B 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ 9E2C FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ 9E2E 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ 9E30 AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ 9E31 E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ 9E33 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ 9E34 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ 9E35 E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ 9E37 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ 9E38 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ 9E39 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ 9E3B 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ 9E3C ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ 9E3E 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ 9E3F 32 70 83     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ 9E42 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ 9E43 B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ 9E44 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ 9E45 C9           	ret
  27+ 9E46              .mul0:
  28+ 9E46 AF           	xor	a
  29+ 9E47 32 70 83     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ 9E4A 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ 9E4B 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ 9E4C C9           	ret
  33+ 9E4D
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
 634  9E4D                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ 9E4D              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ 9E4D              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ 9E4D              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ 9E4D              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ 9E4D              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ 9E4D              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ 9E4D              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ 9E4D              LL38:
   9+ 9E4D              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ 9E4D              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ 9E4D              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ 9E4D              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ 9E4D              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ 9E4D              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ 9E4D              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ 9E4D              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ 9E4D              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ 9E4D              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ 9E4D              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ 9E4D              ;	ret
  21+ 9E4D              ; calculation table
  22+ 9E4D              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ 9E4D              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ 9E4D              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ 9E4D              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ 9E4D              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ 9E4D              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ 9E4D              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  29+ 9E4D              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ 9E4D              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ 9E4D
  32+ 9E4D              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ 9E4D              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ 9E4D              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ 9E4D              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ 9E4D
  37+ 9E4D
  38+ 9E4D              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ 9E4D 21 75 84     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ 9E50 AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ 9E51 FA 5C 9E     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ 9E54 3A 73 84     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ 9E57 21 74 84     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ 9E5A 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ 9E5B C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ 9E5C              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ 9E5C 3A 74 84     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ 9E5F 21 73 84     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ 9E62              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ 9E62              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ 9E62 B7          >                        or a
  51+ 9E63 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ 9E64 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ 9E66              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ 9E66              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ 9E66              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ 9E66 C9           	ret
  57+ 9E67              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ 9E67 FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ 9E69 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ 9E6B ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ 9E6D 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ 9E6E 3A 75 84     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ 9E71 EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ 9E73 32 75 84     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ 9E76 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ 9E77                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ 9E77 B7          >                        or a
  67+ 9E78 C9           	ret
  68+ 9E79              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ 9E79 32 75 84         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ 9E7C                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ 9E7C B7          >                        or a
  71+ 9E7D C9               ret
  72+ 9E7E              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ 9E7E              ;--	push	bc
  74+ 9E7E              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ 9E7E              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ 9E7E              ;--	sub		b
  77+ 9E7E              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ 9E7E              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ 9E7E              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ 9E7E              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ 9E7E              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ 9E7E              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ 9E7E              ;--	ret
  84+ 9E7E
  85+ 9E7E              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ 9E7E              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ 9E7E              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ 9E7E              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ 9E7E              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ 9E7E              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ 9E7E              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ 9E7E              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ 9E7E              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ 9E7E              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ 9E7E              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ 9E7E              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ 9E7E              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ 9E7E              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ 9E7E              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ 9E7E              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ 9E7E              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ 9E7E              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ 9E7E              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ 9E7E              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ 9E7E              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ 9E7E              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ 9E7E              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ 9E7E              ;;;;	ret
 109+ 9E7E              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ 9E7E              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ 9E7E              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ 9E7E              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ 9E7E              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ 9E7E              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ 9E7E              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ 9E7E              ;;;;	ret
 117+ 9E7E              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ 9E7E              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ 9E7E              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ 9E7E              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ 9E7E              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ 9E7E              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ 9E7E              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ 9E7E              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ 9E7E              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ 9E7E              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ 9E7E              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ 9E7E              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ 9E7E              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ 9E7E              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ 9E7E              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ 9E7E              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ 9E7E              ;;;;	ret
 134+ 9E7E              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ 9E7E              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ 9E7E              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ 9E7E              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ 9E7E              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ 9E7E              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ 9E7E              ;;;;	ret

   1+ 9F0E              ;;;LL28:
   2+ 9F0E              ;;;    ld      c,a                         ;
   3+ 9F0E              ;;;    ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
   4+ 9F0E              ;;;    ld      b,a                         ;
   5+ 9F0E              ;;;    ld      a,c                         ; Get varQ into b and retain c
   6+ 9F0E              ;;;RequAmul256divB:                        ;
   7+ 9F0E              ;;;LL28Breg:
   8+ 9F0E              ;;;; "BFRDIV R = (A * 256 / Q)  byte from remainder of division, not signed a = a, b = q, c = r"
   9+ 9F0E              ;;;	cp		b							; Check A >= Q
  10+ 9F0E              ;;;	jr		nc, .AnswerTooBig			; A >= Q? yes too big
  11+ 9F0E              ;;;.CalcRemainder:
  12+ 9F0E              ;;;	ld		c, 	$FE						; set R to $FE
  13+ 9F0E              ;;;.RollRemainder:
  14+ 9F0E              ;;;	sla		a
  15+ 9F0E              ;;;	jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  16+ 9F0E              ;;;	cp		b							; a < q?
  17+ 9F0E              ;;;	jr		nc,.DontSBC
  18+ 9F0E              ;;;.DoSBC:									; a is < q
  19+ 9F0E              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  20+ 9F0E              ;;;.DontSBC:
  21+ 9F0E              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1
  22+ 9F0E              ;;;	jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  23+ 9F0E              ;;;    ld      a,c
  24+ 9F0E              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  25+ 9F0E              ;;;	ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  26+ 9F0E              ;;;.Reduce:								; a geneated a carry
  27+ 9F0E              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  28+ 9F0E              ;;;	scf									; set carry flag for rl
  29+ 9F0E              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  30+ 9F0E              ;;;	jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  31+ 9F0E              ;;;    ld      a,c

  33+ 9F0E              ;;;	ret

  36+ 9F0E              ;;;    ld      a,c
  37+ 9F0E              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  38+ 9F0E              ;;;	ret

  40+ 9F0E              BCequAmul256DivC:
  41+ 9F0E 59             ld    e,c
  42+ 9F0F 67             ld    h,a
  43+ 9F10 2E 00          ld    l,0
  44+ 9F12              AdivEDivide:                             ; this routine performs the operation BC=HL/E
  45+ 9F12 7B             ld a,e                                 ; checking the divisor; returning if it is zero
  46+ 9F13 B7             or a                                   ; from this time on the carry is cleared
  47+ 9F14 C8             ret z
  48+ 9F15 01 FF FF       ld bc,-1                               ; BC is used to accumulate the result
  49+ 9F18 16 00          ld d,0                                 ; clearing D, so DE holds the divisor
  50+ 9F1A              AdivEDivLoop:                            ; subtracting DE from HL until the first overflow
  51+ 9F1A ED 52          sbc hl,de                              ; since the carry is zero, SBC works as if it was a SUB
  52+ 9F1C 03             inc bc                                 ;  note that this instruction does not alter the flags
  53+ 9F1D 30 FB          jr nc,AdivEDivLoop                     ; no carry means that there was no overflow
  54+ 9F1F C9             ret
  55+ 9F20
  56+ 9F20              HL_Div_C:
  57+ 9F20              ; Integer divides HL by C
  58+ 9F20              ; Result in HL, remainder in A
  59+ 9F20              ; Clobbers F, B
  60+ 9F20 06 10                ld b,16
  61+ 9F22 AF                   xor a
  62+ 9F23              HL_Div_C_Loop:
  63+ 9F23 29                   add hl,hl
  64+ 9F24 17                   rla
  65+ 9F25 B9                   cp c
  66+ 9F26 38 02                jr c,HL_DivC_Skip
  67+ 9F28 91                   sub c
  68+ 9F29 2C                   inc l
  69+ 9F2A              HL_DivC_Skip:
  70+ 9F2A 10 F7                djnz HL_Div_C_Loop
  71+ 9F2C 7D                   ld   a,l
  72+ 9F2D 32 74 84             ld  (varR),a
  73+ 9F30 C9                   ret
  74+ 9F31
  75+ 9F31
  76+ 9F31
  77+ 9F31              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  78+ 9F31              RequAmul256divQ:
  79+ 9F31              BFRDIV:
  80+ 9F31 F5           		push	af
  81+ 9F32 3A 73 84     		ld		a,(varQ)
  82+ 9F35 4F           		ld		c,a
  83+ 9F36 F1           		pop		af
  84+ 9F37 FE 00        		cp		0
  85+ 9F39 CA 50 9F     		jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  86+ 9F3C              RequAmul256divC:
  87+ 9F3C 2E 00        		ld		l,0
  88+ 9F3E 67           		ld		h,a
  89+ 9F3F              HL_Div_Cold:						; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  90+ 9F3F 06 10        		ld b,16
  91+ 9F41 AF           		xor a
  92+ 9F42              LOOPPOINT:
  93+ 9F42 29           		add hl,hl
  94+ 9F43 17           		rla
  95+ 9F44 B9           		cp c
  96+ 9F45 38 02        		jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  97+ 9F47 2C           		inc l
  98+ 9F48 91           		sub c
  99+ 9F49              SKIPINCSUB:
 100+ 9F49 10 F7        		djnz LOOPPOINT
 101+ 9F4B 7D           		ld		a,l
 102+ 9F4C 32 74 84     		ld 		(varR),a
 103+ 9F4F C9           		ret
 104+ 9F50              HLDIVC_0_BY:
 105+ 9F50 32 74 84     		ld		(varR),a
 106+ 9F53 C9           		ret
 107+ 9F54              ;	push	af
 108+ 9F54              ;	ld		a,b
 109+ 9F54              ;	ld		(varQ),a
 110+ 9F54              ;	pop		af
 111+ 9F54              ;RequAmul256divQ:
 112+ 9F54              ;BFRDIV:									;BFRDIV R=A*256/Q   byte from remainder of division
 113+ 9F54              ;	ld		hl,varQ
 114+ 9F54              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng	(hl),LL2			;  is A >=  Q ?, if yes, answer too big for 1 byte, R=#&FF
 115+ 9F54              ;	ld		b,$FE						; b = X
 116+ 9F54              ;	ld		c,a							; c = R	div roll counter
 117+ 9F54              ;LL31:									; roll R
 118+ 9F54              ;	sla		a
 119+ 9F54              ;	jr		c,LL29						; hop to Reduce
 120+ 9F54              ;	JumpIfALTNusng (hl)					; Q skip sbc if a < Q
 121+ 9F54              ;	sbc		a,(hl)						; a = a - Q
 122+ 9F54              ;	rl		c							; rotate R left
 123+ 9F54              ;	jr		c,LL31						; loop if R poped out a carry bit
 124+ 9F54              ;	jr		LL2Good
 125+ 9F54              ;LL29:									; Reduce
 126+ 9F54              ;	sbc		a,(hl)
 127+ 9F54              ;	scf
 128+ 9F54              ;	rl		c							; roll a carry flag into R
 129+ 9F54              ;	jr		c,LL31						;  loop R
 130+ 9F54              ;	jr		LL2Good
 131+ 9F54              ;LL2:
 132+ 9F54              ;	ld		c,$FF
 133+ 9F54              ;LL2Good:
 134+ 9F54              ;	ld		a,c
 135+ 9F54              ;	ld		(varR),a
 136+ 9F54              ;	ret
 137+ 9F54
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
 641  9F54                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
   1+ 9F54              RequAdivQ:
   2+ 9F54              	; R = A/Q, U = remainder, code looked a little odd as if R is reminader and U = result
   3+ 9F54              LL61:										; Handling division R=A/Q for case further down
   4+ 9F54 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = A
   5+ 9F55 3A 73 84     	ld		a,(varQ)						; test for divide by 0
   6+ 9F58 FE 00        	cp		0
   7+ 9F5A 28 16        	jr		z,LL84							; divide by zero error
   8+ 9F5C 57           	ld		d,a								; now we can do C/D
   9+ 9F5D 06 08            ld b,8
  10+ 9F5F AF               xor a
  11+ 9F60              LL63:										; roll divide loop
  12+ 9F60 CB 21            sla c
  13+ 9F62 17               rla
  14+ 9F63 BA               cp d
  15+ 9F64 38 02            jr c,LL64
  16+ 9F66 0C               inc c
  17+ 9F67 92               sub d
  18+ 9F68              LL64:
  19+ 9F68 10 F6            djnz LL63
  20+ 9F6A 32 72 84     	ld	(varU),a							; store remainder in U
  21+ 9F6D 79           	ld	a,c
  22+ 9F6E 32 74 84     	ld	(varR),a							; store remainder in R
  23+ 9F71 C9               ret
  24+ 9F72              LL84:										; div error  R=U=#5
  25+ 9F72 3E 32        	ld		a,50
  26+ 9F74 32 74 84     	ld		(varR),a
  27+ 9F77 32 72 84     	ld		(varU),a
  28+ 9F7A C9           	ret
  29+ 9F7B
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
 642  9F7B              ;    INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RSequABSrs-LL129.asm"
 643  9F7B                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RSequQmulA-MULT12.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RSequQmulA-MULT12.asm
   1+ 9F7B              asm_mult12:
   2+ 9F7B              RSequQmulA:
   3+ 9F7B              ; "asm_ult12  R.S = Q * A \ visited quite often S = hi, R = lo, odd that its opposite to mult1"
   4+ 9F7B CD 23 9E     	call APequQmulA
   5+ 9F7E 08           	ex 	af,af'
   6+ 9F7F 7A           	ld	a,d
   7+ 9F80 32 75 84     	ld	(varS),a
   8+ 9F83 7B           	ld	a,e
   9+ 9F84 32 74 84     	ld	(varR),a
  10+ 9F87 08           	ex 	af,af'
  11+ 9F88 C9           	ret
  12+ 9F89
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RSequQmulA-MULT12.asm

   9+ 9FA2                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1, XX15VecY

   9+ 9FA5 32 A7 C0    >                        ld       (XX15VecY),a
  10+ 9FA8                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1 ,XX15VecZ

   1+ 9FC2              CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV:
