 647  A019                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/tidy.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/tidy.asm
   1+ A019              ;rotmap0xLo: DB	0				; INWK +9
   2+ A019              ;rotmap0xHi: DB	0				; INWK +10
   3+ A019              ;rotmat0yLo: DB	0				; INWK +11
   4+ A019              ;rotmat0yHi: DB	0				; INWK +12
   5+ A019              ;rotmat0zLo:	DB 	0				; INWK +13
   6+ A019              ;rotmat0zHi:	DB 	0				; INWK +14
   7+ A019              ;rotmap1xLo: DB	0				; INWK +15
   8+ A019              ;rotmap1xHi:	DB	0				; INWK +16
   9+ A019              ;rotmat1yLo:	DB	0				; INWK +17
  10+ A019              ;rotmat1yHi:	DB	0				; INWK +18
  11+ A019              ;rotmat1zLo:	DB	0				; INWK +19
  12+ A019              ;rotmat1zHi:	DB	0				; INWK +20
  13+ A019              ;rotmat2xLo: DB	0				; INWK +21
  14+ A019              ;rotmat2xHi:	DB	0				; INWK +22
  15+ A019              ;rotmat2yLo:	DB	0				; INWK +23
  16+ A019              ;rotmat2yHi:	DB	0				; INWK +24
  17+ A019              ;rotmat2zLo:	DB	0				; INWK +25
  18+ A019              ;rotmat2zHi:	DB	0				; INWK +26
  19+ A019              ;
  20+ A019              ;rotmatFx	equ	rotmat0xHi
  21+ A019              ;rotmatFy	equ	rotmat0yHi
  22+ A019              ;rotmatFz	equ	rotmat0zHi
  23+ A019              ;rotmatUx	equ	rotmat1xHi
  24+ A019              ;rotmatUy	equ	rotmat1yHi
  25+ A019              ;rotmatUz	equ	rotmat1zHi
  26+ A019              ;
  27+ A019              ;inwkarray			equ		INWK+10
  28+ A019
  29+ A019
  30+ A019
  31+ A019
  32+ A019              ; Divide that sets value to FFFF if divide by 0 unless main value is 0, then 0
  33+ A019
  34+ A019              ; (P+1 A) = (A P) / Q
  35+ A019              ;  B A    = (A P) / Q
  36+ A019              ; TESTED OK
  37+ A019
  38+ A019
  39+ A019 2A A6 C0     NormalizeXX15:          ld      hl, (XX15VecX)              ; h= VecX, l = VecY
  40+ A01C 3A A8 C0                             ld      a,  (XX15VecZ)              ; a = VecZ, d we don't care
  41+ A01F E6 7F        .ABSZ:                  and     SignMask8Bit
  42+ A021 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ; iyh = abs z
  43+ A023 57           .ZSquared:              ld      d,a
  44+ A024 5F                                   ld      e,a
  45+ A025 ED 30                                mul     de
  46+ A027 42 4B                                ld      bc,de                       ; bc = z squared
  47+ A029 7D           .ABSX:                  ld      a,l
  48+ A02A E6 7F        .XSquared:              and     SignMask8Bit
  49+ A02C DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = abs x
  50+ A02E 57                                   ld      d,a
  51+ A02F 5F                                   ld      e,a
  52+ A030 ED 30                                mul     de
  53+ A032 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = x squared
  54+ A033 7A           .ABSY:                  ld      a,d                         ; as h was swapped into d
  55+ A034 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  56+ A036 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                       ; ixl = abs y
  57+ A038 5F           .YSquared:              ld      e,a
  58+ A039 57                                   ld      d,a
  59+ A03A ED 30                                mul     de                          ; de = y squared
  60+ A03C 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + de + bc
  61+ A03D 09                                   add     hl,bc                       ;
  62+ A03E EB                                   ex      de,hl
  63+ A03F CD 4C 98                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; d = iyl =hl = sqrt (de) = sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 + z ^ 2)
  64+ A042 55                                   ld      d,l
  65+ A043 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d
  66+ A045 DD 7C        .NormaliseX:            ld      a,ixh                       ; normalise x
  67+ A047 CD 6B 9D                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
  68+ A04A 57                                   ld      d,a
  69+ A04B 3A A6 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecX)
  70+ A04E E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  71+ A050 B2                                   or      d
  72+ A051 32 A6 C0                             ld      (XX15VecX),a
  73+ A054 DD 7D        .NormaliseY:            ld      a,ixl                       ; normalise y
  74+ A056 55                                   ld      d,l
  75+ A057 CD 6B 9D                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
  76+ A05A 57                                   ld      d,a
  77+ A05B 3A A7 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecY)
  78+ A05E E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  79+ A060 B2                                   or      d
  80+ A061 32 A7 C0                             ld      (XX15VecY),a
  81+ A064 FD 7C        .NormaliseZ:            ld      a,iyh                       ; normalise z
  82+ A066 55                                   ld      d,l
  83+ A067 CD 6B 9D                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
  84+ A06A 57                                   ld      d,a
  85+ A06B 3A A8 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecZ)
  86+ A06E E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  87+ A070 B2                                   or      d
  88+ A071 32 A8 C0                             ld      (XX15VecZ),a
  89+ A074 C9                                   ret
  90+ A075
  91+ A075              TidyNormaliseNoseV:     MACRO
  92+ A075 ~                                    call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15	    ; copy over matrix row 3 (Nosev)
  93+ A075 ~                                    call	NormalizeXX15			    ; normalise z hi, its really TIS3 and write back to matrix
  94+ A075 ~                                    call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV       ; .
  95+ A075                                      ENDM
  96+ A075              TidyNormaliseRoofV:     MACRO
  97+ A075 ~                                    call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15
  98+ A075 ~                                    call	NormalizeXX15			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
  99+ A075 ~                                    call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV
 100+ A075                                      ENDM
 101+ A075
 102+ A075
 103+ A075 DD 01        TidyUbnK:               break
 104+ A077                                      TidyNormaliseNoseV
 104+ A077 CD 89 9F    >                        call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15	    ; copy over matrix row 3 (Nosev)
 104+ A07A CD 19 A0    >                        call	NormalizeXX15			    ; normalise z hi, its really TIS3 and write back to matrix
 104+ A07D CD C2 9F    >                        call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV       ; .
 105+ A080 3A 36 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)      ; Now check and see which vector elemetn we are going to
 106+ A083 E6 60                                and     %01100000                   ; if X is not small then we go straigth to roofx
 107+ A085 C2 1D A1                             jp      nz,.ProcessRoofX            ; .
 108+ A088 3A 38 C0     .TidyXIsSmall:          ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ; Else we test Y on to using
 109+ A08B E6 60                                and     %01100000                   ; if Y is not small we process roofz
 110+ A08D 20 47                                jr      nz,.ProcessRoofZ            ; .
 111+ A08F              ;...roofv_y´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_y´
 112+ A08F 3A 36 C0     .ProcessRoofY:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 113+ A092 32 73 84                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 114+ A095 3A 30 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)	    ;roov z
 115+ A098 CD 7B 9F                             call	RSequQmulA
 116+ A09B 3A 3A C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 117+ A09E 32 73 84                             ld		(varQ),a					; b = regX for now
 118+ A0A1 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 119+ A0A4 CD EB 96                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 120+ A0A7 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; flip sign bit
 121+ A0A8 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 122+ A0AA 57                                   ld      d,a
 123+ A0AB 3A 38 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 124+ A0AE 32 73 84                             ld      (varQ),a
 125+ A0B1 7A           .YTest0Div:             ld      a,d
 126+ A0B2 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 127+ A0B4 B3                                   or      e
 128+ A0B5 FE 00                                cp      0
 129+ A0B7 20 0E                                jr      nz,.SkipYZeroTest
 130+ A0B9                                      ZeroA
 130+ A0B9 AF          >                        xor a
 131+ A0BA C3 17 A1                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 132+ A0BD FE 00        .YTestDiv0:             cp      0
 133+ A0BF 20 06                                jr      nz,.SkipYZeroTest
 134+ A0C1 3E 60        .YDivideByZero:         ld      a,96
 135+ A0C3 B2                                   or      d
 136+ A0C4 C3 17 A1                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 137+ A0C7 7B           .SkipYZeroTest:         ld      a,e
 138+ A0C8 32 70 83                             ld      (varP),a
 139+ A0CB 7A                                   ld      a,d
 140+ A0CC CD 7F 98                             call    DVIDT
 141+ A0CF 78                                   ld      a,b
 142+ A0D0 32 32 C0     .SetRoofY:              ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a
 143+ A0D3 C3 61 A1                             jp      .DoneRoof
 144+ A0D6              ;...roofv_z´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_y´ * roofv_y) / nosev_z´
 145+ A0D6 3A 36 C0     .ProcessRoofZ:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)      ; Failing that we default to Z
 146+ A0D9 32 73 84                             ld		(varQ),a				    ; q = nosev_y
 147+ A0DC 3A 30 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)	    ;roov z
 148+ A0DF CD 7B 9F                             call	RSequQmulA
 149+ A0E2 3A 38 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)	    ; nosev z
 150+ A0E5 32 73 84                             ld		(varQ),a				    ; b = regX for now
 151+ A0E8 3A 32 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 152+ A0EB CD EB 96                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 153+ A0EE 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; flip sign bit
 154+ A0EF EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 155+ A0F1 57                                   ld      d,a
 156+ A0F2 3A 3A C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 157+ A0F5 32 73 84                             ld      (varQ),a
 158+ A0F8 7A           .ZTest0Div:             ld      a,d
 159+ A0F9 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 160+ A0FB B3                                   or      e
 161+ A0FC FE 00                                cp      0
 162+ A0FE 20 0E                                jr      nz,.SkipZZeroTest
 163+ A100                                      ZeroA
 163+ A100 AF          >                        xor a
 164+ A101 C3 17 A1                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 165+ A104 FE 00        .ZTestDiv0:             cp      0
 166+ A106 20 06                                jr      nz,.SkipZZeroTest
 167+ A108 3E 60        .ZDivideByZero:         ld      a,96
 168+ A10A B2                                   or      d
 169+ A10B C3 17 A1                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 170+ A10E 7B           .SkipZZeroTest:         ld      a,e
 171+ A10F 32 70 83                             ld      (varP),a
 172+ A112 7A                                   ld      a,d
 173+ A113 CD 7F 98                             call    DVIDT
 174+ A116 78                                   ld      a,b
 175+ A117 32 34 C0     .SetRoofZ:              ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a
 176+ A11A C3 61 A1                             jp      .DoneRoof
 177+ A11D              ;...roofv_x´ = -(nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_x´
 178+ A11D 3A 38 C0     .ProcessRoofX:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ; so we set Q to Nose Y
 179+ A120 32 73 84                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 180+ A123 3A 32 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; A = roofv Y
 181+ A126 CD 7B 9F                             call	RSequQmulA                  ; RS = NoseY & RoofY
 182+ A129 3A 3A C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 183+ A12C 32 73 84                             ld		(varQ),a					; b = regX for now
 184+ A12F 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 185+ A132 CD EB 96                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 186+ A135 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; flip sign bit
 187+ A136 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 188+ A138 57                                   ld      d,a
 189+ A139 3A 36 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 190+ A13C 32 73 84                             ld      (varQ),a
 191+ A13F 7A           .XTest0Div:             ld      a,d
 192+ A140 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 193+ A142 B3                                   or      e
 194+ A143 FE 00                                cp      0
 195+ A145 20 0E                                jr      nz,.SkipXZeroTest
 196+ A147                                      ZeroA
 196+ A147 AF          >                        xor a
 197+ A148 C3 17 A1                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 198+ A14B FE 00        .XTestDiv0:             cp      0
 199+ A14D 20 06                                jr      nz,.SkipXZeroTest
 200+ A14F 3E 60        .XDivideByZero:         ld      a,96
 201+ A151 B2                                   or      d
 202+ A152 C3 5E A1                             jp      .SetRoofX
 203+ A155 7B           .SkipXZeroTest:         ld      a,e
 204+ A156 32 70 83                             ld      (varP),a
 205+ A159 7A                                   ld      a,d
 206+ A15A CD 7F 98                             call    DVIDT
 207+ A15D 78                                   ld      a,b
 208+ A15E 32 30 C0     .SetRoofX:              ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a
 209+ A161              .DoneRoof:              TidyNormaliseRoofV
 209+ A161 CD 9C 9F    >                        call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15
 209+ A164 CD 19 A0    >                        call	NormalizeXX15			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
 209+ A167 CD DF 9F    >                        call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV
 210+ A16A              ;...sidex = ((nosez * roofy) - nosey * roofz) / 96
 211+ A16A 3A 3A C0     .DoSidevX:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)      ;  -(-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 212+ A16D EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 213+ A16F 32 73 84                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 214+ A172 3A 32 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	     ;roov z
 215+ A175 CD 7B 9F                             call	RSequQmulA
 216+ A178 3A 38 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)		; nosev z
 217+ A17B 32 73 84                             ld		(varQ),a							; b = regX for now
 218+ A17E 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 219+ A181 CD EB 96                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 220+ A184 CD C7 98                             call    BAequDEdiv96
 221+ A187 78                                   ld      a,b
 222+ A188 32 2A C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 223+ A18B              ;...sidey = ((nosex * roofz) - nosez * roofx) / 96
 224+ A18B 3A 36 C0     .DoSidevY:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)      ; -(-nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 225+ A18E EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 226+ A190 32 73 84                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 227+ A193 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roov z
 228+ A196 CD 7B 9F                             call	RSequQmulA                  ; rs = nosex * roofz
 229+ A199 3A 3A C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 230+ A19C 32 73 84                             ld		(varQ),a					; b = regX for now
 231+ A19F 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 232+ A1A2 CD EB 96                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS          ; DE = noseyz* roofz +
 233+ A1A5 CD C7 98                             call    BAequDEdiv96
 234+ A1A8 78                                   ld      a,b
 235+ A1A9 32 2C C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a         ;-(-nosev_y * roofv_x + nosev_x * roofv_y) / 96
 236+ A1AC              ;...sidez = ((nosey * roofx) - nosex * roofy) / 96
 237+ A1AC 3A 38 C0     .DoSidevZ:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ;
 238+ A1AF EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 239+ A1B1 32 73 84                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 240+ A1B4 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 241+ A1B7 CD 7B 9F                             call	RSequQmulA
 242+ A1BA 3A 36 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)		; nosev z
 243+ A1BD 32 73 84                             ld		(varQ),a							; b = regX for now
 244+ A1C0 3A 32 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 245+ A1C3 CD EB 96                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 246+ A1C6 CD C7 98                             call    BAequDEdiv96
 247+ A1C9 78                                   ld      a,b
 248+ A1CA 32 2E C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1),a
 249+ A1CD                                      ZeroA
 249+ A1CD AF          >                        xor a
 250+ A1CE 32 29 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX),a
 251+ A1D1 32 2B C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY),a
 252+ A1D4 32 2D C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),a
 253+ A1D7 C9                                   ret
 254+ A1D8
 255+ A1D8
 256+ A1D8              TidySub1:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
 257+ A1D8              		; b = regX on entry
 258+ A1D8              TIS1Prep:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
 259+ A1D8 08           		ex		af,af'
 260+ A1D9 78           		ld		a,b
 261+ A1DA 32 73 84     		ld		(varQ),a
 262+ A1DD 08           		ex		af,af'
 263+ A1DE EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
 264+ A1E0 CD C9 96     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
 265+ A1E3              ; USES 				A BC E
 266+ A1E3              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
 267+ A1E3              Tis1Div96:							   		; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
 268+ A1E3 4F           		ld		c,a							; Store sign bit in  ct (we use e reg for that)
 269+ A1E4 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit						; ..
 270+ A1E6 5F           		ld		e,a							; ..
 271+ A1E7 79           		ld		a,c							; a = high byte again with sign bit cleared
 272+ A1E8 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit							; ..
 273+ A1EA 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; slide counter T1
 274+ A1EC              TIS1RollTLoop								; roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
 275+ A1EC CB 27        		sla		a
 276+ A1EE              		JumpIfALTNusng $60, TIS1SkipSub
 276+ A1EE FE 60       >                        cp      $60
 276+ A1F0 DA FD A1    >                        jp		c, TIS1SkipSub
 277+ A1F3 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							; subtract 96
 278+ A1F5 37           		scf
 279+ A1F6 CB 10        		rl		b							;  T1
 280+ A1F8 38 F2        		jr		c,TIS1RollTLoop
 281+ A1FA              TIS1KIPCont:
 282+ A1FA 78           		ld		a,b							;   T1
 283+ A1FB B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
 284+ A1FC C9           		ret
 285+ A1FD              TIS1SkipSub:
 286+ A1FD B7           	or			a
 287+ A1FE CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
 288+ A200 38 EA        	jr			c,TIS1RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
 289+ A202 C3 FA A1     	jp			TIS1KIPCont
 290+ A205
 291+ A205              ;.TIDY	\ -> &4679 \ Orthogonalize rotation matrix that uses 0x60 as unity returns INWK(16,18,20) = INWK(12*18+14*20, 10*16+14*20, 10*16+12*18) / INWK(10,12,14)
 292+ A205              ; Ux,Uy,Uz = -(FyUy+FzUz, FxUx+FzUz, FxUx+FyUy)/ Fx,Fy,Fz
 293+ A205
 294+ A205
 295+ A205
 296+ A205
 297+ A205              TidyRotYSmall:
 298+ A205 CD 2E A3     		call	CalcRoofvZ
 299+ A208 32 34 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a			; set roofvy hi?? Says roofz TODO
 300+ A20B C3 3F A2     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
 301+ A20E
 302+ A20E              TidyRotXSmall:
 303+ A20E AF           		xor		a
 304+ A20F 47           		ld		b,a
 305+ A210 3A 38 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev_y
 306+ A213 E6 60        		and		%01100000
 307+ A215 CA 05 A2     		jp		z,TidyRotYSmall
 308+ A218 3A 3A C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 309+ A21B 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 310+ A21C 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 311+ A21F CD F4 A2     		call	CalcRoofvY					; Set (roofvy= (nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y, Q -= nosev_z
 312+ A222 32 32 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a			; set roofvy hi
 313+ A225 C3 3F A2     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
 314+ A228              ; TIDY is broken
 315+ A228
 316+ A228
 317+ A228              TIDY:
 318+ A228
 319+ A228              ORTHOGALISE:
 320+ A228              ;-- NormaliseNosev
 321+ A228 CD 89 9F     		call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15
 322+ A22B CD A8 9B     		call	normaliseXX1596S7			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
 323+ A22E CD C2 9F     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV
 324+ A231              .CheckNXSmall:
 325+ A231 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 326+ A234 E6 60        		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 327+ A236 CA 0E A2     		jp		z,TidyRotXSmall
 328+ A239              .RotXIsBig:
 329+ A239 CD BA A2             call	CalcRoofvX
 330+ A23C 32 30 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a    	; set roofvx hi
 331+ A23F              NormaliseRoofV:
 332+ A23F CD 9C 9F     		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 333+ A242 CD A8 9B     		call	normaliseXX1596S7			; normalise roof
 334+ A245              ;calc sidev x
 335+ A245 CD DF 9F     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 336+ A248 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 337+ A24B 32 73 84     		ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 338+ A24E 3A 34 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 339+ A251 CD 7B 9F     		call	RSequQmulA
 340+ A254 3A 3A C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 341+ A257 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 342+ A258 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 343+ A25B CD D8 A1     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 344+ A25E                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideXNoNeg
 344+ A25E A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 344+ A25F CA 64 A2    >                        jp	    z, NormSideXNoNeg
 345+ A262 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_x
 346+ A264              NormSideXNoNeg:
 347+ A264 32 2A C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 348+ A267              ;calc sidev y
 349+ A267 3A 3A C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 350+ A26A 32 73 84     		ld		(varQ),a
 351+ A26D 3A 30 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 352+ A270 CD 7B 9F     		call	RSequQmulA
 353+ A273 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			        ; nosev x
 354+ A276 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 355+ A277 3A 34 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)			; roofv z
 356+ A27A CD D8 A1     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 357+ A27D                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideYNoNeg
 357+ A27D A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 357+ A27E CA 83 A2    >                        jp	    z, NormSideYNoNeg
 358+ A281 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 359+ A283              NormSideYNoNeg:
 360+ A283 32 38 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
 361+ A286              ;calc sidev z
 362+ A286 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			; nosev x
 363+ A289 32 73 84     		ld		(varQ),a
 364+ A28C 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 365+ A28F CD 7B 9F     		call	RSequQmulA
 366+ A292 3A 38 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev y
 367+ A295 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 368+ A296 3A 30 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 369+ A299 CD D8 A1     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 370+ A29C                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideZNoNeg
 370+ A29C A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 370+ A29D CA A2 A2    >                        jp	    z, NormSideZNoNeg
 371+ A2A0 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 372+ A2A2              NormSideZNoNeg:
 373+ A2A2 32 2C C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a ;TODO SHoudl this be Y??
 374+ A2A5              .ClearLoBytes:
 375+ A2A5 21 35 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 376+ A2A8 06 09        		ld		b,9
 377+ A2AA AF                   xor     a
 378+ A2AB              .ClearLoLoop:
 379+ A2AB 77           		ld		(hl),a						; zero out lo bytes
 380+ A2AC 23           		inc		hl
 381+ A2AD 23           		inc		hl
 382+ A2AE 10 FB        		djnz	.ClearLoLoop
 383+ A2B0 CD AF 9F     		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 384+ A2B3 CD A8 9B     		call	normaliseXX1596S7			; normalise roof
 385+ A2B6              ;calc sidev x
 386+ A2B6 CD FC 9F     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 387+ A2B9
 388+ A2B9 C9           		ret
 389+ A2BA
 390+ A2BA
 391+ A2BA              CalcRoofvX:
 392+ A2BA              Tidy1RX:										; roofv_x´ = -(nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_x´
 393+ A2BA              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ
 393+ A2BA 3A 3A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 393+ A2BD 32 73 84    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 394+ A2C0 3A 34 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 395+ A2C3 CD 7B 9F     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = nosez hi * roofz hi
 396+ A2C6              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 396+ A2C6 3A 38 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 396+ A2C9 32 73 84    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 397+ A2CC 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 398+ A2CF CD C9 96     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; DE = nosey hi * roofy hi + rs
 399+ A2D2 7A           		ld		a,d
 400+ A2D3 E6 80        		and 	$80
 401+ A2D5 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 402+ A2D7              ;DEBUG		ld		c,a
 403+ A2D7 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)					; get nosev x sign
 404+ A2DA 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 405+ A2DB E6 80        		and		$80
 406+ A2DD FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 407+ A2DF FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 408+ A2E1 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 409+ A2E2 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 410+ A2E4 42           		ld		b,d
 411+ A2E5 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 412+ A2E6 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 413+ A2E7 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 414+ A2E9 CD 87 9A     		call	BC_Div_DE
 415+ A2EC FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh							; get back sign from nosevx
 416+ A2EE EE 80        		xor		$80								; flip sign
 417+ A2F0 E6 80        		and		$80								; keep sign bit only
 418+ A2F2 B0           		or		b
 419+ A2F3 C9           		ret
 420+ A2F4
 421+ A2F4
 422+ A2F4              CalcRoofvY:
 423+ A2F4              Tidy1RY:										; roofv_y´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_y´
 424+ A2F4              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ				;                  A        Q              RS
 424+ A2F4 3A 3A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 424+ A2F7 32 73 84    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 425+ A2FA 3A 34 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 426+ A2FD CD 7B 9F     		call	RSequQmulA
 427+ A300              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 427+ A300 3A 36 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 427+ A303 32 73 84    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 428+ A306 3A 30 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 429+ A309 CD C9 96     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS
 430+ A30C 7A           		ld		a,d
 431+ A30D E6 80        		and 	$80
 432+ A30F FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 433+ A311 3A 38 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)					; get nosev x sign
 434+ A314 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 435+ A315 E6 80        		and		$80
 436+ A317 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 437+ A319 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 438+ A31B 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 439+ A31C E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 440+ A31E 42           		ld		b,d
 441+ A31F 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 442+ A320 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 443+ A321 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 444+ A323 CD 87 9A     		call	BC_Div_DE
 445+ A326 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 446+ A328 EE 80        		xor		$80
 447+ A32A E6 80        		and		$80
 448+ A32C B0           		or		b
 449+ A32D C9           		ret
 450+ A32E
 451+ A32E              CalcRoofvZ:
 452+ A32E              Tidy1RZ:										; roofv_z´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_y´ * roofv_y) / nosev_z´
 453+ A32E              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 453+ A32E 3A 38 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 453+ A331 32 73 84    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 454+ A334 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 455+ A337 CD 7B 9F     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = NOSEy * ROOFy
 456+ A33A              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 456+ A33A 3A 36 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 456+ A33D 32 73 84    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 457+ A340 3A 30 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 458+ A343 CD C9 96     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; de (A,ixl) = NOSEx * ROOFx + RS
 459+ A346 7A           		ld		a,d
 460+ A347 E6 80        		and 	$80
 461+ A349 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 462+ A34B 3A 3A C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)					; get nosev x sign
 463+ A34E 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 464+ A34F E6 80        		and		$80
 465+ A351 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 466+ A353 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 467+ A355 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 468+ A356 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 469+ A358 42           		ld		b,d
 470+ A359 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 471+ A35A 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 472+ A35B 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 473+ A35D CD 87 9A     		call	BC_Div_DE
 474+ A360 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 475+ A362 EE 80        		xor		$80
 476+ A364 E6 80        		and		$80
 477+ A366 B0           		or		b
 478+ A367 C9           		ret
 479+ A368
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/tidy.asm
 648  A368                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
   1+ A368
   2+ A368              LL28Amul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
   2+ A368 BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ A369 D2 87 A3    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
   3+ A36C 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
   4+ A36E CB 27        .LL31:                  sla     a
   5+ A370 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
   6+ A372                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
   6+ A372 BA          >                        cp      d
   6+ A373 DA 78 A3    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
   7+ A376 92                                   sub     d
   8+ A377                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
   8+ A377 B7          >                        or a
   9+ A378 3F           .SkipSub:               ccf                                 ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  10+ A379 CB 13                                rl      e
  11+ A37B 38 F1                                jr      c,.LL31
  12+ A37D 7B                                   ld      a,e
  13+ A37E C9                                   ret
  14+ A37F 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  15+ A380 37                                   scf                                 ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  16+ A381 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  17+ A383 38 E9                                jr      c,.LL31                     ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  18+ A385 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  19+ A386 C9                                   ret
  20+ A387 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  21+ A389 C9                                   ret
  22+ A38A
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
 649  A38A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
   1+ A38A              XAequMinusXAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
   2+ A38A              TIS1:
   3+ A38A 08           		ex		af,af'
   4+ A38B 3A 59 83     		ld		a,(regX)
   5+ A38E 47           		ld		b,a
   6+ A38F 08           		ex		af,af'
   7+ A390              BAequMinusBAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
   8+ A390 08           		ex		af,af'
   9+ A391 78           		ld		a,b
  10+ A392 32 73 84     		ld		(varQ),a
  11+ A395 08           		ex		af,af'
  12+ A396 EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  13+ A398 CD C9 96     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  14+ A39B              ; USES 				A BC E
  15+ A39B              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  16+ A39B              Div96:										; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  17+ A39B 47           		ld		b,a
  18+ A39C E6 80        		and		$80							;	hi sign
  19+ A39E 5F           		ld		e,a							;   e = varT
  20+ A39F 78           		ld		a,b
  21+ A3A0 E6 7F        		and		$7F							;	hi A7
  22+ A3A2 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						;   slide counter
  23+ A3A4 48           		ld		c,b							;   c == T1 ::  T1
  24+ A3A5              .DVL3:										;   roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  25+ A3A5 CB 27        		sla		a
  26+ A3A7 FE 60        		cp		$60							; max 96
  27+ A3A9 30 02        		jr		nc,.DV4
  28+ A3AB DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							;  SBC #&60
  29+ A3AD              .DV4:										; skip subtraction
  30+ A3AD CB 11        		rl		c							;  T1
  31+ A3AF 38 F4        		jr		c,.DVL3
  32+ A3B1 79           		ld		a,c							;   T1
  33+ A3B2 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  34+ A3B3 C9           		ret
  35+ A3B4

  42+ A3CC                                     ; This shoudl be a call nz to tidy *****ret     nz

  46+ A3D1                                     ; add AI in here too

  48+ A3D4 FE 0A       >                        cp    ShipAiJumpTableMax

  54+ A3E0 66                                  ld       h,(hl)                                  ; jp hl

  70+ A3E9              CalculateAgression:     IFDEF   ALWAYSANGRY
  71+ A3E9 ~                                        jp  UltraHostile
  72+ A3E9                                      ENDIF
  73+ A3E9 3A 47 C3                             ld      a,(ShipAIFlagsAddr)
  74+ A3EC 47                                   ld      b,a
  75+ A3ED E6 02                                and     %00000010
  76+ A3EF 20 20                                jr      nz,.UltraHostile
  77+ A3F1 78                                   ld      a,b
  78+ A3F2 E6 F0                                and     %11110000                               ; if it can can anger a fighter bay then generally more hostile as implies its a large ship
  79+ A3F4 21 5C C0                             ld      hl,UBnKMissilesLeft                     ; more missiles more agression
  80+ A3F7 B6                                   or      (hl)
  81+ A3F8 47                                   ld      b,a
  82+ A3F9 3A 46 C3                             ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
  83+ A3FC E6 4E                                and     %01001110                               ; We look at if its a bounty hunter, hostile already, pirate and cop
  84+ A3FE B0                                   or      b
  85+ A3FF 47                                   ld      b,a
  86+ A400 3A 53 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKShipAggression)
  87+ A403                                      JumpIfALTNusng 64,.NotAlreadyAgressive
  87+ A403 FE 40       >                        cp      64
  87+ A405 DA 0C A4    >                        jp		c, .NotAlreadyAgressive
  88+ A408 78                                   ld      a,b
  89+ A409 F6 80                                or      %10000000                               ; if its already at least 64 agressive then likley to stay so
  90+ A40B 47                                   ld      b,a
  91+ A40C 78           .NotAlreadyAgressive:   ld      a,b
  92+ A40D 32 53 C0                             ld      (UBnKShipAggression),a
  93+ A410 C9                                   ret
  94+ A411 3E FF        .UltraHostile:          ld      a,$FF
  95+ A413 32 53 C0                             ld      (UBnKShipAggression),a
  96+ A416 C9                                   ret

  98+ A417              ; set angry if possible, if its an innocent then flag the space station to get angry
  99+ A417 3A 46 C3     MakeHostile:            ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)                     ; Check bit 5 of newb flags

 164+ A4AA
 165+ A4AA              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 166+ A4AA              CheckPointRange:        MACRO   ShipPos, ShipSign, MissilePos, MissileSign
 167+ A4AA ~                                    ld      a,(MissilePos)                      ; check X Coord
 168+ A4AA ~                                    ld      hl,(ShipSign)
 169+ A4AA ~                                    xor     (hl)
 170+ A4AA ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
 171+ A4AA ~                                    ld      hl,(ShipPos)
 172+ A4AA ~                                    ld      de,(MissilePos)
 173+ A4AA ~                                    jr      z,.SignsDiffernt
 174+ A4AA ~            .XSame:                 and     a
 175+ A4AA ~                                    sbc     hl,de                               ; distance = Ship X - Missile X
 176+ A4AA ~                                    JumpIfPositive      .CheckDiff              ; if result was -ve
 177+ A4AA ~                                    NegHL
 178+ A4AA ~                                    jp      .CheckDiff
 179+ A4AA ~            .SignsDiffernt:         add     hl,de
 180+ A4AA ~                                    ReturnIfNegative                            ; if we overflowed then return
 181+ A4AA ~            .CheckDiff:             ld      a,h                                 ; if we have an h outside blast raidus
 182+ A4AA ~                                    ReturnIfANotZero
 183+ A4AA ~                                    ld      a,l
 184+ A4AA ~                                    and     a
 185+ A4AA ~                                    ReturnIfAGTEMemusng   CurrentMissileBlastRange
 186+ A4AA                                      ENDM
 187+ A4AA              ;...................................................................
 188+ A4AA              ; We only do one test per loop for spreading the load of work
 189+ A4AA 3A 45 85     CheckMissileBlastLoop:  ld      a,(CurrentMissileCheck)
 190+ A4AD                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng   UniverseSlotListSize
 190+ A4AD FE 0C       >                        cp    UniverseSlotListSize
 190+ A4AF D0          >                        ret	 nc
 191+ A4B0 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 192+ A4B2 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; update for next slot so re can fast return on distance checks

 194+ A4B6                                      ReturnIfSlotAEmpty
 194+ A4B6 21 47 85    >                        ld      hl,UniverseSlotList

 194+ A4BB 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 194+ A4BC 3C          >                        inc     a
 194+ A4BD C8          >                        ret     z           ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
 194+ A4BE 3D          >                        dec     a           ; get original value back for later
 195+ A4BF CD A9 89                             call    IsSpaceStationPresent               ; If its a station its imune to missiles
 196+ A4C2 D8                                   ret     c                                   ; if we have a special mission to kill a staion then its type won't be space station for game logic

 199+ A4C8                                      ReturnIfNotZero                             ;
 199+ A4C8 C0          >                        ret     nz

 203+ A4D0                                      MMUSelectUniverseA

 203+ A4D2 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a

 204+ A4EA             >                        JumpIfPositive      .CheckDiff              ; if result was -ve
 204+ A4EA F2 F8 A4    >                        jp		p, .CheckDiff

 218+ A56E ED 5B 23 C0                          ld      de, (UBnKylo)

 220+ A576 7C                                   ld      a,h
 221+ A577 B2                                   or      d
 222+ A578 B0                                   or      b
 223+ A579                                      ClearCarryFlag
 223+ A579 B7          >                        or a
 224+ A57A                                      ReturnIfNotZero
 224+ A57A C0          >                        ret     nz
 225+ A57B                                      SetCarryFlag
 225+ A57B 37          >                        scf
 226+ A57C C9                                   ret
 227+ A57D
 228+ A57D                                      ZeroA
 228+ A57D AF          >                        xor a
 229+ A57E B4                                   or      h
 230+ A57F                                      ClearCarryFlag
 230+ A57F B7          >                        or a
 231+ A580                                      ReturnIfNotZero                             ; will return with carry clear if way far away
 231+ A580 C0          >                        ret     nz
 232+ A581 7D                                   ld      a,l
 233+ A582                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng    c                      ; return no carry if x far
 233+ A582 B9          >                        cp    c
 233+ A583 D0          >                        ret	 nc

 236+ A588 B5                                   or      l
 237+ A589                                      ClearCarryFlag
 237+ A589 B7          >                        or a

 238+ A58A C0          >                        ret     nz

 240+ A58C B9          >                        cp    c

 247+ A596 B9          >                        cp    c

 248+ A598 37          >                        scf
 249+ A599 C9                                   ret

 253+ A59A ~                                    MMUSelectUnivBankA

  28++A66A FD 67                                ld      iyh,a

  32++A672 C6 46        .SaveMissileBank:       add     a,BankUNIVDATA0                     ; pre calculate add to optimise
  33++A674 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
  34++A676                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
  35++A676 32 9C A5                                 ld  (TacticsMissileBank),a
  36++A679                                      ENDIF

  40++A680                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG

  42++A683                                      ENDIF

  46++A693 3A 54 C0     .IsShipExploding:       ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)                    ; check exploding status

  53++A6A2              .UpdateTargetingShipX:  IFDEF MISSILEBREAK

  55++A6A2                                      ENDIF
  56++A6A2 ED 5B 20 C0                          ld      de,(UBnKxlo)                        ; get target ship X

  58++A6A9                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG

  62++A6B0                                      FlipSignBitA

  63++A6B2 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
  64++A6B3                                      SelectMissileBank
  64++A6B3 FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
  64++A6B5             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA

  67++A6BE                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG

  69++A6C1 32 B1 A5                                 ld  (TacticsMissileX+2),a
  70++A6C4                                      ENDIF
  71++A6C4 47                                   ld      b,a
  72++A6C5 CD B6 94                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
  73++A6C8 22 DF A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),hl

 108++A720 22 B7 A5                                 ld  (TacticsMissileZ),hl
 109++A723 32 B9 A5                                 ld  (TacticsMissileZ+2),a
 110++A726                                      ENDIF
 111++A726
 112++A726 47                                   ld      b,a
 113++A727 CD B6 94                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 114++A72A 22 E7 A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 115++A72D 32 E9 A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 116++A730              ; by here missile in in memory and TacticsVector now holds distance
 117++A730              ; if or ABS all high bytes is <> 0
 118++A730              .CheckDistance:         IFDEF MISSILEDOHIT
 119++A730 2A E0 A5                                 ld      hl,(TacticsVectorX+1)              ; test if high bytes are set (value is assumed to be 24 bit, though calcs are only 16 so this is uneeded)
 120++A733 7C                                       ld      a,h                                ; .
 121++A734 ED 5B E4 A5                              ld      de,(TacticsVectorY+1)              ; .
 122++A738 B2                                       or      d                                  ; .
 123++A739 ED 4B E8 A5                              ld      bc,(TacticsVectorZ+1)              ; .
 124++A73D B0                                       or      b                                  ; .
 125++A73E                                          ClearSignBitA                              ; .
 125++A73E E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 126++A740                                          JumpIfNotZero       .FarAway               ; .
 126++A740 C2 4F A7    >                        jp	nz,.FarAway
 127++A743 B5                                       or      l                                    ; test for low byte bit 7, i.e high of 16 bit values
 128++A744 B3                                       or      e                                  ; .
 129++A745 B1                                       or      c                                  ; .
 130++A746                                          JumpIfNotZero       .FarAway               ; .
 130++A746 C2 4F A7    >                        jp	nz,.FarAway
 131++A749                                      ELSE
 132++A749 ~                                        jp                  .FarAway
 133++A749                                      ENDIF
 134++A749              ; If we get here its close enough to detonate
 135++A749 3A 45 C0     .CloseMissileExplode:   ld      a,(UBnKMissileTarget)
 136++A74C C3 6B A4                             jp      MissileHitShipA
 137++A74F              ;   *far away ** TODO need to set memory read write on page 0
 138++A74F              .FarAway:               SelectTargetBank
 138++A74F FD 7D       >                        ld      a,iyl
 138++A751             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 138++A751 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 139++A754                                      JumpIfMemFalse      UBnKECMFitted, .NoECM                   ; if target has ECM and enough energy to use it
 139++A754 3A 5A C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKECMFitted)
 139++A757 A7          >                        and     a
 139++A758 C2 75 A7    >                        jp      nz, .NoECM
 140++A75B                                      JumpIfMemLTNusng    UBnKEnergy,    ECMCounterMax, .NoECM    ; .
 140++A75B 3A 58 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)
 140++A75E FE 80       >                        cp      ECMCounterMax
 140++A760 DA 75 A7    >                        jp	  c,.NoECM
 141++A763                                      JumpIfMemIsNotZero   ECMCountDown, .NoECM                ; . ECM is already active
 141++A763 3A 84 83    >                        ld      a,(ECMCountDown)
 141++A766 A7          >                        and     a
 141++A767 C2 75 A7    >                        jp	    nz,.NoECM
 142++A76A 3A 67 83     .TestIfUsingECM:        ld      a,(RandomSeed2)                                             ; if random < 16
 143++A76D                                      JumpIfAGTENusng     16, .UpdateMissilePos                           ;   then fire ECM destroying missile
 143++A76D FE 10       >                        cp     16
 143++A76F D2 75 A7    >                        jp		nc,.UpdateMissilePos
 144++A772              ;. If we get here then target is still paged in to fire ECM
 145++A772 C3 7A C5     .ZeroPageFireECM:       jp      FireECM                                             ; with an implicit return
 146++A775              ;                       implicit ret
 147++A775              ;. If we get here then target is still paged in with no ECM
 148++A775              .NoECM:
 149++A775                                    ;;;         ** can do 16 bit maths as we can take teh view that once a object/space station is 24 bit value away then
 150++A775                                    ;;;         ** targeting computer looses track and destructs missiles
 151++A775              ;--- Now we can actually update the missile AI
 152++A775              .UpdateMissilePos:      ;break
 153++A775                                      SelectMissileBank
 153++A775 FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
 153++A777             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 153++A777 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 154++A77A                                      ;break
 155++A77A                                      ;call    ORTHOGALISE
 156++A77A              .NormaliseDirection:    IFDEF MISSILEBREAK
 157++A77A ~                                        break
 158++A77A                                      ENDIF
 159++A77A CD DF AC                             call    NormalizeTactics                    ; Normalise vector down to 7 bit + sign byte (.TA19->TAS2)
 160++A77D                                      IFDEF TACTICSDEBUG
 161++A77D CD A6 AB                                 call DebugTacticsCopy
 162++A780                                      ENDIF
 163++A780              .NegateDirection:       FlipSignMem TacticsVectorX+2                ; negate vector in XX15 so it points opposite direction
 163++A780 3A E1 A5    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorX+2)
 163++A783 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 163++A785 32 E1 A5    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 164++A788                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorY+2                ; we have already negated the dot product above
 164++A788 3A E5 A5    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorY+2)
 164++A78B EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 164++A78D 32 E5 A5    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 165++A790                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorZ+2                ; .
 165++A790 3A E9 A5    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 165++A793 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 165++A795 32 E9 A5    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 166++A798 CD AF A7                             call    SeekingLogic
 167++A79B C9                                   ret
 168++A79C 3A 45 85     .ProcessMissileHit:     ld      a,(CurrentMissileCheck)
 169++A79F                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng UniverseSlotListSize  ; need to wait another loop
 169++A79F FE 0C       >                        cp    UniverseSlotListSize
 169++A7A1 D0          >                        ret	 nc
 170++A7A2 C3 90 A4     .ActivateNewExplosion:  jp  CheckMissileBlastInit               ; initialise
 171++A7A5                                      ; DUMMY RET get a free return by using jp
 172++A7A5 CD 63 C6     .ECMIsActive:           call    UnivExplodeShip                 ; ECM detonates missile
 173++A7A8                                      SetMemTrue  UBnKMissleHitToProcess      ; Enque an explosion
 173++A7A8 AF          >                        xor     a
 173++A7A9 32 44 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKMissleHitToProcess),a
 174++A7AC C3 9C A7                             jp      .ProcessMissileHit              ; lets see if we can enqueue now
 175++A7AF                                      ; DUMMY RET get a free return as activenewexplosion does jp to init with a free ret
 176++A7AF
 177++A7AF CD EB AB     SeekingLogic:           call    XX12EquTacticsDotNosev              ; SA = nose . XX15                           (     ->TAS3)
 178++A7B2 32 A2 A5                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct1),a              ; CNT = A (high byte of dot product)
 179++A7B5 3A 75 84                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; get sign from dot product
 180++A7B8 32 A6 A5                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 181++A7BB CD 41 AC     .RoofDotProduct:        call    XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv              ; Now tran the roof for rotation
 182++A7BE 32 A5 A5                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2),a              ; so if its +ve then the roof is similar so pull up to head towards it
 183++A7C1 3A 75 84                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; .
 184++A7C4 32 A6 A5                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 185++A7C7 CD D1 A7                             call    SimplifiedShipPitchv3
 186++A7CA CD F5 A7                             call    SimplifiedShipRollv3
 187++A7CD CD 23 A8                             call    SimplifiedShipSpeedv3
 188++A7D0 C9                                   ret
 189++A7D1
 190++A7D1              SimplifiedShipPitchv3:  ;break
 191++A7D1 2A A5 A5                             ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 192++A7D4 7C                                   ld      a,h                                ; .
 193++A7D5 EE 80                                xor     $80                                ; .
 194++A7D7 E6 80                                and     $80                                ; .
 195++A7D9 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 196++A7DA 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 197++A7DB CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 198++A7DD                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 198++A7DD FE 10       >                        cp     16
 198++A7DF D2 EB A7    >                        jp		nc,.skipPitchZero
 199++A7E2                                      ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 199++A7E2 AF          >                        xor a
 200++A7E3 B4                                   or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 201++A7E4 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 202++A7E7                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 203++A7E7 32 32 A6                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 204++A7EA                                      ENDIF
 205++A7EA C9                                   ret
 206++A7EB 3E 02        .skipPitchZero:         ld      a,2
 207++A7ED B4                                   or      h
 208++A7EE 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 209++A7F1                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 210++A7F1 32 32 A6                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 211++A7F4                                      ENDIF
 212++A7F4 C9                                   ret
 213++A7F5
 214++A7F5              ;Direct on dot product nose is $24
 215++A7F5              ; Position                  Pitch   Roll    Speed
 216++A7F5              ; Top left forwards         up      -ve     +
 217++A7F5              ; Top right forwards        up      +ve     +
 218++A7F5              ; Bottom left forwards      down    -ve     +
 219++A7F5              ; Bottom right forwards     down    +ve     +
 220++A7F5              ; Top left rear             up      -ve     -
 221++A7F5              ; Top right rear            up      +ve     -
 222++A7F5              ; Bottom left rear          down    -ve     -
 223++A7F5              ; Bottom right rear         down    +ve     -
 224++A7F5
 225++A7F5
 226++A7F5
 227++A7F5              SimplifiedShipRollv3:  ; ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)               ; get current roll
 228++A7F5                                     ; sla     a                                 ; * 2 to also abs
 229++A7F5                                     ; ReturnIfAGTENusng 32                      ; and so if >32 skip
 230++A7F5 CD 47 AC                             call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 231++A7F8 32 A8 A5                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 232++A7FB 6F                                   ld      l,a                                ; .
 233++A7FC 3A 75 84                             ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 234++A7FF 32 A9 A5                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 235++A802 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 236++A803 3A A6 A5                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 237++A806                                      ;xor     $80                               ; .
 238++A806                                      ;xor     h                                 ; b = flip against pitch sign
 239++A806                                      ;and     $80                               ; .
 240++A806                                      ;xor $80
 241++A806 47                                   ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 242++A807 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 243++A808 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 244++A80A                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16,.skipRollZero           ;
 244++A80A FE 10       >                        cp     16
 244++A80C D2 18 A8    >                        jp		nc,.skipRollZero
 245++A80F                                      ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 245++A80F AF          >                        xor a
 246++A810 B0                                   or      b
 247++A811 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 248++A814                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 249++A814 32 30 A6                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 250++A817                                      ENDIF
 251++A817 C9                                   ret
 252++A818 3E 02        .skipRollZero:          ld      a,2
 253++A81A B4                                   or      h
 254++A81B A8                                   xor     b
 255++A81C 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 256++A81F                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 257++A81F 32 30 A6                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 258++A822                                      ENDIF
 259++A822 C9                                   ret
 260++A823
 261++A823 2A A2 A5     SimplifiedShipSpeedv3:  ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 262++A826 7C                                   ld      a,h
 263++A827 A7                                   and     a
 264++A828 20 13                                jr      nz,.SlowDown
 265++A82A ED 5B A5 A5                          ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 266++A82E 7D                                   ld      a,l
 267++A82F                                      JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 267++A82F FE 16       >                        cp      22
 267++A831 DA 3D A8    >                        jp		c, .SlowDown
 268++A834 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 269++A836 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 270++A839                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 271++A839 32 34 A6                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 272++A83C                                      ENDIF
 273++A83C C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 274++A83D              .SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 274++A83D FE 12       >                        cp      18
 274++A83F DA 4B A8    >                        jp		c, .NoSpeedChange
 275++A842 3E FE        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-2
 276++A844 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 277++A847                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 278++A847 32 34 A6                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 279++A84A                                      ENDIF
 280++A84A C9                                   ret
 281++A84B              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 281++A84B AF          >                        xor a
 282++A84C 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 283++A84F                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 284++A84F 32 34 A6                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 285++A852                                      ENDIF
 286++A852 C9                                   ret
 287++A853
 288++A853
 289++A853 CD 92 A8     SimplifiedShipSpeedv3b:  call    GetDistance                         ;
 290++A856 7C                                   ld      a,h
 291++A857 A7                                   and     a
 292++A858 06 16                                ld      b,22
 293++A85A 20 08                                jr      nz,.NotSlow
 294++A85C 7D           .CloseSlowTest:         ld      a,l
 295++A85D                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 30, .NotSlow
 295++A85D FE 1E       >                        cp     30
 295++A85F D2 64 A8    >                        jp		nc,.NotSlow
 296++A862 06 3C                                ld      b,60
 297++A864 2A A2 A5     .NotSlow:               ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)             ; if nosedir is negative (pointing the wrong way)
 298++A867 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ; or nosedir < 22 (very far off)
 299++A868 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ; do decelleration test
 300++A86A C2 7B A8                             jp      nz,.DecelTest                       ; .
 301++A86D 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ; .
 302++A86E                                      JumpIfALTNusng b, .DecelTest                ; .
 302++A86E B8          >                        cp      b
 302++A86F DA 7B A8    >                        jp		c, .DecelTest
 303++A872 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 304++A874 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 305++A877                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 306++A877 32 34 A6                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 307++A87A                                      ENDIF
 308++A87A C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 309++A87B 7D           .DecelTest:             ld      a,l                                 ; if abs acelleration > 18
 310++A87C                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 18 ,.Deccelerate             ;    decelerate by 2
 310++A87C FE 12       >                        cp     18
 310++A87E D2 89 A8    >                        jp		nc,.Deccelerate
 311++A881              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 311++A881 AF          >                        xor a
 312++A882 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 313++A885                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 314++A885 32 34 A6                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 315++A888                                      ENDIF
 316++A888 C9                                   ret
 317++A889 3E FE        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-2
 318++A88B 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 319++A88E                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 320++A88E 32 34 A6                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 321++A891                                      ENDIF
 322++A891 C9                                   ret
 323++A892
 324++A892 2A DF A5     GetDistance:            ld      hl,(TacticsVectorX)
 325++A895 ED 5B E3 A5                          ld      de,(TacticsVectorY)
 326++A899 ED 4B E7 A5                          ld      bc,(TacticsVectorZ)
 327++A89D 7C                                   ld      a,h
 328++A89E E6 7F                                and     $7F
 329++A8A0 67                                   ld      h,a
 330++A8A1 78                                   ld      a,b
 331++A8A2 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 332++A8A4 47                                   ld      b,a
 333++A8A5 7A                                   ld      a,d
 334++A8A6 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 335++A8A8 57                                   ld      d,a
 336++A8A9 09                                   add     hl,bc
 337++A8AA 19                                   add     hl,de
 338++A8AB                                      ShiftHLRight1
 338++A8AB CB 3C       >			   srl h
 338++A8AD CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 339++A8AF                                      ShiftHLRight1
 339++A8AF CB 3C       >			   srl h
 339++A8B1 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 340++A8B3 C9                                   ret
