 114++A9E4 E6 7F                                and     ShipAIDisabled                  ;  .
 115++A9E6 32 54 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a                ;  .
 116++A9E9                                      ;ZeroA                                   ;  .
 117++A9E9 32 5A C0                             ld      (UBnKECMFitted),a               ;  .
 118++A9EC              .LaunchEscapePod:       ;break
 119++A9EC                                      ;            goto spawn escape pod
 120++A9EC              .EnergyOverHalf:
 121++A9EC              .EnergyOverQuater:
 122++A9EC 3A 5C C0     .NoEscapePod:           ld      a,(UBnKMissilesLeft)            ;      if missiles > 0
 123++A9EF 47                                   ld      b,a
 124++A9F0                                      JumpIfAIsZero .NoMissileLaunch
 124++A9F0 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 124++A9F1 CA 07 AA    >                        jp	    z, .NoMissileLaunch
 125++A9F4 3A 68 83     .MissileLaunchTest:     ld      a,(RandomSeed3)                 ;         if random and 15 > = nbr missiles
 126++A9F7 E6 0F                                and     15
 127++A9F9                                      JumpIfALTNusng b, .NoMissileLaunch
 127++A9F9 B8          >                        cp      b
 127++A9FA DA 07 AA    >                        jp		c, .NoMissileLaunch
 128++A9FD 3A 84 83                             ld      a,(ECMCountDown)
 129++AA00                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero  .NoMissileLaunch
 129++AA00 A7          >                        and     a
 129++AA01 C2 07 AA    >                        jp	    nz,.NoMissileLaunch
 130++AA04 C3 04 66                             jp    LaunchEnemyMissile                ; jump out and return if firing missile
 131++AA07 3A 21 C0     .NoMissileLaunch:       ld      a,(UBnKxhi)
 132++AA0A 2A 24 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKyhi)
 133++AA0D B6                                   or      (hl)
 134++AA0E 2A 27 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzhi)
 135++AA11 B6                                   or      (hl)
 136++AA12                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 160, .TooFarForLaser   ; if in laser range (all highs order together < 160)
 136++AA12 FE A0       >                        cp     160
 136++AA14 D2 3B AA    >                        jp		nc,.TooFarForLaser
 137++AA17 CD EB AB                             call    XX12EquTacticsDotNosev
 138++AA1A 47                                   ld      b,a
 139++AA1B 3A 75 84                             ld      a,(varS)
 140++AA1E                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .TooFarForLaser        ;   if dot product of ship < 160 i.e. > -32
 140++AA1E A7          >                        and     a
 140++AA1F C2 3B AA    >                        jp	    nz,.TooFarForLaser
 141++AA22 78                                   ld      a,b                            ;    .
 142++AA23                                      JumpIfALTNusng    32, .DoneLaserShot  ;    .
 142++AA23 FE 20       >                        cp      32
 142++AA25 DA 36 AA    >                        jp		c, .DoneLaserShot
 143++AA28              .FireLaser:             ;break                        ;      do fire laser logic (drain energy, add beam to lines as random line from ship to a random edge of screen)
 144++AA28 78                                   ld      a,b ;; need to see if b gets corrupted by laser fire
 145++AA29                                      JumpIfAEqNusng      35, .LaserHitPlayer
 145++AA29 FE 23       >                        cp     35
 145++AA2B CA 36 AA    >                        jp      z,.LaserHitPlayer
 146++AA2E                                      JumpIfAEqNusng      36, .LaserHitPlayer
 146++AA2E FE 24       >                        cp     36
 146++AA30 CA 36 AA    >                        jp      z,.LaserHitPlayer
 147++AA33 C3 36 AA     .LaserMissedPlayer:     jp      .DoneLaserShot
 148++AA36              .LaserHitPlayer:        ;break ;         do direct hit logic
 149++AA36 21 47 C0     .DoneLaserShot:         ld      hl,UBnKAccel                   ;      Half attacking ship's accelleration in byte 28 (dec so must be 0 1 or 2)
 150++AA39 CB 26                                sla     (hl)
 151++AA3B              .TooFarForLaser:
 152++AA3B              .UpdateShip             ;break
 153++AA3B CD E9 A3                             call    CalculateAgression              ; refresh aggression levels
 154++AA3E 3A 27 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzhi)
 155++AA41                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 3, .ShipFarAway
 155++AA41 FE 03       >                        cp     3
 155++AA43 D2 51 AA    >                        jp		nc,.ShipFarAway
 156++AA46 3A 21 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxhi)
 157++AA49 2A 24 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKyhi)
 158++AA4C B6                                   or      (hl)
 159++AA4D E6 FE                                and     %11111110
 160++AA4F 28 26                                jr      z,.ShipTurnAway
 161++AA51 3A 67 83     .ShipFarAway:           ld      a,(RandomSeed2)                     ; if random with bit 7 set < ship AI byte 32 flag
 162++AA54                                      ;or      %10000000               ; .
 163++AA54                                      JumpIfAGTEMemusng UBnKShipAggression, .ShipTurnAway
 163++AA54 21 53 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnKShipAggression
 163++AA57 BE          >                        cp      (hl)
 163++AA58 D2 77 AA    >                        jp		nc,.ShipTurnAway
 164++AA5B                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorX+2                ; negate vector in XX15 so it points opposite direction
 164++AA5B 3A E1 A5    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorX+2)
 164++AA5E EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 164++AA60 32 E1 A5    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 165++AA63                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorY+2                ; we have already negated the dot product above
 165++AA63 3A E5 A5    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorY+2)
 165++AA66 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 165++AA68 32 E5 A5    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 166++AA6B                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorZ+2                ; .
 166++AA6B 3A E9 A5    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 166++AA6E EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 166++AA70 32 E9 A5    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 167++AA73 CD 7B AA                             call    ShipSeekingLogic            ;    seek as per missile
 168++AA76 C9                                   ret
 169++AA77 CD 7B AA     .ShipTurnAway:          call    ShipSeekingLogic            ; move away (ie.. as per missile but dot products not reversed)
 170++AA7A                                      ;              consider a random roll
 171++AA7A C9                                   ret
 172++AA7B
 173++AA7B CD EB AB     ShipSeekingLogic:       call    XX12EquTacticsDotNosev              ; SA = nose . XX15                           (     ->TAS3)
 174++AA7E 32 A2 A5                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct1),a              ; CNT = A (high byte of dot product)
 175++AA81 3A 75 84                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; get sign from dot product
 176++AA84 32 A6 A5                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 177++AA87 CD 41 AC     .RoofDotProduct:        call    XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv              ; Now tran the roof for rotation
 178++AA8A 32 A5 A5                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2),a              ; so if its +ve then the roof is similar so pull up to head towards it
 179++AA8D 3A 75 84                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; .
 180++AA90 32 A6 A5                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 181++AA93 CD 9D AA                             call    ShipPitchv3
 182++AA96 CD C1 AA                             call    ShipRollv3
 183++AA99 CD EF AA                             call    ShipSpeedv3
 184++AA9C C9                                   ret
 185++AA9D
 186++AA9D 2A A5 A5     ShipPitchv3:            ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 187++AAA0 7C                                   ld      a,h                                ; .
 188++AAA1 EE 80                                xor     $80                                ; .
 189++AAA3 E6 80                                and     $80                                ; .
 190++AAA5 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 191++AAA6 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 192++AAA7 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 193++AAA9                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 193++AAA9 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 193++AAAB D2 B7 AA    >                        jp		nc,.skipPitchZero
 194++AAAE                                      ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 194++AAAE AF          >                        xor a
 195++AAAF B4                                   or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 196++AAB0 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 197++AAB3                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 198++AAB3 32 32 A6                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 199++AAB6                                      ENDIF
 200++AAB6 C9                                   ret
 201++AAB7 3E 02        .skipPitchZero:         ld      a,2
 202++AAB9 B4                                   or      h
 203++AABA 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 204++AABD                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 205++AABD 32 32 A6                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 206++AAC0                                      ENDIF
 207++AAC0 C9                                   ret
 208++AAC1
 209++AAC1 CD 47 AC     ShipRollv3:             call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 210++AAC4 32 A8 A5                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 211++AAC7 6F                                   ld      l,a                                ; .
 212++AAC8 3A 75 84                             ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 213++AACB 32 A9 A5                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 214++AACE 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 215++AACF 3A A6 A5                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 216++AAD2 47                                   ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 217++AAD3 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 218++AAD4 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 219++AAD6                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16,.skipRollZero           ;
 219++AAD6 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 219++AAD8 D2 E4 AA    >                        jp		nc,.skipRollZero
 220++AADB                                      ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 220++AADB AF          >                        xor a
 221++AADC B0                                   or      b
 222++AADD 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 223++AAE0                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 224++AAE0 32 30 A6                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 225++AAE3                                      ENDIF
 226++AAE3 C9                                   ret
 227++AAE4 3E 02        .skipRollZero:          ld      a,2
 228++AAE6 B4                                   or      h
 229++AAE7 A8                                   xor     b
 230++AAE8 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 231++AAEB                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 232++AAEB 32 30 A6                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 233++AAEE                                      ENDIF
 234++AAEE C9                                   ret
 235++AAEF
 236++AAEF 2A A2 A5     ShipSpeedv3:            ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 237++AAF2 7C                                   ld      a,h
 238++AAF3 A7                                   and     a
 239++AAF4 20 13                                jr      nz,.SlowDown
 240++AAF6 ED 5B A5 A5                          ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 241++AAFA 7D                                   ld      a,l
 242++AAFB                                      JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 242++AAFB FE 16       >                        cp      22
 242++AAFD DA 09 AB    >                        jp		c, .SlowDown
 243++AB00 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 244++AB02 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 245++AB05                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 246++AB05 32 34 A6                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 247++AB08                                      ENDIF
 248++AB08 C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 249++AB09              .SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 249++AB09 FE 12       >                        cp      18
 249++AB0B DA 17 AB    >                        jp		c, .NoSpeedChange
 250++AB0E 3E FF        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-1
 251++AB10 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 252++AB13                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 253++AB13 32 34 A6                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 254++AB16                                      ENDIF
 255++AB16 C9                                   ret
 256++AB17              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 256++AB17 AF          >                        xor a
 257++AB18 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 258++AB1B                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 259++AB1B 32 34 A6                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 260++AB1E                                      ENDIF
 261++AB1E C9                                   ret
 262++AB1F              ;;;ShipPitchv2:  ;break
 263++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 264++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      a,h                                ; .
 265++AB1F              ;;;                        xor     $80                                ; .
 266++AB1F              ;;;                        and     $80                                ; .
 267++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 268++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 269++AB1F              ;;;                        sla     a                                  ;
 270++AB1F              ;;;                        JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 271++AB1F              ;;;                        ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 272++AB1F              ;;;                        or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 273++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 274++AB1F              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 275++AB1F              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 276++AB1F              ;;;                        ENDIF
 277++AB1F              ;;;                        ret
 278++AB1F              ;;;.skipPitchZero:         ld      a,3
 279++AB1F              ;;;                        or      h
 280++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 281++AB1F              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 282++AB1F              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 283++AB1F              ;;;                        ENDIF
 284++AB1F              ;;;                        ret
 285++AB1F
 286++AB1F
 287++AB1F              ;;;ShipRollv2:             ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)
 288++AB1F              ;;;                        and     $7F
 289++AB1F              ;;;                        cp      16
 290++AB1F              ;;;                        ret     z
 291++AB1F              ;;;                        call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 292++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 293++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      l,a                                ; .
 294++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 295++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 296++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 297++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign

 300++AB1F              ;;;                        sla     a                                  ;

 304++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 305++AB1F              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 306++AB1F              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 307++AB1F              ;;;                        ENDIF
 308++AB1F              ;;;                        ret
 309++AB1F              ;;;.skipRollZero:          ld      a,3

 311++AB1F              ;;;                        xor     b
 312++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 313++AB1F              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 314++AB1F              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 315++AB1F              ;;;                        ENDIF
 316++AB1F              ;;;                        ret
 317++AB1F              ;;;
 318++AB1F              ;;;ShipSpeedv2:            ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 319++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      a,h
 320++AB1F              ;;;                        and     a
 321++AB1F              ;;;                        jr      nz,.SlowDown
 322++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 323++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      a,l
 324++AB1F              ;;;                        JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 325++AB1F              ;;;.Accelerate:            ld      a,2                                 ; else
 326++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 327++AB1F              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 328++AB1F              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 329++AB1F              ;;;                        ENDIF
 330++AB1F              ;;;                        ret                                         ;  .
 331++AB1F              ;;;.SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 332++AB1F              ;;;.Deccelerate:           ld      a,-1
 333++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 334++AB1F              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 335++AB1F              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 336++AB1F              ;;;                        ENDIF
 337++AB1F              ;;;                        ret
 338++AB1F              ;;;.NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 339++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 340++AB1F              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 341++AB1F              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 342++AB1F              ;;;                        ENDIF
 343++AB1F              ;;;                        ret
 344++AB1F              ;;;
 345++AB1F              ;;;
 346++AB1F              ;;;
 347++AB1F              ;;;RAT2 equ    4           ; roll pitch threshold
 348++AB1F              ;;;RAT  equ    3           ; magnitude of counter
 349++AB1F              ;;;CNT2 equ    22          ; angle for ship slowdown
 350++AB1F              ;;;
 351++AB1F              ;;;
 352++AB1F              ;;;ShipPitch:              ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 353++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      a,h                                ; .
 354++AB1F              ;;;                        xor     $80                                ; .
 355++AB1F              ;;;                        and     $80                                ; .
 356++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 357++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 358++AB1F              ;;;                        sla     a                                  ;
 359++AB1F              ;;;                        JumpIfAGTENusng RAT2, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 360++AB1F              ;;;                        ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 361++AB1F              ;;;                        or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 362++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 363++AB1F              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 364++AB1F              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 365++AB1F              ;;;                        ENDIF
 366++AB1F              ;;;                        ret
 367++AB1F              ;;;.skipPitchZero:         ld      a,l
 368++AB1F              ;;;                        or      h
 369++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 370++AB1F              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 371++AB1F              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 372++AB1F              ;;;                        ENDIF
 373++AB1F              ;;;                        ret
 374++AB1F              ;;;
 375++AB1F              ;;;
 376++AB1F              ;;;                        ;
 377++AB1F              ;;;ShipRoll:               call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 378++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 379++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      l,a                                ; .
 380++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 381++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 382++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 383++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 384++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 385++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 386++AB1F              ;;;                        sla     a                                  ;
 387++AB1F              ;;;                        JumpIfAGTENusng RAT2,.skipRollZero           ;
 388++AB1F              ;;;                        ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 389++AB1F              ;;;                        or      b
 390++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 391++AB1F              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 392++AB1F              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 393++AB1F              ;;;                        ENDIF
 394++AB1F              ;;;                        ret
 395++AB1F              ;;;.skipRollZero:          ld      a,1
 396++AB1F              ;;;                        or      h
 397++AB1F              ;;;                        xor     b
 398++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 399++AB1F              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 400++AB1F              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 401++AB1F              ;;;                        ENDIF
 402++AB1F              ;;;                        ret
 403++AB1F              ;;;
 404++AB1F              ;;;ShipSpeed:              ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 405++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      a,h
 406++AB1F              ;;;                        and     a
 407++AB1F              ;;;                        jr      nz,.SlowDown
 408++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 409++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      a,l
 410++AB1F              ;;;                        JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 411++AB1F              ;;;.Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 412++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 413++AB1F              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 414++AB1F              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 415++AB1F              ;;;                        ENDIF
 416++AB1F              ;;;                        ret                                         ;  .
 417++AB1F              ;;;.SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 418++AB1F              ;;;.Deccelerate:           ld      a,-1
 419++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 420++AB1F              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 421++AB1F              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 422++AB1F              ;;;                        ENDIF
 423++AB1F              ;;;                        ret
 424++AB1F              ;;;.NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 425++AB1F              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 426++AB1F              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 427++AB1F              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 428++AB1F              ;;;                        ENDIF
 429++AB1F              ;;;                        ret

 266+ AB1F
 267+ AB1F              ; On Entry A = TacticsDotProduct2 sign (i.e. roof direction)
 268+ AB1F              ; on exit a == new roll
 269+ AB1F EE 80        calcNPitch:             xor     SignOnly8Bit                    ; c = sign flipped of dot product only
 270+ AB21 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                    ; .
 271+ AB23 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; . (varT in effect)
 272+ AB24 F6 03                                or      MISSILEMAXPITCH                 ; a = flipped sign max pitch
 273+ AB26 3A 49 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)             ; b = abs (currentz pitch)
 274+ AB29 C9                                   ret
 275+ AB2A
 276+ AB2A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                    ; . which will initially be 0
 277+ AB2C 47                                   ld      b,a                             ; .
 278+ AB2D 3A A5 A5                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2)          ; a = abs roof dot product
 279+ AB30                                      JumpIfALTNusng MISSILEMAXPITCH+1, .calcNPitch2    ; if a >= roll threshold
 279+ AB30 FE 04       >                        cp      MISSILEMAXPITCH+1
 279+ AB32 DA 3F AB    >                        jp		c, .calcNPitch2
 280+ AB35 78                                   ld      a,b
 281+ AB36 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 282+ AB38                                      ;jr      z,.NPitchPositive
 283+ AB38                                     ; ld      a,
 284+ AB38 3E 03                                ld      a,MISSILEMAXPITCH                         ;    z rot = z rot * dot product flipped sign
 285+ AB3A B1                                   or      c                               ;    i.e. zrot = current magnitude but dot product sign flipped
 286+ AB3B 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ;    .
 287+ AB3E C9                                   ret                                     ; else (a LT current abs z)
 288+ AB3F B1           .calcNPitch2:           or      c                               ;     rot z = dot product with sign flipped
 289+ AB40 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ;
 290+ AB43 C9                                   ret                                     ;
 291+ AB44
 292+ AB44 3A 49 C0     calcNRoll:              ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)
 293+ AB47 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 294+ AB49 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                    ; flip sign of dot product
 295+ AB4B F6 05                                or      5
 296+ AB4D 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 297+ AB50 C9                                   ret
 298+ AB51
 299+ AB51 4F                                   ld      c,a
 300+ AB52 F6 03                                or      MISSILEMAXPITCH
 301+ AB54 3A 48 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)
 302+ AB57 C9                                   ret
 303+ AB58
 304+ AB58
 305+ AB58
 306+ AB58 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                    ; get ABS value
 307+ AB5A 47                                   ld      b,a
 308+ AB5B 3A A5 A5                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2)          ; now we have the dot product abs value
 309+ AB5E                                      JumpIfALTNusng MISSILEMAXROLL+1, .calcNRoll2
 309+ AB5E FE 04       >                        cp      MISSILEMAXROLL+1
 309+ AB60 DA 6A AB    >                        jp		c, .calcNRoll2
 310+ AB63 3E 03                                ld      a,MISSILEMAXROLL
 311+ AB65 B1                                   or      c
 312+ AB66 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 313+ AB69 C9                                   ret
 314+ AB6A B1           .calcNRoll2:            or      c                               ;     rot z = dot product with sign flipped
 315+ AB6B 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 316+ AB6E C9                                   ret
 317+ AB6F
 318+ AB6F
 319+ AB6F 21 2A C0     CopyRotSideToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX+1
 320+ AB72 C3 7E AB                             jp      CopyRotmatToTacticsMat
 321+ AB75
 322+ AB75 21 36 C0     CopyRotNoseToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX+1
 323+ AB78 C3 7E AB                             jp      CopyRotmatToTacticsMat
 324+ AB7B
 325+ AB7B 21 30 C0     CopyRotRoofToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1
 326+ AB7E              ; Coy rotation matrix high byte to trans rot mat, strip off sign and separate to rotmat byte 2
 327+ AB7E 11 C3 A5     CopyRotmatToTacticsMat: ld      de,TacticsRotMatX
 328+ AB81 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of x
 329+ AB82 47                                   ld      b,a
 330+ AB83 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 331+ AB85 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 332+ AB86 13                                   inc     de
 333+ AB87 78                                   ld      a,b
 334+ AB88 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 335+ AB8A 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 336+ AB8B 13                                   inc     de                  ; move to next rot mat element
 337+ AB8C 23                                   inc     hl
 338+ AB8D 23                                   inc     hl                  ; matrix high byte of y
 339+ AB8E 7E           .processYElement:       ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of y
 340+ AB8F 47                                   ld      b,a
 341+ AB90 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 342+ AB92 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 343+ AB93 13                                   inc     de
 344+ AB94 78                                   ld      a,b
 345+ AB95 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 346+ AB97 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 347+ AB98 13                                   inc     de                  ; move to next rot mat element
 348+ AB99 23                                   inc     hl
 349+ AB9A 23                                   inc     hl                  ; matrix high byte of z
 350+ AB9B 7E           .ProcessZElement:       ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of z
 351+ AB9C 47                                   ld      b,a
 352+ AB9D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 353+ AB9F 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 354+ ABA0 13                                   inc     de
 355+ ABA1 78                                   ld      a,b
 356+ ABA2 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 357+ ABA4 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 358+ ABA5 C9                                   ret
 359+ ABA6
 360+ ABA6                                      IFDEF TACTICSDEBUG
 361+ ABA6              DebugTacticsCopy:
 362+ ABA6 2A 29 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
 363+ ABA9 ED 5B 2B C0                          ld      de,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
 364+ ABAD ED 4B 2D C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ)
 365+ ABB1 22 FF A5                             ld      (TacticsSideX),hl
 366+ ABB4 ED 53 03 A6                          ld      (TacticsSideY),de
 367+ ABB8 ED 43 07 A6                          ld      (TacticsSideZ),bc
 368+ ABBC
 369+ ABBC 2A 2F C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX)
 370+ ABBF ED 5B 31 C0                          ld      de,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY)
 371+ ABC3 ED 4B 33 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
 372+ ABC7 22 0F A6                             ld      (TacticsRoofX),hl
 373+ ABCA ED 53 13 A6                          ld      (TacticsRoofY),de
 374+ ABCE ED 43 17 A6                          ld      (TacticsRoofZ),bc

 377+ ABD5 ED 5B 37 C0                          ld      de,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
 378+ ABD9 ED 4B 39 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ)

 381+ ABE4 ED 43 27 A6                          ld      (TacticsNoseZ),bc

 385+ ABE9
 386+ ABE9 00 00        TacticsVarResult        DW 0
 387+ ABEB CD 75 AB     XX12EquTacticsDotNosev: call    CopyRotNoseToTacticsMat
 388+ ABEE 21 C3 A5     XX12EquTacticsDotHL:    ld      hl,TacticsRotMatX; UBnkTransmatNosevX    ; ROTMATX HI
 389+ ABF1 7E           .CalcXValue:            ld      a,(hl)                              ; DE = RotMatX & Vect X
 390+ ABF2 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 391+ ABF3 3A DF A5                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorX)                  ; .
 392+ ABF6 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 393+ ABF7 ED 30                                mul                                         ; .
 394+ ABF9 7A                                   ld      a,d                                 ; S = A = Hi (RotMatX & Vect X)
 395+ ABFA 32 75 84                             ld      (varS),a                            ; .
 396+ ABFD 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 397+ ABFE 3A E1 A5     .CalcXSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorX+2)                ; B  = A = Sign VecX xor sign RotMatX
 398+ AC01 AE                                   xor     (hl)                                ; .
 399+ AC02 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; .
 400+ AC03 23           .MoveToY:               inc     hl                                  ; Move on to Y component
 401+ AC04 7E           .CalcYValue:            ld      a,(hl)                              ; D = 0, E = Hi (RotMatY & Vect Y)
 402+ AC05 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 403+ AC06 3A E3 A5                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorY)                  ; .
 404+ AC09 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 405+ AC0A ED 30                                mul     de                                  ; .
 406+ AC0C 5A                                   ld      e,d                                 ; .
 407+ AC0D 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; .
 408+ AC0F 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 409+ AC10 3A E5 A5     .CalcYSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorY+2)                ; c = sign of y_sign * sidev_y
 410+ AC13 AE                                   xor     (hl)                                ;
 411+ AC14 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ;
 412+ AC15 23           .MoveToZ:               inc     hl                                  ; Move on to Z component
 413+ AC16 E5           .AddXandY:              push    hl                                  ; but save HL as we need that
 414+ AC17 3A 75 84                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; hl = Hi (RotMatX & Vect X) b= sign
 415+ AC1A 26 00                                ld      h,0                                 ; de = Hi (RotMatY & Vect Y) c= sign
 416+ AC1C 6F                                   ld      l,a                                 ;
 417+ AC1D CD B6 94                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ; a(sign) hl = sum
 418+ AC20 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; b = sign of result
 419+ AC21 22 E9 AB                             ld      (TacticsVarResult),hl               ; save sub in TacticsVarResult
 420+ AC24 E1           .CalcZValue:            pop     hl                                  ; get back to the rotation mat z
 421+ AC25 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                              ; D = 0, E = Hi (RotMatZ & Vect Z)
 422+ AC26 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 423+ AC27 3A E7 A5                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ)                  ; .
 424+ AC2A 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 425+ AC2B ED 30                                mul     de                                  ; .
 426+ AC2D 5A                                   ld      e,d                                 ; .
 427+ AC2E 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; .
 428+ AC30 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 429+ AC31 3A E9 A5     .CalcZSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 430+ AC34 AE                                   xor     (hl)
 431+ AC35 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; Set C to the sign of z_sign * sidev_z
 432+ AC36 2A E9 AB                             ld      hl, (TacticsVarResult)              ; CHL = x + y, BDE = z products
 433+ AC39 CD B6 94                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ; so AHL = X y z products
 434+ AC3C 32 75 84                             ld      (varS),a                            ; for backwards compatibility
 435+ AC3F 7D                                   ld      a,l                                  ; .
 436+ AC40 C9                                   ret
 437+ AC41
 438+ AC41 CD 7B AB     XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv: call    CopyRotRoofToTacticsMat
 439+ AC44 C3 EE AB                             jp      XX12EquTacticsDotHL
 440+ AC47

 442+ AC4A C3 EE AB                             jp      XX12EquTacticsDotHL

 446+ AC53 01 09 00                             ld      bc,9
 447+ AC56 ED B0                                ldir

 450+ AC59 2A 20 C0     CopyPosToVector:        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)

 453+ AC5F 22 DF A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),hl

 468+ AC7E
 469+ AC7E              SetPlayerAsTarget:      ZeroA
 469+ AC7E AF          >                        xor a
 470+ AC7F 21 CF A5                             ld      hl,TacticsTargetX
 471+ AC82 06 09                                ld      b, 3*3
 472+ AC84 77           .ZeroLoop:              ld      (hl),a                              ; player is always at 0,0,0
 473+ AC85 23                                   inc     hl
 474+ AC86 10 FC                                djnz    .ZeroLoop
 475+ AC88 C9                                   ret

 477+ AC89 CD 7E AC     CalcVectorToMyShip:     call    SetPlayerAsTarget
 478+ AC8C CD 59 AC                             call    CopyPosToVector
 479+ AC8F                                      ;call    CopyToTargetVector
 480+ AC8F                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetX+2
 481+ AC8F                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetY+2
 482+ AC8F                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetZ+2
 483+ AC8F C9                                   ret
 484+ AC90
 485+ AC90 ED 5B CF A5  CalcTargetVector:       ld      de,(TacticsTargetX)                        ; get target ship X
 486+ AC94 3A D1 A5                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetX+2)                       ; and flip sign so we have missile - target
 487+ AC97                                      FlipSignBitA
 487+ AC97 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 488+ AC99 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 489+ AC9A 2A 20 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                        ; get missile x
 490+ AC9D 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 491+ ACA0 47                                   ld      b,a
 492+ ACA1 CD B6 94                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 493+ ACA4 22 DF A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),hl
 494+ ACA7 32 E1 A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 495+ ACAA ED 5B D2 A5  .UpdateTargetingShipY:  ld      de,(TacticsTargetY)
 496+ ACAE 3A D4 A5                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetY+2)
 497+ ACB1                                      FlipSignBitA
 497+ ACB1 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 498+ ACB3 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 499+ ACB4 2A 23 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)                        ; get missile x
 500+ ACB7 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 501+ ACBA 47                                   ld      b,a
 502+ ACBB CD B6 94                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 503+ ACBE 22 E3 A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),hl
 504+ ACC1 32 E5 A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 505+ ACC4 ED 5B D5 A5  .UpdateTargetingShipZ:  ld      de,(TacticsTargetZ)
 506+ ACC8 3A D7 A5                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetZ+2)
 507+ ACCB                                      FlipSignBitA
 507+ ACCB EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 508+ ACCD 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 509+ ACCE 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; get missile x
 510+ ACD1 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 511+ ACD4 47                                   ld      b,a
 512+ ACD5 CD B6 94                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 513+ ACD8 22 E7 A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 514+ ACDB 32 E9 A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 515+ ACDE C9                                   ret
 516+ ACDF
 517+ ACDF              ;-- Now its scaled we can normalise
 518+ ACDF              ;-- Scale down so that h d &b are zero, then do once again so l e and c are 7 bit
 519+ ACDF              ;-- use 7 bit mul96 to ensure we don;t get odd maths
 520+ ACDF 2A DF A5     NormalizeTactics:       ld      hl, (TacticsVectorX)        ; pull XX15 into registers
 521+ ACE2 ED 5B E3 A5                          ld      de, (TacticsVectorY)        ; .
 522+ ACE6 ED 4B E7 A5                          ld      bc, (TacticsVectorZ)        ; .
 523+ ACEA 7C           .ScaleLoop:             ld      a,h
 524+ ACEB B2                                   or      d
 525+ ACEC B0                                   or      b
 526+ ACED 28 0F                                jr      z,.DoneScaling
 527+ ACEF                                      ShiftHLRight1
 527+ ACEF CB 3C       >			   srl h
 527+ ACF1 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 528+ ACF3                                      ShiftDERight1
 528+ ACF3 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 528+ ACF5 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 529+ ACF7                                      ShiftBCRight1
 529+ ACF7 CB 38       >			   srl b
 529+ ACF9 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 530+ ACFB C3 EA AC                             jp      .ScaleLoop
 531+ ACFE              .DoneScaling:           ShiftHLRight1                       ; as the values now need to be sign magnitued
 531+ ACFE CB 3C       >			   srl h
 531+ AD00 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 532+ AD02                                      ShiftDERight1                       ; e.g. S + 7 bit we need an extra shift
 532+ AD02 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 532+ AD04 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 533+ AD06                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ; now values are in L E C
 533+ AD06 CB 38       >			   srl b
 533+ AD08 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 534+ AD0A E5 D5 C5                             push    hl,,de,,bc                  ; save vecrtor x y and z nwo they are scaled to 1 byte
 535+ AD0D 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; hl = y(e) ^ 2
 536+ AD0E ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 537+ AD10 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; .
 538+ AD11 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; de = x(l) ^ 2
 539+ AD12 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 540+ AD14 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + de
 541+ AD15 51                                   ld      d,c                         ; de = y(c)^ 2 + x ^ 2
 542+ AD16 59                                   ld      e,c                         ; .
 543+ AD17 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 544+ AD19 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl =  y^ 2 + x ^ 2 + z ^ 2
 545+ AD1A EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; fix as hl was holding square
 546+ AD1B CD 4C 98                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; IYH = A = hl = sqrt (de) = sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 + z ^ 2)
 547+ AD1E                                      ; add in logic if h is low then use lower bytes for all
 548+ AD1E 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ;
 549+ AD1F FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ;
 550+ AD21 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; D = sqrt
 551+ AD22 C1                                   pop     bc                          ; retrive tacticsvectorz scaled
 552+ AD23 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; a = scaled byte
 553+ AD24 CD 6B 9D                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg          ; This rountine I think is wrong and retuins bad values
 554+ AD27 32 E7 A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),a          ; z = normalised z
 555+ AD2A D1                                   pop     de
 556+ AD2B 7B                                   ld      a,e
 557+ AD2C FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 558+ AD2E CD 6B 9D                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg
 559+ AD31 32 E3 A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),a
 560+ AD34 E1                                   pop     hl
 561+ AD35 7D                                   ld      a,l
 562+ AD36 FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 563+ AD38 CD 6B 9D                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg
 564+ AD3B 32 DF A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),a
 565+ AD3E                                      ; BODGE FOR NOW
 566+ AD3E                                     ; BODGE FOR NOW
 567+ AD3E                                      ZeroA                              ;; added to help debugging
 567+ AD3E AF          >                        xor a
 568+ AD3F 32 E0 A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 569+ AD42 32 E4 A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 570+ AD45 32 E8 A5                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 571+ AD48                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorX+2     ; now upper byte is sign only
 571+ AD48 3A E1 A5    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorX+2)
 571+ AD4B E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 571+ AD4D 32 E1 A5    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 572+ AD50                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorY+2     ; (could move it to lower perhaps later if
 572+ AD50 3A E5 A5    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorY+2)
 572+ AD53 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 572+ AD55 32 E5 A5    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 573+ AD58                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorZ+2     ;  its worth it)
 573+ AD58 3A E9 A5    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorZ+2)
 573+ AD5B E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 573+ AD5D 32 E9 A5    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 574+ AD60 C9                                   ret

 626+ AD61              ; also for future ship vs ship combat
 627+ AD61              ;... Tactics........................................................................
 628+ AD61              ;.PART 1
 629+ AD61              ; if shiphitbymissleflag <> false

 636+ AD61              ;                  then cause blast damage to ship

 640+ AD61              ; end if
 641+ AD61              ; if ship is a missle (I think we allow missile on missle action)
 642+ AD61              ;    then if ecm is active
 643+ AD61              ;            then destroy missile and return

 653+ AD61              ;                         end if

 659+ AD61              ;                                 if ship is not station

 661+ AD61              ;                                         set blastcheckcounter to slotlist length  (12)
 662+ AD61              ;                                 end if
 663+ AD61              ;                                 if we are in range of missle blast
 664+ AD61              ;                                    cause blast damage to our ship (this will signal death is needed)

 667+ AD61              ;                         end if
 668+ AD61              ;                 end if
 669+ AD61              ;         end if
 670+ AD61              ;.PART 2A ** adding in a collision logic
 671+ AD61              ;    else if ship is close to another ship
 672+ AD61              ;            then if docking flag set and other ship is space station or we are space station and other ship has docking flag
 673+ AD61              ;                    then if aligned correctly
 674+ AD61              ;                         then remove ship as docked
 675+ AD61              ;                              return
 676+ AD61              ;         else
 677+ AD61              ;            call collision route and determine daamage based on sizes and bounce vectors
 678+ AD61              ;            return
 679+ AD61              ;.PART 2 ** Need to check if ship has AI flag
 680+ AD61              ;    else if not hostile
 681+ AD61              ;            then if not docking or station not present
 682+ AD61              ;                    then calculate vector to planet
 683+ AD61              ;                         jump to part 7
 684+ AD61              ;                    else calculate verctor to docking slot
 685+ AD61              ;                         call caluclate vector to docking slot (DOCKIT)
 686+ AD61              ;                         jump to part 7
 687+ AD61              ;                 end if
 688+ AD61              ;            else case ship type
 689+ AD61              ;                      >>escape pod>> point at planet and jump to step 7
 690+ AD61              ;                      >>space station>> if hostile
 691+ AD61              ;                                           then if cop counter < 7 and 6.2% chance
 692+ AD61              ;                                                   then spawm hostile cop
 693+ AD61              ;                                                end if
 694+ AD61              ;                                           else
 695+ AD61              ;                                                if 0.8% change and transporter count = 0
 696+ AD61              ;                                                   then if 50% chance
 697+ AD61              ;                                                           then spawn transporter
 698+ AD61              ;                                                           else spawn shuttle
 699+ AD61              ;                                                        end if
 700+ AD61              ;                                                end if
 701+ AD61              ;                                        end if
 702+ AD61              ;                                        return
 703+ AD61              ;                      >>targoid and no mother ship in slot list>> set random drift
 704+ AD61              ;                                                                  return
 705+ AD61              ;                      >>if bounty hunter flag>> if ship not hostile
 706+ AD61              ;                                                   then if trader flag clear or 20% chance
 707+ AD61              ;                                                        then if fugitive or offender
 708+ AD61              ;                                                                then set hosile
 709+ AD61              ;                                                end if
 710+ AD61              ;                      >>Carrier and hanger slots > 0 >> if 22% chance (code to be added later)
 711+ AD61              ;                                         then spawn agressive hosting one of types carried
 712+ AD61              ;                                              reduce ships in hanger by 1
 713+ AD61              ;                                              return
 714+ AD61              ;                      >>rock hermit>> if 22% chance
 715+ AD61              ;                                         then spawn agressive hosting one of Sidewinder, Mamba, Krait, Adder or Gecko
 716+ AD61              ;                                              return
 717+ AD61              ;                      >>pirate and in safe zone>> stop pirate being hostile by removing agressive and hostileflags
 718+ AD61              ;                 end case
 719+ AD61              ;         end if
 720+ AD61              ;         recharge ship energy by recharge factor (TODO as a config item on ship type but by default 1)
 721+ AD61              ; .PART 3
 722+ AD61              ;         calulcate dot product of ship nose to us
 723+ AD61              ; .PART 4
 724+ AD61              ;         2.5% change ship rill roll a noticable amount
 725+ AD61              ;         if ship has > 50% energy jump to part 6
 726+ AD61              ;         if ship > 1/8th energy jump to part 5
 727+ AD61              ;         if random 10% chance (i.e. ship < 1/8 energy and bails out)
 728+ AD61              ;            then launch escape pod
 729+ AD61              ;                 set AI to null
 730+ AD61              ;                 set random pitch and roll
 731+ AD61              ;                 set accelleation to 0
 732+ AD61              ;         end if
 733+ AD61              ; .PART 5
 734+ AD61              ;         if ship does not have any missilesor ECM is firing to part 6
 735+ AD61              ;            then if random > threshold for ship type (TODO as a config item on ship type)
 736+ AD61              ;                    then if tharoid ; note this means thargoids are sensitve to ECM
 737+ AD61              ;                            then launch thargon
 738+ AD61              ;                            else spawn angry missle under ship
 739+ AD61              ;                         end if
 740+ AD61              ;                 end if
 741+ AD61              ;            else return
 742+ AD61              ;         end if
 743+ AD61              ; .PART 6
 744+ AD61              ;         if ship is not pointing at us from dot product ( < 160 , also > -32)
 745+ AD61              ;            then jump to part 7
 746+ AD61              ;            else if ship is pointing directly at us ( < 163 i.e. > -35)
 747+ AD61              ;                    then fire laser at us (which reduces energy)
 748+ AD61              ;                         cause laser damage to our ship (this will signal death is needed)
 749+ AD61              ;                         decellerate by half as ship has lock on
 750+ AD61              ;                         return
 751+ AD61              ;                    else fire laser into space (which reduces energy)
 752+ AD61              ;                 end if
 753+ AD61              ;         end if
 754+ AD61              ; .PART 7#
 755+ AD61              ;        if ship is a msile targetting us
 756+ AD61              ;           then ship turns towards us some more
 757+ AD61              ;           else if z hi > =  3 or ( x hi or y hi > 1) , i.e. ship is far away
 758+ AD61              ;                    then do random wiht bit 7 set
 759+ AD61              ;                         if random < AI flag
 760+ AD61              ;                            then   ship turned towards us
 761+ AD61              ;                            else   ship turns away from us
 762+ AD61              ;                         end if
 763+ AD61              ;                end if
 764+ AD61              ;           end if
 765+ AD61              ;           calculate new roll, pitch and accelleration based on new targe vector
 766+ AD61
 767+ AD61
 768+ AD61              ;        determine ship direction based on agression and type
 769+ AD61              ;        set pitch and roll coutners
 770+ AD61              ;        adjust speed depleding on relationship to us
 771+ AD61              ; .PART 8 - new
 772+ AD61              ;        if ship has ECM, another ECM is not active and missile targeted at it
 773+ AD61              ;           if ship has enery of ECM energey cost + 1/8th total
 774+ AD61              ;              if chance 25%
 775+ AD61              ;                 then fire ECM
 776+ AD61              ;
 777+ AD61
 778+ AD61
 779+ AD61
 780+ AD61
 781+ AD61 2A DF A5     ReduceTacticVectors:ld      hl, (TacticsVectorX)        ; pull XX15 into registers
 782+ AD64 ED 5B E3 A5                      ld      de, (TacticsVectorY)        ; .
 783+ AD68 ED 4B E7 A5                      ld      bc, (TacticsVectorZ)        ; .
 784+ AD6C 3A E1 A5                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorX+2)        ; .
 785+ AD6F FD 67                            ld      iyh,a                       ; iyh = X sign
 786+ AD71 3A E5 A5                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorY+2)        ; .
 787+ AD74 FD 6F                            ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = Y sign
 788+ AD76 3A E9 A5                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)        ; .
 789+ AD79 DD 67                            ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = z sign
 790+ AD7B FD B4        .ScaleLoop:         or      iyh                         ; now check if upper has value
 791+ AD7D FD B5                            or      iyl                         ; .
 792+ AD7F                                  ClearSignBitA                       ;  exluding sign bit
 792+ AD7F E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 793+ AD81 28 21                            jr      z,.DoneScaling              ; and exit loop if upper byte is only sign component
 794+ AD83 FD 7C        .ScaledDownBy2:     ld      a,iyh
 795+ AD85 CB 2F                            sra     a
 796+ AD87 FD 67                            ld      iyh,a                       ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 797+ AD89 CB 1C                            rr      h                           ; Deal with X
 798+ AD8B CB 1D                            rr      l                           ;
 799+ AD8D FD 7D                            ld      a,iyl
 800+ AD8F CB 2F                            sra     a                           ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 801+ AD91 FD 6F                            ld      iyl,a
 802+ AD93 CB 1A                            rr      d                           ; Deal with Y
 803+ AD95 CB 1B                            rr      e                           ;
 804+ AD97 DD 7D                            ld      a, ixl                      ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 805+ AD99 CB 2F                            sra     a
 806+ AD9B DD 6F                            ld      ixl,a
 807+ AD9D CB 18                            rr      b                           ; Deal with Z
 808+ AD9F CB 19                            rr      c                           ;
 809+ ADA1 C3 7B AD                         jp      .ScaleLoop
 810+ ADA4 7C           .DoneScaling:       ld      a,h
 811+ ADA5 B2                               or      d
 812+ ADA6 B0                               or      b
 813+ ADA7                                  SignBitOnlyA                        ; check if new sign bit has a value rotated in,
 813+ ADA7 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 814+ ADA9 28 0C                            jr      z,.OKToNormalise
 815+ ADAB              .ShiftTo15Bit:      ShiftHLRight1                       ; one last shift to 15 bit we don't need
 815+ ADAB CB 3C       >			   srl h
 815+ ADAD CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 816+ ADAF                                  ShiftDERight1                       ; to do sign bytes
 816+ ADAF CB 3A       >			   srl d
 816+ ADB1 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 817+ ADB3                                  ShiftBCRight1                       ; as value must be 0
 817+ ADB3 CB 38       >			   srl b
 817+ ADB5 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 818+ ADB7 7C           .OKToNormalise:     ld      a,h                         ; iyh now can only hold sign
 819+ ADB8 FD B4                            or      iyh                         ; so by the end of here
 820+ ADBA 67                               ld      h,a                         ;   hl = x
 821+ ADBB 7A                               ld      a,d                         ;   de = y
 822+ ADBC FD B5                            or      iyl                         ;   bc = z
 823+ ADBE 57                               ld      d,a                         ; all scaled to 15 bit + sign
 824+ ADBF 78                               ld      a,b                         ;
 825+ ADC0 DD B4                            or      ixh                         ;
 826+ ADC2 47                               ld      b,a                         ;
 827+ ADC3 22 EF A5                         ld      (TacticsNormX),hl
 828+ ADC6 22 F3 A5                         ld      (TacticsNormY),hl
 829+ ADC9 22 F7 A5                         ld      (TacticsNormZ),hl
 830+ ADCC C9                               ret
 831+ ADCD                                 ; ***SIgn bits*** need to be in byte 3
 832+ ADCD
# file closed: ./GameEngine/Tactics.asm

  21+ ADCD              ; Success 1 = default drive, carry reset
  22+ ADCD              ; Failure HL = -1 , carry set, errno set
  23+ ADCD F5 C5 D5 E5  GetDefaultDrive:        push	af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  23+ ADD1 DD E5
  24+ ADD3 AF                                   xor	    a	; a = 0 means get default drive into A
  25+ ADD4 CF                                   rst	    $08
  26+ ADD5 89                                   db	    M_GETSETDRV
  27+ ADD6 32 6B AE                             ld	    (DefaultDrive),a
  28+ ADD9 DD E1 E1 D1                          pop		af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  28+ ADDD C1 F1
  29+ ADDF C9                                   ret

 191+ ADEE              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 192+ ADEE              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
 193+ ADEE              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
 194+ ADEE              ;			bc  = amount to read
 195+ ADEE              ;	ret:		carry set = error
 196+ ADEE              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 197+ ADEE B7           fRead:                  or   	a             ; is it zero?
 198+ ADEF C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 199+ ADF0 E5                                   push    hl
 200+ ADF1 DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix    	 ; load ix into hl and save hl for later
 201+ ADF4 CF                                   rst	    $08
 202+ ADF5 9D                                   db	    F_READ
 203+ ADF6 E1                                   pop	    hl
 204+ ADF7 C9                                   ret
 205+ ADF8
 206+ ADF8              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 207+ ADF8              ;	Function	Write bytes to the open file
 208+ ADF8              ;	In:		ix  = address to read from
 209+ ADF8              ;			bc  = amount to write
 210+ ADF8              ;	ret:		carry set = error
 211+ ADF8              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 212+ ADF8 B7           fWrite:                 or   	a             ; is it zero?
 213+ ADF9 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 214+ ADFA E5                                   push	hl
 215+ ADFB DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix
 216+ ADFE CF                                   rst	    $08
 217+ ADFF 9E                                   db	    F_WRITE
 218+ AE00 E1                                   pop	    hl
 219+ AE01 C9                                   ret
 220+ AE02
 221+ AE02              ; *******************************************************************************************************

 223+ AE02              ;	In:		a  = handle

 225+ AE02              ; *******************************************************************************************************

 267+ AE14              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 268+ AE14              ; Function:	Load a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 269+ AE14              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
 270+ AE14              ;		    ix = address to load to
 271+ AE14              ;           bc = filelength
 272+ AE14              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 273+ AE14 CD CD AD     FileLoad:	            call    GetDefaultDrive
 274+ AE17 C5 D5 F5                             push	bc,,de,,af
 275+ AE1A                                      ; get file size
 276+ AE1A C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix			; store size, load address,
 277+ AE1D E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl
 278+ AE20 06 01                                ld      b,FA_READ		; mode open for reading
 279+ AE22 CD E0 AD                             call    fOpen
 280+ AE25 38 17                                jr	    c,.error_opening; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 281+ AE27 FE 00                                cp	    0				; was file handle 0?
 282+ AE29 28 13                                jr	    z,.error_opening; of so there was an error opening.
 283+ AE2B DD E1 C1                             pop     bc,,ix          ; get load address back and size back
 284+ AE2E F5                                   push	af				; remember handle
 285+ AE2F CD EE AD                             call	fRead			; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 286+ AE32 38 0C                                jr	    c,.error_reading
 287+ AE34 F1                                   pop	    af			    ; get handle back
 288+ AE35 CD 02 AE                             call	fClose			; close file
 289+ AE38 38 07                                jr	    c,.error_closing
 290+ AE3A F1 D1 C1                             pop     bc,,de,,af      ; normal exit
 291+ AE3D C9                                   ret
 292+ AE3E              ;
 293+ AE3E              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 294+ AE3E              ;
 295+ AE3E DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 296+ AE40 C1           .error_reading:		    pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 297+ AE41
 298+ AE41              .error_closing:
 299+ AE41 C1           .NormalError:  	        pop	bc	; don't pop into A, return with error code
 300+ AE42 D1                                   pop	de
 301+ AE43 C1                                   pop	bc
 302+ AE44 C9                                   ret
 303+ AE45
 304+ AE45              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 305+ AE45              ; Function:	Save a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 306+ AE45              ; In:		hl = file name
 307+ AE45              ;		    ix = address to save from
 308+ AE45              ;		    bc = size
 309+ AE45              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 310+ AE45 CD CD AD     FileSave:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 311+ AE48 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix   			; store size& save address
 312+ AE4B E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl               ; get name into ix
 313+ AE4E 06 0C                                ld      b,FA_OVERWRITE		; mode open for writing
 314+ AE50 CD E0 AD                             call    fOpen
 315+ AE53 38 12                                jr	    c,.error_opening	; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 316+ AE55 FE 00                                cp	    0			        ; was file handle 0?
 317+ AE57 28 0E                                jr	    z,.error_opening	; of so there was an error opening.
 318+ AE59 DD E1 C1                             pop	    bc,,ix			    ; get lenght and save address back
 319+ AE5C F5                                   push	af			        ; remember handle
 320+ AE5D CD F8 AD                             call	fWrite			    ; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 321+ AE60 38 04                                jr	c,.error
 322+ AE62 F1                                   pop	af			            ; get handle back
 323+ AE63 CD 02 AE                             call	fClose			    ; close file
 324+ AE66 C9           .error:                 ret
 325+ AE67              ;
 326+ AE67              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 327+ AE67              ;
 328+ AE67 DD E1 C1     .error_opening:         pop	bc,,ix                  ; don't pop a, need error code
 329+ AE6A C9                                   ret
 330+ AE6B
 331+ AE6B 00           DefaultDrive:	        DB	0
 332+ AE6C 00           FileHandle:             DB  0
 333+ AE6D 00           CardFlags               DB  0
 334+ AE6E 00 00        TargetSize              DW  0
 335+ AE70 00 00        FileStreamPort          DW  0
 336+ AE72 00 00 00...  FileBuffer              DS  512                     ; block of data
 337+ B072 00           FilereadsPerformed      DB  0
 338+ B073 00 00        FilemapBlockCount       DW  0
 339+ B075 00 00        FilemapBufferPointer    DW  0
 340+ B077 00 00        FilemapBufferLast       DW  0
 341+ B079 00 00 00...  FilemapBuffer           DS  FILEMAP_BLOCK_SIZE * FILEMAP_SIZE        ; expecting 60 to be overkill as most should be 1
 342+ B139
# file closed: ./Hardware/drive_access.asm

  17+ B1E6              txt_status_colour		equ $FF
  18+ B1E6
  19+ B1E6              print_boiler_text_l2:
  20+ B1E6              ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  21+ B1E6              BoilerTextLoop:
  22+ B1E6 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  23+ B1E7 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  24+ B1E8 23           	inc			hl
  25+ B1E9 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  26+ B1EA 23           	inc			hl
  27+ B1EB 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  28+ B1EC 23           	inc			hl
  29+ B1ED 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  30+ B1EE 23           	inc			hl
  31+ B1EF E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  32+ B1F0 EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  33+ B1F1 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  34+ B1F3                  MMUSelectLayer2
  34+ B1F3 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  35+ B1F7 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  36+ B1FA E1           	pop			hl
  37+ B1FB C1           	pop			bc
  38+ B1FC 10 E8        	djnz		BoilerTextLoop
  39+ B1FE C9           	ret
  40+ B1FF
  41+ B1FF
  42+ B1FF              print_boiler_text:
  43+ B1FF              ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  44+ B1FF              .BoilerTextLoop:
  45+ B1FF C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  46+ B200 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  47+ B201 23           	inc			hl
  48+ B202 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  49+ B203 23           	inc			hl
  50+ B204 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  51+ B205 23           	inc			hl
  52+ B206 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  53+ B207 23           	inc			hl
  54+ B208 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  55+ B209 EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  56+ B20A 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  57+ B20C C5           	push		bc

  59+ B20E CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
