 514+ C816
 515+ C816                                      include "Universe/Ships/InitialiseOrientation.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/InitialiseOrientation.asm
   1++C816              ;  sidev = (1,  0,  0)  sidev = (&6000, 0, 0)
   2++C816              ;  roofv = (0,  1,  0)  roofv = (0, &6000, 0)
   3++C816              ;  nosev = (0,  0, -1)  nosev = (0, 0, &E000)   E000 = SignBit[96]
   4++C816              InitialiseOrientation:
   5++C816 21 00 00     ZI1:                    ld      hl, 0
   6++C819 22 2B C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY),hl                ; set the zeroes
   7++C81C 22 2D C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),hl                ; set the zeroes
   8++C81F 22 2F C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),hl                ; set the zeroes
   9++C822 22 33 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ),hl                ; set the zeroes
  10++C825 22 35 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevX),hl                ; set the zeroes
  11++C828 22 37 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevY),hl                ; set the zeroes
  12++C82B 21 00 60                             ld      hl, $6000					; 96 in hi byte
  13++C82E                                      ;ld      hl,1
  14++C82E 22 29 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX),hl
  15++C831 22 31 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),hl
  16++C834 21 00 E0                             ld      hl, $E000					; -96 in hi byte which is +96 with hl bit 7 set
  17++C837 22 39 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevZ),hl
  18++C83A C9                                   ret
  19++C83B
  20++C83B              InitialisePlayerMissileOrientation:
  21++C83B CD 16 C8                             call    InitialiseOrientation
  22++C83E 21 00 60                             ld      hl,$6000
  23++C841 22 39 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevZ),hl           ; mius
  24++C844 C9                                   ret
  25++C845
  26++C845
  27++C845              ;  sidev = (1,  0,  0)  sidev = (&6000, 0, 0)
  28++C845              ;  roofv = (0,  1,  0)  roofv = (0, &6000, 0)
  29++C845              ;  nosev = (-0,  -0, 1) nosev = (0, 0, &6000)
  30++C845 CD 16 C8     LaunchedOrientation:    call    InitialiseOrientation
  31++C848                                      FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevX+1;  as its 0 flipping will make no difference
  31++C848 3A 36 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
  31++C84B EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
  31++C84D 32 36 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX+1),a
  32++C850                                      FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevY+1;  as its 0 flipping will make no difference
  32++C850 3A 38 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
  32++C853 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
  32++C855 32 38 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
  33++C858                                      FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1
  33++C858 3A 3A C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
  33++C85B EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
  33++C85D 32 3A C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1),a
  34++C860 C9                                   ret
  35++C861
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/InitialiseOrientation.asm
 516+ C861
 517+ C861              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 518+ C861              ;OrientateVertex:
 519+ C861              ;                      [ sidev_x sidev_y sidev_z ]   [ x ]
 520+ C861              ;  projected [x y z] = [ roofv_x roofv_y roofv_z ] . [ y ]
 521+ C861              ;                      [ nosev_x nosev_y nosev_z ]   [ z ]
 522+ C861              ;
 523+ C861
 524+ C861              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 525+ C861              ;TransposeVertex:
 526+ C861              ;                      [ sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x ]   [ x ]
 527+ C861              ;  projected [x y z] = [ sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y ] . [ y ]
 528+ C861              ;                      [ sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z ]   [ z ]
 529+ C861              ; VectorToVertex:
 530+ C861              ;                     [ sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x ]   [ x ]   [ x ]
 531+ C861              ;  vector to vertex = [ sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y ] . [ y ] + [ y ]
 532+ C861              ;                     [ sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z ]   [ z ]   [ z ]
 533+ C861              ;INPUTS:    bhl = dividend  cde = divisor where b and c are sign bytes
 534+ C861              ;OUTPUTS:   cahl = quotient cde = divisor
 535+ C861              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 536+ C861                                      include "./ModelRender/EraseOldLines-EE51.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/EraseOldLines-EE51.asm
   1++C861              ;
   2++C861              ; EraseOldLines:
   3++C861              ;	Loop from 0 to UbnKEdgeHeapCounter (note this should be 4 * actual nbr of lines)
   4++C861              ;		draw line (black) UBnkLinesArray[0,1]+Loop to [2,3]+loop
   5++C861              ;	 	loop + 4
   6++C861              ; Return
   7++C861
   8++C861              EraseOldLines:
   9++C861              EE51:										; if bit3 set draw lines in XX19 heap
  10++C861              	ReturnOnMemBitClear UBnKexplDsp,3       ; bit 3 denotes that there is nothing to erase as its already done
  10++C861 3A 51 C0    >                        ld     a,(UBnKexplDsp)
  10++C864 CB 5F       >                        bit 	3,a
  10++C866 C8          >                        ret		z
  11++C867 CB DF        	set		3,a
  12++C869 32 51 C0     	ld		(UBnKexplDsp),a  				; else toggle bit3 to allow lines (set will do as its 0 by now)
  13++C86C C3 5D EB     	jp		clearLines						; LL115	clear LINEstr. Draw lines in XX19 heap.  - note its an & not direct
  14++C86F              ; We use the ret from the clearLines so not needed here
  15++C86F
# file closed: ././ModelRender/EraseOldLines-EE51.asm

   1++C86F              ;TrimToScreenGrad:

  14++C86F              ;85 36                   STA &36			 \ XX15+2
  15++C86F              ;98                      TYA 			 \ step Y1 hi
  16++C86F              ;65 37                   ADC &37		\ XX15+3 \ Y1 hi
  17++C86F              ;85 37                   STA &37			 \ XX15+3
  18++C86F              ;A9 00                   LDA #0			 \ xleft min
  19++C86F              ;85 34                   STA &34		\ XX15+0 \ X1 lo

  27++C86F              ;8A                      TXA 			 \ step Y1 lo
  28++C86F              ;18                      CLC
  29++C86F              ;65 36                   ADC &36		\ XX15+2 \ Y1 lo
  30++C86F              ;85 36                   STA &36			 \ XX15+2
  31++C86F              ;98                      TYA 			 \ step Y1 hi
  32++C86F              ;65 37                   ADC &37		\ XX15+3 \ Y1 hi
  33++C86F              ;85 37                   STA &37			 \ XX15+3
  34++C86F              ;A2 FF                   LDX #&FF		 \ xright max
  35++C86F              ;86 34                   STX &34		\ XX15+0 \ X1 lo
  36++C86F              ;E8                      INX 			 \ X = 0

  33++C897 20 0A                                jr      nz, .LL107

  39++C8A3              ; so XX13 = 0 if x2_hi = y2_hi = 0, y2_lo is on-screen,  XX13 = 191 if x2_hi or y2_hi are non-zero or y2_lo is off the bottom of the screen
  40++C8A3 FD 7C        .LL107                  ld      a,iyh

  44++C8AA 20 27                                jr      nz,.LL83                    ;

  46++C8AD ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; i.e  screen height < y1)
  47++C8B0 20 21                                jr      nz,.LL83

  50++C8B4 FE 00                                cp      0
  51++C8B6 20 15                                jr      nz, .LL108
  52++C8B8              ; Finished clipping exit point ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  53++C8B8 79           .ClipDone:              ld      a,c                         ; LL146 (Clip Done)               Y1 = y1 lo, x2 = x2 lo, x1 = x1 lo y1 = y1 lo                                   -- Nothing off screen
  54++C8B9 32 A7 C0                             ld      (UBnkNewY1),a
  55++C8BC DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl

  61++C8C9 B7          >                        or a

  63++C8CB              ; Finished out of bounds exit point -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  64++C8CB 37           .PointsOutofBounds:     scf                                 ; LL109 (ClipFailed) carry flag set as not visible

  66++C8CD FD 7C        .LL108:                 ld      a,iyh

  70++C8D3 FD 7C        .LL83:                  ld      a,iyh                       ; (Line On screen Test)      if XX13 < 128 then only 1 point is on screen so goto LL115                      -- We only need to deal with X2Y2
  71++C8D5 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ;
  72++C8D8 28 28                                jr      z, .LL115                   ;
  73++C8DA 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; If both x1_hi and x2_hi have bit 7 set, jump to LL109  to return from the subroutine with the C flag set, as the entire line is above the top of the screen
  74++C8DB A2                                   and     d
  75++C8DC                                      JumpIfNegative  .PointsOutofBounds
  75++C8DC FA CB C8    >                        jp		m, .PointsOutofBounds
  76++C8DF 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; If both y1_hi and y2_hi have bit 7 set, jump to LL109  to return from the subroutine with the C flag set, as the entire line is above the top of the screen
  77++C8E0 DD A4                                and     ixh

  80++C8E6 3D                                   dec     a

  85++C8ED F2 CB C8    >                        jp		p, .PointsOutofBounds

  99++C902              .LL115:                 ClearCarryFlag

 100++C903 E5 D5        .CalcDX:                push    hl,,de
 101++C905 EB                                   ex      hl,de                       ; so hl is x2 and de = x1

 105++C90C 32 71 C8                             ld      (clipDxHighNonABS),a

 111++C91A 7C           .CalcQuadrant:          ld      a,h
 112++C91B 32 73 C8                             ld      (clipDyHigh),a              ; so A = sign of deltay in effect
 113++C91E              ;So we now have delta_x in XX12(3 2), delta_y in XX12(5 4)  where the delta is (x1, y1) - (x2, y2))

 115++C921 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; now a = sign dx xor sign dy

 122++C934                                      macronegate16de                     ; Otherwise flip the sign of delta_y to make it  positive, starting with the low bytes

 122++C939 57          >                    ld 		d,a

 126++C944 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; is it a negative X

 128++C949                                      ;ld      hl,(clipDx)                 ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 commented out
 129++C949                                      macronegate16hl                     ; Otherwise flip the sign of delta_y to make it  positive, starting with the low bytes
 129++C949 AF          >					xor 	a
 129++C94A 95          >					sub 	l
 129++C94B 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 129++C94C 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 129++C94D 94          >					sub 	h
 129++C94E 67          >					ld 		h,a
 130++C94F              .LL111:
 131++C94F 7C           .ScaleLoop:             ld      a,h                         ; At this point DX and DY are ABS values
 132++C950 B2                                   or      d
 133++C951 28 0A                                jr      z,.CalculateDelta
 134++C953                                      ShiftDERight1
 134++C953 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 134++C955 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 135++C957                                      ShiftHLRight1
 135++C957 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 135++C959 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 136++C95B 18 F2                                jr      .ScaleLoop                  ; scaled down Dx and Dy to 8 bit, Dy may have been negative
 137++C95D              .CalculateDelta:
 138++C95D              ; By now, the high bytes of both |delta_x| and |delta_y| are zero We know that h and d are both = 0 as that's what we tested with a BEQ
 139++C95D AF           .LL113:                 xor     a
 140++C95E 32 91 84                             ld      (varT),a                    ; t = 0
 141++C961 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; If delta_x_lo < delta_y_lo, so our line is more vertical than horizontal, jump to LL114
 142++C962                                      JumpIfALTNusng  e, .LL114           ;
 142++C962 BB          >                        cp      e
 142++C963 DA 73 C9    >                        jp		c, .LL114
 143++C966              ; Here Dx >= Dy sp calculate Delta Y / delta X
 144++C966 32 73 84     .DxGTEDy:               ld      (varQ),a                    ; Set Q = delta_x_lo
 145++C969 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; d = also Q for calc
 146++C96A 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; Set A = delta_y_lo
 147++C96B CD 49 99                             call    AEquAmul256DivD; LL28Amul256DivD             ; Call LL28 to calculate:  R (actually a reg) = 256 * A / Q   = 256 * delta_y_lo / delta_x_lo
 148++C96E 32 74 84                             ld      (varR),a                    ;
 149++C971 18 10                                jr      .LL116                      ; Jump to LL116, as we now have the line's gradient in R
 150++C973              ; Here Delta Y > Delta X so calulate delta X / delta Y
 151++C973 7B           .LL114:                 ld      a,e                         ; Set Q = delta_y_lo
 152++C974 57                                   ld      d,a
 153++C975 32 73 84                             ld      (varQ),a
 154++C978 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; Set A = delta_x_lo
 155++C979 CD 49 99                             call    AEquAmul256DivD; LL28Amul256DivD             ; Call LL28 to calculate: R = 256 * A / Q  = 256 * delta_x_lo / delta_y_lo
 156++C97C 32 74 84                             ld      (varR),a                    ;
 157++C97F 21 91 84                             ld      hl,varT                     ; T was set to 0 above, so this sets T = &FF

 159++C983 D1           .LL116:                 pop     de                          ; get back X2
 160++C984 E1                                   pop     hl                          ; get back X1 into hl,
 161++C985 3A 74 84                             ld      a,(varR)                    ; Store the gradient in XX12+2 this can be optimised later
 162++C988 32 74 C8                             ld      (clipGradient),a
 163++C98B FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 164++C98D 3A 75 84                             ld      a,(varS)
 165++C990 32 75 C8                             ld      (clipDxySign),a             ;  Store the type of slope in XX12+3, bit 7 clear means ?Not needed as clipDxySign is used for varS earlier?
 166++C993                                                                          ; top left to bottom right, bit 7 set means top right to bottom left **CODE IS WRONG HERE A TEST IS BL to TR
 167++C993 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                       ; iyh was XX13 from earlier
 168++C995 FE 00                                cp      0                           ; If XX13 = 0, skip the following instruction
 169++C997 28 05                                jr      z,.LL138                    ;
 170++C999 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; If XX13 is positive, it must be 95. This means (x1, y1) is on-screen but (x2, y2) isn't, so we jump to LLX117 to swap the (x1, y1) and (x2, y2)
 171++C99C 28 13                                jr      z,.LLX117                   ; coordinates around before doing the actual clipping, because we need to clip (x2, y2) but the clipping routine at LL118 only clips (x1, y1)
 172++C99E              ; If we get here, XX13 = 0 or 191, so (x1, y1) is off-screen and needs clipping
 173++C99E CD C5 C9     .LL138                  call    ClipPointHLBC               ; Call LL118 to move (x1, y1) along the line onto the screen, i.e. clip the line at the (x1, y1) end
 174++C9A1 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                       ; If XX13 = 0, i.e. (x2, y2) is on-screen, jump down to LL124 to return with a successfully clipped line
 175++C9A3 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 176++C9A6 28 1A                                jr      z,.LL124
 177++C9A8              ; If we get here, XX13 = 191 (both coordinates are off-screen)
 178++C9A8 7C           .LL117:                 ld      a,h                         ; If either of x1_hi or y1_hi are non-zero, jump to
 179++C9A9 B0                                   or      b                           ; LL137 to return from the subroutine with the C flag
 180++C9AA C2 CB C8                             jp      nz, .PointsOutofBounds      ; set, as the line doesn't fit on-screen
 181++C9AD B1                                   or      c                           ; if x1 and y1 hi are both zero test bit 8 or Y1 to see if its > 128
 182++C9AE FA CB C8                             jp      m, .PointsOutofBounds       ; set, as the line doesn't fit on-screen
 183++C9B1              ; If we get here, XX13 = 95 or 191, and in both cases (x2, y2) is off-screen, so we now need to swap the (x1, y1) and (x2, y2) coordinates around before doing
 184++C9B1              ; the actual clipping, because we need to clip (x2, y2) but the clipping routine at LL118 only clips (x1, y1)
 185++C9B1 EB           .LLX117:                ex      de,hl                       ;  swap X1 and X2
 186++C9B2 DD E5                                push    ix                          ;  swap Y1 and Y2
 187++C9B4 C5                                   push    bc
 188++C9B5 DD E1                                pop     ix
 189++C9B7 C1                                   pop     bc
 190++C9B8 CD C5 C9                             call    ClipPointHLBC               ;  Call LL118 to move (x1, y1) along the line onto the screen, i.e. clip the line at the (x1, y1) end
 191++C9BB 3A 78 C8                             ld      a,(SWAP)
 192++C9BE 3D                                   dec     a
 193++C9BF 32 78 C8                             ld      (SWAP),a                    ; Set SWAP = &FF to indicate that we just clipped the line at the (x2, y2) end by swapping the coordinates (the DEC does this as we set SWAP to 0 at the start of this subroutine)
 194++C9C2 C3 B8 C8     .LL124:                 jp      .ClipDone                    ; now put points in place
 195++C9C5
 196++C9C5              ; Move a point along a line until it is on-screen point is held in HL(X) BC(Y) LL118
 197++C9C5              ; iyh still holds XX13 iyl still holds gradient
 198++C9C5 7C           ClipPointHLBC:          ld      a,h                         ; If x1_hi is positive, jump down to LL119 to skip the following
 199++C9C6 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 200++C9C9 28 17                                jr      z,.LL119
 201++C9CB 32 75 84     .X1isNegative:          ld      (varS),a                    ;  Otherwise x1_hi is negative, i.e. off the left of the screen, so set S = x1_hi
 202++C9CE E5 D5 C5                             push    hl,,de,,bc
 203++C9D1 CD 47 CA                             call    LL120                       ;  Call LL120 to calculate:   (Y X) = (S x1_lo) * XX12+2      if T = 0   = x1 * gradient
 204++C9D4                                                                          ;                             (Y X) = (S x1_lo) / XX12+2      if T <> 0  = x1 / gradient
 205++C9D4                                                                          ;  with the sign of (Y X) set to the opposite of the line's direction of slope
 206++C9D4 C1 D1 E1                             pop    hl,,de,,bc                   ;  get coordinates back
 207++C9D7 2A 79 C8                             ld      hl,(varYX)
 208++C9DA 09                                   add     hl,bc                       ; y1 = y1 + varYX
 209++C9DB 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
 210++C9DD 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0                        ; Set x1 = 0
 211++C9E0 18 1A                               jr      .LL134                      ; in BBC is set x to 0 to force jump, we will just jump
 212++C9E2 FE 00        .LL119:                 cp      0
 213++C9E4 28 16                                jr      z,.LL134                    ;  If x1_hi = 0 then jump down to LL134 to skip the following, as the x-coordinate is already on-screen (as 0 <= (x_hi x_lo) <= 255)
 214++C9E6 3D                                   dec     a
 215++C9E7 32 75 84                             ld      (varS),a                    ;  Otherwise x1_hi is positive, i.e. x1 >= 256 and off the right side of the screen, so set S = x1_hi - 1
 216++C9EA E5 D5 C5                             push    hl,,de,,bc
 217++C9ED CD 47 CA                             call    LL120                      ;  Call LL120 to calculate: (Y X) = (S x1_lo) * XX12+2      if T = 0  = (x1 - 256) * gradient
 218++C9F0                                                                          ;                           (Y X) = (S x1_lo) / XX12+2      if T <> 0 = (x1 - 256) / gradient
 219++C9F0                                                                          ;  with the sign of (Y X) set to the opposite of theline's direction of slope
 220++C9F0 C1 D1 E1                             pop     hl,,de,,bc
 221++C9F3 2A 79 C8                             ld      hl,(varYX)
 222++C9F6 09                                   add     hl,bc                        ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 simplfied post debug
 223++C9F7 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl                        ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 simplfied post debug
 224++C9F9 21 FF 00                             ld      hl,255                      ; Set x1 = 255
 225++C9FC              ; We have moved the point so the x-coordinate is on screen (i.e. in the range 0-255), so now for they-coordinate
 226++C9FC 78           .LL134:                 ld      a,b                         ; If y1_hi is positive, jump down to LL135  to skip the following
 227++C9FD ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ;
 228++CA00 28 1A                                jr      z,.LL135                    ;
 229++CA02 32 75 84                             ld      (varS),a                    ; Otherwise y1_hi is negative, i.e. off the top of the screen, so set S = y1_hi
 230++CA05 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; Set R = y1_lo
 231++CA06 32 74 84                             ld      (varR),a                    ;
 232++CA09 E5 D5 C5                             push    hl,,de,,bc
 233++CA0C CD A8 CA                             call    LL123                       ;  Call LL123 to calculate: (Y X) = (S R) / XX12+2      if T = 0  = y1 / gradient
 234++CA0F                                                                          ;                           (Y X) = (S R) * XX12+2      if T <> 0 = y1 * gradient
 235++CA0F                                                                          ;  with the sign of (Y X) set to the opposite of the line's direction of slope
 236++CA0F C1 D1 E1                             pop     hl,,de,,bc
 237++CA12 D5                                   push    de
 238++CA13 EB                                   ex      hl,de                       ; de = x1
 239++CA14 2A 79 C8                             ld      hl,(varYX)                  ; hl = varYX
 240++CA17 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; we don't need to swap back as its an add, Set x1 = x1 + (Y X)
 241++CA18 D1                                   pop     de                          ; de = x2 again
 242++CA19 01 00 00                             ld      bc,0                        ; Set y1 = 0
 243++CA1C 79           .LL135:                 ld      a,c                         ; if bc < 128 then no work to do
 244++CA1D E6 80                                and     $80
 245++CA1F B0                                   or      b                           ; here we see if c bit 8 is set or anything in b as we know if its 0 this would mean there is no need to clip
 246++CA20 C8                                   ret     z
 247++CA21 E5                                   push    hl
 248++CA22 60 69                                ld      hl,bc
 249++CA24 01 80 00                             ld      bc,128
 250++CA27 B7                                   or      a
 251++CA28 ED 42                                sbc     hl,bc                       ; hl =  (S R) = (y1_hi y1_lo) - 128
 252++CA2A 22 74 84                             ld      (varRS), hl                 ; and now RS (or SR)
 253++CA2D 7C                                   ld      a,h
 254++CA2E E1                                   pop     hl
 255++CA2F ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; If the subtraction underflowed, i.e. if y1 < 192, then y1 is already on-screen, so jump to LL136 to return from the subroutine, as we are done
 256++CA32 C0                                   ret     nz
 257++CA33              ; If we get here then y1 >= 192, i.e. off the bottom of the screen
 258++CA33 E5 D5 C5     .LL139:                 push    hl,,de,,bc
 259++CA36 CD A8 CA                             call    LL123                       ;  Call LL123 to calculate: (Y X) = (S R) / XX12+2      if T = 0  = y1 / gradient
 260++CA39                                                                          ;                           (Y X) = (S R) * XX12+2      if T <> 0 = y1 * gradient
 261++CA39                                                                          ;  with the sign of (Y X) set to the opposite of the line's direction of slope
 262++CA39 C1 D1 E1                             pop     hl,,de,,bc
 263++CA3C D5                                   push    de
 264++CA3D EB                                   ex      hl,de
 265++CA3E 2A 79 C8                             ld      hl,(varYX)
 266++CA41 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; we don't need to swap back as its an add, Set x1 = x1 + (Y X)
 267++CA42 01 7F 00                             ld      bc,127                      ; set bc to 127 bottom of screen
 268++CA45 D1                                   pop     de
 269++CA46 C9           .LL136:                 ret                                 ;  Return from the subroutine
 270++CA47
 271++CA47
 272++CA47              ; Calculate the following:   * If T = 0  (more vertical than horizontal), (Y X) = (S x1_lo) * XX12+2
 273++CA47              ;                            * If T <> 0 (more horizontal than vertical), (Y X) = (S x1_lo) / XX12+2
 274++CA47              ;                              giving (Y X) the opposite sign to the slope direction in XX12+3.
 275++CA47              ; Other entry points        LL122                Calculate (Y X) = (S R) * Q and set the sign to the opposite of the top byte on the stack
 276++CA47 7D           LL120:                  ld      a,l                          ; Set R = x1_lo
 277++CA48 32 74 84                             ld      (varR),a
 278++CA4B CD 05 CB                             call    LL129                        ;  Call LL129 to do the following:  Q = XX12+2   = line gradient  A = S EOR XX12+3 = S EOR slope direction (S R) = |S R| So A contains the sign of S * slope direction
 279++CA4E F5                                   push    af                           ;  Store A on the stack so we can use it later
 280++CA4F C5                                   push    bc
 281++CA50 47                                   ld      b,a
 282++CA51 3A 91 84                             ld      a,(varT)                     ; instead : (Y X) = (S R ) / Q
 283++CA54 FE 00                                cp      0
 284++CA56 78                                   ld      a,b
 285++CA57 C1                                   pop     bc                           ; we can't use af as that would disrupt the flags
 286++CA58 C2 6F CA                             jp      nz, .LL121
 287++CA5B              ; The following calculates:  (Y X) = (S R) * Q using the same shift-and-add algorithm that's documented in MULT1
 288++CA5B 3A 74 C8     .LL122:                  ld      a,(clipGradient)
 289++CA5E 32 73 84                             ld      (varQ),a; optimise
 290++CA61 CD A4 96                             call    HLequSRmulQdiv256
 291++CA64 22 79 C8                             ld      (varYX),hl
 292++CA67 F1                                   pop     af
 293++CA68 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 294++CA6B CA 9B CA                             jp      z,.LL133
 295++CA6E C9                                   ret
 296++CA6F 11 FE FF     .LL121:                  ld      de,$FFFE                    ; set XY to &FFFE at start, de holds XY
 297++CA72 2A 74 84                             ld      hl,(varRS)                  ; hl = RS
 298++CA75 3A 73 84                             ld      a,(varQ)
 299++CA78 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; b = q
 300++CA79              .LL130:                 ShiftHLLeft1                        ; RS *= 2
 300++CA79 CB 25       >			   sla l
 300++CA7B CB 14       >			   rl  h
 301++CA7D 7C                                   ld      a,h
 302++CA7E 38 04                                jr      c,.LL131                    ; if S overflowed skip Q test and do subtractions
 303++CA80                                      JumpIfALTNusng b, .LL132            ; if S <  Q = 256/gradient skip subtractions
 303++CA80 B8          >                        cp      b
 303++CA81 DA 8C CA    >                        jp		c, .LL132
 304++CA84 3F           .LL131:                 ccf                                 ; compliment carry
 305++CA85 98                                   sbc     a,b                         ; q
 306++CA86 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; h (s)
 307++CA87 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; r
 308++CA88 DE 00                                sbc     a,0                         ; 0 - so in effect SR - Q*256
 309++CA8A 37                                   scf                                 ; set carry for next rolls
 310++CA8B 3F                                   ccf
 311++CA8C              .LL132:                 RollDELeft1                         ; Rotate de bits left
 311++CA8C CB 13       >               rl  e
 311++CA8E CB 12       >               rl  d
 312++CA90 38 E7                                jr      c,.LL130                    ;
 313++CA92 ED 53 79 C8                          ld      (varYX),de
 314++CA96 F1                                   pop     af              ; get back sign
 315++CA97 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 316++CA9A C8                                   ret     z               ; if negative then return with value as is reversed sign
 317++CA9B 2A 79 C8     .LL133:                 ld      hl,(varYX)      ; may not actually need this?
 318++CA9E                                      NegHL
 318++CA9E AF          >                    xor a
 318++CA9F 95          >                    sub l
 318++CAA0 6F          >                    ld l,a
 318++CAA1 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 318++CAA2 94          >                    sub h
 318++CAA3 67          >                    ld h,a
 319++CAA4 22 79 C8                             ld      (varYX),hl
 320++CAA7 C9           .LL128:                 ret
 321++CAA8
 322++CAA8
 323++CAA8
 324++CAA8
 325++CAA8              ; Calculate the following: * If T = 0,  calculate (Y X) = (S R) / XX12+2 (actually SR & XX12+2 /256)
 326++CAA8              ;                          * If T <> 0, calculate (Y X) = (S R) * XX12+2
 327++CAA8              ;                          giving (Y X) the opposite sign to the slope direction in XX12+3.
 328++CAA8              ;
 329++CAA8              ; Other entry points:      LL121                Calculate (Y X) = (S R) / Q and set the sign to the opposite of the top byte on the stack
 330++CAA8              ;                          LL133                Negate (Y X) and return from the subroutine
 331++CAA8              ;                          LL128                Contains an RTS
 332++CAA8 CD 05 CB     LL123:                  call    LL129                       ; Call LL129 to do the following: Q = XX12+2   = line gradient  A = S EOR XX12+3 = S EOR slope direction (S R) = |S R| So A contains the sign of S * slope direction
 333++CAAB F5                                   push    af                          ; Store A on the stack so we can use it later
 334++CAAC C5                                   push    bc                          ; If T is non-zero, so it's more horizontal than vertical, jump down to LL121 to calculate this
 335++CAAD 47                                   ld      b,a
 336++CAAE 3A 91 84                             ld      a,(varT)                    ; instead : (Y X) = (S R) * Q *** this looks to be the wrong way roudn for Y!!!!
 337++CAB1 FE 00                                cp      0
 338++CAB3 78                                   ld      a,b
 339++CAB4 C1                                   pop     bc
 340++CAB5 C2 F1 CA                             jp      nz, .LL122
 341++CAB8              ; The following calculates: (Y X) = (S R) / Q using the same shift-and-subtract algorithm that's documented in TIS2, its actually X.Y=R.S*256/Q
 342++CAB8 11 FE FF     .LL121:                 ld      de,$FFFE                    ; set XY to &FFFE at start, de holds XY
 343++CABB 2A 74 84                             ld      hl,(varRS)                  ; hl = RS
 344++CABE 3A 73 84                             ld      a,(varQ)
 345++CAC1 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; b = q
 346++CAC2              .LL130:                 ShiftHLLeft1                        ; RS *= 2
 346++CAC2 CB 25       >			   sla l
 346++CAC4 CB 14       >			   rl  h
 347++CAC6 7C                                   ld      a,h
 348++CAC7 38 04                                jr      c,.LL131                    ; if S overflowed skip Q test and do subtractions
 349++CAC9                                      JumpIfALTNusng b, .LL132            ; if S <  Q = 256/gradient skip subtractions
 349++CAC9 B8          >                        cp      b
 349++CACA DA D5 CA    >                        jp		c, .LL132
 350++CACD 3F           .LL131:                 ccf                                 ; compliment carry
 351++CACE 98                                   sbc     a,b                         ; q
 352++CACF 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; h (s)
 353++CAD0 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; r
 354++CAD1 DE 00                                sbc     a,0                         ; 0 - so in effect SR - Q*256
 355++CAD3 37                                   scf                                 ; set carry for next rolls
 356++CAD4 3F                                   ccf
 357++CAD5              .LL132:                 RollDELeft1                         ; Rotate de bits left
 357++CAD5 CB 13       >               rl  e
 357++CAD7 CB 12       >               rl  d
 358++CAD9 38 E7                                jr      c,.LL130                    ;
 359++CADB ED 53 79 C8                          ld      (varYX),de
 360++CADF F1                                   pop     af              ; get back sign
 361++CAE0 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 362++CAE3 C8                                   ret     z               ; if negative then return with value as is reversed sign
 363++CAE4 2A 79 C8     .LL133:                 ld      hl,(varYX)      ; may not actually need this?
 364++CAE7                                      NegHL
 364++CAE7 AF          >                    xor a
 364++CAE8 95          >                    sub l
 364++CAE9 6F          >                    ld l,a
 364++CAEA 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 364++CAEB 94          >                    sub h
 364++CAEC 67          >                    ld h,a
 365++CAED 22 79 C8                             ld      (varYX),hl
 366++CAF0 C9           .LL128:                 ret
 367++CAF1              ; The following calculates:  (Y X) = (S R) * Q using the same shift-and-add algorithm that's documented in MULT1
 368++CAF1 3A 74 C8     .LL122:                 ld      a,(clipGradient)
 369++CAF4 32 73 84                             ld      (varQ),a; optimise
 370++CAF7 CD A4 96                             call    HLequSRmulQdiv256
 371++CAFA 22 79 C8                             ld      (varYX),hl
 372++CAFD F1                                   pop     af
 373++CAFE ED 27 80                             test    $80
 374++CB01 CA E4 CA                             jp      z,.LL133
 375++CB04 C9                                   ret
 376++CB05
 377++CB05              ; Do the following, in this order:  Q = XX12+2
 378++CB05              ;                                   A = S EOR XX12+3
 379++CB05              ;                                   (S R) = |S R|
 380++CB05              ; This sets up the variables required above to calculate (S R) / XX12+2 and give the result the opposite sign to XX13+3.
 381++CB05 3A 74 C8     LL129:                  ld      a,(clipGradient)
 382++CB08 32 73 84                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Set Q = XX12+2
 383++CB0B 3A 75 84                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; If S is positive, jump to LL127
 384++CB0E E5 F5                                push    hl,,af                      ; else
 385++CB10 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ;   if bit 7 is clear
 386++CB13 28 0C                                jr      z,.LL127                    ;      RS = ABS RS
 387++CB15 2A 74 84                             ld      hl,(varRS)                  ;      .
 388++CB18                                      NegHL                               ;      .
 388++CB18 AF          >                    xor a
 388++CB19 95          >                    sub l
 388++CB1A 6F          >                    ld l,a
 388++CB1B 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 388++CB1C 94          >                    sub h
 388++CB1D 67          >                    ld h,a
 389++CB1E 22 74 84                             ld      (varRS),hl                  ;      .
 390++CB21 21 75 C8     .LL127:                 ld      hl,clipDxySign              ;   hl = dxy sign
 391++CB24 F1                                   pop     af                          ;
 392++CB25 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; a = S XOR clipDxySign
 393++CB26 E1                                   pop     hl
 394++CB27 C9                                   ret
 395++CB28
 396++CB28              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 397++CB28
 398++CB28              ;My logic version
 399++CB28              ClipLineV3:             ;break
 400++CB28 ED 4B A8 C0                          ld      bc,(UbnkPreClipY1)                  ; bc - XX15(2,3)
 401++CB2C DD 2A AC C0                          ld      ix,(UbnkPreClipY2)                  ; ix - XX12(0,1)
 402++CB30 2A A6 C0                             ld      hl,(UbnkPreClipX1)                  ; hl - XX15(0,1)
 403++CB33 ED 5B AA C0                          ld      de,(UbnkPreClipX2)                  ; de - XX15(4,5)
 404++CB37 78           .CheckNoClip:           ld      a,b
 405++CB38 B2                                   or      d
 406++CB39 B4                                   or      h
 407++CB3A DD B4                                or      ixh
 408++CB3C C2 45 CB                             jp      nz,.CheckXOffScreen                 ; if both Y1 and y2 have bit 7 set
 409++CB3F 79                                   ld      a,c                                 ; then we clip
 410++CB40 DD A5                                and     ixl
 411++CB42 CA 4C CC                             jp      z, .ClipComplete
 412++CB45              ;if either x1hi x2hi are 0 then we clip. if both <> 0and both same sign exit
 413++CB45              .CheckXOffScreen:       ZeroA                                       ;
 413++CB45 AF          >                        xor a
 414++CB46 32 77 C8                             ld      (clipFlags),a                       ;
 415++CB49 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ; if x1 and x2 high are zero then check for clipping Y
 416++CB4A B2                                   or      d                                   ;
 417++CB4B 28 11                                jr      z,.CheckYOffScreen                  ;
 418++CB4D 7C           .CheckXSameSign:        ld      a,h                                 ; if x1 high and x2 high are same sign then off screen
 419++CB4E FE 00                                cp      0                                   ; we have already elimited x1 x2 zero
 420++CB50 28 0C                                jr      z,.CheckYOffScreen                  ; .
 421++CB52 7A                                   ld      a,d                                 ; .
 422++CB53 FE 00                                cp      0                                   ; .
 423++CB55 28 07                                jr      z,.CheckYOffScreen                  ; .
 424++CB57 B4                                   or      h                                   ; .
 425++CB58 28 04                                jr      z,.CheckYOffScreen                  ; .
 426++CB5A AC                                   xor     h                                   ; .
 427++CB5B E6 80                                and     $80                                 ; .
 428++CB5D C8                                   ret     z                                   ; .
 429++CB5E              ; uif y1h and y2h are negative, same sign and exit
 430++CB5E 78           .CheckYOffScreen:       ld      a,b
 431++CB5F DD AC        .CheckBothYNegative:    xor     ixh
 432++CB61 E6 80                                and     $80
 433++CB63 20 22                                jr      nz,.StartProcessing
 434++CB65 78                                   ld      a,b                                 ; so if they are the same
 435++CB66 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ; then both negative if y1h negative
 436++CB68 C0                                   ret     nz
 437++CB69 78                                   ld      a,b
 438++CB6A E6 80                                and     $80
 439++CB6C 20 19                                jr      nz,.StartProcessing                 ;negative we can go straight to clip
 440++CB6E 21 7F 00                             ld      hl,127                              ; > 127 then
 441++CB71 50 59                                ld      de,bc
 442++CB73 CD 7D 9B                             call    compare16HLDE
 443++CB76 F2 87 CB                             jp      p,.StartProcessing                  ; +ve and at least one on screen
 444++CB79 DD 7C        .Y1IsNegative:          ld      a,ixh
 445++CB7B E6 80                                and     $80
 446++CB7D 20 08                                jr      nz,.StartProcessing
 447++CB7F DD 54 DD 5D                          ld      de,ix
 448++CB83 CD 7D 9B                             call    compare16HLDE
 449++CB86 F8                                   ret     m
 450++CB87
 451++CB87 2A A6 C0     .StartProcessing:       ld      hl,(UbnkPreClipX1)                  ; hl - XX15(0,1)
 452++CB8A ED 5B AA C0                          ld      de,(UbnkPreClipX2)                  ; de - XX15(4,5)
 453++CB8E FD 26 00                             ld      iyh,0
 454++CB91              ;if x1hi or y1 high <> 0 or y1 > 127 then set bit 1 of clipcoord
 455++CB91 7C                                   ld      a,h
 456++CB92 B0                                   or      b
 457++CB93 28 06                                jr      z,.CheckP1Ylo
 458++CB95 FD 26 01     .P1OffScreen:           ld      iyh,1
 459++CB98 C3 A3 CB                             jp      .CheckP2OffScreen
 460++CB9B 79           .CheckP1Ylo:            ld      a,c
 461++CB9C E6 80                                and     $80
 462++CB9E 28 03                                jr      z,.CheckP2OffScreen
 463++CBA0 FD 26 01                             ld      iyh,1
 464++CBA3              .CheckP2OffScreen:
 465++CBA3              ;if x2hi or y2 high <> 0 or y2 > 127 then set bit 2 of clipcoord
 466++CBA3 7A                                   ld      a,d
 467++CBA4 DD B4                                or      ixh
 468++CBA6 28 09                                jr      z,.CheckP2Ylo
 469++CBA8 FD 7C        .P2OffScreen:           ld      a,iyh
 470++CBAA F6 02                                or      2
 471++CBAC FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
 472++CBAE C3 BD CB                             jp      .CheckXDirection
 473++CBB1 DD 7D        .CheckP2Ylo:            ld      a,ixl
 474++CBB3 E6 80                                and     $80
 475++CBB5 28 06                                jr      z,.CheckXDirection
 476++CBB7 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 477++CBB9 F6 02                                or      2
 478++CBBB FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
 479++CBBD              .CheckXDirection:       ;break
 480++CBBD              ;If X1 > X2 then direction is -ve so set bit 3 of clipccord
 481++CBBD CD 7D 9B                             call    compare16HLDE
 482++CBC0 F2 C9 CB                             jp      p,.CheckYDirection
 483++CBC3 FD 7C        .X1ltX2:                ld      a,iyh
 484++CBC5 F6 04                                or      4
 485++CBC7 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
 486++CBC9              ;if Y1 > Y2 then slop is -ve so set bit 4 of clipcoord
 487++CBC9 D5 E5        .CheckYDirection:       push    de,,hl
 488++CBCB 60 69                                ld      hl,bc
 489++CBCD DD 54 DD 5D                          ld      de,ix
 490++CBD1 CD 7D 9B                             call    compare16HLDE
 491++CBD4 F2 DD CB                             jp      p,.Y1gteY2
 492++CBD7 FD 7C        .Y1ltY2:                ld      a,iyh
 493++CBD9 F6 08                                or      8
 494++CBDB FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
 495++CBDD              ;calculate DX
 496++CBDD              .Y1gteY2:               ;break
 497++CBDD D1 E1                                pop     hl,,de                              ; reverse pop to do an ex
 498++CBDF                                      ClearCarryFlag                              ; .
 498++CBDF B7          >                        or a
 499++CBE0 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                               ; .
 500++CBE2 7C           .ABSDX:                 ld      a,h                                 ; HL = ABS HL
 501++CBE3 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ; .
 502++CBE5 28 06                                jr      z,.DXPositive                       ; .
 503++CBE7                                      macronegate16hl                             ; .
 503++CBE7 AF          >					xor 	a
 503++CBE8 95          >					sub 	l
 503++CBE9 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 503++CBEA 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 503++CBEB 94          >					sub 	h
 503++CBEC 67          >					ld 		h,a
 504++CBED EB           .DXPositive:            ex      de,hl                               ; de = abs delta x
 505++CBEE DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix                               ; iy = hl = Y2 - Y1
 506++CBF1 ED 42                                sbc     hl,bc                               ; .
 507++CBF3 7C           .ABSDY:                 ld      a,h                                 ; HL = ABS HL
 508++CBF4 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ; .
 509++CBF6 28 06                                jr      z,.DYPositive                       ; .
 510++CBF8                                      macronegate16hl                             ; .
 510++CBF8 AF          >					xor 	a
 510++CBF9 95          >					sub 	l
 510++CBFA 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 510++CBFB 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 510++CBFC 94          >					sub 	h
 510++CBFD 67          >					ld 		h,a
 511++CBFE              .DYPositive:            ; Scale DX and DY to 8 bit, by here hl = abs dy, de = abs dx
 512++CBFE              ;calculate DY
 513++CBFE 7C           .ScaleLoop:             ld      a,h                                 ; At this point DX and DY are ABS values
 514++CBFF B2                                   or      d                                   ; .
 515++CC00 28 0A                                jr      z,.ScaleDone                        ; .
 516++CC02                                      ShiftDERight1                               ; .
 516++CC02 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 516++CC04 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 517++CC06                                      ShiftHLRight1                               ; .
 517++CC06 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 517++CC08 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 518++CC0A 18 F2                                jr      .ScaleLoop                          ; scaled down Dx and Dy to 8 bit, Dy may have been;;                                                                                               negative
 519++CC0C              .ScaleDone:             ; hl = ABS DY, DE = ABS DX,  bc = Y1, ix = Y2,   note H and D will be zero
 520++CC0C              ;if Dx = 0 then hosrizontal line and clip X1 & X2 only then exit
 521++CC0C              ;if Dy = 0 then vertical line and clip Y1 & Y2 only then exit
 522++CC0C
 523++CC0C              ;if DX < DY  gradient = 256 * delta_x_lo / delta_y_lo
 524++CC0C              ;       else gradient = 256 * delta_y_lo / delta_x_lo, set bit 5 of clipcord
 525++CC0C 7B           .CalculateDelta:        ld      a,e                                 ; if DX < DY goto DX/DY
 526++CC0D                                      JumpIfALTNusng l,.DXdivDY                   ; else do DY/DX
 526++CC0D BD          >                        cp      l
 526++CC0E DA 22 CC    >                        jp		c, .DXdivDY
 527++CC11 7D           .DYdivDX:               ld      a,l                                 ;    A = DY
 528++CC12 53                                   ld      d,e                                 ;    D = DX
 529++CC13 CD 49 99                             call    AEquAmul256DivD                     ;    A = R = 256 * DY / DX
 530++CC16 32 7D C8     .SaveGradientDYDX:      ld      (Gradient),a
 531++CC19 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 532++CC1B F6 10                                or      16
 533++CC1D FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                               ;
 534++CC1F C3 2A CC                             jp      .ClipP1                             ;
 535++CC22 7B           .DXdivDY:               ld      a,e                                 ;    A = DX
 536++CC23 55                                   ld      d,l                                 ;    D = DY
 537++CC24 CD 49 99                             call    AEquAmul256DivD                     ;    A = R = 256 * DX / DY
 538++CC27 32 7D C8     .SaveGradientDXDY:      ld      (Gradient),a
 539++CC2A              ;if bit 1 of clipccord is set call    LL118
 540++CC2A FD 7C        .ClipP1:                ld      a,iyh
 541++CC2C E6 01                                and     1
 542++CC2E CA 3B CC                             jp      z,.ClipP2
 543++CC31 CD 7C CC                             call    LL118v3
 544++CC34 ED 43 A8 C0                          ld      (UbnkPreClipY1), bc                 ; bc - XX15(2,3);;
 545++CC38 22 A6 C0                             ld      (UbnkPreClipX1), hl
 546++CC3B              ;if bit 2 of clipcoord is set
 547++CC3B              ;        swap x1y1 with x2y2
 548++CC3B              ;        call    LL118
 549++CC3B FD 7C        .ClipP2:                ld      a,iyh
 550++CC3D E6 02                                and     2
 551++CC3F CA 4C CC                             jp      z,.ClipComplete
 552++CC42 CD 72 CC                             call    LL118v3PreSwap
 553++CC45 ED 43 AC C0                          ld      (UbnkPreClipY2), bc                 ; bc - XX15(2,3);;
 554++CC49 22 AA C0                             ld      (UbnkPreClipX2), hl
 555++CC4C              ;clip compelte exit
 556++CC4C 3E FF        .ClipComplete:          ld      a,$FF
 557++CC4E 32 7C C8                             ld      (ClipSuccess),a
 558++CC51 ED 4B A8 C0                          ld      bc,(UbnkPreClipY1)                  ; bc - XX15(2,3);;
 559++CC55 2A A6 C0                             ld      hl,(UbnkPreClipX1)
 560++CC58 DD 2A AC C0                          ld      ix,(UbnkPreClipY2)                  ; bc - XX15(2,3);;
 561++CC5C ED 5B AA C0                          ld      de,(UbnkPreClipX2)
 562++CC60 79                                   ld      a,c                                 ; Y1 = y1 lo, x2 = x2 lo, x1 = x1 lo y1 = y1 lo                                   -- Nothing off screen
 563++CC61 32 A7 C0                             ld      (UBnkNewY1),a
 564++CC64 DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
 565++CC66 32 A9 C0                             ld      (UBnkNewY2),a
 566++CC69 7D                                   ld      a,l
 567++CC6A 32 A6 C0                             ld      (UBnkNewX1),a
 568++CC6D 7B                                   ld      a,e
 569++CC6E 32 A8 C0                             ld      (UBnkNewX2),a
 570++CC71 C9                                   ret
 571++CC72
 572++CC72 ED 4B AC C0  LL118v3PreSwap:         ld      bc,(UbnkPreClipY2)                  ; bc - XX15(2,3);;
 573++CC76 2A AA C0                             ld      hl,(UbnkPreClipX2)
 574++CC79 C3 83 CC                             jp      LL118v3Fetched
 575++CC7C ED 4B A8 C0  LL118v3:                ld      bc,(UbnkPreClipY1)                  ; bc - XX15(2,3);;
 576++CC80 2A A6 C0                             ld      hl,(UbnkPreClipX1)
 577++CC83              LL118v3Fetched:
 578++CC83              ; if X1 hi <> 0
 579++CC83              LL118:                  ;break
 580++CC83 7C                                   ld      a,h
 581++CC84 A7                                   and     a
 582++CC85 28 7D                                jr      z,.DoneXCalc
 583++CC87              ;        if x1 hi bit 7 is set (so negative)
 584++CC87 E6 80        .CalcBlock1:            and     $80
 585++CC89 28 3E                                jr      z,.CalcBlockX2
 586++CC8B              ;               if clipccord bit 5 is set Adjust = abs(X1) / Gradient (may need to swap bit check?)
 587++CC8B FD 7C        .CalcBlockX1A:          ld      a,iyh
 588++CC8D E6 10                                and      16
 589++CC8F 20 12                                jr      nz,.CalcBlockX1B
 590++CC91                                      macronegate16hl
 590++CC91 AF          >					xor 	a
 590++CC92 95          >					sub 	l
 590++CC93 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 590++CC94 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 590++CC95 94          >					sub 	h
 590++CC96 67          >					ld 		h,a
 591++CC97 3A 7D C8                             ld      a,(Gradient)
 592++CC9A C5                                   push    bc                                  ; abs(X1) / Gradient
 593++CC9B 4F                                   ld      c,a
 594++CC9C CD 8B CD                             call    div_hl_c
 595++CC9F C1                                   pop     bc
 596++CCA0 C3 B1 CC                             jp      .DoneX1Calc
 597++CCA3              ;                                else set Adjust = abs(X1) * Gradient
 598++CCA3 C5           .CalcBlockX1B:          push    bc                                  ;  abs(X1) * Gradient
 599++CCA4                                      macronegate16hl
 599++CCA4 AF          >					xor 	a
 599++CCA5 95          >					sub 	l
 599++CCA6 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 599++CCA7 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 599++CCA8 94          >					sub 	h
 599++CCA9 67          >					ld 		h,a
 600++CCAA 3A 7D C8                             ld      a,(Gradient)
 601++CCAD CD AA 96                             call    HLeqyHLmulAdiv256
 602++CCB0 C1                                   pop     bc
 603++CCB1              ;               y1 += adjust * (-1 if bit 4 of clipcoord is set)
 604++CCB1              ;               x1 = 0 then call into DonrX1Calc
 605++CCB1 FD 7C        .DoneX1Calc:            ld      a,iyh
 606++CCB3 E6 08                                and     8
 607++CCB5 20 06                                jr      nz,.X1SkipNegate
 608++CCB7                                      macronegate16hl
 608++CCB7 AF          >					xor 	a
 608++CCB8 95          >					sub 	l
 608++CCB9 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 608++CCBA 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 608++CCBB 94          >					sub 	h
 608++CCBC 67          >					ld 		h,a
 609++CCBD 50 59        .X1SkipNegate:          ld      de,bc
 610++CCBF EB                                   ex      hl,de
 611++CCC0 19                                   add     hl,de
 612++CCC1 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
 613++CCC3 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0
 614++CCC6 C3 04 CD                             jp      .DoneXCalc
 615++CCC9              ;        else x1 hi is positive
 616++CCC9              ;                if clipccord bit 5 is set Adjust = X1 lo / Gradient (may need to swap bit check?)
 617++CCC9 FD 7C        .CalcBlockX2:           ld      a,iyh
 618++CCCB E6 10                                and     16
 619++CCCD 20 12                                jr      nz,.CalcBlockX2B
 620++CCCF 3A 7D C8     .CalcBlockX2A:          ld      a,(Gradient)            ;Q = gradient
 621++CCD2 C5                                   push    bc
 622++CCD3 4F                                   ld      c,a
 623++CCD4 11 00 01                             ld      de,256
 624++CCD7 B7 ED 52                             sub     hl,de
 625++CCDA CD 8B CD                             call    div_hl_c
 626++CCDD C1                                   pop     bc
 627++CCDE C3 EF CC                             jp      .DoneX2Calc
 628++CCE1              ;                                 else set Adjust = X1 lo * Gradient
 629++CCE1 C5           .CalcBlockX2B:          push    bc
 630++CCE2 3A 7D C8                             ld      a,(Gradient)            ;Q = gradient
 631++CCE5 11 00 01                             ld      de,256
 632++CCE8 B7 ED 52                             sub     hl,de
 633++CCEB CD AA 96                             call    HLeqyHLmulAdiv256       ; hl = YX = SR / Q
 634++CCEE C1                                   pop     bc
 635++CCEF              ;                y1 += adjust * (-1 if bit 4 of clipcoord is set)
 636++CCEF              ;                x1 = 255
 637++CCEF FD 7C        .DoneX2Calc:ld          a,iyh
 638++CCF1 E6 08                                and     8
 639++CCF3 20 06                                jr      nz,.X2SkipNegate
 640++CCF5                                      macronegate16hl
 640++CCF5 AF          >					xor 	a
 640++CCF6 95          >					sub 	l
 640++CCF7 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 640++CCF8 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 640++CCF9 94          >					sub 	h
 640++CCFA 67          >					ld 		h,a
 641++CCFB EB           .X2SkipNegate:          ex      de,hl
 642++CCFC 60 69                                ld      hl,bc

 644++CCFF 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
 645++CD01 21 FF 00                             ld      hl,255
 646++CD04              ;    if Y1 hi <> 0 or Y1 low >= 128
 647++CD04 78           .DoneXCalc:             ld      a,b
 648++CD05 A7                                   and     a
 649++CD06 20 04                                jr      nz,.CalcBlockY1Test
 650++CD08 79                                   ld      a,c
 651++CD09 E6 80                                and     $80
 652++CD0B C8                                   ret     z

 661++CD1A 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 661++CD1B 90          >                    sub 	b
 661++CD1C 47          >                    ld 		b,a
 662++CD1D 3A 7D C8                             ld      a,(Gradient)            ;Q = gradient

 666++CD24 CD 8B CD                             call    div_hl_c;LLHLdivC;div_hl_c

 668++CD28 EB                                   ex      de,hl
 669++CD29 C3 3D CD                             jp      .DoneBlockY1
 670++CD2C              ;                                 else set Adjust = abs(Y1) * Gradient
 671++CD2C              .CalcBlockY1B:          macronegate16bc

 680++CD3D              ;                ret

 689++CD4E FD 7C        .CalcBlockY2:           ld      a,iyh

 696++CD5D B7 ED 52                             sub     hl,de

 698++CD61 CD 8B CD                             call    div_hl_c;LLHLdivC

 700++CD65 EB                                   ex      de,hl
 701++CD66 C3 7A CD                             jp      .DoneBlockY2
 702++CD69              ;                                 else set Adjust = Y1 lo * Gradient

 710++CD79 EB                                   ex      de,hl

 712++CD7A              ;                y1 = 127

 714++CD7C E6 04                                and     4
 715++CD7E 20 06                                jr      nz,.Y2SkipNegate

 716++CD81 93          >                    sub 	e

 719++CD8A C9                                   ret

 721++CD8B
 722++CD8B AF           div_hl_c:               xor	a
 723++CD8C 06 10                                ld	b, 16
 724++CD8E 29           .loop:                  add	hl, hl
 725++CD8F 17                                   rla
 726++CD90 38 03                                jr	c, $+5
 727++CD92 B9                                   cp	c
 728++CD93 38 02                                jr	c, $+4
 729++CD95 91                                   sub	c
 730++CD96 2C                                   inc	l
 731++CD97 10 F5                                djnz	.loop
 732++CD99 C9                                   ret
 733++CD9A
 734++CD9A 11 FE FF     LLHLdivC:               ld      de,$FFFE                    ; set XY to &FFFE at start, de holds XY
 735++CD9D              .LL130:                 ShiftHLLeft1                        ; RS *= 2
 735++CD9D CB 25       >			   sla l
 735++CD9F CB 14       >			   rl  h
 736++CDA1 7C                                   ld      a,h
 737++CDA2 38 04                                jr      c,.LL131                    ; if S overflowed skip Q test and do subtractions
 738++CDA4                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL132            ; if S <  Q = 256/gradient skip subtractions
 738++CDA4 B9          >                        cp      c
 738++CDA5 DA B0 CD    >                        jp		c, .LL132
 739++CDA8 3F           .LL131:                 ccf                                 ; compliment carry
 740++CDA9 99                                   sbc     a,c                         ; q
 741++CDAA 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; h (s)
 742++CDAB 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; r
 743++CDAC DE 00                                sbc     a,0                         ; 0 - so in effect SR - Q*256
 744++CDAE 37                                   scf                                 ; set carry for next rolls
 745++CDAF 3F                                   ccf
 746++CDB0              .LL132:                 RollDELeft1                         ; Rotate de bits left
 746++CDB0 CB 13       >               rl  e
 746++CDB2 CB 12       >               rl  d
 747++CDB4 38 E7                                jr      c,.LL130                    ;
 748++CDB6 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = result
 749++CDB7 C9                                   ret

 768++CDB8              ;;;;;;                        ret     z                                   ;

 792++CDB8              ;;;;;;                        ret     z                                   ;

 540+ CDB8                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyRotmatToTransMat.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyRotmatToTransMat.asm
   1++CDB8              ; Set TransMatTo
   2++CDB8              ; XX16(1 0)   (3 2)   (5 4)   = sidev_x sidev_y sidev_z XX16(13,12) (15 14) (17 16)
   3++CDB8              ; XX16(7 6)   (9 8)   (11 10) = roofv_x roofv_y roofv_z XX16(7 6)   (9 8)   (11 10)
   4++CDB8              ; XX16(13 12) (15 14) (17 16) = nosev_x nosev_y nosev_z XX16(1 0)   (3 2)   (5 4)
   5++CDB8              ; This moves Side XYZ to position 0, Roof XYZ to position 1 annd nose XYZ to position 2 as a copy of each batch of 6 bytes
   6++CDB8              ; 18 byte fast copy
   7++CDB8
   8++CDB8              ; Fast copy using the stack                                                         ; T states
   9++CDB8 DD 21 00 00  CopyRotmatToTransMat:   ld      ix,0                                                ; 14
  10++CDBC DD 39                                add     ix,sp                                               ; 15
  11++CDBE 31 29 C0                             ld      sp,UBnkrotmatSidevX ; Source                        ; 10
  12++CDC1 E1                                   pop     hl                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevX              ; 10
  13++CDC2 D1                                   pop     de                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevY              ; 10
  14++CDC3 C1                                   pop     bc                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevZ              ; 10
  15++CDC4 D9                                   exx                                                         ; 4
  16++CDC5 E1                                   pop     hl                  ; UBnkrotmatRoofvX              ; 10
  17++CDC6 D1                                   pop     de                  ; UBnkrotmatRoofvY              ; 10
  18++CDC7 C1                                   pop     bc                  ; UBnkrotmatRoofvZ              ; 10
  19++CDC8 31 6D C0                             ld      sp,UBnkTransmatRoofvZ+2 ; Target + 2 reversed       ; 10
  20++CDCB C5                                   push    bc                                                  ; 10
  21++CDCC D5                                   push    de                                                  ; 10
  22++CDCD E5                                   push    hl                                                  ; 10
  23++CDCE D9                                   exx                                                         ; 4
  24++CDCF C5                                   push    bc                                                  ; 10
  25++CDD0 D5                                   push    de                                                  ; 10
  26++CDD1 E5                                   push    hl                                                  ; 10
  27++CDD2 31 35 C0                             ld      sp,UBnkrotmatNosevX ; Source                        ; 10
  28++CDD5 E1                                   pop     hl                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevX              ; 10
  29++CDD6 D1                                   pop     de                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevY              ; 10
  30++CDD7 C1                                   pop     bc                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevZ              ; 10
  31++CDD8 31 73 C0                             ld      sp,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+2                             ; 10
  32++CDDB C5                                   push    bc                                                  ; 10
  33++CDDC D5                                   push    de                                                  ; 10
  34++CDDD E5                                   push    hl                                                  ; 10
  35++CDDE DD F9                                ld      sp,ix               ; restore stack                 ; 10
  36++CDE0 C9                                   ret                                                         ; 10 Total 267 (LDI version is 318)
  37++CDE1
  38++CDE1
  39++CDE1
  40++CDE1              ;CopyRotmatToTransMat:
  41++CDE1              ;                        ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX
  42++CDE1              ;                        ld      de,UBnkTransmatSidevX
  43++CDE1              ;                        SixLDIInstrunctions
  44++CDE1              ;                        ld      hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX
  45++CDE1              ;                        ld      de, UBnkTransmatRoofvX
  46++CDE1              ;                        SixLDIInstrunctions
  47++CDE1              ;                        ld      hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
  48++CDE1              ;                        ld      de, UBnkTransmatNosevX
  49++CDE1              ;                        SixLDIInstrunctions
  50++CDE1              ;                        ret
  51++CDE1
  52++CDE1              CopyRotToTransMacro:    MACRO
  53++CDE1 ~                                    ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX
  54++CDE1 ~                                    ld      de,UBnkTransmatSidevX
  55++CDE1 ~                                    SixLDIInstrunctions
  56++CDE1 ~                                    SixLDIInstrunctions
  57++CDE1 ~                                    SixLDIInstrunctions
  58++CDE1                                      ENDM
  59++CDE1
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyRotmatToTransMat.asm
 541+ CDE1                                      include "./Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm
   1++CDE1              TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15:
   2++CDE1 2A AC C0             ld		hl,(UBnkXX12xLo)					; get X into HL
   3++CDE4 7C           		ld		a,h			                        ; get XX12 Sign
   4++CDE5 E6 80        		and		$80									; check sign bit on high byte
   5++CDE7 47           		ld		b,a									; and put it in of 12xlo in b
   6++CDE8                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
   7++CDE8 7C                   ld      a,h
   8++CDE9 E6 7F                and     $7F
   9++CDEB 67                   ld      h,a
  10++CDEC                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  11++CDEC ED 5B 20 C0  		ld		de,(UBnKxlo)						;
  12++CDF0 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnKxsgn)						; get Ship Pos (low,high,sign)
  13++CDF3 E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  14++CDF5 4F           		ld		c,a									; and put sign of unkxsgn c
  15++CDF6 CD B6 94     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; this will result in HL = result and A = sign
  16++CDF9 B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H to give 15 bit signed (*NOT* 2's c)
  17++CDFA 67           		ld		h,a
  18++CDFB 22 A6 C0     		ld		(UBnkXScaled),hl					; now write it out to XX15 X pos
  19++CDFE              ; ..................................
  20++CDFE 2A AE C0     		ld		hl,(UBnkXX12yLo)					; Repeat above for Y coordinate
  21++CE01 7C           		ld		a,h
  22++CE02 E6 80        		and		$80
  23++CE04 47           		ld		b,a
  24++CE05                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  25++CE05 7C                   ld      a,h
  26++CE06 E6 7F                and     $7F
  27++CE08 67                   ld      h,a
  28++CE09                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  29++CE09 ED 5B 23 C0  		ld		de,(UBnKylo)
  30++CE0D 3A 25 C0     		ld		a,(UBnKysgn)
  31++CE10 E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  32++CE12 4F           		ld		c,a
  33++CE13 CD B6 94     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC
  34++CE16 B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H
  35++CE17 67           		ld		h,a
  36++CE18 22 A8 C0     		ld		(UBnkYScaled),hl
  37++CE1B              ; ..................................
  38++CE1B 2A B0 C0     		ld		hl,(UBnkXX12zLo)					; and now repeat for Z cooord
  39++CE1E 7C           		ld		a,h
  40++CE1F E6 80        		and		$80
  41++CE21 47           		ld		b,a
  42++CE22                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  43++CE22 7C                   ld      a,h
  44++CE23 E6 7F                and     $7F
  45++CE25 67                   ld      h,a
  46++CE26                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  47++CE26 ED 5B 26 C0  		ld		de,(UBnKzlo)
  48++CE2A 3A 28 C0     		ld		a,(UBnKzsgn)
  49++CE2D E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  50++CE2F 4F           		ld		c,a
  51++CE30 CD B6 94     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC
  52++CE33 B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H
  53++CE34 67           		ld		h,a
  54++CE35 CB 7C        		bit		7,h                                 ; if sign if positive then we don't need to do the clamp so we ony jump
  55++CE37 20 16        		jr		nz,ClampZto4                        ; result was negative so we need to clamp to 4
  56++CE39 E6 7F                and     $7F                                 ; a = value unsigned
  57++CE3B 20 06                jr      nz,NoClampZto4                      ; if high byte was 0 then we could need to clamp still by this stage its +v but and will set z flag if high byte is zero
  58++CE3D 7D                   ld      a,l                                 ; get low byte now
  59++CE3E              		JumpIfALTNusng 4,ClampZto4					; if its < 4 then fix at 4
  59++CE3E FE 04       >                        cp      4
  59++CE40 DA 4F CE    >                        jp		c, ClampZto4
  60++CE43              NoClampZto4:
  61++CE43 22 AA C0     		ld		(UBnkZScaled),hl					; hl = signed calculation and > 4
  62++CE46 7D           		ld		a,l									; in addition write out the z cooord to UT for now for backwards compat (DEBUG TODO remove later)
  63++CE47 32 91 84             ld      (varT),a
  64++CE4A 7C           		ld		a,h
  65++CE4B 32 72 84             ld      (varU),a
  66++CE4E C9           		ret
  67++CE4F              ClampZto4:											; This is where we limit 4 to a minimum of 4
  68++CE4F 21 04 00     		ld		hl,4
  69++CE52 22 AA C0     		ld		(UBnkZScaled),hl; BODGE FOR NOW
  70++CE55 7D           		ld		a,l
  71++CE56 32 91 84             ld      (varT),a                            ;                                                                           ;;;
  72++CE59 7C           		ld		a,h
  73++CE5A 32 72 84             ld      (varU),a 						; compatibility for now
  74++CE5D C9           		ret
  75++CE5E
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm
 542+ CE5E                                      include "./Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm"
# file opened: ././Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm
   1++CE5E              ScaleNodeTo8Bit:								; TODO make signed
   2++CE5E ED 4B AA C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)
   3++CE62 2A A6 C0     	ld			hl,(UBnkXScaled)
   4++CE65 ED 5B A8 C0  	ld			de,(UBnkYScaled)
   5++CE69              SetABSbc:
   6++CE69 78           	ld			a,b
   7++CE6A DD 67        	ld			ixh,a
   8++CE6C E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
   9++CE6E 47           	ld			b,a									; bc = ABS bc
  10++CE6F              SetABShl:
  11++CE6F 7C           	ld			a,h
  12++CE70 DD 6F        	ld			ixl,a
  13++CE72 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
  14++CE74 67           	ld			h,a									; hl = ABS hl
  15++CE75              SetABSde:
  16++CE75 7A           	ld			a,d
  17++CE76 FD 67        	ld			iyh,a
  18++CE78 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
  19++CE7A 57           	ld			d,a									; de = ABS de
  20++CE7B              ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop:
  21++CE7B 78               ld          a,b		                            ; U	\ z hi
  22++CE7C B4           	or			h                                   ; XX15+1	\ x hi
  23++CE7D B2           	or			d                                   ; XX15+4	\ y hi
  24++CE7E 28 0F            jr          z,ScaleNodeDone                   ; if X, Y, Z = 0  exit loop down once hi U rolled to 0
  25++CE80                  ShiftHLRight1
  25++CE80 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  25++CE82 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  26++CE84                  ShiftDERight1
  26++CE84 CB 3A       >			   srl d
  26++CE86 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  27++CE88              	ShiftBCRight1
  27++CE88 CB 38       >			   srl b
  27++CE8A CB 19       >			   rr  c
  28++CE8C C3 7B CE         jp          ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop
  29++CE8F              ScaleNodeDone:										; now we have scaled values we have to deal with sign
  30++CE8F DD 7C        	ld			a,ixh								; get sign bit and or with b
  31++CE91 E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  32++CE93 B0           	or			b
  33++CE94 47           	ld			b,a
  34++CE95              SignforHL:
  35++CE95 DD 7D        	ld			a,ixl								; get sign bit and or with b
  36++CE97 E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  37++CE99 B4           	or			h
  38++CE9A 67           	ld			h,a
  39++CE9B              SignforDE:
  40++CE9B FD 7C        	ld			a,iyh								; get sign bit and or with b
  41++CE9D E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  42++CE9F B2           	or			d
  43++CEA0 57           	ld			d,a
  44++CEA1              SignsDoneSaveResult:
  45++CEA1 ED 43 AA C0  	ld			(UBnkZScaled),bc
  46++CEA5 22 A6 C0     	ld			(UBnkXScaled),hl
  47++CEA8 ED 53 A8 C0  	ld			(UBnkYScaled),de
  48++CEAC 78           	ld			a,b
  49++CEAD 32 72 84     	ld			(varU),a
  50++CEB0 79           	ld			a,c
  51++CEB1 32 91 84     	ld			(varT),a
  52++CEB4 C9           	ret
  53++CEB5
# file closed: ././Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm

 553+ CEC3 AF                                   xor     a
 554+ CEC4 77                                   ld      (hl),a
