 557+ CEC6 3A 3B C3     SetAllFacesVisible:     ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)            ; (XX0),Y which is XX0[0C] or UBnkHullCopy+FaceCtX4Addr                                 ;;; Faces count (previously loaded into b up front but no need to shave bytes for clarity
 558+ CEC9 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; else do explosion needs all vertices                                                  ;;;
 559+ CECB CB 3F                                srl     a                           ;  /=4  TODO add this into blueprint data for speed                                                           ;;; For loop = 15 to 0
 560+ CECD 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; b = Xreg = number of normals, faces
 561+ CECE 21 D2 C0                             ld      hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
 562+ CED1 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
 563+ CED3              SetAllFacesVisibleLoop:
 564+ CED3 77           EE30:                   ld      (hl),a
 565+ CED4 23                                   inc     hl
 566+ CED5 10 FC                                djnz    SetAllFacesVisibleLoop
 567+ CED7 C9                                   ret
 568+ CED8              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 569+ CED8 3A 3B C3     SetAllFacesHidden:      ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)            ; (XX0),Y which is XX0[0C] or UBnkHullCopy+ShipHullFacesCount                           ;;; Faces count (previously loaded into b up front but no need to shave bytes for clarity
 570+ CEDB CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; else do explosion needs all vertices                                                  ;;;
 571+ CEDD CB 3F                                srl     a                           ;  /=4                                                                                  ;;; For loop = 15 to 0
 572+ CEDF 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; b = Xreg = number of normals, faces
 573+ CEE0 06 10                                ld      b,16
 574+ CEE2 21 D2 C0                             ld      hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
 575+ CEE5 3E 00                                ld      a,$00
 576+ CEE7 77           SetAllFacesHiddenLoop:  ld      (hl),a
 577+ CEE8 23                                   inc     hl
 578+ CEE9 10 FC                                djnz    SetAllFacesHiddenLoop

 581+ CEEC              ;;;;X = normal scale
 582+ CEEC              ;;;;ZtempHi = zhi
 583+ CEEC              ;;;;......................................................
 584+ CEEC              ;;;; if ztemp hi <> 0                                   ::Scale Object Distance
 585+ CEEC              ;;;;  Loop                                              ::LL90
 586+ CEEC              ;;;;     inc X
 587+ CEEC              ;;;;     divide X, Y & ZtempHiLo by 2
 588+ CEEC              ;;;;  Until ZtempHi = 0
 589+ CEEC              ;;;;......................................................
 590+ CEEC              ;-LL21---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 591+ CEEC                                      include "Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm
   1++CEEC              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
   2++CEEC              Norm256mulAdivQ:
   3++CEEC 47               ld      b,a
   4++CEED 0E 00            ld      c,0
   5++CEEF 16 00            ld      d,0
   6++CEF1 3A 73 84         ld      a,(varQ)
   7++CEF4 5F               ld      e,a
   8++CEF5              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
   9++CEF5              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  10++CEF5              NormDIV16UNDOC:
  11++CEF5 21 00 00         ld      hl,0
  12++CEF8 78               ld      a,b
  13++CEF9 06 10            ld      b,16
  14++CEFB              NormDIV16UNDOCLOOP:
  15++CEFB CB 31        	sll	    c		; unroll 16 times
  16++CEFD 17           	rla	    		; ...
  17++CEFE ED 6A        	adc	    hl,hl		; ...
  18++CF00 ED 52        	sbc	    hl,de		; ...
  19++CF02 30 02        	jr	    nc,NormDIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
  20++CF04 19           	add	    hl,de		; ...
  21++CF05 0D           	dec	    c		; ...
  22++CF06              NormDIV16UNDOCSKIP:
  23++CF06 10 F3            djnz    NormDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  24++CF08 79               ld      a,c
  25++CF09 32 74 84         ld      (varR),a
  26++CF0C C9               ret
  27++CF0D
  28++CF0D FD 67        Norm256mulAdivQSignA:   ld      iyh,a
  29++CF0F                                      ClearSignBitA
  29++CF0F E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  30++CF11 CD EC CE                             call    Norm256mulAdivQ              ; do 15 bit unsigned
  31++CF14 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                       ; now correct R reg
  32++CF16                                      SignBitOnlyA
  32++CF16 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  33++CF18 B1                                   or      c
  34++CF19 32 74 84                             ld      (varR),a
  35++CF1C C9                                   ret
  36++CF1D
  37++CF1D              ; Tested OK
  38++CF1D              ;LL21
  39++CF1D              NormaliseTransMat:
  40++CF1D                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
  41++CF1D ~                            ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+1     ; initialise loop
  42++CF1D ~                            ld      b,9                         ; total of 9 elements to transform
  43++CF1D ~                            MMUSelectMathsTables
  44++CF1D ~            .LL21Loop:      ld      d,(hl)
  45++CF1D ~                            dec     hl
  46++CF1D ~                            ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = hilo now   hl now = pointer to low byte
  47++CF1D ~                            ShiftDELeft1                        ; De = DE * 2
  48++CF1D ~                            ld      a,d                         ; a = hi byte after shifting
  49++CF1D ~                            push	hl
  50++CF1D ~                            push	bc
  51++CF1D ~                            call    AEquAmul256Div197Log        ; R = (2(hi).0)/ConstNorm - LL28 Optimised BFRDIV R=A*256/Q = delta_y / delta_x Use Y/X grad. as not steep
  52++CF1D ~                            ;ld      a,c                         ; BFRDIV returns R also in l reg
  53++CF1D ~                            pop		bc
  54++CF1D ~                            pop		hl							; bc gets wrecked by BFRDIV
  55++CF1D ~                            ld      (hl),a                      ; write low result to low byte so zlo = (zhl *2)/197, we keep hi byte in tact as we need the sign bit
  56++CF1D ~                            dec     hl                          ; now hl = hi byte of pre val e.g z->y->x
  57++CF1D ~                            djnz    .LL21Loop                   ; loop from 2zLo through to 0xLo
  58++CF1D ~                            MMUSelectROM0
  59++CF1D ~                            ret
  60++CF1D                      ELSE
  61++CF1D 21 72 C0                     ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+1         ; initialise loop
  62++CF20 0E C5                        ld      c,ConstNorm                 ; c = Q = norm = 197
  63++CF22 79                           ld      a,c
  64++CF23 32 73 84                     ld      (varQ),a                    ; set up varQ
  65++CF26 06 09                        ld      b,9                         ; total of 9 elements to transform
  66++CF28 56           LL21Loop:       ld      d,(hl)
  67++CF29 2B                           dec     hl
  68++CF2A 5E                           ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = hilo now   hl now = pointer to low byte
  69++CF2B                              ShiftDELeft1                        ; De = DE * 2
  69++CF2B CB 23       >			   sla e
  69++CF2D CB 12       >			   rl  d
  70++CF2F 7A                           ld      a,d                         ; a = hi byte after shifting
  71++CF30 E5                           push	hl
  72++CF31 C5                           push	bc
  73++CF32 CD EC CE                     call    Norm256mulAdivQ
  74++CF35                              ;===call    RequAmul256divC				; R = (2(hi).0)/ConstNorm - LL28 Optimised BFRDIV R=A*256/Q = delta_y / delta_x Use Y/X grad. as not steep
  75++CF35 79                           ld      a,c                         ; BFRDIV returns R also in l reg
  76++CF36 C1                           pop		bc
  77++CF37 E1                           pop		hl							; bc gets wrecked by BFRDIV
  78++CF38 77                           ld      (hl),a                      ; write low result to low byte so zlo = (zhl *2)/197, we keep hi byte in tact as we need the sign bit
  79++CF39 2B                           dec     hl                          ; now hl = hi byte of pre val e.g z->y->x
  80++CF3A 10 EC                        djnz    LL21Loop                    ; loop from 2zLo through to 0xLo
  81++CF3C C9                           ret
  82++CF3D                      ENDIF
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm
 592+ CF3D              ;;;                        include "Universe/Ships/NormaliseXX15.asm"
 593+ CF3D              ;-LL91---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 594+ CF3D
 595+ CF3D              ; Now we have
 596+ CF3D              ;   * XX18(2 1 0) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo)
 597+ CF3D              ;   * XX18(5 4 3) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo)
 598+ CF3D              ;   * XX18(8 7 6) = (z_sign z_hi z_lo)
 599+ CF3D              ;
 600+ CF3D              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 601+ CF3D                                      include "Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm
   1++CF3D              ; TESTEDOK
   2++CF3D
   3++CF3D              ;ScaleOrientationXX16:                       ; DEBUG TODO will combine with inverse later
   4++CF3D              ;        ld      a,(XX17)
   5++CF3D              ;        ld      ixl,a
   6++CF3D              ;        ld      ixh,9
   7++CF3D              ;        ld      hl,UBnkTransInv0x
   8++CF3D              ;        ld      a,(hl)
   9++CF3D              ;ScaleNode:
  10++CF3D              ;        ld      b,ixl
  11++CF3D              ;ScaleNodeLoop:
  12++CF3D              ;        sla      a
  13++CF3D              ;        djnz    ScaleNodeLoop
  14++CF3D              ;        ld      (hl),a
  15++CF3D              ;        inc     hl
  16++CF3D              ;        inc     hl
  17++CF3D              ;        dec     ixh
  18++CF3D              ;        jr      nz,ScaleNode
  19++CF3D              ;        ret
  20++CF3D
  21++CF3D
  22++CF3D              InverseXX16:								; lead routine into .LL42	\ ->  &4B04 \ DO nodeX-Ycoords their comment  \  TrnspMat
  23++CF3D              ; we coudl combine this with move to transmat later as an optimisation
  24++CF3D              ; INPUT - All Scaled
  25++CF3D              ;  They transmat has already been put into side, roof nose order
  26++CF3D              ;  XX16   = |sidev_x| |sidev_y| |sidev_z|  1  0  3  2  5  4 note each bytepair is Scaled value in low and high byte just for sign
  27++CF3D              ;  XX16   = |roofv_x| |roofv_y| |roofv_z|  7  6  8  9 11 10
  28++CF3D              ;  XX16   = |nosev_x| |nosev_y| |nosev_z| 13 12 15 14 17 16
  29++CF3D              ; OUTPUT
  30++CF3D              ;  XX16(1 0)   ( 3 2) ( 5 4 ) =  sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x
  31++CF3D              ;  XX16(7 6)   ( 8 9) (11 10) =  sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y
  32++CF3D              ;  XX16(13 12) (15 14)(17 16) =  sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z
  33++CF3D              ; First all side values become compoment 0 of each vector
  34++CF3D 2A 61 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevX)     ;
  35++CF40 ED 5B 67 C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvX)     ;
  36++CF44 ED 4B 6D C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevX)     ;
  37++CF48 22 79 C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x0),hl     ;
  38++CF4B ED 53 7B C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x1),de     ;
  39++CF4F ED 43 7D C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x2),bc     ;
  40++CF53 2A 63 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevY)     ;
  41++CF56 ED 5B 69 C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvY)     ;
  42++CF5A ED 4B 6F C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevY)     ;
  43++CF5E 22 81 C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y0),hl     ;
  44++CF61 ED 53 83 C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y1),de     ;
  45++CF65 ED 43 85 C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y2),bc     ;
  46++CF69 2A 65 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevZ)     ;
  47++CF6C ED 5B 6B C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvZ)     ;
  48++CF70 ED 4B 71 C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevZ)     ;
  49++CF74 22 89 C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z0),hl     ;
  50++CF77 ED 53 8B C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z1),de     ;
  51++CF7B ED 43 8D C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z2),bc     ;
  52++CF7F C9                   ret
  53++CF80
  54++CF80
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm
 602+ CF80              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 603+ CF80              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 604+ CF80              ;   XX12(1 0) = [x y z] . sidev  = (dot_sidev_sign dot_sidev_lo)  = dot_sidev
 605+ CF80              ;   XX12(3 2) = [x y z] . roofv  = (dot_roofv_sign dot_roofv_lo)  = dot_roofv
 606+ CF80              ;   XX12(5 4) = [x y z] . nosev  = (dot_nosev_sign dot_nosev_lo)  = dot_nosev
 607+ CF80              ; Returns
 608+ CF80              ;
 609+ CF80              ;   XX12(1 0)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the sidev (or _x)
 610+ CF80              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+1 and magnitude in XX12
 611+ CF80              ;
 612+ CF80              ;   XX12(3 2)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the roofv (or _y)
 613+ CF80              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+3 and magnitude in XX12+2
 614+ CF80              ;
 615+ CF80              ;   XX12(5 4)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the nosev (or _z)
 616+ CF80              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+5 and magnitude in XX12+4
 617+ CF80              ; TESTEDOK
 618+ CF80              XX12DotOneRow:
 619+ CF80              XX12CalcX:              N0equN1byN2div256 varT, (hl), (UBnkXScaled)       ; T = (hl) * regXX15fx /256
 619+ CF80 3A A6 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)                        ;
 619+ CF83 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 619+ CF84 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 619+ CF85 57          >                        ld      d,a
 619+ CF86 ED 30       >                        mul
 619+ CF88 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 619+ CF89 32 91 84    >                        ld      (varT),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 620+ CF8C 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 621+ CF8D              XX12CalcXSign:          AequN1xorN2 UBnkXScaledSign,(hl)             ;
 621+ CF8D 3A A7 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)
 621+ CF90 AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 622+ CF91 32 75 84                             ld      (varS),a                            ; Set S to the sign of x_sign * sidev_x
 623+ CF94 23                                   inc     hl
 624+ CF95              XX12CalcY:              N0equN1byN2div256 varQ, (hl),(UBnkYScaled)       ; Q = XX16 * XX15 /256 using varQ to hold regXX15fx
 624+ CF95 3A A8 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)                        ;
 624+ CF98 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 624+ CF99 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 624+ CF9A 57          >                        ld      d,a
 624+ CF9B ED 30       >                        mul
 624+ CF9D 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 624+ CF9E 32 73 84    >                        ld      (varQ),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 625+ CFA1                                      ldCopyByte varT,varR                        ; R = T =  |sidev_x| * x_lo / 256
 625+ CFA1 3A 91 84    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 625+ CFA4 32 74 84    >                        ld       (varR),a
 626+ CFA7 23                                   inc     hl
 627+ CFA8                                      AequN1xorN2 UBnkYScaledSign,(hl)             ; Set A to the sign of y_sign * sidev_y
 627+ CFA8 3A A9 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaledSign)
 627+ CFAB AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 628+ CFAC              ; (S)A = |sidev_x| * x_lo / 256  = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 629+ CFAC E5           STequSRplusAQ           push    hl
 630+ CFAD CD 4D 9E                             call    baddll38                            ; JSR &4812 \ LL38   \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ 1byte add (subtract)
 631+ CFB0 E1                                   pop     hl
 632+ CFB1 32 91 84                             ld      (varT),a                            ; T = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 633+ CFB4 23                                   inc     hl
 634+ CFB5              XX12CalcZ:              N0equN1byN2div256 varQ,(hl),(UBnkZScaled)       ; Q = |sidev_z| * z_lo / 256
 634+ CFB5 3A AA C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)                        ;
 634+ CFB8 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 634+ CFB9 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 634+ CFBA 57          >                        ld      d,a
 634+ CFBB ED 30       >                        mul
 634+ CFBD 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 634+ CFBE 32 73 84    >                        ld      (varQ),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 635+ CFC1                                      ldCopyByte varT,varR                        ; R = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 635+ CFC1 3A 91 84    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 635+ CFC4 32 74 84    >                        ld       (varR),a
 636+ CFC7 23                                   inc     hl
 637+ CFC8                                      AequN1xorN2 UBnkZScaledSign,(hl)             ; A = sign of z_sign * sidev_z
 637+ CFC8 3A AB C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 637+ CFCB AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 638+ CFCC              ; (S)A= |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo + |sidev_z| * z_lo
 639+ CFCC CD 4D 9E                             call    baddll38                            ; JSR &4812 \ LL38   \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 640+ CFCF              ; Now we exit with A = result S = Sign
 641+ CFCF C9                                   ret
 642+ CFD0
 643+ CFD0
 644+ CFD0
 645+ CFD0              ;-- LL51---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 646+ CFD0              ;TESTED OK
 647+ CFD0              ;XX12EquScaleDotOrientation:                         ; .LL51 \ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z
 648+ CFD0              XX12EquXX15DotProductXX16:
 649+ CFD0 01 00 00                             ld      bc,0                                ; LDX, LDY 0
 650+ CFD3 21 61 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatSidevX
 651+ CFD6 CD 80 CF                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 652+ CFD9 32 AC C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a
 653+ CFDC 3A 75 84                             ld      a,(varS)
 654+ CFDF 32 AD C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a
 655+ CFE2 21 67 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatRoofvX
 656+ CFE5 CD 80 CF                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 657+ CFE8 32 AE C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a
 658+ CFEB 3A 75 84                             ld      a,(varS)
 659+ CFEE 32 AF C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a
 660+ CFF1 21 6D C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevX
 661+ CFF4 CD 80 CF                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 662+ CFF7 32 B0 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a
 663+ CFFA 3A 75 84                             ld      a,(varS)
 664+ CFFD 32 B1 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a
 665+ D000 C9                                   ret
 666+ D001              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 667+ D001                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ScaledToXX18.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ScaledToXX18.asm
   1++D001              CopyXX12ScaledToXX18:

   3++D004 32 9A C0    >                        ld       (XX18),a

   8++D01F                      ldCopyByte XX12+5       ,XX18+8           ; XX12+5 => XX18+8

   1++D164              CopyXX12ToScaled:
   2++D164              CopyResultToScaled:
   3++D164                      ldCopyByte  XX12+0,UBnkXScaled      ; xnormal lo
   3++D164 3A AC C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+0)
   3++D167 32 A6 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
   4++D16A                      ldCopyByte  XX12+2,UBnkYScaled      ; ynormal lo
   4++D16A 3A AE C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+2)
   4++D16D 32 A8 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
   5++D170                      ldCopyByte  XX12+4,UBnkZScaled      ; znormal lo and leaves a holding zscaled normal

   5++D173 32 AA C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a

   7++D177

 672+ D177              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 673+ D177                                      include "./Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
   1++D177              ;;; Q = XX12 xLo ,A = XX15 xLo
   2++D177              ;;; T = A * Q/256 Usgined  (FMLTU)
   3++D177              ;;; S = XX12 XSign Xor XX15 XSign
   4++D177              ;;; Q = XX12 Ynormal Lo, A = XX15+2 (y lo)
   5++D177              ;;; Q = A * Q/256 Usigned (FMLTI)
   6++D177              ;;; R = T
   7++D177              ;;; A = XX12+3 (ySign) Xor XX15+3 (ySign)
   8++D177              ;;; T = BADD s(A) = R + Q(SA) (xdot + ydot)
   9++D177              ;;; Q = XX12+4 (znormal lo) A = XX15+4 z lo
  10++D177              ;;; Q = A * Q /256 usigned (zdot)
  11++D177              ;;; R = T
  12++D177              ;;; A - XX15+ 5 Zsign Xor XX12+5 Z Sign
  13++D177
  14++D177
  15++D177
  16++D177
  17++D177
  18++D177              MacroAequDxEdiv256usgn:	MACRO
  19++D177 ~            						mul
  20++D177 ~            						ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
  21++D177              						ENDM
  22++D177              DotProductXX12XX15:
  23++D177 3A AC C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  24++D17A                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  24++D17A A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  24++D17B CA 98 D1    >                        jp	    z, dotxskipzero
  25++D17E 5F                   ld          e,a
  26++D17F 3A A6 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
  27++D182 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  28++D183                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  28++D183 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  28++D184 CA 98 D1    >                        jp	    z, dotxskipzero
  29++D187 ED 30        		mul
  30++D189 42                   ld          b,d                     ; b = result
  31++D18A 3A AD C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
  32++D18D 21 A7 C0             ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
  33++D190 AE                   xor         (hl)
  34++D191 E6 80                and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
  35++D193 FD 67                ld          iyh ,a                   ; we actually need to preserve sign in iyh here
  36++D195 C3 9C D1             jp          dotmuly
  37++D198              dotxskipzero:
  38++D198 AF                   xor         a
  39++D199 47                   ld          b,a
  40++D19A FD 67                ld          iyh,a
  41++D19C              dotmuly:
  42++D19C              ; now we have b = XX12 x &d  norm x signed
  43++D19C 3A AE C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
  44++D19F                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  44++D19F A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  44++D1A0 CA BF D1    >                        jp	    z, dotyskipzero
  45++D1A3 5F                   ld          e,a
  46++D1A4 3A A8 C0             ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
  47++D1A7                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  47++D1A7 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  47++D1A8 CA BF D1    >                        jp	    z, dotyskipzero
  48++D1AB 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  49++D1AC ED 30                mul
  50++D1AE 4A                   ld          c,d                     ; c = result
  51++D1AF DD 69                ld          ixl,c
  52++D1B1 3A AF C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
  53++D1B4 21 A9 C0             ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
  54++D1B7 AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
  55++D1B8 E6 80                and         $80                     ; do b = x mul c = y mul, iyh = sign for b and a = sign for c
  56++D1BA DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  57++D1BC C3 C3 D1             jp          dotaddxy
  58++D1BF              dotyskipzero:
  59++D1BF AF                   xor         a
  60++D1C0 4F                   ld          c,a
  61++D1C1 DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  62++D1C3              dotaddxy:
  63++D1C3              ; Optimise later as this is 16 bit
  64++D1C3 26 00                ld          h,0                     ;
  65++D1C5 68                   ld          l,b                     ; hl = xlo + x scaled
  66++D1C6 16 00                ld          d,0                     ;
  67++D1C8 59                   ld          e,c                     ; de = ylo + yscaled
  68++D1C9 FD 44                ld          b,iyh                   ; b = sign of xlo + xscaled
  69++D1CB 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of ylo + yscaled
  70++D1CC CD B6 94             call ADDHLDESignBC                  ; so now hl = result so will push sign to h
  71++D1CF 47                   ld          b,a                     ; b = resultant sign , hl = add so far
  72++D1D0 3A B0 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ;
  73++D1D3                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  73++D1D3 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  73++D1D4 CA F9 D1    >                        jp	    z, dotzskipzero
  74++D1D7 5F                   ld          e,a                     ;
  75++D1D8 3A AA C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
  76++D1DB                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  76++D1DB A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  76++D1DC CA F9 D1    >                        jp	    z, dotzskipzero
  77++D1DF 57                   ld          d,a
  78++D1E0 ED 30                mul
  79++D1E2 E5                   push        hl                      ; save prev result
  80++D1E3 3A AB C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
  81++D1E6 21 B1 C0             ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
  82++D1E9 AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
  83++D1EA E6 80                and         $80                     ; a = sign of multiply
  84++D1EC 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of z lo & z scaled
  85++D1ED E1                   pop         hl
  86++D1EE 5A                   ld          e,d
  87++D1EF 16 00                ld          d,0
  88++D1F1 CD B6 94             call ADDHLDESignBC
  89++D1F4 32 75 84             ld          (varS),a
  90++D1F7 7D                   ld          a,l
  91++D1F8 C9                   ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
  92++D1F9              dotzskipzero:                               ; if we got here then z was zero so no component so just tidy up from last add
  93++D1F9 78                   ld          a,b
  94++D1FA 32 75 84             ld          (varS),a
  95++D1FD 7D                   ld          a,l
  96++D1FE C9                   ret
  97++D1FF              ;;;;       DotProductXX12XX15:
  98++D1FF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  99++D1FF              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 100++D1FF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
 101++D1FF              ;;;;       ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
 102++D1FF              ;;;;		; FMLTU	\ A=A*Q/256unsg using D as A and E as Q
 103++D1FF              ;;;;		mul
 104++D1FF              ;;;;       ld          b,d                     ; b as var T
 105++D1FF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 106++D1FF              ;;;;       ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
 107++D1FF              ;;;;       xor         (hl)
 108++D1FF              ;;;;       and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
 109++D1FF              ;;;;       ld          (varS),a                ; we did use c as S \ S	\ x-sign, but we actually need it in varS for BADD
 110++D1FF              ;;;; now we have b = XX12 x & norm x signed
 111++D1FF              ;;;; by here B = xlo & xscaled C = result sign
 112++D1FF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 113++D1FF              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 114++D1FF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
 115++D1FF              ;;;;		ld          d,a						; MISSED THIS EARLIER BUG FIX
 116++D1FF              ;;;;       mul
 117++D1FF              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 118++D1FF              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q = Y y-dot
 119++D1FF              ;;;;       ld          a,b                     ; get back T from above held in b
 120++D1FF              ;;;;       ld          (varR),a                ; R= b \ T	\ x-dot
 121++D1FF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
 122++D1FF              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
 123++D1FF              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
 124++D1FF              ;;;;       and         $80
 125++D1FF              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 126++D1FF              ;;;;       ld          (varT),a                ; var T	\ xdot+ydot
 127++D1FF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ; use d as  varQ        ; XX12+4	\ znormal lo to varQ
 128++D1FF              ;;;;       ld          e,a                     ; use e as var Q
 129++D1FF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
 130++D1FF              ;;;;       ld          d,a
 131++D1FF              ;;;;       mul
 132++D1FF              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 133++D1FF              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q	\ zdot
 134++D1FF              ;;;;       ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; copy T to R so R = resutl of previous calc
 135++D1FF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 136++D1FF              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
 137++D1FF              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
 138++D1FF              ;;;;       and         $80
 139++D1FF              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 140++D1FF              ;;;;       ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
 141++D1FF
# file closed: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
 674+ D1FF              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 675+ D1FF              ; scale Normal. IXL is xReg and A is loaded with XX17 holds the scale factor to apply
 676+ D1FF              ; Not Used in code      include "Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm"
 677+ D1FF              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 678+ D1FF                                      include "./Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
   1++D1FF              ScaleObjectDistance:
   2++D1FF              ; ">ScaleObjectDistance, scales camera location and returns c = scaling factor (equiv of X reg)"
   3++D1FF 3A 41 C3             ld      a,(QAddr)                   ; Hull byte #18 normals scaled by 2^Q% DtProd^XX2  their comment   Dot product gives  normals' visibility in XX2
   4++D202 4F                   ld      c,a                         ; c = Q factor for scaling of normals
   5++D203              LL90:                                       ; scaling object distance
   6++D203 3A A1 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; z_hi
   7++D206 47                   ld      b,a                         ; z_hi (yReg)
   8++D207                      ReturnIfAIsZero                     ; if zHi 0 test ifis object close/small, i.e. zhi already zero then we are done
   8++D207 A7          >                        and     a
   8++D208 C8          >                        ret     z
   9++D209              LL90Loop:
  10++D209              ; Loop dividing camera by 2 until zhi is 0 and updating scale factor
  11++D209 0C                   inc     c                           ; LL90+3 \ repeat INWK z brought closer, take Qscale X up
  12++D20A                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0yLo    ; cam Y /= 2
  12++D20A 2A 9D C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
  12++D20D CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  12++D20F CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  12++D211 22 9D C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),hl
  13++D214                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0xLo    ; cam X /= 2
  13++D214 2A 9A C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
  13++D217 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  13++D219 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  13++D21B 22 9A C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl
  14++D21E                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0zLo    ; cam Z /= 2
  14++D21E 2A A0 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
  14++D221 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  14++D223 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  14++D225 22 A0 C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),hl
  15++D228 7C                   ld      a,h                         ; last shift will result in zhi adjusted into h reg.
  16++D229                      JumpIfAIsNotZero LL90Loop           ; loop until z hi = 0 this gives scalinging in c
  16++D229 A7          >                        and     a
  16++D22A C2 09 D2    >                        jp	    nz,LL90Loop
  17++D22D C9                   ret
  18++D22E
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm

 682+ D22E              ; is the angle between the ship -> camera vector and the normal of the face as long as both are unit vectors soo we can check that normal z > 0
 683+ D22E              ; normal vector = cross product of ship ccordinates

 686+ D22E                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm
   1++D22E 7E           CopyFaceToXX15:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D22F 47                                   ld      b,a                                                    ;;;
   3++D230 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   4++D232 32 A7 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaledSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D235 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D236 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D238 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D239 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   9++D23B 32 A9 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D23E 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D23F CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D241 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  13++D243 32 AB C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D246 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D247 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D248 32 A6 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D24B 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++D24C 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  19++D24D 32 A8 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  20++D250 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  21++D251 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  22++D252 32 AA C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
  23++D255 C9                                   ret
  24++D256

 687+ D256                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
   1++D256 7E           CopyFaceToXX12:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D257 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save sign bits to b
   3++D258 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   4++D25A 32 AD C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D25D 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D25E CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D260 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D261 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   9++D263 32 AF C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D266 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D267 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D269 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  13++D26B 32 B1 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D26E 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D26F 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D270 32 AC C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D273 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++D274 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  19++D275 32 AE C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  20++D278 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  21++D279 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  22++D27A 32 B0 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a
  23++D27D C9                                   ret
  24++D27E
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
 688+ D27E              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 689+ D27E              ; Original loginc in EE29 (LL9 4 of 12)
 690+ D27E              ; Enters with XX4 = z distnace scaled to 1 .. 31
 691+ D27E              ; get number of faces * 4      FaceCntX4
 692+ D27E              ; return if no faces
 693+ D27E              ; get Face Normal scale factor FaceScale (XX17)
 694+ D27E              ; get ship pos z hi     (XX18)
 695+ D27E              ; While Z hi <> 0
 696+ D27E              ;    FaceScale = FaceScale + 1           (XX17)
 697+ D27E              ;    Ship pos y = ship pos y / 2         (XX18)
 698+ D27E              ;    ship pos x = ship pos x / 2         (XX18)
 699+ D27E              ;    ship pos z = ship pos z / 2         (XX18)
 700+ D27E              ; Loop
 701+ D27E              ; Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to Scaled         (XX15)
 702+ D27E              ; Get Dot Product of Scaled (XX15) and XX16 (pre inverted) into XX12
 703+ D27E              ; Copy XX12 into XX18
 704+ D27E              ; For each face
 705+ D27E              ;     Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 706+ D27E              ;     if normal visibility range  < XX4
 707+ D27E              ;        Get Face data into XX12
 708+ D27E              ;        if FaceScale (XX17) >= 4
 709+ D27E              ;            Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to scaled (XX15)                                                                  ::LL143
 710+ D27E              ;        else
 711+ D27E              ;           Copy FaceScale scaled to X  (XX17)
 712+ D27E              ;LabelOverflowLoop:
 713+ D27E              ;           Copy FaceData (XX12) to Scaled (XX15)                                                                   ::LL92
 714+ D27E              ;           While X >= 0
 715+ D27E              ;              X--                                                                                                  ::LL93
 716+ D27E              ;              if  x >= 0
 717+ D27E              ;                  XX15x = XX15x / 2
 718+ D27E              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
 719+ D27E              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
 720+ D27E              ;           loop
 721+ D27E              ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z                                                              ::LL94
 722+ D27E              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 723+ D27E              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 724+ D27E              ;               X = 1
 725+ D27E              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 726+ D27E              ;           else
 727+ D27E              ;              Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
 728+ D27E              ;           endif
 729+ D27E              ;           AddX = FaceData (XX12)x +  ShipPos (XX18)x
 730+ D27E              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 731+ D27E              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 732+ D27E              ;               X = 1
 733+ D27E              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 734+ D27E              ;           else
 735+ D27E              ;              Scaled (XX15) X = AddX
 736+ D27E              ;           endif
 737+ D27E              ;           AddY = FaceData (XX12)y +  ShipPos (XX18)y
 738+ D27E              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 739+ D27E              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 740+ D27E              ;               X = 1
 741+ D27E              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 742+ D27E              ;           else
 743+ D27E              ;              Scaled (XX15) Y = AddY
 744+ D27E              ;           endif
 745+ D27E              ;        endif
 746+ D27E              ;        calculate dot product XX12.XX15  (XX15x * XX12x /256 + XX15y * XX12y /256 + XX15z * XX12z /256)        ::LL89
 747+ D27E              ;        if dot product < 0
 748+ D27E              ;           set face visible
 749+ D27E              ;        else
 750+ D27E              ;           set face invisible
 751+ D27E              ;        end if
 752+ D27E              ;     else
 753+ D27E              ;       Set FaceVisibility to true
 754+ D27E              ;     end if
 755+ D27E              ; Next Face
 756+ D27E
 757+ D27E              ;line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
 758+ D27E
 759+ D27E              ;               [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
 760+ D27E              ;  visibility = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
 761+ D27E              ;               [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
 762+ D27E              ;
 763+ D27E              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 764+ D27E              ; line of sight (eye outwards dot face normal vector < 0
 765+ D27E              ; So lin eof sight = vector from 0,0,0 to ship pos, now we need to consider teh ship's facing
 766+ D27E              ; now if we add teh veector for teh normal(times magnitude)) to teh ship position we have the true center of the face
 767+ D27E              ; now we can calcualt teh dot product of this caulated vector and teh normal which if < 0 is goot. this means we use rot mat not inverted rotmat.
 768+ D27E
 769+ D27E                  include "./ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm
   1++D27E              ;    DEFINE DEBUGDRAWDISTANCE 1
   2++D27E                  DEFINE CHECKDOTSHIPDATA  1
   3++D27E              ;    DEFINE DEBUGFORCEFACEDRAW 1
   4++D27E 00           CurrentNormIdx  DB 0
   5++D27F              ; SomeFacesVisible:
   6++D27F              ; EE29:
   7++D27F
   8++D27F              ;   Backface cull logic  line of sight vector . face normal vector
   9++D27F              ;       line of sight vector . face normal vector
  10++D27F              ;       => line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
  11++D27F              ;       Where [x y z] =
  12++D27F              ;                                               [ [x y z] . sidev ]
  13++D27F              ;                    projected [x y z] vector = [ [x y z] . roofv ]
  14++D27F              ;                                               [ [x y z] . nosev ]
  15++D27F              ;
  16++D27F              ;   so project the [x y z] vector into the face's normal space
  17++D27F              ;  line of sight vector = projected [x y z] vector + face normal vector
  18++D27F              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev ]   [ normal_x ]
  19++D27F              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv ] + [ normal_y ]
  20++D27F              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev ]   [ normal_z ]
  21++D27F              ;
  22++D27F              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]
  23++D27F              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ]
  24++D27F              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]
  25++D27F              ;
  26++D27F              ; so
  27++D27F              ;              visibility = [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
  28++D27F              ;                            [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
  29++D27F              ;                           [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
  30++D27F              ;
  31++D27F              ; where face is visible if visibility < 0
  32++D27F              ;
  33++D27F              ;   so we set XX15 to [x y z] . sidev
  34++D27F              ;                     [x y z] . roofv
  35++D27F              ;                     [x y z] . nosev
  36++D27F              ;
  37++D27F
  38++D27F
  39++D27F
  40++D27F 3A A1 C0     ScaleDrawcam:           ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; if z hi is 0 then we have scaled XX18
  41++D282                                      JumpIfAIsZero .ScaleDone            ;
  41++D282 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  41++D283 CA AF D2    >                        jp	    z, .ScaleDone
  42++D286 2A 9A C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)        ; pull postition into registers
  43++D289 ED 5B 9D C0                          ld      de,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)        ; we only pull in if needed to save fetches
  44++D28D ED 4B A0 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)        ;
  45++D291 FD 2C        .ScaleNormalLoop:       inc     iyl                         ; Q goes up by one
  46++D293                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; divide cam position by 2
  46++D293 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  46++D295 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  47++D297                                      ShiftDERight1                       ;
  47++D297 CB 3A       >			   srl d
  47++D299 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  48++D29B                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ;
  48++D29B CB 38       >			   srl b
  48++D29D CB 19       >			   rr  c
  49++D29F 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; loop if not scaled down
  50++D2A0                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .ScaleNormalLoop     ;
  50++D2A0 A7          >                        and     a
  50++D2A1 C2 91 D2    >                        jp	    nz,.ScaleNormalLoop
  51++D2A4 22 9A C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl        ; save position back to XX18
  52++D2A7 ED 53 9D C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),de        ;
  53++D2AB ED 43 A0 C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),bc        ;
  54++D2AF FD 7D        .ScaleDone:             ld      a,iyl
  55++D2B1 32 7A 84                             ld      (varXX17),a                  ; XX17 = normal scale factor for current ship adjusted for camera
  56++D2B4 C9                                   ret
  57++D2B5
  58++D2B5 3A 28 C0     CheckVisible:           ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                 ; Is the ship behind us
  59++D2B8 E6 80        .CheckBehind:           and     SignOnly8Bit                 ; which means z sign is negative
  60++D2BA 20 31                                jr      nz,.ShipNoDraw               ; .
  61++D2BC 2A 26 C0     .CheckViewPort:         ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                 ; now check to see if its within 90 degree arc
  62++D2BF 7C                                   ld      a,h
  63++D2C0                                      JumpIfAGTENusng ShipMaxDistance, .ShipNoDraw
  63++D2C0 FE C0       >                        cp     ShipMaxDistance
  63++D2C2 D2 ED D2    >                        jp		nc,.ShipNoDraw
  64++D2C5 ED 5B 20 C0  .CheckXAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKxlo)                 ; if abs x > abx z then its out side of view port
  65++D2C9 CD 7D 9B                             call    compare16HLDE
  66++D2CC 38 1F                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
  67++D2CE ED 5B 23 C0  .CheckYAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKylo)                ; if abs y > abx z then its out side of view port
  68++D2D2 CD 7D 9B                             call    compare16HLDE
  69++D2D5 38 16                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
  70++D2D7                                      IFDEF   CHECKDOTSHIPDATA
  71++D2D7 3A 3C C3     .CheckDotV2:                ld      a,(DotAddr)
  72++D2DA                                          JumpIfAGTENusng h, .DrawFull
  72++D2DA BC          >                        cp     h
  72++D2DB D2 E1 D2    >                        jp		nc,.DrawFull
  73++D2DE C3 F3 D2                                 jp      .ShipIsADot
  74++D2E1 3A 54 C0     .DrawFull:                  ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)            ; its visible but a dot
  75++D2E4 F6 40                                    or      ShipIsVisible               ; Visible and not a dot
  76++D2E6 E6 F7                                    and     ShipIsNotDot                ;
  77++D2E8 32 54 C0                                 ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a            ;
  78++D2EB                                          ClearCarryFlag
  78++D2EB B7          >                        or a
  79++D2EC C9                                       ret
  80++D2ED                                      ELSE
  81++D2ED ~            .CalculateXX4:              ShiftHLRight1                       ; hl = z pos / 8
  82++D2ED ~                                        ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
  83++D2ED ~                                        ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
  84++D2ED ~                                        ld      a,h
  85++D2ED ~                                        srl     a                           ; if a / 16 <> 0 then ship is a dot
  86++D2ED ~            .DrawAsDotCheck:            JumpIfNotZero   .ShipIsADot
  87++D2ED ~                                        ; Check visbility distance
  88++D2ED ~            .SetXX4Dist:                ;break
  89++D2ED ~                                        ld      a,l
  90++D2ED ~                                        rra                                 ; l may have had bit 0 of h carried in
  91++D2ED ~                                        srl     a                           ; so move it to bit 4 giving A as distance $000xxxxx
  92++D2ED ~                                        srl     a
  93++D2ED ~                                        srl     a
  94++D2ED ~                                        ld      (UBnkDrawAllFaces),a        ; XX4 = "all faces" distance
  95++D2ED ~                                        ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)            ; its visible but a dot
  96++D2ED ~                                        or      ShipIsVisible               ; Visible and not a dot
  97++D2ED ~                                        and     ShipIsNotDot                ;
  98++D2ED ~                                        ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a            ;
  99++D2ED ~                                        ClearCarryFlag
 100++D2ED ~                                        ret
 101++D2ED                                      ENDIF
 102++D2ED              .ShipNoDraw:            ClearMemBitN  UBnkaiatkecm  , ShipIsVisibleBitNbr ; Assume its hidden
 102++D2ED 21 54 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
 102++D2F0 CB B6       >                        res     ShipIsVisibleBitNbr,(hl)
 103++D2F2 C9                                   ret
 104++D2F3 3A 54 C0     .ShipIsADot:            ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)            ; its visible but a dot
 105++D2F6                                      IFDEF DEBUGDRAWDISTANCE
 106++D2F6 ~                                        or      ShipIsVisible   ;
 107++D2F6                                      ELSE
 108++D2F6 F6 48                                    or      ShipIsVisible | ShipIsDot   ;
 109++D2F8                                      ENDIF
 110++D2F8 32 54 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a            ;
 111++D2FB C9                                   ret
 112++D2FC
 113++D2FC
 114++D2FC              ; TODO remove all teh processing of rotmat to load craft to camera as its already been done
 115++D2FC              CullV2:                 ReturnIfMemisZero FaceCtX4Addr      ;
 115++D2FC 3A 3B C3    >                        ld   a,(FaceCtX4Addr)
 115++D2FF A7          >                        and a
 115++D300 C8          >                        ret    z
 116++D301                                     ; break
 117++D301 CD B8 CD                             call    CopyRotmatToTransMat        ; XX16 = UBNKRotMat
 118++D304 CD 4F 7D                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197          ; scale rotation matrix in XX16
 119++D307 CD 70 D0                             call    LoadCraftToCamera           ; XX18 = camera
 120++D30A                                      ;call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Copy the camera to XX15 as signed 15 bit
 121++D30A 3A 41 C3     .BackfaceLoop:          ld      a,(QAddr)                   ;
 122++D30D FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = scale factor
 123++D30F              ; By this point XX18 = scaled draw cam and iyl = scale factor
 124++D30F CD 7F D2                             call    ScaleDrawcam                ; XX18 = scaled camera XX17 = scale
 125++D312 CD 94 D0                             call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Xx18 -> xx15 sign + 15 bit
 126++D315 CD A6 7C     .LL91:                  call    XX12EquNodeDotXX16          ; xx12 = Scaled Camera . Rotation matrix (Note Xx16 no Xx16 inv)
 127++D318 CD 01 D0                             call    CopyXX12ScaledToXX18        ; now xx18 = XX12 = xx15.xx16
 128++D31B 21 01 C5     .PrepNormals:           ld      hl,UBnkHullNormals                                                                                                 ;;; V = address of Normal start
 129++D31E 22 75 83                             ld      (varV),hl
 130++D321 3A 3B C3                             ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)                                        ; For each face
 131++D324 CB 3F                                srl     a                                              ;
 132++D326 CB 3F                                srl     a                                              ;
 133++D328 47                                   ld      b,a                                            ;
 134++D329 AF                                   xor     a
 135++D32A 32 7E D2                             ld      (CurrentNormIdx),a                                          ; used to increment up face incdex as b decrements
 136++D32D E5           .ProcessNormalsLoop:    push    hl
 137++D32E C5                                   push    bc
 138++D32F 7E           .LL86:                  ld      a,(hl)                                         ; Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 139++D330 E6 1F                                and     $1F                                            ; if normal visibility range  < XX4
 140++D332 E5                                   push    hl
 141++D333 21 52 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkDrawAllFaces
 142++D336 BE                                   cp      (hl)
 143++D337 E1                                   pop     hl
 144++D338                                      IFDEF DEBUGFORCEFACEDRAW
 145++D338 ~                                        jp      .FaceVisible
 146++D338                                      ELSE
 147++D338 DA 7D D4                                 jp      c,.FaceVisible              ; then we always draw
 148++D33B                                      ENDIF
 149++D33B              ; This bit needs to be added to force face visible
 150++D33B CD 56 D2     .LL87:                  call    CopyFaceToXX12              ; XX12 = normal (repolaced scale version) as a working copy
 151++D33E 3A 7A 84                             ld      a,(XX17)                    ; a = q scale XX17 cauclated by the call to ScaleDrawcam
 152++D341 47                                   ld      b,a
 153++D342                                      JumpIfALTNusng 4,.ScaleNormByXX17   ; if q >= 4 then is so big we don;t factor in + normal for dot product
 153++D342 FE 04       >                        cp      4
 153++D344 DA 7F D3    >                        jp		c, .ScaleNormByXX17
 154++D347 CD 4B D0     .LL143:                 call    CopyXX18toXX15              ; and we just set XX15 = scaled Camera dot rotation matrix
 155++D34A C3 0E D4                             jp      .DoneScalingIntoXX15        ; Now Process XX12 normal
 156++D34D 3A 9A C0     .Ovflw:                 ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)         ; divide camera by 2 if overflow
 157++D350 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; which is held in XX18
 158++D352 32 9A C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),a         ; .
 159++D355 3A A0 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)         ; .
 160++D358 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 161++D35A 32 A0 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),a         ; .
 162++D35D 3A 9D C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)         ; .
 163++D360 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 164++D362 32 9D C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),a        ; .
 165++D365 06 01        .ScaleXScaledAgain:     ld      b,1                         ; set scale to 1 so we divide original normal by 2 into face and try again and hope we didn't scaled down XX12 earlier so if we did then we must be in the do doo as the object was obscenely large and very close
 166++D367                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled         ; Divide XX15 by 2^B
 166++D367 3A A6 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 166++D36A CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 166++D36C 32 A6 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 167++D36F                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled         ;
 167++D36F 3A A8 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 167++D372 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 167++D374 32 A8 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 168++D377                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled         ;
 168++D377 3A AA C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 168++D37A CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 168++D37C 32 AA C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 169++D37F              ; if we jumped to here scale factor < 4 so we copy in normal to XX15 (scaled) LL92
 170++D37F              .ScaleNormByXX17:       ;ld      b,a
 171++D37F CD 26 D0                             call    CopyXX12toXX15
 172++D382 05           .LL93                   dec     b
 173++D383 FA A2 D3                             jp      m, .ScaledNorm
 174++D386              .LL93Loop:              ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled        ; Divide XX15 by 2^B, I think this should be really XX12 and is a bug in the original code
 174++D386 3A A6 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 174++D389 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 174++D38B 32 A6 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 175++D38E                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled        ;
 175++D38E 3A A8 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 175++D391 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 175++D393 32 A8 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 176++D396                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled        ;
 176++D396 3A AA C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 176++D399 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 176++D39B 32 AA C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 177++D39E 05                                   dec     b                          ;
 178++D39F F2 86 D3                             jp      p,.LL93Loop                ; Now we have XX15 as scaled Normal, XX15 as camera, don;t really knwo why as cals work on XX12 and XX18
 179++D3A2              .ScaledNorm:            ;ORIG CODE DOES NOT HAVE THIS call    CopyXX15ToXX12 ; DEBUG as XX15 shoudl be a sacled nromal
 180++D3A2              ; Add normal to XX15
 181++D3A2              ; if we jumped here direct from LL143 then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q, XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = drawcam scaled also
 182++D3A2              ; if we jumped here via scaling       then XX15 = normal scaled by Q,  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX16 = drawcam scaled
 183++D3A2              ; if we hit an overflow               then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = (drawcam scaled / 2 ) / 2^ nbr overflows (if we cam in vai scaling then its a mess?
 184++D3A2              ; So LL94 is wrong as it shoud be operating on XX12 not XX15
 185++D3A2              .LL94:                  ldCopyByte UBnkZScaled, varR        ; ldCopyByte  UBnkZScaled,     varR  ; if we jumped direct XX15 = drawcam scaled, Xx12 = normal xx18 = drawcam
 185++D3A2 3A AA C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkZScaled)
 185++D3A5 32 74 84    >                        ld       (varR),a
 186++D3A8                                      ldCopyByte UBnkXX12zSign, varS      ; ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varS  ; if we did scaling then xx15 = norm scaled XX18 = drawcam
 186++D3A8 3A B1 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zSign)
 186++D3AB 32 75 84    >                        ld       (varS),a
 187++D3AE                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam Z signed
 187++D3AE 3A A0 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
 187++D3B1 32 73 84    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 188++D3B4 3A A2 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)        ; .
 189++D3B7 CD 4D 9E                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = drawcam Z dot + z
 190++D3BA DA 4D D3                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 191++D3BD 32 AA C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 192++D3C0                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkZScaledSign   ;
 192++D3C0 3A 75 84    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 192++D3C3 32 AB C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaledSign),a
 193++D3C6                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaled,     varR   ; SR = normal X
 193++D3C6 3A A6 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXScaled)
 193++D3C9 32 74 84    >                        ld       (varR),a
 194++D3CC                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xSign,   varS   ; .
 194++D3CC 3A AD C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 194++D3CF 32 75 84    >                        ld       (varS),a
 195++D3D2                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam x dot
 195++D3D2 3A 9A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
 195++D3D5 32 73 84    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 196++D3D8 3A 9C C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)        ; .
 197++D3DB CD 4D 9E                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal x + drawcam x dot
 198++D3DE DA 4D D3                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 199++D3E1 32 A6 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 200++D3E4                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkXScaledSign   ; .
 200++D3E4 3A 75 84    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 200++D3E7 32 A7 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaledSign),a
 201++D3EA                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled, varR       ; SR = normal Y
 201++D3EA 3A A8 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkYScaled)
 201++D3ED 32 74 84    >                        ld       (varR),a
 202++D3F0                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12ySign, varS     ; .
 202++D3F0 3A AF C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12ySign)
 202++D3F3 32 75 84    >                        ld       (varS),a
 203++D3F6                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0yLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam y dot
 203++D3F6 3A 9D C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
 203++D3F9 32 73 84    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 204++D3FC 3A 9F C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)        ; .
 205++D3FF CD 4D 9E                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal y + drawcam y dot
 206++D402 DA 4D D3                             jp      c,.Ovflw                    ; .
 207++D405 32 A8 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a             ; XX15 Y = SA
 208++D408                                      ldCopyByte   varS, UBnkYScaledSign  ; .
 208++D408 3A 75 84    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 208++D40B 32 A9 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaledSign),a
 209++D40E              ; calculate dot product LL89
 210++D40E              .DoneScalingIntoXX15:   ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo, varQ       ; Q = norm X XX12
 210++D40E 3A AC C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xLo)
 210++D411 32 73 84    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 211++D414 3A A6 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)             ; A = XX15 X
 212++D417 CD B4 9D                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 213++D41A 32 91 84                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 214++D41D 3A AD C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXX12xSign)           ; S = sign of XX15 X * XX12 X
 215++D420 21 A7 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkXScaledSign          ; .
 216++D423 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 217++D424 32 75 84                             ld      (varS),a                    ; .
 218++D427                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo, varQ       ; Q = norm Y XX12
 218++D427 3A AE C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 218++D42A 32 73 84    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 219++D42D 3A A8 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)             ; A = XX15 Y
 220++D430 CD B4 9D                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 221++D433 32 73 84                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 222++D436                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; R = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 222++D436 3A 91 84    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 222++D439 32 74 84    >                        ld       (varR),a
 223++D43C 3A AF C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)         ; A = sign of XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 224++D43F 21 A9 C0                             ld      hl, UBnkYScaledSign         ; .
 225++D442 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 226++D443 CD 4D 9E                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = SR+AQ = (X calc) + (Y calc)
 227++D446 32 91 84                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 228++D449                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12zLo, varQ       ; Q = XX12 Z
 228++D449 3A B0 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zLo)
 228++D44C 32 73 84    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 229++D44F 3A AA C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaled)           ; A = XX15 Z
 230++D452 CD B4 9D                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 231++D455 32 73 84                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 232++D458                                      ldCopyByte  varT, varR              ; R = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 232++D458 3A 91 84    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 232++D45B 32 74 84    >                        ld       (varR),a
 233++D45E 3A AB C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)       ; A = sign of XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 234++D461 21 B1 C0                             ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign           ; .
 235++D464 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 236++D465 CD 4D 9E                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = ((X+Y signed)) (Z signed)
 237++D468 FE 00                                cp      0                           ; was the result 0, if so then there are scenarios where SAEquSRPlusAQ can return -ve 0
 238++D46A 28 08                                jr      z,.FaceNotVisible           ; in which case face is not visible
 239++D46C 3A 75 84                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; if the cacl was a negative number then its visible
 240++D46F ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; this should test S not A
 241++D472 20 09                                jr      nz,.FaceVisible                                      ;        if dot product < 0 set face visible
 242++D474 3A 7E D2     .FaceNotVisible:         ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 243++D477 CD BE CE                             call        SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 244++D47A C3 83 D4                             jp          .ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
 245++D47D 3A 7E D2     .FaceVisible:            ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 246++D480 CD B5 CE                             call        SetFaceAVisible
 247++D483 21 7E D2     .ProcessNormalLoopEnd:  ld          hl, CurrentNormIdx
 248++D486 34                                   inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 249++D487 C1                                   pop         bc
 250++D488 E1                                   pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 251++D489 3E 04                                ld          a,4
 252++D48B ED 31                                add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry
 253++D48D 22 75 83                             ld          (varV),hl               ; save as we need it again
 254++D490 05                                   dec         b
 255++D491 C2 2D D3                             jp          nz,.ProcessNormalsLoop
 256++D494 C9                                   ret
 257++D495
