 772+ D495              ;--LL52 to LL55-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 773+ D495
 774+ D495              TransposeXX12NodeToXX15:
 775+ D495                      ldCopyByte  UBnKxsgn,UbnkXPointSign           ; UBnkXSgn => XX15+2 x sign
 775+ D495 3A 22 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnKxsgn)
 775+ D498 32 A8 C0    >                        ld       (UbnkXPointSign),a
 776+ D49B ED 4B AC C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12xLo)                   ; c = lo, b = sign   XX12XLoSign
 777+ D49F A8                   xor         b                                   ; a = UBnkKxsgn (or XX15+2) here and b = XX12xsign,  XX12+1 \ rotated xnode h                                                                             ;;;           a = a XOR XX12+1                              XCALC
 778+ D4A0 FA B6 D4             jp          m,NodeNegativeX                                                                                                                                                            ;;;           if sign is +ve                        ::LL52   XCALC
 779+ D4A3              ; XX15 [0,1] = INWK[0]+ XX12[0] + 256*INWK[1]                                                                                       ;;;          while any of x,y & z hi <> 0
 780+ D4A3              NodeXPositiveX:
 781+ D4A3 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; We picked up XX12+0 above in bc Xlo
 782+ D4A4 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC
 783+ D4A6 2A 20 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKxlo)                       ; hl = XX1 UBNKxLo
 784+ D4A9 26 00                ld          h,0                                 ; but we don;t want the sign
 785+ D4AB 09                   add         hl,bc                               ; its a 16 bit add
 786+ D4AC 22 A6 C0             ld          (UbnkXPoint),hl                    ; And written to XX15 0,1
 787+ D4AF AF                   xor         a                                   ; we want to write 0 as sign bit (not in original code)
 788+ D4B0 32 A8 C0             ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a
 789+ D4B3 C3 D2 D4             jp          FinishedThisNodeX
 790+ D4B6              ; If we get here then _sign and vertv_ have different signs so do subtract
 791+ D4B6              NodeNegativeX:
 792+ D4B6              LL52X:                                                 ;
 793+ D4B6 2A 20 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKxlo)                       ; Coord
 794+ D4B9 ED 4B AC C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12xLo)                   ; XX12
 795+ D4BD 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; XX12 lo byte only
 796+ D4BF ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = UBnKx - UBnkXX12xLo
 797+ D4C1 F2 CF D4             jp          p,SetAndMopX                       ; if result is positive skip to write back
 798+ D4C4              NodeXNegSignChangeX:
 799+ D4C4              ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
 800+ D4C4 CD 93 9B             call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
 801+ D4C7 3A A8 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointSign)                 ; XX15+2
 802+ D4CA EE 80                xor         $80                                 ; Flip bit 7
 803+ D4CC 32 A8 C0             ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a                 ; XX15+2
 804+ D4CF              SetAndMopX:
 805+ D4CF 22 20 C0             ld          (UBnKxlo),hl                       ; XX15+0
 806+ D4D2              FinishedThisNodeX:
 807+ D4D2
 808+ D4D2              LL53:
 809+ D4D2
 810+ D4D2                      ldCopyByte  UBnKysgn,UbnkYPointSign           ; UBnkXSgn => XX15+2 x sign
 810+ D4D2 3A 25 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnKysgn)
 810+ D4D5 32 AB C0    >                        ld       (UbnkYPointSign),a
 811+ D4D8 ED 4B AE C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12yLo)                   ; c = lo, b = sign   XX12XLoSign
 812+ D4DC A8                   xor         b                                   ; a = UBnkKxsgn (or XX15+2) here and b = XX12xsign,  XX12+1 \ rotated xnode h                                                                             ;;;           a = a XOR XX12+1                              XCALC
 813+ D4DD FA F3 D4             jp          m,NodeNegativeY                                                                                                                                                            ;;;           if sign is +ve                        ::LL52   XCALC
 814+ D4E0              ; XX15 [0,1] = INWK[0]+ XX12[0] + 256*INWK[1]                                                                                       ;;;          while any of x,y & z hi <> 0
 815+ D4E0              NodeXPositiveY:
 816+ D4E0 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; We picked up XX12+0 above in bc Xlo
 817+ D4E1 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC
 818+ D4E3 2A 23 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKylo)                       ; hl = XX1 UBNKxLo
 819+ D4E6 26 00                ld          h,0                                 ; but we don;t want the sign
 820+ D4E8 09                   add         hl,bc                               ; its a 16 bit add
 821+ D4E9 22 A9 C0             ld          (UbnkYPoint),hl                    ; And written to XX15 0,1
 822+ D4EC AF                   xor         a                                   ; we want to write 0 as sign bit (not in original code)
 823+ D4ED 32 A8 C0             ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a
 824+ D4F0 C3 0F D5             jp          FinishedThisNodeY
 825+ D4F3              ; If we get here then _sign and vertv_ have different signs so do subtract
 826+ D4F3              NodeNegativeY:
 827+ D4F3              LL52Y:                                                 ;
 828+ D4F3 2A 23 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKylo)                       ; Coord
 829+ D4F6 ED 4B AE C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12yLo)                   ; XX12
 830+ D4FA 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; XX12 lo byte only
 831+ D4FC ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = UBnKx - UBnkXX12xLo
 832+ D4FE F2 0C D5             jp          p,SetAndMopY                       ; if result is positive skip to write back
 833+ D501              NodeXNegSignChangeY:
 834+ D501              ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
 835+ D501 CD 93 9B             call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
 836+ D504 3A AB C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointSign)                 ; XX15+2
 837+ D507 EE 80                xor         $80                                 ; Flip bit 7
 838+ D509 32 AB C0             ld          (UbnkYPointSign),a                 ; XX15+2
 839+ D50C              SetAndMopY:
 840+ D50C 22 23 C0             ld          (UBnKylo),hl                       ; XX15+0
 841+ D50F              FinishedThisNodeY:
 842+ D50F
 843+ D50F
 844+ D50F              TransposeZ:
 845+ D50F              LL55:                                                   ; Both y signs arrive here, Onto z                                          ;;;
 846+ D50F 3A B1 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zSign)                   ; XX12+5    \ rotated znode hi                                              ;;;
 847+ D512                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,NegativeNodeZ                    ; LL56 -ve Z node                                                           ;;;
 847+ D512 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 847+ D514 C2 28 D5    >                        jp      nz,NegativeNodeZ
 848+ D517 3A B0 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)                     ; XX12+4 \ rotated znode lo                                                 ;;;
 849+ D51A 2A 26 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; INWK+6    \ zorg lo                                                       ;;;
 850+ D51D ED 31                add         hl,a                                ; hl = INWKZ + XX12z                                                        ;;;
 851+ D51F 7D                   ld          a,l
 852+ D520 32 91 84             ld          (varT),a                            ;                                                                           ;;;
 853+ D523 7C                   ld          a,h
 854+ D524 32 72 84             ld          (varU),a                            ; now z = hl or U(hi).T(lo)                                                 ;;;
 855+ D527 C9                   ret                                             ; LL57  \ Node additions done, z = U.T                                      ;;;
 856+ D528              ; Doing additions and scalings for each visible node around here                                                                    ;;;
 857+ D528              NegativeNodeZ:
 858+ D528              LL56:                                                   ; Enter XX12+5 -ve Z node case  from above                                  ;;;
 859+ D528 2A 26 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; INWK+6 \ z org lo                                                         ;;;
 860+ D52B ED 4B B0 C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12zLo)                    ; XX12+4    \ rotated z node lo                                                 ......................................................
 861+ D52F 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; upper byte will be garbage
 862+ D531                      ClearCarryFlag
 862+ D531 B7          >                        or a
 863+ D532 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; 6502 used carry flag compliment
 864+ D534 7D                   ld          a,l
 865+ D535 32 91 84             ld          (varT),a                            ; t = result low
 866+ D538 7C                   ld          a,h
 867+ D539 32 72 84             ld          (varU),a                            ; u = result high
 868+ D53C E2 49 D5             jp          po,MakeNodeClose                    ; no overflow to parity would be clear
 869+ D53F              LL56Overflow:
 870+ D53F FE 00                cp          0                                   ; is varU 0?
 871+ D541 20 16                jr          nz,NodeAdditionsDone                ; Enter Node additions done, UT=z
 872+ D543 3A 91 84             ld          a,(varT)                            ; T \ restore z lo
 873+ D546                      ReturnIfAGTENusng 4                              ; >= 4 ? zlo big enough, Enter Node additions done.
 873+ D546 FE 04       >                        cp    4
 873+ D548 D0          >                        ret	 nc
 874+ D549              MakeNodeClose:
 875+ D549              LL140:                                                  ; else make node close
 876+ D549 AF                   xor         a                                   ; hi This needs tuning to use a 16 bit variable
 877+ D54A 32 72 84             ld          (varU),a                            ; U
 878+ D54D 3E 04                ld          a,4                                 ; lo
 879+ D54F 32 91 84             ld          (varT),a                            ; T
 880+ D552 C9                   ret
 881+ D553              ;--LL49-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 882+ D553              ProcessVisibleNode:
 883+ D553              RotateNode:                                                                                                                         ;;;
 884+ D553 CD D0 CF             call        XX12EquXX15DotProductXX16                                                                                       ;;;           call      XX12=XX15.XX16
 885+ D556              LL52LL53LL54LL55
 886+ D556              TransposeNode:
 887+ D556 CD 95 D4             call        TransposeXX12NodeToXX15
 888+ D559
 889+ D559              ; ......................................................                                                         ;;;
 890+ D559              NodeAdditionsDone:
 891+ D559              Scale16BitTo8Bit:
 892+ D559              LL57:                                                   ; Enter Node additions done, z=T.U set up from LL55
 893+ D559 3A 72 84             ld          a,(varU)                            ; U \ z hi
 894+ D55C 21 A7 C0             ld          hl,UbnkXPointHi
 895+ D55F B6                   or          (hl)                                ; XX15+1    \ x hi
 896+ D560 21 AA C0             ld          hl,UbnkYPointHi
 897+ D563 B6                   or          (hl)                                ; XX15+4    \ y hi
 898+ D564              AreXYZHiAllZero:
 899+ D564 28 2B                jr          z,NodeScalingDone                   ; if X, Y, Z = 0  exit loop down once hi U rolled to 0
 900+ D566              DivideXYZBy2:
 901+ D566                      ShiftMem16Right1    UbnkXPoint                  ; XX15[0,1]
 901+ D566 2A A6 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UbnkXPoint)
 901+ D569 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
 901+ D56B CB 1D       >                    rr    l
 901+ D56D 22 A6 C0    >                    ld    (UbnkXPoint),hl
 902+ D570                      ShiftMem16Right1    UbnkYPoint                  ; XX15[3,4]
 902+ D570 2A A9 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UbnkYPoint)
 902+ D573 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
 902+ D575 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
 902+ D577 22 A9 C0    >                    ld    (UbnkYPoint),hl
 903+ D57A 3A 72 84             ld          a,(varU)                            ; U \ z hi
 904+ D57D 67                   ld          h,a
 905+ D57E 3A 91 84             ld          a,(varT)                            ; T \ z lo
 906+ D581 6F                   ld          l,a
 907+ D582                      ShiftHLRight1
 907+ D582 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 907+ D584 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 908+ D586 7C                   ld          a,h
 909+ D587 32 72 84             ld          (varU),a
 910+ D58A 7D                   ld          a,l
 911+ D58B 32 91 84             ld          (varT),a                            ; T \ z lo
 912+ D58E C3 59 D5             jp          Scale16BitTo8Bit                    ; loop U
 913+ D591              NodeScalingDone:
 914+ D591              LL60:                                                   ; hi U rolled to 0, exited loop above.
 915+ D591              ProjectNodeToScreen:
 916+ D591                      ldCopyByte  varT,varQ                           ; T =>  Q   \ zdist lo
 916+ D591 3A 91 84    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 916+ D594 32 73 84    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 917+ D597 3A A6 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointLo)                    ; XX15  \ rolled x lo
 918+ D59A 21 73 84             ld          hl,varQ
 919+ D59D BE                   cp          (hl)                                ; Q
 920+ D59E                      JumpIfALTusng DoSmallAngle                      ; LL69 if xdist < zdist hop over jmp to small x angle
 920+ D59E DA A7 D5    >                        jp		c,DoSmallAngle
 921+ D5A1 CD 54 9F             call        RequAdivQ                           ; LL61  \ visit up  R = A/Q = x/z
 922+ D5A4 C3 AF D5             jp          SkipSmallAngle                      ; LL65  \ hop over small xangle
 923+ D5A7              DoSmallAngle:                                           ; small x angle
 924+ D5A7              LL69:
 925+ D5A7              ; TODO check if we need to retain BC as this trashes it
 926+ D5A7              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 927+ D5A7              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 928+ D5A7 47                   ld      b,a
 929+ D5A8 CD 12 9A             call    DIV16UNDOC
 930+ D5AB 79                   ld      a,c
 931+ D5AC 32 74 84             ld      (varR),a
 932+ D5AF               ;;;       call        RequAmul256divQ                     ; LL28  \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q byte for remainder of division
 933+ D5AF              SkipSmallAngle:
 934+ D5AF              ScaleX:
 935+ D5AF              LL65:                                                   ; both continue for scaling based on z
 936+ D5AF 3A A8 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointSign)                  ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 937+ D5B2                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,NegativeXPoint                 ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 937+ D5B2 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 937+ D5B4 C2 C7 D5    >                        jp      nz,NegativeXPoint
 938+ D5B7              ; ......................................................
 939+ D5B7              PositiveXPoint:
 940+ D5B7 3A 74 84             ld          a,(varR)
 941+ D5BA 6F                   ld          l,a
 942+ D5BB 3A 72 84             ld          a,(varU)
 943+ D5BE 67                   ld          h,a
 944+ D5BF 3E 80                ld          a,ScreenCenterX
 945+ D5C1 ED 31                add         hl,a
 946+ D5C3 EB                   ex          de,hl
 947+ D5C4 C3 D7 D5             jp          StoreXPoint
 948+ D5C7              NegativeXPoint:
 949+ D5C7              LL62:                                                   ; Arrive from LL65 just below, screen for -ve RU onto XX3 heap, index X=CNT ;;;
 950+ D5C7 3A 74 84             ld          a,(varR)
 951+ D5CA 6F                   ld          l,a
 952+ D5CB 3A 72 84             ld          a,(varU)
 953+ D5CE 67                   ld          h,a
 954+ D5CF 0E 80                ld          c,ScreenCenterX
 955+ D5D1 06 00                ld          b,0
 956+ D5D3                      ClearCarryFlag
 956+ D5D3 B7          >                        or a
 957+ D5D4 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = RU-ScreenCenterX
 958+ D5D6 EB                   ex          de,hl
 959+ D5D7              StoreXPoint:                                            ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 960+ D5D7 FD 73 00             ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point
 961+ D5DA FD 72 01             ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
 962+ D5DD FD 23                inc         iy
 963+ D5DF FD 23                inc         iy
 964+ D5E1              ; ......................................................
 965+ D5E1              LL66:
 966+ D5E1              ProcessYPoint:
 967+ D5E1 AF                   xor         a                                   ; y hi = 0
 968+ D5E2 32 72 84             ld          (varU),a                            ; U
 969+ D5E5                      ldCopyByte  varT,varQ                           ; Q \ zdist lo
 969+ D5E5 3A 91 84    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 969+ D5E8 32 73 84    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 970+ D5EB 3A A9 C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointLo)                    ; XX15+3 \ rolled y low
 971+ D5EE 21 73 84             ld          hl,varQ
 972+ D5F1 BE                   cp          (hl)                                ; Q
 973+ D5F2                      JumpIfALTusng SmallYHop                         ; if ydist < zdist hop to small yangle
 973+ D5F2 DA FB D5    >                        jp		c,SmallYHop
 974+ D5F5              SmallYPoint:
 975+ D5F5 CD 54 9F             call        RequAdivQ                           ; LL61  \ else visit up R = A/Q = y/z
 976+ D5F8 C3 FE D5             jp          SkipYScale                          ; LL68 hop over small y yangle
 977+ D5FB              SmallYHop:
 978+ D5FB              LL67:                                                   ; Arrive from LL66 above if XX15+3 < Q \ small yangle
 979+ D5FB CD 31 9F             call        RequAmul256divQ                     ; LL28  \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q byte for remainder of division
 980+ D5FE              SkipYScale:
 981+ D5FE              LL68:                                                   ; both carry on, also arrive from LL66, yscaled based on z
 982+ D5FE 3A AB C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointSign)                  ; XX15+5 \ sign of X dist
 983+ D601 CB 7F                bit         7,a
 984+ D603 C2 16 D6             jp          nz,NegativeYPoint                   ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 985+ D606              PositiveYPoint:
 986+ D606 3A 74 84             ld          a,(varR)
 987+ D609 6F                   ld          l,a
 988+ D60A 3A 72 84             ld          a,(varU)
 989+ D60D 67                   ld          h,a
 990+ D60E 3E 60                ld          a,ScreenHeightHalf
 991+ D610 ED 31                add         hl,a
 992+ D612 EB                   ex          de,hl
 993+ D613 C3 26 D6             jp          LL50
 994+ D616              NegativeYPoint:
 995+ D616              LL70:                                                   ; Arrive from LL65 just below, screen for -ve RU onto XX3 heap, index X=CNT ;;;
 996+ D616 3A 74 84             ld          a,(varR)
 997+ D619 6F                   ld          l,a
 998+ D61A 3A 72 84             ld          a,(varU)
 999+ D61D 67                   ld          h,a
1000+ D61E 0E 60                ld          c,ScreenHeightHalf
1001+ D620 06 00                ld          b,0
1002+ D622                      ClearCarryFlag
1002+ D622 B7          >                        or a
1003+ D623 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = RU-ScreenCenterX
1004+ D625 EB                   ex          de,hl
1005+ D626              LL50:                                                   ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1006+ D626 FD 73 00             ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point
1007+ D629 FD 72 01             ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1008+ D62C FD 23                inc         iy
1009+ D62E FD 23                inc         iy
1010+ D630 C9                   ret
1011+ D631              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1012+ D631              ;;;     Byte 0 = X magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1013+ D631              ;;;     Byte 1 = Y magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1014+ D631              ;;;     Byte 2 = Z magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1015+ D631              ;;;     Byte 3 = Sign Bits of Vertex 7=X 6=Y 5 = Z 4 - 0 = visibility beyond which vertix is not shown
1016+ D631              CopyNodeToXX15:
1017+ D631                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkXScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1017+ D631 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1017+ D632 32 A6 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
1018+ D635 23                   inc         hl
1019+ D636                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkYScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1019+ D636 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1019+ D637 32 A8 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
1020+ D63A 23                   inc         hl
1021+ D63B                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkZScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1021+ D63B 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1021+ D63C 32 AA C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
1022+ D63F 23                   inc         hl
1023+ D640              PopulateXX15SignBits:
1024+ D640              ; Simplfied for debugging, needs optimising back to original DEBUG TODO
1025+ D640 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
1026+ D641 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ; copy sign and visibility to c
1027+ D642 47                   ld          b,a
1028+ D643 E6 80                and         $80                                 ; keep high 3 bits
1029+ D645 32 A7 C0             ld          (UBnkXScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1030+ D648 78                   ld          a,b
1031+ D649 E6 40                and         $40
1032+ D64B CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1033+ D64D 32 A9 C0             ld          (UBnkYScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1034+ D650 78                   ld          a,b
1035+ D651 E6 20                and         $20
1036+ D653 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1037+ D655 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1038+ D657 32 AB C0             ld          (UBnkZScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1039+ D65A 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; returns a with visibility sign byte
1040+ D65B E6 1F                and         $1F                                 ; visibility is held in bits 0 to 4                                                              ;;;     A = XX15 Signs AND &1F (to get lower 5 visibility)
1041+ D65D 32 91 84             ld          (varT),a                            ; and store in varT as its needed later
1042+ D660 C9                   ret
1043+ D661
1044+ D661              ;;;     Byte 4 = High 4 bits Face 2 Index Low 4 bits = Face 1 Index
1045+ D661              ;;;     Byte 5 = High 4 bits Face 4 Index Low 4 bits = Face 3 Index
1046+ D661              ;..............................................................................................................................
1047+ D661              ProcessANode:                                           ; Start loop on Nodes for visibility, each node has 4 faces associated with ;;; For each node (point) in model                  ::LL48
1048+ D661              LL48GetScale:
1049+ D661 3A 61 83             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; get Normal visible range into e before we copy node
1050+ D664 5F                   ld          e,a
1051+ D665 CD 31 D6             call        CopyNodeToXX15
1052+ D668              LL48GetVertices:
1053+ D668              LL48GetVertSignAndVisDist:
1054+ D668                      JumpIfALTNusng e,NodeIsNotVisible               ; if XX4 > Visibility distance then vertext too far away , next vertex.                                             ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1054+ D668 BB          >                        cp      e
1054+ D669 DA A6 D6    >                        jp		c, NodeIsNotVisible
1055+ D66C              CheckFace1:                                                                                                                         ;;;     if all FaceVisile[point face any of idx1,2,3 or 4] = 0
1056+ D66C                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;     get point face idx from byte 4 & 5 of normal
1056+ D66C 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1056+ D66D 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1056+ D66E 32 70 83    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1057+ D671 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1058+ D672 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1059+ D674 E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1060+ D675                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                    ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 4;;;
1060+ D675 21 D2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1060+ D678 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1060+ D67A 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1061+ D67B E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1062+ D67C                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1062+ D67C A7          >                        and     a
1062+ D67D C2 AC D6    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1063+ D680              CheckFace2:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1064+ D680 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1065+ D681 ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1066+ D683 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1067+ D685                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1067+ D685 A7          >                        and     a
1067+ D686 C2 AC D6    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1068+ D689              CheckFace3:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1069+ D689                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;
1069+ D689 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1069+ D68A 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1069+ D68B 32 70 83    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1070+ D68E 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1071+ D68F E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1072+ D691 E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1073+ D692                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                  ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 5;;;
1073+ D692 21 D2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1073+ D695 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1073+ D697 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1074+ D698 E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1075+ D699                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1075+ D699 A7          >                        and     a
1075+ D69A C2 AC D6    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1076+ D69D              CheckFace4:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1077+ D69D 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1078+ D69E ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1079+ D6A0 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1080+ D6A2                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1080+ D6A2 A7          >                        and     a
1080+ D6A3 C2 AC D6    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1081+ D6A6              NodeIsNotVisible:                                                                                                                   ;;;
1082+ D6A6 01 04 00             ld          bc,4
1083+ D6A9 FD 09                add         iy,bc                               ; if not visible then move to next element in array anyway                  ;;;
1084+ D6AB                      ;;; Should we be loading FFFFFFFF into 4 bytes or just ignore?
1085+ D6AB C9                   ret                                                                                                      ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1086+ D6AC              NodeIsVisible:
1087+ D6AC              LL49:
1088+ D6AC CD 53 D5             call        ProcessVisibleNode                  ; Process node to determine if it goes on heap
1089+ D6AF C9                   ret
1090+ D6B0
1091+ D6B0
1092+ D6B0              ProjectNodeToEye:
1093+ D6B0 ED 4B AA C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)					; BC = Z Cordinate. By here it MUST be positive as its clamped to 4 min
1094+ D6B4 79           	ld			a,c                                 ;  so no need for a negative check
1095+ D6B5 32 73 84     	ld			(varQ),a		                    ; VarQ = z
1096+ D6B8 3A A6 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)                     ; XX15	\ rolled x lo which is signed
1097+ D6BB CD FB 99     	call		DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC					; result in BC which is 16 bit TODO Move to 16 bit below not just C reg
1098+ D6BE 3A A7 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1099+ D6C1                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeXPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1099+ D6C1 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1099+ D6C3 C2 CE D6    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeXPoint
1100+ D6C6              EyePositiveXPoint:									; x was positive result
1101+ D6C6 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
1102+ D6C8 26 00            ld          h,0
1103+ D6CA 09               add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
1104+ D6CB C3 D5 D6         jp          EyeStoreXPoint
1105+ D6CE              EyeNegativeXPoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
1106+ D6CE 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX
1107+ D6D0 26 00            ld          h,0
1108+ D6D2                  ClearCarryFlag
1108+ D6D2 B7          >                        or a
1109+ D6D3 ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
1110+ D6D5              EyeStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1111+ D6D5 EB               ex          de,hl
1112+ D6D6 FD 73 00         ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point TODO this bit is 16 bit aware just need to fix above bit
1113+ D6D9 FD 72 01         ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1114+ D6DC              EyeProcessYPoint:
1115+ D6DC ED 4B AA C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)					; Now process Y co-ordinate
1116+ D6E0 79           	ld			a,c
1117+ D6E1 32 73 84     	ld			(varQ),a
1118+ D6E4 3A A8 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)                     ; XX15	\ rolled x lo
1119+ D6E7 CD FB 99     	call		DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	                ; a = Y scaled * 256 / zscaled
1120+ D6EA 3A A9 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1121+ D6ED                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
1121+ D6ED CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1121+ D6EF C2 FA D6    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeYPoint
1122+ D6F2              EyePositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
1123+ D6F2 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1124+ D6F4                  ClearCarryFlag
1124+ D6F4 B7          >                        or a
1125+ D6F5 ED 42            sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
1126+ D6F7 C3 FF D6         jp          EyeStoreYPoint
1127+ D6FA              EyeNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
1128+ D6FA 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1129+ D6FC 26 00            ld          h,0
1130+ D6FE 09               add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
1131+ D6FF              EyeStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1132+ D6FF EB               ex          de,hl
1133+ D700 FD 73 02         ld          (iy+2),e                            ; Update Y Point
1134+ D703 FD 72 03         ld          (iy+3),d                            ; Update Y Point
1135+ D706 C9               ret
1136+ D707
1137+ D707
1138+ D707
1139+ D707              ; Pitch and roll are 2 phases
1140+ D707              ; 1 - we apply our pitch and roll to the ship position
1141+ D707              ;       x -> x + alpha * (y - alpha * x)
1142+ D707              ;       y -> y - alpha * x - beta * z
1143+ D707              ;       z -> z + beta * (y - alpha * x - beta * z)
1144+ D707              ; which can be simplified as:
1145+ D707              ;       1. K2 = y - alpha * x
1146+ D707              ;       2. z = z + beta * K2
1147+ D707              ;       3. y = K2 - beta * z
1148+ D707              ;       4. x = x + alpha * y
1149+ D707              ; 2 - we apply our patch and roll to the ship orientation
1150+ D707              ;      Roll calculations:
1151+ D707              ;
1152+ D707              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1153+ D707              ;        nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1154+ D707              ;      Pitch calculations:
1155+ D707              ;
1156+ D707              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - beta * nosev_z_hi
1157+ D707              ;        nosev_z = nosev_z + beta * nosev_y_hi
1158+ D707
1159+ D707
1160+ D707              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1161+ D707                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
   1++D707
   2++D707              ; Full version
   3++D707              ; 1. K2 = y - alpha * x
   4++D707              ; 2. z = z + beta * K2
   5++D707              ; 3. y = K2 - beta * z
   6++D707              ; 4. x = x + alpha * y
   7++D707
   8++D707
   9++D707              APPequPosPlusAPP:       MACRO    Position, PositionSign
  10++D707 ~                                    push    bc
  11++D707 ~                                    ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  12++D707 ~                                    ld      a,(PositionSign)
  13++D707 ~                                    ld      b,a
  14++D707 ~                                    ld      a,c
  15++D707 ~                                    xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  16++D707 ~                                    jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  17++D707 ~            ; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  18++D707 ~                                    ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  19++D707 ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  20++D707 ~                                    add     hl,de
  21++D707 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  22++D707 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  23++D707 ~                                    pop     bc
  24++D707 ~                                    ret
  25++D707 ~            ; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  26++D707 ~            .MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  27++D707 ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  28++D707 ~                                    or      a
  29++D707 ~                                    sbc     hl,de
  30++D707 ~                                    jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  31++D707 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  32++D707 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  33++D707 ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  34++D707 ~                                    pop     bc
  35++D707 ~                                    ret
  36++D707 ~            .MV51:                  NegHL
  37++D707 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl
  38++D707 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  39++D707 ~                                    pop     bc
  40++D707 ~                                    ret
  41++D707                                      ENDM
  42++D707
  43++D707
  44++D707              APPequXPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKxlo, UBnKxsgn
  44++D707 C5          >                        push    bc
  44++D708 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  44++D709 3A 22 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
  44++D70C 47          >                        ld      b,a
  44++D70D 79          >                        ld      a,c
  44++D70E A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  44++D70F FA 20 D7    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  44++D712             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  44++D712 ED 5B 71 83 >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  44++D716 2A 20 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  44++D719 19          >                        add     hl,de
  44++D71A 22 71 83    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  44++D71D 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  44++D71E C1          >                        pop     bc
  44++D71F C9          >                        ret
  44++D720             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  44++D720 ED 5B 71 83 >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  44++D724 2A 20 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  44++D727 B7          >                        or      a
  44++D728 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  44++D72A 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  44++D72C 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  44++D72D 22 71 83    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  44++D730 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  44++D732 C1          >                        pop     bc
  44++D733 C9          >                        ret
  44++D734             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  44++D734 AF          >                    xor a
  44++D735 95          >                    sub l
  44++D736 6F          >                    ld l,a
  44++D737 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  44++D738 94          >                    sub h
  44++D739 67          >                    ld h,a
  44++D73A 22 71 83    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  44++D73D 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  44++D73E C1          >                        pop     bc
  44++D73F C9          >                        ret
  45++D740
  46++D740              APPequYPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKylo, UBnKysgn
  46++D740 C5          >                        push    bc
  46++D741 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  46++D742 3A 25 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
  46++D745 47          >                        ld      b,a
  46++D746 79          >                        ld      a,c
  46++D747 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  46++D748 FA 59 D7    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  46++D74B             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  46++D74B ED 5B 71 83 >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  46++D74F 2A 23 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  46++D752 19          >                        add     hl,de
  46++D753 22 71 83    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  46++D756 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  46++D757 C1          >                        pop     bc
  46++D758 C9          >                        ret
  46++D759             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  46++D759 ED 5B 71 83 >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  46++D75D 2A 23 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  46++D760 B7          >                        or      a
  46++D761 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  46++D763 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  46++D765 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  46++D766 22 71 83    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  46++D769 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  46++D76B C1          >                        pop     bc
  46++D76C C9          >                        ret
  46++D76D             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  46++D76D AF          >                    xor a
  46++D76E 95          >                    sub l
  46++D76F 6F          >                    ld l,a
  46++D770 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  46++D771 94          >                    sub h
  46++D772 67          >                    ld h,a
  46++D773 22 71 83    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  46++D776 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  46++D777 C1          >                        pop     bc
  46++D778 C9          >                        ret
  47++D779
  48++D779              APPequZPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKzlo, UBnKzsgn
  48++D779 C5          >                        push    bc
  48++D77A 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  48++D77B 3A 28 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
  48++D77E 47          >                        ld      b,a
  48++D77F 79          >                        ld      a,c
  48++D780 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  48++D781 FA 92 D7    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  48++D784             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  48++D784 ED 5B 71 83 >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  48++D788 2A 26 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
  48++D78B 19          >                        add     hl,de
  48++D78C 22 71 83    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  48++D78F 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  48++D790 C1          >                        pop     bc
  48++D791 C9          >                        ret
  48++D792             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  48++D792 ED 5B 71 83 >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  48++D796 2A 26 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
  48++D799 B7          >                        or      a
  48++D79A ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  48++D79C 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  48++D79E 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  48++D79F 22 71 83    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  48++D7A2 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  48++D7A4 C1          >                        pop     bc
  48++D7A5 C9          >                        ret
  48++D7A6             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  48++D7A6 AF          >                    xor a
  48++D7A7 95          >                    sub l
  48++D7A8 6F          >                    ld l,a
  48++D7A9 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  48++D7AA 94          >                    sub h
  48++D7AB 67          >                    ld h,a
  48++D7AC 22 71 83    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  48++D7AF 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  48++D7B0 C1          >                        pop     bc
  48++D7B1 C9          >                        ret
  49++D7B2
  50++D7B2              ; rollWork holds Alpha intermidate results
  51++D7B2 00 00 00     rollWork      DS 3
  52++D7B5              rollWorkp1    equ rollWork
  53++D7B5              rollWorkp2    equ rollWork+1
  54++D7B5              rollWorkp3    equ rollWork+2
  55++D7B5
  56++D7B5              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  57++D7B5              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
  58++D7B5 3A 89 83     ApplyMyRollAndPitch:    ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
  59++D7B8 21 7D 83                             ld      hl,BET1                     ; and pitch
  60++D7BB B6                                   or      (hl)
  61++D7BC CA 78 D9                             jp      z,.NoRotation               ; if both zero then don't compute
  62++D7BF                                      ;break
  63++D7BF              ; P[210] = x * alph (we use P[2]P[1] later as result/256
  64++D7BF 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; e = roll magnitude
  65++D7C0 2A 20 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                ; hl = ship x pos
  66++D7C3 CD 44 97                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2-2 AHL = UbnkXlo * Alp1 both unsigned
  67++D7C6 32 72 83                             ld      (varPhi2),a                 ; set P[2] to high byte to help with ./256
  68++D7C9 22 70 83                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo * Alph1
  69++D7CC              ; A = Flip sign
  70++D7CC 3A 8A 83                             ld      a,(ALP2)                ; flip the current roll angle alpha and xor with x sign
  71++D7CF 21 22 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxsgn                 ; and xor with x pos sign
  72++D7D2 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; so now  (A P+2 P+1) = - (x_sign x_hi x_lo) * alpha / 256
  73++D7D3              ; AP[2]P[1] =Y + AP[2]P[1] (i.e. Previous APP/256)
  74++D7D3 CD 40 D7                             call    APPequYPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 calculate APP = y - (x * alpha / 256)
  75++D7D6              ; K2 = AP[2][1] K2(3 2 1) = (A P+2 P+1) = y - x * alpha / 256
  76++D7D6 32 B4 D7                             ld      (rollWorkp3),a               ; k2+3 = sign of result
  77++D7D9 22 B2 D7                             ld      (rollWorkp1),hl             ; k2+1,2 = result
  78++D7DC              ; P[210] = K2[2 1] * Beta  = (A ~P) * X
  79++D7DC 3A 7D 83                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; a = magnitude of pitch
  80++D7DF 5F                                   ld      e,a
  81++D7E0 CD 44 97                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (P+2 P+1) * BET1 or by now ((UbnkXlo * Alph1)/256 * Bet1)
  82++D7E3 32 72 83                             ld      (varPp2),a                   ; save highest byte in P2
  83++D7E6 22 70 83                             ld      (varP),hl
  84++D7E9              ; Fetch sign of previosu cal and xor with BETA inverted
  85++D7E9 3A B4 D7                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)
  86++D7EC 5F                                   ld      e,a
  87++D7ED 3A 7E 83                             ld      a,(BET2)
  88++D7F0 AB                                   xor     e                           ; so we get the sign of K3 and xor with pitch sign
  89++D7F1              ; Z = P[210] =Z + APP
  90++D7F1 CD 79 D7                             call    APPequZPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6
  91++D7F4 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ; save result back into z
  92++D7F7 22 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
  93++D7FA              ; A[P1]P[0] = z * Beta
  94++D7FA 3A 7D 83                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; get pitch back again for mulitply in original it was kept in Q so no fetch needed
  95++D7FD 5F                                   ld      e,a
  96++D7FE CD 44 97                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2 P2 P1 was already in hl (A P+1 P) = (z_hi z_lo) * beta
  97++D801 32 72 83                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; P2 = high byte of result
  98++D804 22 70 83                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo & Alph1
  99++D807              ; A xor BET2,Zsign
 100++D807 3A B4 D7                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)               ; get K3 (sign of y) and store it in y pos
 101++D80A 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a                ; save result back into y
 102++D80D 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; a = y sign Xor pitch rate sign
 103++D80E 3A 7E 83                             ld      a,(BET2)                    ;
 104++D811 AB                                   xor     e                           ;
 105++D812 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; now xor it with z sign too
 106++D813 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ;
 107++D816 AB                                   xor     e                           ; so now a = sign of y * beta * sign y * sign z
 108++D817 F2 26 D8                             jp      p,.MV43                     ; if result is pve beta * z and y have differetn signs
 109++D81A 2A 71 83                             ld      hl,(varPp1)
 110++D81D ED 5B B2 D7                          ld      de,(rollWorkp1)
 111++D821 B7                                   or      a
 112++D822 19                                   add     hl,de
 113++D823 C3 40 D8                             jp      .MV44
 114++D826 2A B2 D7     .MV43:                  ld      hl,(rollWorkp1)
 115++D829 ED 5B 71 83                          ld      de,(varPp1)
 116++D82D B7                                   or      a
 117++D82E ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; (y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1)
 118++D830 30 0E                                jr      nc,.MV44                    ; if there was no over flow carry on
 119++D832                                      NegHL
 119++D832 AF          >                    xor a
 119++D833 95          >                    sub l
 119++D834 6F          >                    ld l,a
 119++D835 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 119++D836 94          >                    sub h
 119++D837 67          >                    ld h,a
 120++D838 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                ; flip sign bit TODO, we may have to remove xor as planets and suns are sign + 23 bit xpos
 121++D83B EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 122++D83D 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 123++D840              ; by here we have (y_sign y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1) = K2 - beta * z
 124++D840 22 23 C0     .MV44:                  ld      (UBnKylo),hl                ; we do save here to avoid two writes if MV43 ended up with a 2s'c conversion
 125++D843 3A 89 83                             ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
 126++D846 5F                                   ld      e,a
 127++D847 2A 23 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 128++D84A CD 44 97                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 129++D84D 32 72 83                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; store high byte P(2 1 0) = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 130++D850 22 70 83                             ld      (varP),hl
 131++D853 3A 8B 83                             ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)
 132++D856 5F                                   ld      e,a
 133++D857 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 134++D85A AB                                   xor     e                           ; a = sign of roll xor y so now we have (A P+2 P+1) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo) * alpha / 256
 135++D85B CD 07 D7                             call    APPequXPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 Set (A P+2 P+1) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo) + (A P+2 P+1) = x + y * alpha / 256
 136++D85E 32 22 C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a                ; save resutl stright into X pos
 137++D861 22 20 C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 138++D864                                      ;break
 139++D864                                      ; if its not a sun then apply to local orientation
 140++D864                                      ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatNosevX, UBnkrotmatNosevY   ; ApplyMyRollToNosev:
 140++D864             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
 140++D864 3A 88 83    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
 140++D867 32 73 84    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 140++D86A             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
 140++D86A 2A 37 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
 140++D86D 22 74 84    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 140++D870             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
 140++D870 3A 35 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
 140++D873 32 70 83    >                        ld       (varP),a
 140++D876 3A 36 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
 140++D879 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
 140++D87B CD C9 96    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
 140++D87E ED 53 37 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 140++D882             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 140++D882 2A 35 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
 140++D885 22 74 84    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 140++D888 3A 38 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
 140++D88B CD C9 96    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
 140++D88E ED 53 35 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 141++D892                                      ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatSidevX, UBnkrotmatSidevY   ; ApplyMyRollToSidev:
 141++D892             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
 141++D892 3A 88 83    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
 141++D895 32 73 84    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 141++D898             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
 141++D898 2A 2B C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
 141++D89B 22 74 84    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 141++D89E             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
 141++D89E 3A 29 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
 141++D8A1 32 70 83    >                        ld       (varP),a
 141++D8A4 3A 2A C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
 141++D8A7 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
 141++D8A9 CD C9 96    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
 141++D8AC ED 53 2B C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 141++D8B0             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 141++D8B0 2A 29 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
 141++D8B3 22 74 84    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 141++D8B6 3A 2C C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
 141++D8B9 CD C9 96    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
 141++D8BC ED 53 29 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 142++D8C0                                      ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatRoofvX, UBnkrotmatRoofvY   ; ApplyMyRollToRoofv:
 142++D8C0             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)

 145++D974 ED 53 33 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 146++D978 3A 6E 84     .NoRotation:            ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; get speed
 147++D97B 16 00                                ld      d,0
 148++D97D 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; de = speed in low byte
 149++D97E 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                ; hl = z position
 150++D981 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ; b = z sign
 151++D984 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;
 152++D985 0E 80                                ld      c,$80                       ; c = -ve as we are always moving forwards
 153++D987 CD B6 94                             call    ADDHLDESignBC               ; update speed
 154++D98A 22 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl                ; write back to zpos
 155++D98D 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ;
 156++D990 C9                                   ret
